text: Welcome to 150 Lowell a beautifully updated home nestled in the heart of Sierra Madre, offering the perfect blend of modern comfort, thoughtful design, and effortless indoor-outdoor living. Fully upgraded & refined with exceptional attention to detail, this 3-bedroom, 3-bath residence is designed for both everyday living and stylish entertaining. The bright, open floor plan flows seamlessly, filled with natural light and inviting spaces. The spacious primary suite feels like a private retreat, featuring custom wood built-ins, a spa-inspired en-suite bath, and serene views of the backyard a true sanctuary within the home. Step outside and experience your very own resort-style oasis. The private backyard features a sparkling solar-heated pool (owned solar), expansive covered patio, and a detached garage with an additional bathroom ideal for poolside guests or future creative use. The garage is also equipped with a dedicated EV charger, adding convenience for electric vehicle owners. Notable upgrades include three tankless water heaters, dual-zone HVAC (with separate systems for the main living area and primary suite), a whole-house water filtration system, and an outdoor hot-water shower perfect after a swim or a day in the garden. Situated on an oversized lot, this exceptional property offers privacy, comfort, and an elevated lifestyle all just moments from Sierra Madres charming downtown, hiking trails, and award-winning schools. A rare opportunity to own a thoughtfully curated home in one of the San Gabriel Valleys most beloved communities.

This lovely townhouse-style condo is set back from the street in a wonderful location within the charming Hastings Oaks Condominium Complex in Sierra Madre. The spacious light-filled main level has an open floor plan, creating an inviting and airy atmosphere. Sliding glass doors in the living room lead to a large private patio. It features wood flooring, plantation shutters and recessed lighting. The updated kitchen is complete with beautiful granite countertops and ample cabinetry. The dining area off the kitchen has an adjoining balcony with wonderful city-light views at night. A convenient powder room completes the downstairs level of the home. Upstairs, you'll find two spacious bedrooms with large closets and an updated bathroom. The primary bedroom offers serene garden and treetop views, while the second bedroom offers fantastic night time light views as well. Best of all, due to its unique location within the complex, it does not face directly towards any other units creating a sense of privacy that is unusual to find in a complex such as this. The HOA allows a washer and dryer to be installed with HOA approval. The unit includes two designated parking spaces; a carport space with additional storage and a second space that's not covered. Residents can enjoy the community pool and recreation room. The location is close to The Village in Sierra Madre, offering access to fantastic shopping, dining and all the charm that Sierra Madre has to offer. There are also nearby shopping options in Pasadena which is just a short drive away. Welcome home!

Charming Cottage Home in Sierra Madre Nestled on a peaceful, tree-lined street in the desirable community of Sierra Madre, this enchanting 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom cottage offers a perfect blend of privacy, comfort, and character. The homes inviting curb appeal welcomes you, with its sunny yellow exterior. Inside, youll find a beautifully maintained and thoughtfully designed living space that is newly painted with new flooring. The light-filled home provides a warm, welcoming atmosphere, ideal for both relaxing and entertaining. The living room has a wood burning fireplace along with hard wood flooring and offers easy access to the cozy outdoor patio and garden areaperfect for al fresco dining and enjoying the serene surroundings. There is also a separate dining room off the living room with stunning custom-made wood build ins. On the other side of the house, there is a separate family room/den that is a cozy retreat and allows for multiple areas for entertainment. The private primary suite upstairs boasts ample space, complete with an en-suite bathroom for ultimate convenience and comfort. The mountain views from it are spectacular. The additional 2 main floor bedrooms are generously sized and versatile, perfect for family, guests, or a home office. The lush and secluded front yard offers a peaceful retreat, where you can unwind amidst mature trees and well-maintained landscaping. Located on a quiet street, yet just moments from local shops, dining, and the beauty of the surrounding foothills, this home offers the best of both worldsa tranquil retreat and easy access to everything Sierra Madre has to offer.

This charming two-story home, built in 2008, offers the coveted Sierra Madre lifestyle, blending classic charm with modern amenities. The main level features a dining area that seamlessly flows into the kitchen, complete with built-in stainless steel appliances, ample cabinetry, and generous counter space for meal preparation. A main floor bedroom and bathroom provide convenient guest accommodations. Upstairs, a spacious living room awaits, highlighted by double doors that open to a balcony showcasing breathtaking mountain views. The primary bedroom and bathroom are also located on this level, along with a laundry area equipped with stackable washer/dryer hook-ups. Additional features include central air and heat, dual pane windows, a water filtration system, and owned solar panels! Enjoy the prime location, just a few blocks from the shops and restaurants of downtown Sierra Madre.

Step into a timeless masterpiece of Spanish Colonial Revival architecture with Casa El Encanto, a landmark property steeped in history and charm. Built in 1932 during the golden era of design, this extraordinary residence showcases exquisite craftsmanship and thoughtful details that transport you to a bygone era of elegance. Casa El Encanto exudes character and authenticity. The house has been carefully maintained and improved over the decades while retaining its historical integrity.This hacienda style home boasts over 4, 400 square feet of meticulously designed living space, including five bedrooms, four and a half bathrooms, and an array of stunning features. Exquisite padre tile floors create a warm and inviting ambiance. Open-beamed ceilings, tiled bathrooms, and period-specific lighting blend seamlessly with modern comforts.A 9-by-52-foot flagstone front porch, grand covered central patio with sweeping views of the valley below and a rear stone terrace with a built-in barbecue set the stage for gracious entertaining. The extensive gardens include meandering paths, citrus and fruit trees, sports court and a sparkling swimming pool and spa. The property also includes a recently updated HVAC system and seismic reinforcements. Nestled in the serene Sierra Madre community, Casa El Encanto offers the perfect blend of privacy and convenience. With its unique history, stunning craftsmanship, and timeless beauty, this home is truly one-of-a-kind.

Welcome to this tastefully remodeled single-level traditional home, nestled on a spacious 11, 400 sq ft lot on a peaceful, tree-lined street in the charming town of Sierra Madre. This home has been thoughtfully updated while maintaining its timeless appeal. The original wood floors have been lovingly restored, adding warmth and character throughout the home. The inviting living room features a cozy fireplace and a stunning floor-to-ceiling picture window, allowing natural light to flood the room.The kitchen has been completely remodeled with brand-new appliances, making meal prep a breeze. Both bathrooms have been tastefully updated, providing modern comfort and style. The home features three bedrooms, including a spacious and versatile back bedroom with backyard access, offering a variety of possibilities--whether as a bedroom, music room, gym, or office-- it provides flexible living options.Step outside to your private, expansive backyard, where you can unwind and enjoy serene mountain views by the sparkling pool. The property also includes energy-efficient solar panels (paid in full), newer windows, new light fixtures, electrical outlets, fresh stucco, and exterior paint, ensuring you can move in with peace of mind.Additional features include a two-car finished garage, central air and heat, and automatic sprinklers. Located just three blocks from the vibrant Sierra Madre village, you'll have access to hiking trails, parks, a dog park, and convenient freeway access, making this location ideal for both relaxation and recreation.This is a truly special property that combines modern updates with a prime location. Don't miss out - schedule your private tour today and make this dream home yours!

This gracious shingled estate, known as Sierra Bonita Ranch - Yerxa House, is situated on a gated and lushly landscaped .92 acre lot and was completely reconstructed in recent years from exterior walls to interior studs while retaining its original exterior design. As a Designated Historical Landmark and under the Mills Act, thus enjoying substantially reduced property taxes, the nearly 6800 square foot home offers mountain and valley views, expansive public rooms, and wide terraces for large-scale entertaining. No detail was overlooked in the years' long reconstruction of the home and grounds with meticulous attention to detail and superior craftsmanship, including elegant finishes with box beams and crown mouldings, sophisticated lighting throughout, and new electrical, plumbing, whole house water filtration, water softener, fire sprinkler and solar systems, built-in window screens, seismic retrofitting, exterior walls, shingles, roof, and terrace. Special interior features include fireplaces in the Living and Dining Rooms as well as the Primary Bedroom suite, multiple French doors opening to terraces and decks, a Lacanche stove, two Miele dishwashers and wine refrigeration in the Kitchen, an office, theater and sun rooms, and a magnificent second floor Library-Family Room. Exterior features include pool, spa, new landscaping, lighting, and stonework, a porte-cochere, and sweeping front and rear lawns. This is an exceptional estate offering of a truly 'newer old house' in the heart of one of the San Gabriel Valley's most beloved village communities

This charming townhome is perfectly situated just 2 blocks from the delightful Sierra Madre village area and all it has to offer. The interior has been freshlypainted and features newly installed laminate floors. Upon entry, you are welcomed to a spacious living room with fireplace. The family room and adjacentdining area both open to a private patio, perfect for morning coffee or dining alfresco. The upstairs features a generous primary bedroom suite with walk-in closet and a balcony. There are 2 other bedrooms, including one that is oversized, giving you an opportunity to create a 4th bedroom. Another fullbathroom is in the hallway. The two-car attached garage with direct access to the home provides laundry hook ups and storage. This home's great location offers easy access to restaurants, shops, parks, hiking trails, and the joys of living in Sierra Madre.

Step into the epitome of refined living, where meticulous craftsmanship and modern luxury converge in this stunning residence. Impeccably remodeled inside and out, this home offers a seamless blend of elegance and functionality. The residence offers ample space with four oversized bedrooms, updated kitchen and three en-suite bathrooms adorned with opulent marble, natural stone and granite finishes. Beautiful Belgard paver driveway leads to an oversized 2.5 car garage to fit all your toys, and natural stone hardscape enhance the home's curb appeal and inviting atmosphere. As you enter through the front door, you will discover a spacious living room accentuated by vault ceiling and gleaming hardwood floors seamlessly connecting with a family room, dining room and downstairs bedroom. The kitchen features a Bertazzoni 6-burner range, beautiful granite and a farmer's sink that will cater to culinary enthusiasts. Two sets of French doors open to the large backyard featuring meticulous landscape, mature trees and a paved patio perfect for entertainment. A maple wood staircase will lead you to the upstairs where you will find three bedrooms, including two master suites with en-suite bathrooms. The primary suite bedroom features a walk-in closet and a balcony overlooking the tranquil backyard. The beautifully maintained home abounds many upgrades, and the comprehensive renovation included a new Pex repipe, new HVAC ducting, a top-of-the-line variable TRANE XV20 system with dual zones for ultimate comfort control, and so much more. The home also boasts Toto toilets and sinks, Hansgrohe and Toto fixtures, crown molding throughout and the convenience of a tankless water heater with instant hot water. Recent 2023 improvements include a new roof and fresh exterior paint, ensuring years of worry-free living. Indulge in the pinnacle of luxurious living, where every detail has been thoughtfully curated to provide a haven you'll be proud to call home.

Opportunity awaits in Sierra Madre Must See Renderings! Buyers ready to reimagine its potential Here's your chance to transform this spacious home into your dream retreat. With 2, 496 square feet of living space on a generous 10, 543 square foot lot, there's plenty of room to design your ideal living environment.Currently featuring four bedrooms and three bathrooms, this home offers ample space to meet a variety of needs. The expansive private yard invites you to create your own outdoor oasis--whether it's a lush garden, a play area, a swimming pool, or a spot for evening al fresco gatherings.The property includes a garage for all your storage or project needs, and parking is easy with the included space. You'll love the convenience of being close to local shops, restaurants, and picturesque trails, offering endless opportunities for leisure and exploration.This is a fantastic opportunity to put your personal touch on a home and make it uniquely yours. Whether you're an experienced renovator or just eager to create a space that reflects your style, this property is brimming with potential. Don't miss out on turning this Sierra Madre gem into your dream home!

Nestled on a quiet and tree lined cul-de-sacat the top of the world, you'll find this classic Mid-Century home boasting breathtaking, panoramic valley, city lights and mountain views. If you desire privacy and a slower-paced lifestyle, look no further. This property offers a rare and exceptional opportunity for privacy and reflection, this home makes nature's beauty an extension of your backyard. Step inside & immediately discover the 'oh my goodness' factor. This property creates an inviting atmosphere, where a multi-wing concept design is centered around a step down living room with floor-to-ceiling windows a dining area and with a oversized set of sliding glass doors that seamlessly blend indoor and outdoor spaces, drawing you in with mesmerizing views that invite you to wander out to the scenic deck that just begs you to sit and relax. This freshly repainted home, both inside and out, is every buyer's dream. The new carpet makes the home even more cozy.Please don't miss the primary wing where there is both primary bedroom suite and a extra large room that could be used as an office, sitting room, den, and so much more. The bonus room has a door that opens to an expansive viewing deck where you can see local city lights and on a clear day all the way down to the LA skyline.The highly desirable Sierra Madre community offers a tranquil retreat, where you'll enjoy easy access to hiking, trails, local shops, dining, parks, and excellent schools. Enjoy the best of both worlds - a serene neighborhood atmosphere with convenient proximity to everything you need. Schedule your showing today. This will not last!

Situated on a generous 10, 152-square-foot lot, this delightful one-story, 1, 288-square-foot home offers 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, making it the perfect canvas for your dream lifestyle. Recently updated with a new roof, fresh exterior paint, and a beautifully low-maintenance landscaped front yard, and hardwood flooring throughout, this property offers ample opportunities for personalization. The kitchen features a spacious pantry and a convenient laundry room area. The primary bedroom includes an ensuite bathroom with a walk-in tub for added comfort. The expansive lot provides incredible potential for future enhancementsimagine adding a home, an ADU, or even a sparkling pool. With so much space, the possibilities are truly endless! Discover the charm and versatility this property has to offer. Don't miss the chance to make it yours!

Welcome to 397 N Mountain Trail, a beautifully updated home in lovely Sierra Madre. This charming residence offers a perfect blend of modern updates and serene living, with an updated kitchen and bathrooms showcasing contemporary finishes and fixtures, ideal for those who appreciate both style and functionality. An open layout allows seamless flow from the comfortable living room with its gas fireplace to the kitchen with breakfast bar and dining area which opens to the back yard. The expansive upstairs primary bedroom suite is an entire floor complete with skylights, jetted tub, large walk-in closet and private balcony that invites you to soak in the tranquil surroundings. Step outside to the terraced pool area, where stunning mountain views create an idyllic backdrop for relaxation and entertaining with built-in BBQ, firepit area, canopy for al fresco dining, a grapevine, orange and lemon trees. The direct access garage has good storage options and laundry with an EV charging outlet on the exterior. Great landscaping, an inviting front porch and a convenient circular driveway provide great curb appeal in the front. Dont miss the amazing community happenings including the 4th of July parade, concerts in the park, taking in the amazing shops, restaurants, and coffee shops in town and the Mount Wilson Trail close to your doorstep for incredible hiking. Experience the best of indoor-outdoor living in this exceptional Sierra Madre retreat!

Located in the picturesque community of Sierra Madre, this 1956 Traditional single story home features 3 bedrooms, 2 and 1/2 baths. This home has been lovingly maintained by the same family for 68 years. The living room and family room have expansive sliding glass doors overlooking a spacious covered patio perfect for summertime dining or just enjoying the lush landscaped yard. These rooms also feature a double sided brick fireplace adding to the warmth and charm of this home. The main bedroom with hardwood floors is generous in size and closet space. It has direct access to the full bath. The remaining two bedrooms with hardwood floors share a 3/4 bath. The galley kitchen has spotless white tiled counters with a cooktop and double ovens. The kitchen also offers a comfortable breakfast area. Beyond the kitchen is the laundry room and 1/2 bath. The large two car garage has an attached room that could be an office or playroom. The backyard has an abundant grassy area plus a pad for RV parking. This home is also located in the Arcadia School District.

A Beautiful home nestled in the picturesque Sierra Madre Foothills. This stunningly reimagined 1950s post and beam home seamlessly blends mid-century charm with modern finishes. Offering breathtaking mountain views, an open-concept layout, and an abundance of natural light, this architectural gem is a rare find. The home is an entertainer's dream with a brand new custom Danish kitchen from Reform in Copenhagen, top tier line Fisher & Paykel integrated appliances, beautiful top tier OOAK quartz countertops, brand new floors throughout and a converted den with floor to ceiling Pinky's glass doors. The home offers a flexible floor plan with a living room, den, three bedrooms two bathrooms. In addition, there is a separate office with laundry off the carport. The entire home was refitted with new plumbing, the gas lines have been replaced, electrical has been modernized and warm flooring has been installed throughout. A detached home office and laundry room have also been created and the expansive 13, 573 lot is zoned for a lot split or an ADU addition. The lot features sweeping mountain views and has been updated with a large grass area, irrigation, outdoor entertaining patio, privacy hedges, and drought tolerant landscaping. Seller also willing to sell furnished with near new pieces from DWR, BluDot, Anthropologie, Article, CB2, Sundays and more.

LA's best kept secret is the enchanting Sierra Madre Canyon consisting of rustic hideaways. This hidden gem offers an escape where nature and serenity define everyday living. This character-rich Craftsman home of 1, 762 sf with 2 bedrooms & 2 baths also has a separate 346 sf guest house with 1 bedroom & 1 bath. Rarely do you find a home where the soothing sounds of a nearby stream create an atmosphere of pure tranquility. Discover the stunning stained-glass windows and doors throughout made with love by one of the sellers. There is wood flooring and the inviting layout is designed for comfort and function. The generous living room features an alcove and a separate space that lends well as an office, while the formal dining room is perfect for gatherings. A spacious kitchen serves as the heart of the home, and the first-floor bedroom offers 2 walk-in closets and an adjacent bath. Upstairs, the enchanting primary bedroom with an updated bathroom boasts a vaulted wood-accented ceiling and a cozy sitting room - ideal for relaxing or conversion to a luxurious walk-in closet.A rustic split-door welcomes you to this delightful guest house, complete with vaulted ceiling, a bedroom area with closet, an updated kitchen, & an updated bathroom. The stunning stained-glass window in the bedroom area is more than just decorative - It's a functional door! The front door was salvaged from the LA County Courthouse and given new life here. Don't miss the hidden surprise of 4 photo negatives embedded in the window above the bed - when the light captures it just right, the images revel themselves in the reflection. Wood flooring adds warmth, making this space perfect for guests, private office, or a potential income-producing rental. Parking is highly sought after making 2 spaces for the main house & a space for the studio a valuable asset. An impressive 1, 256-sf basement reveals a fortified concrete foundation and offers endless opportunities. Whether you envision a woodworking shop, hobby room, expansive storage, home gym, music studio, or private retreat, this versatile space is ready to accommodate your needs. Just steps from the beloved Mary's Market and minutes from the Mt. Wilson hiking trail, this home is also close to the vibrant and quaint Sierra Madre Village, highly rated schools, parks, dog park, and convenient freeway access. Enjoy the nearby city lifestyle all while savoring the peacefulness of canyon living.

Beautifully and meticulously maintained this 1952 Traditional single level home with many upgrades both inside and out is not to be missed. The mature drought tolerant front yard with secluded shaded sitting area sets the tone for the rest of the home. Both bright and spacious, this wonderful floor plan includes a formal entry, a spacious and open living room with newer gas fireplace. A large window provides a beautiful and private garden view to the outside. The kitchen has been completely remodeled to include quartz counter tops, custom made cabinets providing ample storage and offers an eat-in kitchen area. The dining room is conveniently located next to the kitchen. Two bedrooms share an updated bathroom including a full tub with shower. Convenient hall closets offer additional storage. A third bedroom with ensuite is currently being used as an office. Enjoy the private and serene fully fenced backyard with grassy play area, an oversized red brick patio area, ideal for entertaining, and many fruit trees to include citrus cara cara orange, lime, fig, apricot, nectarine & fuji persimmon. INVALUABLE FEATURES INCLUDE: Freshly painted inside, new roof, HVAC, newer insulation and ducting, updated electrical and plumbing, retrofitted, new redbrick entry way with security screen door, electrical outlets outside on all sides and much more. This well-tended home is a must see! Located with close proximity to charming downtown; explore shops, restaurants, parks, famous hiking trails, schools and the celebrated Sierra Madre Playhouse.

A 1961 modernist paradise in the foothills of Sierra Madre by architects Smith, Powell & Morgridge. Offering privacy, incredible views and dramatic design at every turn, this landmark mid-century modern home is a true work of art. Set down a long gated driveway, enter into a serene setting where the outside world melts away and the gorgeous natural surroundings take center stage. Inside you will find all the hallmarks of this design era: dramatic arched ceilings, wood paneled walls, original built-ins, stone floors and walls of glass bringing the outdoors inside including the massive city and hillside views. The main living space is open and bright with fireplace and dining area. A large kitchen with vintage details connects to a comfortable den with fireplace. Three spacious bedrooms and three bathrooms complete the layout that blends comfort and easy living. Outdoor spaces surround the home with numerous decks, patios and a stunning private spa and garden area. Ample parking and storage, multi-zone HVAC and a bonus workshop are just some of the many additional features. Located in a great Sierra Madre neighborhood close to Mount Wilson Trail Park, Mary's Market and downtown Sierra Madre. A very special home in a very special setting.

Nestled on a quiet and leafy cul-de-sac, this picture-perfect single-story home offers a thoughtfully designed floor plan, a serene setting, and breathtaking mountain and city light views. Beautifully reimagined and meticulously maintained, this gem of a home boasts a harmonious floor plan perfect for both everyday living and effortless entertaining and connectedness. Upon entry, you are embraced by the warmth of the living room's timeless wood beam ceilings, inviting brick fireplace with built-in hearth seating, and large picture window. Comfort extends into the dining room, featuring a delightful bay window and a discreet pocket door that leads to the heart of the home. Beyond the pocket door, the well-appointed kitchen seamlessly connects to the expansive family room for an effortless flow between spaces. Designed with both function and style in mind, the kitchen showcases high-end stainless steel appliances, abundant cabinetry including a walk-in pantry, a sunlit breakfast area, and an expansive nearly 8-foot island - perfect for meal prep, gathering, and lively conversations. The adjacent family room serves as a warm and welcoming retreat, complete with a cozy fireplace, custom built-in bar, and views and access to the professionally landscaped backyard. Here, sweeping mountain views provide a picturesque backdrop to a private oasis, perfect for relaxation and entertaining. Enhancing the outdoor experience, an elegant pergola shelters a fully equipped grill station with seating and twinkling city light views, creating the perfect setting for al fresco dining and memorable moments with family and friends. The primary suite is a true sanctuary, featuring vaulted ceilings, 11-inch custom moldings, and a lavish 16-foot walk-in closet. A solid glass panel door with full-light sidelights opens to a private covered patio, further elevating the suite's sense of space and tranquility. The spa-inspired en-suite bath completes this retreat, showcasing dual vanities, a luxurious shower, and a separate soaking tub - creating the ultimate haven of comfort and relaxation. Additional highlights of this exceptional home include owned solar panels, energy-efficient dual-pane windows, a private gated driveway, and wall-to-wall storage in the garage. A rare gem, perfectly blending elegance, modern comforts, and a breathtaking setting - this is truly a special home not to be missed!

Located in beautiful Sierra Madre, this 1955 traditional/Ranch style home features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, along with a versatile den spanning over 1, 825 square feet. Upon entering, you are greeted by an inviting living room fitted with a quarried stone gas-burning fireplace. The room is spacious, featuring an open-concept living and dining area, plus a bonus sitting space with a sliding glass door that provides access to the covered back patio.The home features a galley kitchen with a quaint built-in breakfast nook. It includes stainless steel appliances such as a gas cooktop, dishwasher, double oven, and a wood-paneled refrigerator. Adjacent to the kitchen, you'll find a separate laundry room equipped with a utility sink and a door leading to the backyard.The versatile den is accented with wood paneling and shelving, creating an at-home library--perfect for a home office or easily convertible back to its original use as a fourth bedroom. The master bedroom, with direct access to the three-quarter bathroom, is generously sized and features a built-in closet with drawers, hanging space, and upper cabinetry for abundant storage options. The home also includes two additional bedrooms and a full bathroom with a shower-tub combination.Outside, you'll notice the large covered patio area, perfect for entertaining guests, and the garden bed-lined exterior. Enjoy the tranquility of the lush landscaping and various fruit trees on the property. Additional features include an attached two-car garage, partial hardwood flooring, dual-pane windows, copper plumbing, an updated electrical panel, and a tankless water heater. This home is a true gem, offering a wonderful opportunity to enjoy the best of California living.

MAJOR ADDITION and RENOVATIONS completed in 2024! Discover unparalleled luxury in this exquisite Mid-century Modern Ranch home nestled in Sierra Madre. Situated on a sprawling 9, 000+ sq ft lot, this exceptional property features a newly expanded main house (2230 sq ft) and a brand new ADU (731 sq ft). Boasting four spacious bedrooms and three elegantly appointed bathrooms, the open-concept floor plan exudes sophistication with high ceilings and abundant natural light, perfect for seamless living and entertaining. The gourmet chef's kitchen, complete with a generous kitchen island, is a centerpiece for culinary endeavors and social gatherings. Step onto the inviting deck, ideal for outdoor dining and relaxation. With state-of-the-art upgrades including a new roof, plumbing, electrical systems, windows, doors, and HVAC, this home ensures contemporary comfort and tranquility. The brand-new ADU includes two bedrooms, one bathroom, and a private entrance, catering effortlessly to guests, extended family, or rental opportunities. Embrace luxurious living in Sierra Madre with access to local amenities, schools, and nearby parks. Dont miss this exclusive opportunity to own a meticulously designed property in one of Sierra Madres most coveted neighborhoods.

Back on the market as buyer was not able to sell their home. Welcome to 80 W. Grandview where you'll find a meticulously maintained authentic Victorian home built in 1889. This is an approved Mills Act Home which offers a potential monthly savings of $1, 368! For the past 40 years, the homeowners have taken great care to restore this gem to reflect its original splendor, which included removing a section that was added to the front of the home and restoring the facade to its originally built architecture. In the late 1980's the homeowner rewired and replumbed the whole house. In 1986 the foundation was fortified with 28 cubic yards of concrete and the house was bolted to the foundation. A delightful parlor offers the perfect spot for enjoying a good book and your favorite beverage while the adjacent living room offers a wood burning stove to cozy up to. A generous sized dining room features a large storage closet, access to a relaxing deck that overlooks the backyard and is adjacent the butler's pantry that provides extra storage. The updated kitchen features a new dishwasher, convection/microwave, oven, gas cooktop, garbage disposal, pantry, appliance cabinet and wood floors. Off the kitchen is a cozy den and a quaint breakfast room. Professional landscaped and meticulously maintained front and backyards, with an outdoor kitchen area as well as a pool and spa. The primary bedroom, with an office alcove and access to a large deck with treetop view, as well as 2 additional bedrooms and two bathrooms are located upstairs. Additional features: two staircases, an amazing basement of 728 sf offers a laundry sink, cedar closet and refrigerator; and endless other practical and special amenities described in the Seller Home Improvements sheet. The 359 sf garage features a multi-purpose room upstairs that could be an office, hobby room, gym, storage, etc. This is one house you will not want to miss. You are only an offer away from owning this amazing gem!

Welcome home to this quintessential Canyon property with stunning views of city lights and mountain vistas. Immerse yourself in the charm of wrap-around decks, picturesque windows, and French doors. The living room features high open beam ceilings and a gorgeous River rock fireplace. The kitchen and dining area exude charm with a Garden window and French door that seamlessly blend the indoors with the outdoors. The primary bedroom and full-size bathroom are conveniently located on the main level, with two additional bedrooms and a full bathroom upstairs. The lower level offers a cozy den or office with a Franklin stove. The artistry of the landscape design was inspired by Disneyland, with enchanting landscape lighting throughout the front yard , backyard and side yard. Unique, custom cobblestone approach with colored paver driveway. Fantastic inlaid concrete block walls with artistic charm and whimsey. Additionally, this property includes a one car garage and space for an additional 4-5 cars in driveway.

This stunning traditional home in Sierra Madre exudes character, charm, and beautiful views of the majestic Foothills. Situated on Manzanita Ave., the house features a spacious formal living room with built-in bookcases, an elegant fireplace, and ample space for entertaining. The open floor plan seamlessly connects the living room to the dining area adjacent to the kitchen. The kitchen presents an opportunity for transformation into your dream space. The large family room provides a peaceful view of the private backyard, with a covered patio conveniently located just off the family room. The professionally landscaped backyard features mature Chinese Elm and Pine trees that shade the manicured lawn. The home consists of three bedrooms and two bathrooms. The Primary Bedroom boasts a deluxe frosted glass wardrobe and an updated en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms share a spacious, updated hall bath. One of the bedrooms has built-ins, making it ideal for use as a home office or creative space, and it includes a cozy full bed nook. The third bedroom offers lovely mountain views. With proximity to Historic Sierra Madre's beautiful shops, restaurants, and fun, this gorgeous traditional home is a must-see.

MAJOR PRICE REDUCTION! Welcome to this beautiful property at 400 W. Carter Avenue. This home boasts 2, 482 sqft. and is located on over a quarter of an acre in the very desirable city of Sierra Madre. Enjoy the double sided fireplace in the large living room which opens into the dining area and newer kitchen. All five bedrooms are en-suites along with a conveniently placed mudroom. The home has been recently painted and has new flooring, light fixtures, central air & heat. The front yard has drought-tolerant landscaping and is completely fenced. This property offers a wide variety of opportunities with two driveways; an automatic driveway gate which opens to a large parking area on N Grove St. and a second driveway off Carter Ave. Just when you thought you were sold, wait till you hear about the ADU in the back! The back house offers 3 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom on 916SqFt of living space. Sierra Madre village is a short distance to a small town feel, provided with restaurants, boutique shops, and more. With the interest rates declining, this is your chance to own this gorgeous home in Sierra Madre with the best schools ().

This beautifully upgraded townhome is ideally situated just two blocks from the delightful village of Sierra Madre, offering easy access to shopping, restaurants, Taylor's Ol' Fashioned Market, and more. The interior has been freshly painted and features new carpeting throughout. The spacious living room has a fireplace and the family room opens to a lovely patio area. The eat-in kitchen boasts tile countertops and a generous pantry. Upstairs, you'll find three roomy bedrooms, with the option to convert one into a fourth. Sierra Madre Fire Station #2. Originally built in 1961 with a design by local architect Robert Ainsworth, this neighborhood fire station has been restored and converted into a one-of-a-kind live/work space. Having serviced the area until it was decommissioned by the city of Sierra Madre, it was later purchased by a private owner who completed the restoration into its current state in 2007. With its striking facade from the street, the interior is a clean and open space with a flexible floorplan for loft-like living with kitchen, full bathroom, storage and bedroom area. Much of the original fire station design remains with gorgeous concrete floors, original posts, 11-foot ceilings, skylight, and natural light from the front opaque door along with original lettering and lights. Tucked away in a serene location close to Mary's Market, local hiking and downtown Sierra Madre as well as Pasadena surrounding areas make this a rare and unique retreat.

Nestled on a premiere cul-de-sac, this rare gem boasts a single level home spanning 2, 493 square feet, complemented by a 508 square foot Guest House, all set on a spacious 14, 972 square foot flat lot. The location on one of the most coveted streets in town offers a serene setting surrounded by beautifully manicured California Ranch Homes and affords breathtaking panoramic views of the majestic San Gabriel Mountains. Originally constructed in 1952, this residence seamlessly marries timeless charm with modern luxury. Upon entering you are welcomed by a grand great room featuring soaring ceilings, rich hardwood floors, a traditional fireplace, and a wall of built-ins, all bathed in natural light streaming through nearly full wall height windows and doors. The view from the living space includes glimpses of the mountains, a lush canopy of trees, and the shimmering pool. A highlight of the home's layout is the open design that facilitates a seamless flow for both entertaining and everyday living. The thoughtfully designed rooms include a cozy den with a second fireplace and rich paneled walls, adding warmth and character. The large sunny kitchen, overlooking the front yard presents an opportunity for customization to create the Chef's Kitchen of your dreams. Outside the expansive covered patio serves as a bridge between the indoor and outdoor living areas, providing a peaceful retreat overlooking the pool, built in BBQ, Bar with sink and refrigerator, and the Charming Guest House. The primary suite, strategically positioned for privacy, offers a tranquil retreat overlooking the backyard. It features a spa like bathroom, two closets and built in linen closets line the hallway. On the opposite side of the house the secondary bedrooms share a bathroom, creating a comfortable and private space for family or guests. Adding to the allure of this property is the one bedroom Designer inspired Guest House meticulously renovated in 2015. Perfect for accommodating extended family, guests, or serving as a home office, this space offers endless possibilities to suit your needs. 220 South Canon represents a rare opportunity to own a truly extraordinary property. Make this exceptional residence your own and experience the unparalleled lifestyle it offers in Sierra Madre. Offers are due Tuesday, July 23 at 11 am.

Welcome to Twycross House! This architecturally significant Craftsman Bungalow inspired the creation of a national magazine in 1990 known as American Bungalow. The magazine also helped create a movement nationwide that popularized 'Bungalow' homes which are prevalent in southern California. There have only been two owners of this noteworthy property since it was built in 1915. It's easy to imagine yourself sitting on the cozy front porch beneath a beaded ceiling with a cold lemonade and a good book. The living and dining rooms are rich in Craftsman architecture with Douglas fir batten & board walls and doors, a Batchelder fireplace which was improved by adding some reproduction tiles, built-in hutches & China cabinets, plate rails, and original wood flooring. The huge R3 lot consists of 3 separate parcels totaling 18, 015 square feet (130 frontage X 139 deep). This property is on the Historic Register. Preliminary discussions with the Sierra Madre Planning staff explained that if the 3 lots were combined into one there is a possibility to build up to 6 units with a total square footage of 11, 100 sf. This property awaits a new steward who can appreciate its architectural style, its rich history and restore it to its glory days!

Welcome to your dream home in Sierra Madre! This elegant townhome is perfectly situated just a block and a half from downtown's Village area. With high ceilings, dual-pane windows, and central air conditioning, comfort is guaranteed. The spacious formal dining area overlooks the living room, complemented by beautiful hardwood floors. The lovely kitchen boasts upgraded granite countertops, a trash compactor, dishwasher, built-in microwave, and ample cabinet space. The large primary bedroom features recessed lighting, a ceiling fan, spacious closets, and a remodeled bathroom. Crown moldings, plantation shutters, and updated bathrooms add a touch of luxury throughout. For convenience and safety, there's a two-car attached garage and a laundry area. Entertain guests on the lovely patio or by the swimming pool on hot summer days. This property's prime location offers easy access to schools, hiking trails, golf courses, freeways, and the vibrant downtown scene with its shops and restaurants. Another bonus is that the HOA dues cover water, trash, fire/earthquake insurance, & maintenance of the grounds of the property. Don't miss this opportunity to make this your home sweet home!
full_street_line: 137 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit E

text: Here is Your Grandiose Mid-Century Modern 2-Story Home! This California Modern 5-Bedroom 3-Bath Home sits on a 1/2 Acre Plateau of Land w/all the Space you've ever Dreamed Of. This Naturalistic setting allows you to metaphorically escape the hustle and bustle of the City life while staying conveniently nestled within. The Cathedral Ceilings with Floor to Ceiling Windows fill in a Light and Lush Landscape bringing the Outdoors Indoors, as intended! Mature Oak & Pine Trees seclude your Peaceful and Tranquil Lifestyle on this Oversized Level Magnificent Lot with Sprinkler & Drip System. The List of Recent Upgrades goes on and on from Engineered Hard Wood Floors, All 3 Bathrooms & Kitchen Remodeled, Painted Interior & Exterior, Re-Piped Plumbing, added Recessed Lighting & Hardwired Smoke Detectors & Ceiling Fans in all bedrooms, Added Storage Crawl Space-Drywall-Recessed Lighting in Garage. The Master Retreat w/Dual Closets & En Suite Bath were completely Remodeled with an Oversized Shower and Bench to Relax, Dual Shower Heads, Dual Nooks, Dual Sinks, Walnut Wood Vanity and Quartz Countertops. The Eat-In Kitchen has Solid Cherry Cabinetry, New Quartz Countertops & Backsplash, New Floors, New Stove, Double Oven & Double Trash. Formal Dining w/Pool View! EVERYTHING you need is on these Expansive Grounds, a Pool (5Ft) & Spa (w/ new equip.), Half-Basketball Court, Built in BBQ & Gas Fire Pit, Entertaining Patio, Wet Bar, Mud Room, Laundry Room, Lemon-Orange-Pomegranate Trees, Drought Tolerant Plants, a ton of On Lot Parking. A Variety of Competitive Public, Private, & Charter School options Nearby like the California School of the Arts, High Point, St.Rita & LaSalle. The Small Town Vibe of Sierra Madre is within 3 square miles of Serenity between Pasadena & Arcadia. It has the quaintest downtown area (30 min walk) w/ many Locally Famous hot spots like Mother Moos Creamery, Brunch at Emmi's, Happy Hour at Lucky Baldwins, RT Rodgers Brewery just to name a few. The LA Arboretum, Huntington Garden and Mt Wilson Hiking Trail and many connecting will keep you Active for years to come. The City's Annual Events give the Warmth of a tight knit Community that keeps traditions alive. Don't Miss the 4th of July Parade coming up soon and the Guinness World Record Wisteria Vine Spring Festival. Sierra Vista Park is a retreat with Baseball Fields, Rec & Aquatics Center, Dog Park, Pools, Tennis & Playgrounds. Go Madre!

This delightful custom-built home with Tudor accents sits attractively on one of Sierra Madre's most coveted streets. Delivering a desirous floor plan of 3, 376 sqft on an expansive quarter-acre-plus lot that reveals picturesque landscaping enhanced by mountain and city-light views and a discernible note of serenity. The striking entry door, embellished with leaded glass, welcomes guests into an impressive foyer, rich hardwood floors, a sweeping staircase, soaring ceilings and a total of five bedrooms with four tastefully updated baths with classic finishes. The home offers the added benefit of a main-level bedroom and attached full bath ideal as a guest room or office. With large open rooms this home flows seamlessly for relaxed family living and entertaining. Undoubtedly, the heart of this home is the generously sized, step-down family room showcasing a vaulted ceiling, attractive fireplace and built-in bar. The room opens to a Trex deck and verdant views with easy flow into the wraparound rear yard and pool area. The home's kitchen is centrally configured for convenience and offers stainless appliances, granite counters, generous cabinets for display and storage in addition to counter space seating for quick meals. There is also a separate dining room for hosting larger groups when needed. The home also offers a step-down den, a second fireplace as well as access to the rear yard. This versatile room can be used as a music room, game room or library. The main level of the home is complete with an easy-to-access basement for on-hand storage and a laundry room connecting to the attached oversized garage. Upstairs presents four bedrooms, all well-sized with custom closets and views. The large primary suite features a double-door entry, walk-in closet with built-ins, a full bath including heated floors and a south-facing balcony perfect for stargazing and expansive tree-top views. The three additional well-appointed bedrooms are positioned to share a full bath located between the rooms. The home's rear yard provides a lovely place to gather for dining, relaxation in the pool and spa, as well as enough grass space for children and pets to play and explore. Plus, there is a fresh herb garden for culinary enthusiasts. Bordering the dramatic foothills, 136 W. Carter Avenue offers today's buyers a versatile layout coupled with a sought-after location in the charming town of Sierra Madre... Don't miss this delightful place to call Home.

Nestled in the hills of Sierra Madre, the J.J. Mulvihill Residence is an architectural retreat at the foothills of the The San Gabriel Mountains with views to the Pacific Ocean. Built in 1949 for J.J. Mulvihill, the owner of an exotic plant nursery, renowned California architect Harwell Hamilton Harris crafted this stunning home to engage the landscape in a bold and modern way that also feels timeless. Wrapped in custom milled Redwood, the house is the essence of mythical California living: Magical views from every window and a covered lanai framing a 100 year old Oak tree. The current owners have lovingly updated, preserved and restored as many details as possible. The upstairs is a showcase space for entertaining or lounging in the window-wrapped living room, with a 13 ft ceiling, exposed beams and 180 degree views to the South. To the North, two fully restored suites featuring custom builtins and lighting. The main level includes the re-imagined cook's kitchen, laundry room, pantry and a jewel box glass dining area with garden views of oaks folding into mountains beyond. Steps away, an expansive outdoor living room lanai with custom brick fireplace allows you to unplug and harmonize with nature year-round. An additional private suite rests on the ground level and offers a view of the lotus pond and the magnificence of the oak's full canopy.

Perched on a green knoll above the street sits this fantastic Upgraded End-unit townhome in the center of Sierra Madre. This is a small complex in a great neighborhood with close proximity to the picturesque village of Sierra Madre with wonderful shopping, restaurants and great parks. As you enter this lovely home you will be welcomed with large windows that flood the spacious Living room with natural light, and the Vaulted Ceilings and Fireplace make it the perfect space for any gathering. The Greatroom area is complete with a Family room, Dining Area, Kitchen, and Built-in Bar with Wine/Beverage refrigerator- all combined. Within the Great room you will find a lovely light filled Bay Window, French Doors that open to a Balcony, and a wonderful Garden Window in the Kitchen. The Kitchen has stainless steel appliances, stone countertops and even a dumb waiter to help lift groceries from the garage. The spacious Primary Suite has Vaulted Ceilings, a wall of closets, and upgraded Bathroom with double vanities. There are 2 additional spacious bedrooms and 2 more beautiful upgraded Bathrooms. Entertain guests on the private patio or just enjoy the outside. The 2 car garage is oversized with extra storage areas and has direct entry into the home. There is beautiful flooring throughout, Central Air & Heating, Plantation Shutters, and a Life Source Water Filter system. Some photos have been virtually staged.

Front House includes 3 Beds, 2.5 baths, Den, Sun Room. Back House is 2 Beds, 1 Bath. Discover the perfect opportunity to own two beautiful homes on a single flat lot that spans 14, 250 square feet! The front house is a stunning 2823 sq. ft. masterpiece that boasts a spacious two-story floor plan. It features three bedrooms, two small lofts with a sitting area, 2.5 baths, a huge Living Room with cathedral ceilings and a Fireplace, Dining Area, Den/Office off of the living room, 475 sq. ft. sunroom-illuminating natural light, an enormous, open remodeled kitchen with a breakfast bar and table perfect for entertaining guests, and a Laundry Room. The large Primary Suite offers a remodeled bath, a walk-in closet, a separate dressing area, and a private balcony overlooking the pool. The house also has two zones Central Air & heat, and a double attached garage with direct access. The house is filled with natural light that accentuates the beauty of the space. The grounds are a tranquil paradise, featuring a gorgeous pool & spa, an imported outdoor sauna, built-in bar-b-que w/sink, several water fountains, and various private patios. The single-story back house is a generous 1665 sq. ft. and is flooded with natural light from eight skylights. The house includes two bedrooms and one bath, consisting of a large Primary Bedroom and remodeled bath, a second sizable bedroom, and a spacious living room that is a Great Room with a high ceiling and fireplace. The French doors open to a covered patio, an ideal space for relaxation. The house also features central air and heat, a covered carport, and a tool shed. This versatile space could be used as a guest house, a home office, or a rental property. Both homes offer an incredible opportunity to live in unparalleled style, comfort, and luxury. Don't miss out on this once-in-a-lifetime chance to own a piece of paradise!

TWO HOMES ON ONE LOT!! Step into this extraordinary home in Sierra Madre. The front unit, boasting 3 large bedrooms and 1 bathroom sprawled across approximately 1, 530 square feet, welcomes you with an expansive canvas awaiting your creative touch. The kitchen, complete with a built-in breakfast nook, sets the stage for culinary adventures, while the adjacent laundry room adds practical convenience to daily living. Entertain in style in the generously sized living room and formal dining room. The front unit is not just a home; it's a platform for your vision. Picture your dream space against the breathtaking backdrop of mountain views that grace the property. The vast lot, spanning over 10, 000 square feet, serves as your private oasis, providing ample space for landscaping, outdoor gatherings, or even a garden sanctuary. As an added bonus, the property features a separate back house/ADU, extending approximately 875 square feet. This additional dwelling is a self-contained haven, boasting a full kitchen, Central A/C, its own laundry area, a bedroom, living room, and dining room. It's the perfect space for extended family, guests, or a potential income-generating unit, offering flexibility to suit your needs. This property represents a rare chance to craft a dream living space in one of Sierra Madre's most sought-after locations. Whether you're yearning for a tranquil retreat or exploring income opportunities, seize this moment to turn your imagination into reality. Welcome to a residence where every detail is a canvas for your dreams to unfold.

The Treasure of Sierra Madre! Captivating Spanish Colonial Revival designed by infamous architect Gordon Kaufmann, with rich history dating back to 1927, expressed through carefully curated, classic elements of the original period architecture. Naturally bright and private, the main courtyard radiates the grandeur of a flourishing great lawn opposite a breezy colonnade, massive arched front door, terracotta tiled center hall, cathedral ceilings with majestic, delicately carved exposed beams, focal wood-burning fireplace, and built-in cabinetry and millwork. Narrow, natural gauge original oak floors alternate with thick white stucco walls, all accentuated with ornamental ironwork and pops of green and pink through strategically positioned banks of French doors windows. A captivating floorplan encompasses formal living and dining rooms open to sheltered outdoor spaces, providing a harmonious balance of abundance of light and cool shade throughout the day. The spacious kitchen with adjacent breakfast room makes for a stately yet comfortable feel. A flex space such as game room, art, craft, writing studio, game or entertainment area, and office/guest bedroom, surrounded by expansive gardens, completes the first floor. Each of the three upstairs bedrooms, including the primary suite, lends beautiful period accents that elegantly contribute to the airy and generous scale - serving as a perfect canvas for the visionary who will bring this iconic property back to life! Available for the first time in 58 years, the timeless Kaufmann estate encompasses a two-level main house and a three-car garage with second story guest house casita, all majestically situated on nearly three quarters of an acre surrounded by magical serene and private grounds, gardens and pool at the end of the idyllic Olivera cul-de-sac, minutes away from all things downtown Sierra Madre!

Location, Location, Location! This is a rare opportunity. Really cute home in a super location with plenty of room to stretch out and enjoy the outdoors. The outdoors includes a vary large Green House, a great garden area, plenty of room for recreation and a lovely patio area for those outdoor events we all love so much.

Tastefully updated and remodeled over the years-your dream home awaits in the quaint city of Sierra Madre. Charming single level home set against the breathtaking San Gabriel mountain range offers a blend of timeless elegance and modern comfort. Meticulously cared for, with attention to detail present in every room, classic craftsmanship & modern upgrades are noted throughout this beautiful property. Step inside to a welcoming foyer that sets the tone for the rest of the house. The large living room boasts original hardwood floors that exude warmth & character, making it the perfect space for both everyday living and entertaining. The fireplace creates a cozy atmosphere, ideal for gatherings with friends & family. The dining room complete with wainscoting, crown moldings, built-ins add additional charm and sophistication. The heart of this home is the large updated kitchen, featuring plenty of storage, recessed lighting, walk-in pantry, breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances, and counter space for the avid chef. Cooking here will be a delight! A den with French doors to the outside open up to a balcony overlooking the serene backyard. The large master ensuite offers a peaceful retreat with plenty of space and natural light. The attached bathroom has been tastefully remodeled to provide modern convenience including a walk-in shower. Two additional bedrooms share an updated main hall bathroom with separate tub and shower. Exceptional living continues into the serene outdoor space. Enjoy the private fully fenced backyard, drought tolerant garden with grassy play area, fruit trees, and mountain views, creating a perfect ambiance for relaxation and entertaining. Invaluable features include: upgraded plumbing and electric, a tankless water heater, dual paned windows, crown moldings, earthquake bracing for added safety and peace of mind, detached garage with attached carport (could be converted into another dwelling unit/buyer to verify). Workshop at back of garage w/separate entrance, post alarm service, plantation shutters, tubular skylight in dining room. Move right in to this turnkey home! Located with close proximity to charming downtown; explore shops, restaurants, parks, famous hiking trails, schools, and the celebrated Sierra Madre Playhouse.

There is so much to love about Sierra Madre. From its traditional 4th of July parade to its popular Wisteria Tree Festival and its famous Heasley Field, Sierra Madre is a wonderful place to call home. Situated on the corner of Sunnyslope Avenue and Sierra Madre Blvd., 555 W. Sierra Madre is a beautifully appointed garden style condominium complex. Unit D is an end unit on the first level and located at the front of the property. The two-bedroom, two-bathroom floor plan of 1, 550 square feet includes a large living room and dining area, spacious kitchen, and two nicely sized bedrooms. Off the formal entry is the living room and dining area. The space offers two large windows, recessed lighting, a fireplace, and access to the kitchen. The remodeled kitchen includes granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, enclosed stackable laundry area, and a sliding door to the private side yard. The side yard features a concrete patio, raised planter, and a gate to the exterior of the complex. Off the central hallway are the two bedrooms and bathrooms. The primary bedroom includes its own bathroom, window, and two closets. The guest bedroom features a large closet and west facing window and is adjacent to the hallway bathroom.The grounds of the complex are professionally manicured and maintained. There is also a detached 2-car garage at the rear of the property. Additional features of note include new windows and new sliding door, wood flooring, tankless water heater, and central heating and air conditioning.
full_street_line: 555 W Sierra Madre Blvd Unit D

text: Nestled within the tranquil embrace of the canyon, this charming retreat is a sanctuary where nature's beauty seamlessly intertwines with modern comfort. Offering panoramic vistas of the foothills dancing among the treetops, this well-kept haven is a testament to serenity and sophistication. A charming front yard invites you to pause and immerse yourself in the tranquil ambiance of this quiet, canyon street. Picture-perfect moments await as you cozy up in the inviting sitting area, enveloped by the serene surroundings. Step inside to discover a meticulously maintained 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home, featuring hardwood flooring and updated finishes. With a bonus room of approximately 120sqft. ( not included in the sqft ) on the lower level boasting a separate entrance, possibilities abound for personalized use, whether it be a home office, creative studio, or guest quarters. Indulge in the luxury of central heating and air conditioning, ensuring year-round comfort, while a newly remodeled kitchen and bathrooms elevate the living experience to new heights. Every corner of this residence exudes a sense of thoughtful design and meticulous care, a testament to the passion of its interior design and architect owners. Outside, a back deck beckons, offering a front-row seat to nature's grandeur. Gaze upon the Sierra Madre Canyon, where the sunset casts a mesmerizing glow over the rolling foothills, painting the sky with hues of gold and crimson. Here, amidst the whispering leaves and gentle breeze, find solace and tranquility as you embrace the beauty of your surroundings. This canyon retreat isn't just a home; it's a sanctuary where every detail has been lovingly curated to create an oasis of peace and inspiration. Welcome to a life of effortless beauty and timeless charm in the heart of nature's embrace.

Elegant 2BR, 2BA top floor end unit with dark wood floors, fireplace with stone surround, large windows with plantation shutters and tree-top views in highly desirable Sierra Madre. Quaint downtown shops and restaurants are nearby. Remodeled Kitchen with granite counters, microwave, stackable washer/dryer, wood cabinets, and charming breakfast area that opens to the balcony. Spacious Primary Suite with dressing alcove, remodeled bath with dual sinks and stall shower; 2nd bedroom adjacent to hall bathroom. Tree-top views from the spacious Living - Dining rooms. Private 2 Car Garage with automatic opener at rear of the complex. Low HOA includes EQ insurance and beautifully landscaped and well- maintained grounds.
full_street_line: 555 W Sierra Madre Blvd Unit E

text: The newly envisioned Sierra Madre residence presents an exceptional and charming townhome but like an SFR nestled in the foothills of the San Gabriel Mountains, emanating quiet luxury and irresistible comfort. Just steps away from the picturesque village of Sierra Madre, this exclusive abode offers an urban lifestyle in a rustic setting. The free-flowing floor plan boasts 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and a detached two-car garage.Upon entry, one is greeted by the marvel of the shared fireplace between the living and dining areas, inundating the space with natural light through numerous windows and high ceilings. The home features Engineered hardwood flooring, modern New vanities, and wall cabinets that add charm and elegance to this fully modernized dwelling.Work or relax in style from the top floor loft with framed mountain views, overlooking the magnificent interior elements of the living space below. The primary suite boasts high ceilings, a lavish dressing area, a spacious walk-in closet, and a master bathroom with double vanities. The second master bedroom, ideal for a child, features high ceilings and its own bathroom.Descending to the main floor, another bedroom with a walk-in closet awaits. The doors seamlessly transition from the formal living and dining area to a family room and a delightful patio, creating a cozy setting for fireside gatherings. Stepping into the courtyard reveals a serene oasis, enclosed by an enchanted garden with lights.Adjacent to the property is a detached two-car garage with built-in cabinets. Noteworthy features include a new kitchen with LED lighting, soft close cabinets, stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting and laundry facilities. Situated as one of the closest residential properties to downtown, this abode exudes small-town charm, surrounded by quaint shops, cafes, and a vibrant community known for its natural beauty, events, and hiking trails.Conveniently located just minutes away from top-rated schools, the 210 freeway, Pasadena, Santa Anita Park, Huntington Gardens, and an array of hiking trails, this residence offers the perfect blend of accessibility and tranquility. Embrace the opportunity to turn this dream home into your reality.

NATURE SURROUNDS THIS PRIVATE RETREAT. Imagine living in the mountains in a secluded 2 bedroom 1 1/2 bath home in the Upper Canyon of Sierra Madre among pines and oaks. There is an additional studio apartment with a 3/4 bath & quasi/kitchenette, with new flooring (Assessor shows 3 + 2). The adjacent lot included (40' X 100.35' Assessor) includes a winding exterior staircase leading to a massive wooden deck for relaxing while sitting among nature and smelling the fresh air or admiring the star show. The bright Living room has a Ben Franklin wood-burning fireplace, built-in shelves, and amazing paned windows that bring in the sunlight. The 2 Bedrooms off the hall bath have ceiling fans and are carpeted. The fully equipped and comfortable country kitchen with an eating area has more amazing windows that bring in nature's beauty. Comiclally decorated and spacious laundry room has a 1/2 bath. Double car garage with extra storage, and door opener. Per seller, both lots back up to the Angeles National Forest. Has not been on the market for 40 years. Property in Trust with no court confirmation.

Since 1997, 75 N. Baldwin Ave. has been the location of the iconic Four Seasons Tearoom. And after 26 years of this property being filled with joy, laughter, and various meaningful celebrations, the property is now available for a new owner to continue the beautiful tearoom tradition perhaps or create something altogether new. Either way, the location, and building are a treasure. The property offers three dining areas, the main dining room seats 25 to 30, and the garden room has the capacity for 15 to 20 people. The patio dining can accommodate 35 plus people, and two convenient bathrooms service the downstairs area. The kitchen is equipped with two commercial refrigerators and a Wolf six-burner stove, an Ice maker, stainless steel hot water urn, and two working stations. Also, there's an office/laundry area by the kitchen, and outside, there's a storage area with a freezer. The property also comes with a two-car garage and four additional parking spots in the driveway. Literally, on top of all this, the property has a two-bedroom and one-bath unit above, with access from a private staircase. Let your imagination soar with this multi-use property jewel.

Newly reimagined by Studio Sinergia, Casa Sierra is an exquisite Mediterranean townhome nestled in the foothills of the San Gabriel Mountains that exudes quiet luxury and irresistible comfort. Located steps from the quaint village of Sierra Madre, this exclusive gated enclave offers an urban lifestyle in rustic picturesque surroundings. Built over 4 levels of living, this free-flowing floor plan features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a loft, and an attached two-car garage with laundry bar. Upon entering discover the architectural detail of the grand two-story fireplace, arched passageways, dramatic 20-foot ceiling, and a crowning skylight that floods the interior with natural light. Finishing elements include bleached linen flooring, ceramic tiling, Brazilian Quartzite and Italian Silver Travertine surfaces. Designer lighting, tailored drapery, custom wood built-ins, and preserved millwork add charm and elegance to this fully modernized home. Work or unwind in style from the top floor loft featuring framed mountain views and overlooking the magnificent interior elements of the living space below. Occupying an entire level, the primary suite showcases vaulted ceilings, a sumptuous dressing area, an expansive walk-in closet, and a wet room anchored by an alluring walk-in rain shower. Descending to the main level, French doors open up off of the formal living and dining space to a charming balcony that offers additional mountain views. Once outside in the front courtyard, escape and decompress in the tranquility of a private hedged European-inspired garden. Additional features include new HVAC and water heater, new kitchen and laundry appliances, and a central vacuum system. As one of the closest residential properties to downtown, Casa Sierra puts the town at your doorstep with an incredible Walk Score of 87. Just minutes to excellent schools, the 210 freeway, Pasadena, Santa Anita Park, Huntington Gardens, and a wide array of hiking trails. Make this dream home your reality.

Nestled amidst the serene landscape of Sierra Madre, a charming home awaits, offering a tranquil retreat from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. As you step through the welcoming entrance, soft natural light fills the foyer, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Follow the hallway as it leads to a spacious living area, where a crackling fireplace adds a cozy touch. French doors open to a deck, seamlessly blending indoor and outdoor living spaces, perfect for both lively gatherings and quiet moments of relaxation. Adjacent to the living room, a quaint outdoor patio provides a peaceful spot to enjoy the fresh mountain air and entertain guests amidst the lush surroundings. The heart of the home, the kitchen, is a functional and stylish space. With sleek countertops and modern appliances, it's equipped to inspire culinary creativity, whether you're enjoying a leisurely breakfast or hosting a casual dinner with friends. Retreat to the master suite, where you'll find a comfortable space to unwind. French doors open to the deck, providing a tranquil setting to start your day with a cup of coffee and soak in the natural beauty of the surroundings. Enjoy the immersive experience of surround sound in the master bedroom. Additional bedrooms offer comfort and versatility for guests or family members. The bathrooms maintain their original charm and are impeccably maintained, adding to the character of the home. Outside, the expansive grounds invite you to explore lush gardens and enjoy leisurely strolls. Additional features include a 2-car attached garage with a bonus room, perfect for use as a craft room, office, or gym. And on the east side of the house, a wine cellar awaits, providing a perfect spot to store and showcase your collection. Experience the tranquility of Sierra Madre living at its finest, with contemporary modern features enhancing the charm of this peaceful retreat. Your oasis awaits.

Situated at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac in the foothills of beautiful Sierra Madre lies this updated, spacious home with its surrounding verdant gardens. The bright, lofty social spaces have an easy flow and connect seamlessly to the back patio, bbq area, large lawn, and garden. Inside, a welcoming entry space introduces the vaulted living room with its stunning mountain views and fireplace, the cozy den with built-in cabinets, another fireplace and sliding door to the covered patio, and open stair to the bedrooms and office on the second level. Beyond the stair is a sizable dining room with French doors to the side garden. Adjacent to the dining room and den is the updated kitchen, which features a large social counter connecting it to the breakfast nook that has views to the backyard. The ground floor also features a powder room, laundry area with plenty of storage, and a direct connection to the finished three car garage. Upstairs, an elegant corridor with views to the social spaces below connects a capacious en-suite primary bedroom with a walk-in closet and private balcony on one side to the other wing which features two bedrooms, a full bathroom, and an office. The office has the third fireplace in the house and comes with extensive built-in bookshelves and a desk. This well-appointed home is within minutes of charming downtown Sierra Madre as well as hiking trails and the natural wonders of the San Gabriel Mountains. It's the perfect location for a small town lifestyle with easy access to all that metropolitan Los Angeles offers.

Nestled on a quiet street in the sought-after Sierra Madre neighborhood, this charming mid-century home sits on a secluded 17, 100 sq.ft lot and is an entertainers paradise. At first glance, the formal living room is framed with beautiful natural wood flooring, beamed ceilings, brick fireplace, and a picturesque view of the landscaped lush front garden. Adjacent to the living room, the oversized family room extends flawlessly into the dining room, kitchen, and the expansive backyard patio, making the home a perfect hosting and entertaining residence. The primary bedroom is a tranquil retreat, complete with an en suite bathroom and bathed in Southern exposure light, filtering through the canopy of mature oak trees. All four bedrooms and two bathrooms are conveniently situated on one wing of the home, separate from the entertainment area. Outside, two detached structures offer additional flexibility: a garage with an attached office space, and a separate outbuilding currently utilized as a spacious hobby room. The home is located within a short distance to downtown Sierra Madre and the local schools that offer unique Secondary Dual Language Immersion Programs to the Sierra Madre resident students.

This rare single level street facing townhome feels like a home with no one on either side, above or below, It has beautiful views to common area garden, treelined street & the mountains beyond, attached 2-car garage & private fenced brick patio. The interiors have laminate floors in main and bedroom areas, a newer kitchen with granite counters, custom cabinetry, area for kitchen table, & bar top. Living room has a gas fireplace & lovely wall of French-style sliding glass doors to the patio. The open floor plan flows from living rm to dining room, allowing for spacious furniture arrangement & entertaining. The primary suite has 2 closets, north facing window with shutters & large double sink dressing area, leading to attached bathroom w/walk-in shower. Privately situated on opposite side of entry from primary bedroom, the 2nd bedroom is adjacent to the 2nd bathroom, w/custom linen & display cabinets just outside. The attached 2 car garage has plenty of room for storage as well as washer dryer hook-ups. The convenient location is fantastic near the center of the charming town of Sierra Madre, 2 blocks to Baldwin & 1 block to Sierra Madre Blvd. with cafes, shopping, & other services.

Impeccably designed, this sophisticated, contemporary Spanish townhome provides an expansive, open feel throughout, offering high ceilings, gorgeous architectural detail, and tremendous privacy, all within a couple blocks of beloved Sierra Madre's downtown. A noticeable quiet descends upon this rear unit, creating a sanctuary of elegance as you enter the expansive living and dining room with beamed ceilings, beautiful French doors opening to an arched breezeway for seamless indoor-outdoor living. The living space, which includes a temperature-controlled wine room and separate powder room, flows into the kitchen, complete with custom cabinetry integrated into the fridge and new dishwasher (replaced 2023), a welcoming peninsula to gather around, and a full size pantry, all with direct access to the garage. Venture upstairs to a bright, light-filled landing, adjacent to three full bedroom suites, the primary suite including a large closet with built-ins, French doors opening to a large balcony, and a bathroom with an ''Airbath'' soaking tub with tree-top views for privacy, double sink vanity, and separate shower with glass enclosure. The other two bedroom suites, one of which has a private balcony, each have ample closet space, plenty of light, and a 3/4 bathroom. Along with energy efficient dual pane windows, Nest thermostat, tankless water heater, and LED lighting, the home also includes a new HVAC system (replaced 2023), central vacuum, secured driveway gate with remote access, guest parking space within the complex, sound and security systems with fire sprinklers. This is a rare opportunity to live in a unique, newer-built community that offers privacy, spacious comfort, and easy access to Sierra Madre's very special and cherished foothill village and hiking trails.
agent: Michael Y Maloney The Maloney Group

text: Inspired by the original orchard houses of the San Gabriel Valley, this custom home is move-in ready. A covered porch, with built-in counter & cabinet, is an entertainer's dream! The living room is anchored by a gas fireplace and bay window filled with the view of a lush tree. Several built-in features, such as the casement windows on parliament hinges, were salvaged from the original 1921 home and were used as doors for cabinets flanking the fireplace. Also incorporated is an original China hutch, glass-front bookcase, and small casement window throughout the downstairs living space. All hardwood floors have been refinished. The kitchen features a new 36 Thermador six burner range/oven, and a deep, single-basin Kohler sink. Refrigerator and microwave are also included. An adjacent butler's pantry offers additional cabinets, countertop area and prep sink for easy entertaining. The adjacent breakfast nook, with its built-in storage, overlooks the covered porch, and is the hub between the family room, den, and kitchen. The den has an L-shaped built-in desk with two separate work stations and comes with built-in cabinets above and below. Its closet provides additional storage for home office. An adjacent bath serves the ground floor. A stair from the den leads to second-floor bedrooms, as well as a covered deck that offers views of the mountains and Valley. An alcove in the master suite also provides a perfect place for reading and enjoying the mountain views. It comes with two walk-in closets plus ensuite with double vanity and a separate toilet/new walk-in shower. Two additional second floor bedrooms are served by a full bath. The laundry room on this level comes with its own sink, built-in/fold-down ironing board, washer and dryer. Additional storage cabinets are available at the end of the hall. A separate stair at the north end of the second floor provides access to the backyard's patio seating and dining area that overlook the spa and pool creating a perfect ambiance for relaxation and entertaining, (pool and spa are controlled by an app). A ground floor bath is also accessible from the pool area. Dense greenery provides privacy and overhead string lights illuminate night-time parties in a resort-like setting. Additional features include: A two-car garage with ample storage, solar power, secure mail drop and so much more. Located with close proximity to charming downtown Sierra Madre. Come and appreciate this home in person!
