This property is wonderfully located in the foothills of Sierra Madre on a large corner lot, close to the quaint downtown, with easy walking distance to Sierra Madre Elementary School and less than one mile walking distance to the Mt Wilson trailhead. The house was built in 1890 and is in need of major renovations or complete rebuild. Most likely, an all cash buyer or private money financing will be required to acquire this property due to condition. The awesome, large detached approximately 962 square foot 2 car garage was built in 1988 per the owner and also features a generously sized storage room or workshop area. An investor may elect to keep the garage intact or beautify it to match a newly renovated or rebuilt house. There is plenty of parking space in the gated garage driveway. This is an incredible location with a possible view to the valley and has the potential to be an absolute dream home! The buyer intends to sell the property as is with no warranties expressed or implied.

This home is located in the foothills of Sierra Madre, near the mountains featuring a quiet and serene setting, offering three bedrooms and three bathrooms, cozy living room with fire place, nice family room, and balcony with the potential to separate the one bathroom and bathroom downstairs, as it has a separate rear entry, which could be rented. The large backyard offers fruit trees, and fence for privacy in addition to a large work room which could be made into a garage. There is a large gate that opens to the large bottom portion of the backyard with potential for RV parking. The central air and heat, and all the wood trim around the home gives this property lots of charm and comfort, with very convenient proximity to the Sierra Madre Village, easy access to 210 Freeway, the City of Pasadena and downtown Los Angeles, as well as easy walk to trails and foothills.

Fabulous opportunity to own a special piece of land in Sierra Madre!! Very private and lush with trees. Abundant wildlife! LAND VALUE ONLY!! Property consists of three APN #s: 5674-031-001, 5764-031-002, and 5764-031-007. There are two legal lots. Each lot can have ONE house built on it. Buyer to check with the City of Sierra Madre for development requirements, restrictions, etc. Some utilities are connected. Condition of the structures will not be considered as a contingency as one is yellow-tagged and one is red-tagged. They are not habitable. DO NOT ENTER STRUCTURES. Please note: pictures were taken before last years winter rains and the tree trimming/removal.

Welcome to this charming Sierra Madre home. Situated on a beautiful, tree-adorned street, this quaint California bungalow enjoys picturesque surroundings while nestled comfortably against the stunning San Gabriel Mountains. The large front deck welcomes you into a private indoor/outdoor living space where you and your guests will enjoy Sierra Madre living at its best. The property boasts a generous-sized lot, while the house delivers a cozy ambiance with plenty of room to develop. Inside, you are immediately welcomed into a well-lit living room ready for relaxation and socializing and adorned with a breadth of windows and a soft blanket of rich natural light. The spacious, centrally-located kitchen features a roomy eat-in dining area and provides direct access to the backyard, ideal for dinner parties, barbeques, and making unloading the groceries a breeze. The rear bedroom also offers seamless access through the sliding glass doors to the expansive backyard where mature oak, olive, crepe myrtle, and fig trees provide a tranquil retreat at any time of day. Freshly painted interiors in addition to newer insulation, plumbing, electric, and internet make this home turn-key. Other highlights include a spacious full bath, recessed lighting, and laminate flooring. Conveniently located near downtown Sierra Madre, Bailey Canyon, and various attractions, this home is the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and community.

Welcome to this charming traditional bungalow home, nestled in the hills of Sierra Madre yet conveniently located within walking distance of the quaint downtown village of the Sierra Madre neighborhood which is moments away from your local shops, trendy eateries, and scenic trails. This captivating residence offers a unique opportunity to experience modern living with a touch of classic charm. Situated on a beautifully landscaped lot with white picket fence, this property features three spacious bedrooms and two baths. The living area radiates warmth, with an open floor plan and large windows that fill the space with natural light. The open-concept design seamlessly connects the living room to the dining area making it perfect for hosting family and friends. The updated kitchen, complete with quartz countertops and stainless-steel appliances, provides an ideal space for culinary creations. The master bedroom, accompanied by an ensuite bathroom offers a serene retreat with ample closet space and tranquil atmosphere. Additional well-appointed bedrooms offer flexibility for guest rooms, home offices or creative spaces. A beautifully crafted second bathroom balances the functionality with style. Step outside and discover your private oasis. The lush landscaping and mature trees create a picturesque setting, inviting relaxation. This re-imagined residence underwent a recent renovation including new windows/doors, new HVAC system, new roof, new hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, new exterior and interior paint. Main house offers 1300 sq. ft and a bonus room at rear of garage, perfect for office space or man cave that is approximately 200 sq. ft. for future ADU conversion. Seller has also installed a 220 V outlet for electrical vehicles. The long driveway leads you to the detached two car garage. Welcome to this lovely home.

Exquisite architecture and craftsmanship located in tranquil foothill community! This luxurious, updated 5-bedroom/6-bathroom house offers French doors & windows throughout, a rare find nowadays! The serene porch invites you to sit and watch hummingbirds busy in the front yard's abundant gardenias, rose bushes, and citrus tress. The bright & spacious living room boasts quality maple flooring, a new gas fireplace, and built-in bookshelves. The airy, gracious dinning room is accented with a gold-tone chandelier. A large library/playroom sits next to the living room. The clean & modern Tiffany blue gourmet kitchen, including a massive work island, double oven, induction stovetop, and convertible range hood makes cooking a delight! The laundry room, like the rest of the house, offers ample storage. Gracing the staircase to the second floor, a skylight with remote control blinds adds convenience in adjusting lighting for the winter and summer seasons. The primary suite's double French doors lead to a private balcony featuring valley views, while the marble-walled primary bath features an open shower, soaking tub, double vanities and smart toilet. The peaceful backyard seduces with its sparking saltwater pool and spa. A roomy downstairs suite offers a retreat area, kitchenette, a full bath for guests, its many windows affording a pleasant garden view. Permitted Guest House. The two-car garage has been upgraded with epoxy flooring, a wall-mounted television, and air conditioning. Easy walk to charming downtown Sierra Madre. You'll never want to leave!!

Welcome to 804 Woodland Dr/Wormwood Cottage located in the picturesque and serene setting of the Sierra Madre Canyon. This home offers two separate homes and both are very unique and charming. As you enter the stairs lead you to the lower half of the Wormwood Cottage. It can be utilized as a home office, artist studio or reading room/library. The balcony off the cottage has an area to sit and enjoy the canyon setting. A staircase leads you to the main living area and separate entrance. As you enter you will see the rustic living room, kitchenette, built in bed and bookshelf. There is a bathroom and nice size closet, storage area. This charming cottage is perfect for a work from home office, mother in law quarters, man cave, artist studio, teenagers dream living area, the possibilities are endless. The canyon charm and babbling brook are so relaxing and you can hear right outside your windows. As you go up several stairs to the main house. There are lush plants along the way as well as two separate stairs to two separate entrances to the main house. As you get up the stairs you will see a large grass area to entertain, bbq or hang out and enjoy the canyon living. The main house has two levels, A newly remodeled kitchen in 2020 with granite counter tops and nice wood cabinets. There is space to entertain several for dinner, a large sitting area that has a view out the window, a bathroom as well as a laundry room off the kitchen as well. As you go upstairs there is a large living room, custom fireplace, two bedrooms and a beautiful travertine custom bathroom, and a view of the canyon out the living room window. As you step outside to the balcony priceless views that capture all the canyon life has to offer, plus a nice size wrap around balcony with custom railing and a built in custom kitchen/bar area. The views are incredible, you can hear the water flowing down the brook and hear and see wildlife. Canyon living that will leave you at peace , walk to Mary's Market to enjoy a tasty burger or cup of coffee, close to local hiking trails, walk to parks and the small downtown shops and restaurants ... enjoy all the canyon has to offer and much more.... This is a true canyon gem!!! DO NOT GO ON PROPERTY/only open house

Welcome to this stunning recently renovated home, showcasing elegant French-style construction and a modern interior design. Located at the base of the picturesque San Gabriel foothills, this property offers breathtaking views of both the cityscape and the majestic mountains. Nestled on a peaceful cul-de-sac in Sierra Madre, a quiet neighborhood adjacent to Arcadia and Pasadena, this home provides the perfect retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life. Sierra Madre itself is a treasure trove of history and unique culture, making it a truly special place to call home. The garden, a tranquil oasis, invites you to unwind and soak in the refreshing breeze while marveling at the breathtaking sunsets. It's the perfect spot to relax and create cherished memories with loved ones. The interior boasts a modern design, accentuated by beautiful engineer wood flooring that flows seamlessly throughout the home. The combination of French-style architecture and contemporary touches creates an ambiance of timeless elegance and comfort. Upstairs, four bedrooms offer ample space for family members or guests, providing privacy and functionality. Additionally, a flexible room downstairs can serve as a convenient home office or a cozy bedroom to suit your preferences and needs. In conclusion, this must-see home in Sierra Madre presents a rare opportunity to own a beautifully renovated property with a blend of French charm and modern aesthetics. Enjoy the scenic views, quiet neighborhood, and easy access to amenities and major highways. Don't miss out on the chance to call this exquisite property your own. Schedule your viewing today and experience the allure of this delightful Southern California gem.

Welcome to Sierra Madre, where you can almost feel time slowing down as you drive through the village of quaint shops, tree-lined streets, character homes and desirable public schools - including 2023 CA Distinguished School awardee, Sierra Madre Elementary School. This light-filled, split-level home was built in 1987 and checks all the boxes that today's Buyers are looking for. The two story living room features spectacular mountain views, hardwood floors and a gas fireplace. The recently remodeled kitchen features granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a breakfast island. Both the kitchen and adjacent dining room also feature hardwood floors. Downstairs, a spacious family room with fireplace, built-ins and extra storage also opens to the rear yard, with pool and spa (with removable safety fence), yard and patio areas, just right for entertaining or just a little 'stay-cation'. Two bedrooms, a full bath, a spacious storage closet and laundry area complete the lower level. Upstairs, you'll fall in love with the huge primary bedroom which offers a custom closet, remodeled bath and a balcony that overlooks the rear yard. Additionally, the upper level includes the fourth bedroom, a full bath and a convertible den/office that could also serve as a nursery. Some of the many features include 3-zone central heat and air conditioning, solar panel lease, and attached two-car garage with built-in cabinets. This home's flexible split-level floor plan offers options for numerous lifestyles, and offers plenty of space in all the right places. This home has been beautifully maintained, and the many features and upgrades can be found on the attached improvement list. The tight knit community has nicknamed itself 'Fairlegria', and enjoys close proximity to the town center, both public and private schools, parks and trails and features local favorites including Taylor's Market, PoppyCakes Bakery, Mother Moo's Ice Cream, and Yui Sushi. Come see all that this beautiful home and Sierra Madre have to offer!

The only vacant commercial lot in the vibrant desirable town of Sierra Madre. It has been owned by one family since the 1950s. Fantastic opportunity to build one or two story commercial building. Water and electricity already on property. Bring your ideas to the City of Sierra Madre to verify total sq footage and height allowable.

All that there is to love about the village community of Sierra Madre will be found in this delightful home on Monterey Lane. When it comes to location, this 2 bedroom, 2 bath home is simply described as - perfect! Sited on one of the town's preferred cul-de-sacs, the 13, 299 square foot resplendent lot will captivate with its garden vignettes, mature Oaks and Koi ponds while boasting a hard-to-find, close-knit community for those lucky to live on ''The Lane.''This thoughtfully designed home offers an open concept that reveals the surrounding garden spaces and the opportunity for ''nature's therapy'' from every angle. A floor plan of 1, 589 square feet allows for easy flow between the living room, dining area and den which open nicely to a lovely side yard with water feature for tranquil outdoor dining. The original kitchen has been well-maintained and offers a 1958 Chambers range, tile counters, a pantry, a powder room and convenient access to the rear yard and gardens. Other features of this special home are hardwood floors, a natural brick fireplace, gracious built-in book shelves, leaded glass accents and picture windows for natural light and calming verdant views. This home will continue to delight with its Certified Wildlife Garden Habitat designation, magnificent native Oaks, two professionally designed ponds (by Jon Rassmussen, The Pond Co), the opportunity to have fresh eggs from the hens of the hen house, and fresh fruit from the productive trees (fig, apricot, orange, Meyer lemon, tangerine, guava and Anna apples). All this plus, ''bonus rooms'' in the rear yard offering the potential for tremendous added value ~ currently the bonus space is being used as a charming garden bedroom (measured at 200 sqft) and a separate workshop (measured at 308 sqft). Buyer to investigate the potential for these structures. 35 Monterey Lane offers the new owners one of today's highly sought intangibles, an opportunity to find peace and serenity within your own home and garden.

Welcome to this charming investment opportunity or dream home starter. Located in the tranquil Sierra Madre foothills. A quaint brick path leads to the welcoming porch and entrance of this single-level residence, brimming with cozy charm. Inside, youll find original hardwood floors, breezy ceiling fans, and a gracefully arched passageway linking the living room to the bedrooms. The kitchen, bright with natural light, features efficient modular cabinets. Let your creativity flourish in transforming this delightful property into your ultimate dream home. Situated on a corner lot, the garden boasts an array of cactus and diverse flora, offering tons of potential to customize. The secluded back patio offers a serene retreat for outdoor relaxation. Conveniently access the single-car garage, complete with a workbench, through the patio ideal for expansion projects. Conveniently adjacent to Pasadena, San Marino, Arcadia, fine dining, shopping, and just moments away from the historical Arcadia Arboretum and The Shops. More pictures to be posted soon.

Charming Mid-Century Entertainer's House!!! Freshly painted inside and out. With newly refinished gleaming hardwood floors, and resurfaced driveway this house is move in ready, just in time for your Holidays! Enter this lovely home through a covered porch that opens to an inviting foyer and a large bright Livingroom with wood burning fireplace that overlooks a large Saltillo tiled covered patio/deck and a beautiful verdant grassy backyard!!! A true California inside-outside living designed house! The sunny flexible convertible Den just off the living room could function as a 4th bedroom, or guestroom with direct access to 2nd bathroom and has a closet. Three other bedrooms and a larger bath with a spa tub and bidet are on the opposite side of the house. Storage room with utility sink in the patio could be an easy future en-suite bathroom addition or used as a darkroom. Custom Built-in cabinetry throughout the house provide additional storage. Many citrus, peach, apricot trees, a vegetable garden and room to add built in BBQ or outdoor kitchen, an artist studio, treehouse, play ground, and a chicken coop! This emotional house with over 8400 sqft lot has majestic mountain views from front yard and faces a beautiful oak lined street that is an easy stroll to the quaint Sierra Madre downtown with lovely cafes and restaurants and all hiking trails and parks. Front yard has a California drought resistant landscape on drip system with many varieties of flowering succulents. Huntington Library, LA Arboretum, Norton Simon Museum, Pacific Asia Museum, and Downtown Pasadena are just a few minutes away! Easy Downtown LA access via Metrolink. Excellent school ratings. Large two car garage could be an ADU addition for additional income. This is a trust sale and relative owners have never lived in the house. Buyer to perform own inspections and investigations. and verify square footage provided by tax accessor. As is sale, no further repairs or credit for repairs will be issued. Seller is RE licensee and selects services.

First time on the market in 40 years, this traditional single family home adjacent to Upper Hastings Ranch is located on a quiet tree lined street in Sierra Madre. Mature Liquid Amber, Jacaranda and a Royal Palm tree welcomes the visitor to this three bedroom/two bathroom residence. With a large living room, open kitchen and one bedroom and bathroom downstairs and two bedrooms and one bathroom upstairs, there is plenty of opportunity to expand on the first and second floors. With lush greenery and avocado trees, the expansive and inviting backyard is perfect for either increasing the interior foot print of the home, utilizing the space for entertaining or expanding the two-car garage. Alegria is the ideal home to realize one's dreams looking for that reminiscent home to raise a family. Located in close proximity to Bailey Canyon Wilderness Park, neighborhood schools, restaurants and Eaton Canyon Golf Course.

This delightful Craftsman Sierra Madre home is situated right in the heart of the city. Bring your tool belt it's a fixer. This home has tremendous potential. Huge lot that is zoned R-3 with the potential to build more housing, or ADU unit. Front porch great for summer nights and those cold mornings to enjoy a cup of coffee. Hardwood floors throughout this craftsman home. Walking distance from Downtown Sierra Madre and only 2 miles from Santa Anita Mall.

PRIVACY AND FOREVER VIEWS!!!! This artistically inspired haven is nestled in a serene canyon, offering breathtaking views of city lights and the downtown Los Angeles skyline. On clear days, catch glimpses of the sun shining on the Pacific Ocean. Experience maximum privacy and seclusion in a peaceful environment surrounded by nature. Observe abundant wildlife right from your front door. In addition to the two bedrooms, an artist studio with a half bath provides a dedicated space to bring your creative visions to life or convert it to a third bedroom. A spacious 5 car garage offers plenty of room for your collections and storage needs. Youll feel miles away from the city, yet the convenience of urban living is just a short drive (or walk!) away with easy access to shopping, dining and public transportation. Dont miss out on the opportunity to call this private canyon retreat your home.

Welcome to your dream retreat in the heart of Sierra Madre! This charming and quaint single-level craftsman home offers the perfect blend of comfort and character. As you step onto the property, you'll be greeted by an inviting front porch, complete with a cozy sitting area, where you can relax and enjoy the peaceful ambiance of this little town. The allure of mountain living comes to life on the real deck, where breathtaking mountain views surround you. Imagine sipping your morning coffee or hosting gatherings against this stunning natural backdrop. Inside, the timeless beauty of hardwood floors spans throughout the entire home, creating an elegant and cohesive feel. The spacious front yard and long driveway not only offer convenience but also provide ample space for outdoor activities and parking. Step into the living room, where a traditional brick fireplace exudes warmth and character, perfect for cozy evenings with loved ones. The open-concept layout seamlessly flows into the formal dining room/family room, creating an ideal space for entertaining guests or simply enjoying quality family time. The built-in china cabinet adds a touch of sophistication and serves as both a functional storage solution and a decorative element. Stay comfortable year-round with central air conditioning, ensuring a pleasant atmosphere throughout the seasons. Prepare meals in the kitchen while being treated to a beautiful mountain view through the windows. The scenic vista adds a unique charm to your culinary experiences. As you explore the backyard, you'll discover a large avocado tree - a delightful feature that provides both shade and a potential source of fresh, homegrown produce. The generously sized backyard also offers the exciting opportunity to build an Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU), allowing for expanded living space or rental income potential. A special surprise awaits you in the form of the original ice house, a versatile space that can be transformed into an art studio, just as it is currently being used as a pottery studio. Unleash your creativity and relish in having a dedicated space for artistic endeavors. Don't miss your chance to own this enchanting craftsman home in Sierra Madre, where every detail tells a story and the possibilities are as boundless as the surrounding mountains. Embrace a lifestyle of tranquility, natural beauty, and artistic expression - schedule a viewing today and make this remarkable property yours.

Welcome to 646 W Sierra Madre Boulevard #B. Built in 2007, this stunning two story condo is located in the quaint city of Sierra Madre. Quality in details and construction are obvious in the high ceilings, crown molding, walnut flooring and built-in speaker system. The large open kitchen boasts a center island, limestone countertops, cherry wood cabinetry and Jenn-Air stainless steel appliances. Adjacent to the kitchen you will find an office (or bonus room/bedroom) and one bath. The oversized fireplace is the focal point of the living room. French doors off of the dining room open to a beautiful outdoor patio. Access the second story by the gorgeous wooden staircase or the private, interior elevator! Upstairs you will find 2 bedrooms, one full bath, and a spacious master bedroom with a walk-in closet, sitting area and elegant master bath. Central heat and air, and an attached two car garage with laundry facilities complete this stunner! Simply the best in condominium living.
full_street_line: 646 W Sierra Madre Blvd Unit B

text: This fabulous home shows pride of ownership throughout, situated in the foothills on a quiet tree-lined street, close to Sierra Madre's charming downtown and steps from Bailey Canyon Wilderness Park. Meticulously maintained and remodeled over the years, this 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom home has much to offer and is ready for its next owner. Downstairs there are 2 bedrooms with a 3/4 bathroom which could comfortably be used as guest suite as it closes off to the main common rooms. The gorgeous kitchen is newly remodeled with attractive backsplash and stone countertops, new cabinets, stainless steel appliances and a breakfast nook with a guest bathroom adjacent. The entry, living room, dining area, breakfast nook and kitchen have luxury vinyl flooring throughout. From the cozy living room there are double doors out to a terraced backyard with decorative river rock stones and a concrete patio under a majestic Oak tree. Upstairs there are two large bedrooms each with dual closets, views of the mountains, and a newly remodeled full bathroom. There is a bonus room/office off the kitchen and an attached garage with laundry. The home also offers copper plumbing, updated electrical (from 1995), central heat and air, plenty of storage in the attic and attached garage. The home has been recently painted on the exterior and the landscaping is perfect, front and back. Move right in to this perfect home!

Probate Sale! The Janet Parsley Trust. This 3 bed; 3 bath Single Family Home features +/-1, 551 Sq Ft of living space, +/-7, 313 Sq Ft lot, APN: 5761-016-010. The property is occupied and the occupant is not paying rent. The property will be delivered occupied at the close of escrow. No interior inspections. No showings. This Property is offered together with improvements thereon as is, where is, with no warranty expressed or implied.

This stunning Mediterranean Estate has been completely remodeled inside and out located on one of the most desirable streets in Sierra Madre. Situated on a huge flat lot that is over 3/4 of an acre with lush landscape, an abundance of fruit trees & rose trees offering an oasis of tranquility and privacy. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream featuring top of the line stainless steel appliances to include side by side Sub Zero and Thermador refrigerators, 2 dishwashers, a warming drawer, Sub Zero ice maker, and built in Miele cappuccino machine, to name a few. There are 2 islands, lots of granite counters and storage space, reverse osmosis with instant hot water plus a whole house filtration system. The huge formal dining room overlooks a large grassy area, sparkling pool & spa creating the ideal space for entertaining and family gatherings. The enormous 1058 sf great room was perfectly designed for large parties featuring 2 fireplaces, 2 wet bars, dishwasher, refrigerator, surround sound, travertine floors and a regulation pool table. The large home theater features an amazing sound system with 8 Klipsch speakers and a wood burning fireplace. The lovely master suite has a recessed ceiling, and a peaceful retreat with a relaxing fireplace. The master bath features double sinks with granite counters, double stall shower with double entries, extra deep Kohler cast iron spa tub, sauna , bidet , 2 walk in closets + a 3rd closet. There is an abundance of additional living space to include a guest house that has never been lived in, guest room with 3/4 bath, and ADU equipped with three roll up doors that meet city code requirements for living space. This amazing home is a car collector's dream with the option of using the ADU as an additional 3 car garage for a total of 6 garage spaces. Additionally, there is a huge circular driveway with two mechanized gates that provides a multitude of parking spaces, and an automatic whole house backup generator in the event of a power loss. The main hse is 5682 sf, gst hse 608 sf, gst rm 214 sf, and the ADU 797 sf for a total of 7301 sf of living space.

Welcome to 755 Valle Vista, a magnificent residence nestled in the quaint town of Sierra Madre. This stunning property offers a generous size living space, spanning nearly 4, 200 square feet, on a large lot of 16, 505 square feet, providing ample room for comfortable living and entertaining. From the beautiful curb appeal to the meticulously manicured landscaping, this property is perfect for a large family with multiple cars. As you step inside the double door entry, you'll be greeted by beautiful high ceilings and a dramatic staircase. There are breathtaking city light views and majestic mountain vistas that serve as a picturesque backdrop from the family room and multiple bedrooms.This home offers a well-designed floor plan that seamlessly blends elegance and functionality with a dedicated office on the 1st floor and 4 Bedrooms, 1 of which is the Master Suite with wood ceilings and a nice balcony to showcase the city light and mountain views on the 2nd floor. The spacious living areas are perfect for hosting gatherings or simply enjoying quality time with loved ones. The backyard is a true oasis, featuring a sprawling space with a pool, spa and sport court, perfect for pickle ball, basketball or maybe can be expanded to a tennis court. The large windows not only allow for stunning views of the outdoor retreat but also invite an indoor-outdoor lifestyle, making it an ideal setting for entertaining or unwinding in privacy. In addition to its beauty and amenities, this property offers practicality and convenience. The large driveway and 3-car garage provide ample space for parking multiple vehicles, ensuring ease and accessibility for you and your guests. Offers a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of city life, while still being conveniently located near amenities and attractions. Sierra Madre is known for its charming community, and this property exemplifies the best of it. From its tranquil surroundings to its stunning views, it presents an opportunity to embrace the beauty of nature while enjoying the comforts of this beautiful home. Although this property may need a few updates, it's very hard to find this large square footage for a house and large lot in this beautiful city. Don't miss the chance to make this exceptional residence your own, where you can indulge in the spaciousness, admire the panoramic views, and create cherished memories in the backyard oasis. Come experience the allure of Sierra Madre living at its finest.

SIERRA MADRE ONE OWNER MID-CENTURY HOME Welcome to this exceptional, one-owner traditional style home, a true gem built in 1967. With its timeless charm and potential for customization, this residence presents a unique opportunity for those looking to create their dream home. Step inside and be greeted by the spacious layout, providing ample room for comfortable living and entertaining. The bamboo floors throughout most of the home add a touch of natural beauty and durability. The kitchen, with its original charm, presents the perfect canvas for your culinary vision. The dining room can accommodate a large crowd and is warmed by a cozy fireplace. The primary bedroom overlooks the rear yard and has an en-suite 3/4 bath. The three additional bedrooms offer space to cater to all of your personal needs. The attached, two-car garage, provides ample space for parking and storage. The backyard presents a tranquil setting adorned with beautiful trees that include avocado, fig and citrus. A large, prolific avocado tree graces the front entry. Conveniently located near the park, public transportation and the many amenities of the quaint village of Sierra Madre. Don't miss out on this chance to unleash all of your design aspirations!

Welcome to 661 Canyon Crest Dr., this beautiful home offers a blend of character, modern upgrades, & endless potential in one of the most private and quiet areas of Sierra Madre. Upon arrival, you will notice the wide double lot size, expansive driveway, lush landscaping, and majestic mountain views. As you step inside, you will immediately notice the brand-new LVP wood-like flooring, & fresh interior paint throughout. You will be impressed by the spacious living room featuring large windows that fill the space with natural light, complementing the charming brick fireplace, which adds both warmth and a touch of elegance. This home features three large size bedrooms, brand-new carpet, and ample closet space. One bedroom could be perfect for an office. Crown molding further enhances this home and is in the bedrooms, hallways, and dining room. The kitchen is fully functional with charming built-in cabinetry and opens to the dining room with built-in credenza & period wainscoting, a perfect space for private dinners creating wonderful memories with friends and family. The thoughtfully added upgrades include a new 4-ton HVAC system, new roof, and new electrical with a 200-amp panel ensuring your comfort and peace of mind. Additionally, a dedicated laundry room with convenient shelving and lighting has been thoughtfully incorporated, adding a level of functionality. The updated bathroom further showcases the attention to detail poured into this property with a new tile floor, tiled shower/bathtub, and fixtures. Outside, you will discover a wraparound front porch that is a perfect place to enjoy a quiet morning, birds chirping in the cool canyon air.. Or perhaps enjoy a good book with iced tea in the afternoonsâ€¦ There is ample storage inside your two-car carport with a dedicated 220v EV power supply. The backyard is private and tranquil, with a new marathon turf lawn and fruit trees providing a serene retreat amidst the beauty of nature. Interested in expanding this home? Here is where the endless potential comes inâ€¦Looking for an ADU or a dream garage? You have the room on this highly desired double lot. Want to build your dream bathroom with a walk-in closet, or perhaps design your dream kitchen? It is all available within this beautiful property. Located in a friendly community with scenic beauty, 17 mi. from DTLA, minutes away from the Mt. Wilson hiking trail, Mary's Market, and lively downtown Sierra Madre boutique shops and restaurants.

Elegantly updated, single level, ranch style home located in charming Sierra Madre! Welcomed by the cozy and inviting entry, your eye is instantly drawn to the view of the picturesque backyard. The living room with traditional fireplace, formal dining room, and charming family room also with fireplace are perfect to host your family and friends. The renovated kitchen with light-filled breakfast nook awaits your morning coffee. The primary bedroom is spacious with windows overlooking the serene backyard accompanied by a beautifully renovated en suite. Two additional bedrooms share a renovated hall bath ensuring comfort and convenience for everyone. This home encourages an indoor/outdoor lifestyle with easy access from the family room to the backyard and patio. The backyard is stunning! Lush and beautifully manicured, this oasis is perfect for quiet evenings at home or entertaining. This home is conveniently located to a variety of restaurants, coffee bars, and boutique establishments. With its many upgrades, lovely floor plan, and some mountain views, you would be fortunate to call this house your home!

Located on a beautiful, broad tree-lined street in the northern part of the city, this gated, two story California Bungalow on almost a half -acre lot is but blocks from the heart of the ever popular Sierra Madre village. The grand steps to the wide front porch and entry offer a beautiful view of the front grounds and beyond. The floor plan is open and conducive to today's lifestyle and the house offers numerous windows for natural light plus a secluded primary suite on the second floor. The rear of the property offers bonus rooms with two baths and the possibility of conversion to an ADU (must be verified with city). In recent years the exterior has been repainted, the pool has been redone, and the electrical in the house has been updated. Property has several fruit trees and an avocado. First time on the market in decades. This is a retreat-style property with wonderful potential.

Discover this meticulously updated and expanded gem, from the studs up in 2015, offering a harmonious blend of modern luxury and energy efficiency, including paid solar panels. Experience high-end finishes, including Hansgrohe fixtures, Toto toilets, and custom cabinetry and built-ins. The primary suite features a custom walk-in closet, adding a touch of luxury to your daily routine. The kitchen is designed for ease and organization with roll-out shelves in the pantry and high-end appliances. Located in proximity to the scenic Bailey Canyon Wilderness Park, as well as schools, markets, and Sierra Madres charming downtown district, this home is a testament to fine craftsmanship and contemporary living. Don't miss your opportunity to call it your own.

This rare, single level townhouse is in highly desirable community of Sierra Madre! As you enter the home you are greeted by the living room with vaulted ceilings, lots of natural light, and a beautiful gas fireplace. The large kitchen has newer laminate flooring and plenty of storage. This unit has one of the largest back patios in the complex! Perfect for gardening, or simply enjoying your morning coffee. The primary bedroom has vaulted ceilings and an en suite bathroom with duel vanity and tile flooring. The spacious 2 car garage is attached to the courtyard with easy access. Walking distance to downtown Sierra Madre with unique shops, restaurants and community events. Come make this townhouse your own!

Enchanting Sierra Madre Home with ADU Potential and Old-World Charm. Welcome to this rare gem nestled in the hills of Sierra Madre, California. This meticulously restored residence beautifully blends Mediterranean aesthetics with California living, making every corner an inviting retreat. With the added benefit of a permitted storage space that is currently used as a 4th bedroom but can easily be converted into an accessory dwelling unit (ADU), this property presents an excellent opportunity for additional income generation. As you enter this charming cottage, you're immediately greeted by the inviting warmth of the living spaces. Each corner of the home is imbued with a unique charm that makes it truly special. The living room, purposefully designed, offers a cozy space that encourages cherished moments with family and friends. The kitchen blends traditional character with functional features to inspire your culinary creativity. Adjacent to the galley kitchen, a light and bright sunroom awaits, offering the perfect space for relaxation, reading, or enjoying your favorite TV shows. One of the standout features of this property is its expansive outdoor living space. Like a natural extension of the indoors, the generous patio is perfect for hosting lively summer BBQs or soaking up the quiet serenity of a cool evening. The garden has been thoughtfully landscaped with native plants, serving as an idyllic outdoor retreat. The property includes three additional bedrooms and one and a half bathrooms, offering flexibility for a growing family or guests. The updated bathrooms feature new fixtures and finishes while maintaining the home's charm. Located at 310 Old Ranch Road, this home promises tranquility without compromising on convenience. Nearby hiking trails, parks, and a vibrant downtown area are all within easy reach. Don't miss this rare opportunity to own an enchanting residence with ADU potential in Sierra Madre. Experience the best of California living in this remarkable home. Schedule your private tour today and unlock the endless possibilities of this one-of-a-kind property.

When was the last time you walked into a property and said WOW, this is perfect. Well, this is it! Situated in the much sought after city of Sierra Madre, this complex rarely sees a listing come up. This 2 story condo is one of 6 units and is situated at the back of the complex providing an abundance of privacy. Meander down the path and enter through the gate to your own private patio. Opening the front door you are greeted with a spacious living room featuring a lovely window seat, gas fireplace, and a door leading to a side deck. The galley style kitchen offers a walk-in pantry and eat in breakfast/dining area. Off the living room is a half bath. All three bedrooms are upstairs. The primary suite has its own gas burning fireplace, walk-in closet and 2 doors opening onto a private deck The en-suite bath has dual sinks with separate tub and shower. The two additional bedrooms share a full bath. There is a separate designated laundry room on this level as well. Additional features include, central air and heat, direct access from the 2 car attached garage, and bamboo flooring is throughout the home with the exception of the baths. With close proximity to the Sierra Madre public library, parks, downtown shops and restaurants, local hiking trails and easy freeway access, this location is hard to beat. Welcome home !

Welcome to this exquisite tastefully built Tuscan Style townhome. This townhome is in the rear of the complex and offers and abundance of privacy. Located in the charming town of Sierra Madre . The Spacious living room boasts a fireplace with a mantle. , nice size dining room, gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, alder cabinets with distressed finish and travertine countertops. A nice size guest bathroom downstairs as well as an elevator to accommodate your needs. As you take the elevator or the stairs to proceed upstairs, you will find 3 spacious bedrooms. The primary bedroom boast lots of light a sitting area and a lovely fireplace to enjoy cold days/evenings. The large primary bathroom is designed and beautifully done. A large walk in closet also is a huge bonus. The two additional bedrooms are large and lots of light come in to the rooms. The spacious bathroom upstairs is tastefully done and is perfect to share or enjoy privately. The large crown moldings, walnut hardwood flooring throughout most of home. The designer selected carpet upstairs is the perfect light color. Custom blinds and window coverings throughout this tastefully built townhome. French doors lead you out to a large private patio to enjoy and relax with a favorite book or glass of wine. A built in bbq with custom tile plus a countertop to enjoy those California days/evenings. Custom landscape with bay tree and fern trees surrounding the exterior adding immense privacy. The two car garage with laundry inside. As well as custom built cabinets and office space to enjoy!! Welcome to the quaint town of Sierra Madre . You can walk to the parks, library, hiking trails, shops and local restaurants. Enjoy a summer evening concert in the park at the local park in town. Too much to include... this is a MUST see townhome.
full_street_line: 636 W Sierra Madre Blvd Unit B

text: As you enter the charming town of Sierra Madre, you can almost feel time slowing down as you drive through the village of quaint shops, tree lined streets and desirable public schools - including 2023 CA Distinguished School awardee, Sierra Madre Elementary School. This beautifully renovated home is located at the end of a private drive, shaded by a canopy of mature oak trees and in close proximity to the town center and a stone's throw from a park with playground, tennis courts, swimming pool and baseball fields. The spacious floor plan features a large living room, glass surrounded dining room, gourmet eat-in kitchen with adjoining laundry room, three bedrooms and two baths. The living room offers wide plank hardwood floors, beamed ceiling, and an oversized brick fireplace with raised hearth. A large picture window spans the length of the living room and offers a window seat with tranquil views to the front raised patio. The chef's kitchen features Carrera marble countertops, custom built cabinets, Viking appliances and an apron front sink, plus a corner fireplace across from the built-in banquette and eating area. The primary bedroom offers a large closet and full bath, while the additional two bedrooms also have large closets and share an updated bathroom with clawfoot tub, a double schoolhouse sink and hex-tile floor. Other features you're sure to appreciate are an oversized two-car garage with utility sink, central air-conditioning, copper plumbing and a tankless water heater. This one-story home hits that rare sweet-spot of working equally well for numerous lifestyles, and the open rooms, multiple patios and a generous dining room are perfect for indoor and outdoor parties and entertaining!

Sierra Madre, a village town that is reminiscent of a ''Mayberry'' small community is the location of this west-facing, mid-century home that hasn't been on the market for over 30 years. The open living room features a cozy fireplace, built-in shelving for displaying family treasures and is open to the dining area. Meal prep is easy in the open kitchen with skylight, breakfast counter and offers a view of the private backyard. The primary suite features a full bath, a large dressing area and sliding doors to the backyard. The second bedroom also offers its own full bath. A generous-sized family room features a vaulted ceiling, access to and views of the backyard. There is a multi-purpose room that can be used as a den, office, gym, etc. New carpet was just installed, and the interior was partially painted. There is a laundry room, central air & heating and a separate work/potting-shed. The spacious backyard with a lemon tree is perfect for family gatherings, children, and pets. Located a short distance to the quaint downtown village of Sierra Madre is a plethora of eateries, boutique shopping, Starbucks, and is also near hiking trails; Sierra Madre Canyon, Mount Wilson, Chantry Flats and Eaton Canyon. This light fixer awaits its new stewards who will be free to create and transform this humble abode to a personalized treasure! Please see attached floor plan showing laundry/powder room possibilities!

Welcome to this stunning home in Sierra Madre that exudes elegance and style. Situated on a beautiful tree-lined street, this expansive residence boasts three bedrooms, three bathrooms plus a loft/office area and an additional sizable bonus room with a separate entrance. Step inside to a welcoming foyer that sets the tone for the rest of the house. The spacious, bright living room features a fireplace with a charming mantle and there are large windows that features lovely mountain views. Adjacent to the living room is the spacious dining room. The kitchen has been thoughtfully designed with sleek granite countertops, ample cabinet space and a large eating area with lovely views of the back yard. Off the kitchen and eating area is a sizable family room with cathedral ceilings, a second fireplace and sliding glass doors leading to a wonderful deck with a classic pergola. The primary suite features a gorgeous, remodeled bathroom that includes a soaking tub. On the main level of the home there are also two additional bedrooms, an additional full bathroom and a powder room. It also has an oversized laundry room with multiple storage closets and cabinet spaces. A spiral staircase leads to the loft/office area. In addition, there is a bonus room with storage cabinets that is accessed from the backyard. The private and fully fenced/gated backyard has two patio areas. A large attached two-car garage completes this wonderful home. With close proximity to parks, shops, restaurants and local hiking trails this home is truly a gem. Welcome home!

This hidden gem is nestled among the trees and next to a babbling brook at the base of the San Gabriel Mountains and seamlessly blends a secluded retreat with modern amenities. Originally built in 1916 & rebuilt in 2007, the well-appointed 5-bed, 4-bath home with 2, 500+ SF of living space, is perfect for those looking to have a serene escape from the city. As you enter, notice the beautiful craftsman details & hardwood oak flooring which extend throughout the home, perfectly complimenting the wooded setting. The spacious & inviting living room with a wall of French doors & windows calls you to the views of the back porch overlooking the gardens & stunning mountain views. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, a large farmhouse sink, & an open dining area with French doors leading outside.The primary suite has a sitting area, bespoke red oak built-in closets & second story views of the mountains. Step into the backyard surrounded by nature and featuring a large patio, refreshing spa pool and garden beds. Unique to the Canyon, this large flat lot includes a 2-car garage + driveway, able to accommodate guests & secure off-street parking. Nearby parks & quick access to hiking trails throughout the Angeles National Forest offer opportunities for those who love to play & explore the great outdoors. Offering space, comfort & luxury within a tight-knit community, this spectacular opportunity to own a piece of the magical Sierra Madre Canyon is one you won't want to miss!

1914 "AIRPLANE" BUNGALOW Neatly tucked into a tree-lined cul-de-sac lane, this 1914 "Airplane" style Bungalow is loaded with charm and character. Upon entering, your eye is drawn to the focal point of the living room: its hand-crafted, river rock fireplace complemented by the warmth of hardwood flooring. The flooring continues into the formal dining room which is framed with wainscoting and able to accommodate a large gathering. The kitchen has been updated and opens out to a spacious family room. The main level offers 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. Upstairs, you will find the primary suite which consists of a bedroom and bath. The special characteristic of an "airplane" bungalow is a single room on the second floor surrounded by windows, said to resemble the cockpit of an airplane and designed to originally be a sleeping room in summer months with all-around access to breezes. An attached, wrap-around, redwood deck offers ample space for outdoor dining and entertainment and overlooks a sparkling, blue swimming pool that screams "jump in and cool off" on these warm days of summer. The rear yard includes a large, grassy area and is graced with a lovely view of the mountains. The oversized, 11, 000+ square foot lot provides plenty of parking. In addition, there is an outbuilding with a carport with plumbing and electricity which would be perfect for an ADU. This home is located near public transportation, the park and recreation center and the downtown village of Sierra Madre.

Welcome to SIERRA MADRE. Classic Mid-Century design on a Large Lot. First Time on the market in 40 Years. New Exterior Paint, great 70s Floor Plan. Primary bedroom is its own Retreat. Grand Arching Windows, a Beautifully set Yard, all within Small Town Tranquility- which has become increasingly Hard To Find outside our Hometown. Easy Stroll to the Charming and Quaint Downtown Village - Cafes, Shops, Parks. An Unbelievable Opportunity to own a Classic Home on over an 18, 000 sqft. Flat Lot in Sierra Madre; come See and Feel how Special this Property is.

Located in Sierra Madre, California, this charming home features 3 bedrooms, 1.5 baths, and a separate guest house. The main residence offers a spacious living area, a well-appointed kitchen, and a master bedroom. The additional bedrooms can be utilized as guest rooms or a home office. Outside, the property boasts a peaceful backyard with mature trees and a patio area, perfect for outdoor activities. Sierra Madre is a serene suburban city known for its top-rated schools and proximity to nature preserves. Don't miss the opportunity to own this wonderful home with a separate guest house.

Located in the hills of Sierra Madre, but within walking distance to the quaint downtown village of Sierra Madre Completely sweet home with a Japanese flair and lots of vintage touches throughout 1/1 MAIN HOUSE AND DETACHED WORKSHOP/OFFICE - The main house has a formal entry to the living room with a lovely fireplace centered on north facing wall flanked by two large windows to allow natural light into the space. There is a cozy breakfast nook overlooking the rear yard and a galley kitchen that leads to the mud room with washer/dryer hookups and lots of storage. The bedroom is ample in size with some mid century build ins and a walk in closet. There is access to the bathroom from either the bedroom or the mud room. The detached workshop/office is a very large open space with lots of built in book shelves and storage The yard features a deck that overlooks beautiful a Japanese inspired themed yard with pond and waterfall (there were koi in the pond at one time) There is a two car garage and a long driveway Home is being sold as is, where is with no repairs being done Buyer to verify square footage & check with city regarding all permits, zoning and possible uses Owner passed away peacefully in home in April 2023 Square footage estimated to be 905 main house and 445 workshop/office.

This is one of the few rare new builds on top of the north hillside in the City of Sierra Madre, and this highly coveted location has yet to be available in decades. Nestled beneath majestic Mt. Wilson, this brand-new custom build Spanish style home features city lights and canyon views, thoughtfully designed to enhance the serene tranquility of its surroundings. This beautifully designed property boasts 4 bedrooms and 4 1/2 bathrooms, spanning an impressive 2, 707 square feet of living area. Additionally, a spacious 731 square foot bonus room with a private entrance brings the total indoor usable area to an expansive 3, 438 square feet. Features include beautiful step ceilings, a motor court, designer light fixtures, designer cabinets, and luxurious quartz kitchen countertops. Conveniently located on the north end of Baldwin Avenue in one of the most charming and family-friendly small towns on the west coast. Just a few minutes' walk to downtown Sierra Madre for shopping, fine dining, and everything you could want in your local neighborhood, not to mention a short drive to Arcadia and Highway 210 to bustling Pasadena and Downtown LA. If you are looking for a different design or floor plan, please check out the homes located adjacent to this property at 638 Baldwin Ct.

Situated on a wonderful street in the picturesque city of Sierra Madre, this extensively remodeled home boasts incredible mountain and city views. Upon entering through the oversized front door one is greeted with a large living room consisting of a fireplace and many of the original craftsman-style built-ins. Located just off the living room is a bedroom/office ensuite with French doors that open onto the front patio. The dining room, which contains French doors that open onto a balcony, sits adjacent to a marvelous sun room with massive windows overlooking the city below. On the opposite side of the dining room is a large kitchen complete with a beautiful center island, all new high-end Thermador appliances, a large pantry and a breakfast nook. The primary bedroom is located down the hall and contains a spacious walk-in closet and a magnificent bathroom, complete with a large glass enclosed shower, a stand-alone soaking tub and double vanities. A third bedroom ensuite is also located on the street level floor. Downstairs contains the fourth bedroom ensuite and laundry room. But what really sets the downstairs apart is the huge den/game room complete with a wet bar and direct access to the pool area outside. The sparkling pool has also been completely re-done with a new Pebble Tech finish and brand new filter equipment. Other upgrades include: New plumbing, new electrical, dual zone heating and AC and engineered wood and tile throughout. Close proximity to schools, shops and restaurants. This is a stunning home!

This Artisan-built Victorian Revival home combines vintage-inspired details with modern updates. Upon entering, through a brick walkway, pass under a rare mature Engleman Oak to the front entry. Clerestory windows provide ample natural light to the entry stairwell and newer Cherry wood floors add sophistication to the interior. The living room is a showstopper w/a black marble-faced fireplace, built-in shelves and cabinetry. The owner has repurposed the original dining room into a music room/ den and transformed the family room into a formal dining room. Exceptional panoramic views can be seen from all levels of the home with treetops, wooded hillsides, and city lights. French doors leading to an exterior viewing deck, is ready for dining and entertainment. The remodeled kitchen boasts high-end appliances, a Wolf Range with a 900 CFM hood, a beverage refrigerator, and a breakfast area with easy access to the front outside dining viewing deck The upper level offers a versatile space that can be used as an office or fourth bedroom area, featuringa loft with a built-in platform bed, and access to the large top viewing deck. A large attic standing heigh may present many living options.The sleeping wing on the second level comprises 3 bedrooms and 2 remodeled baths, including an en-suite with a fireplace, walk-in closet, and newly remodeled large 3/4 bath with dual sinks. The en-suite leads out to the expansive viewing deck, providing stunning views of the surrounding landscape. A great place for private relaxation. The lower level offers a unique and versatile area, with built-in surround sound, perfect for entertainment, relaxation, or just a place to get away. During the winter months, the sound of the Sierra Madre river rock wash can be heard from many rooms offering a tranquil sound rairely found in city living.Other features include a hardwired sound system throughout, walnut paneling and built-ins, 2-car direct access garage, with built-ins, and parking for 3 additional cars in the driveway. Overall, this Sierra Madre Canyon home offers quality and attention to detail throughout coupled with a comfortable and functional space that is perfect for modern living.

Rare single level townhome in the sought-after community of Sierra Madre! This two-bedroom, two bathroom updated townhome is the epitome of style and sophistication. The open concept floor plan is made for today's lifestyle. The cozy living room is highlighted with a gas fireplace and custom wall cabinets. A large dining room leads to the chef's kitchen. Updates to kitchen include solid wood cabinets with Silestone countertops, oversized KitchenAid side by side refrigerator, double ovens and a Bosch dishwasher. Walnut engineered hardwood floors and interior shutters enhance the warmth and sophistication of the home. Sliding patio doors open to a private courtyard with majestic mountain views. A motorized retractable awning will provide year-round protection from the sun and rain. The large primary bedroom has a custom-built desk making remote work possible. The primary en-suite bedroom includes a walk-in closet, updated bathroom with a double sink vanity and large dual shower head fixtures. Spacious two car garage is attached to the courtyard with easy access to the townhome. Walking distance to vibrant downtown Sierra Madre with unique shops, restaurants and community events. This beautiful townhome is the perfect place to call home!

Here's your change.... price reduced $100, 000 AND, central air-conditioning will be installed soon! Tranquil grounds of nearly half an acre provide the perfect setting for this grand Craftsman estate. For the past 25+ years, the owners have been lovingly and carefully restoring the home, respecting the original architecture. Tall front hedges offer verdant seclusion of the generously sized front yard which is surrounded by mature trees in a park-like setting and is magically illuminated by accent lighting at night. Inside the home, hallmarks of natural oak wood flooring, picture frame windows, built-in cabinets and shelves, French doors, glass doorknobs, a mud room and enclosed sleeping porches all add to the splendor of halcyon days. Downstairs boasts the living room, dining room, family room, kitchen, one bedroom, a bathroom and the mud/laundry room. The kitchen features a serene view of both the front yard and mountains from the expansive kitchen window as well as a cozy breakfast nook. Upstairs you'll find 3 additional bedrooms, an office, and a bathroom. The primary bedroom includes a balcony offering the perfect respite for sipping tea before bedtime. Through the family room is a large deck that overlooks the expansive and private backyard and pool. For the gardener in the family there is a raised-bed garden area, and fruit trees which include: several varieties of lemon, lime, blood orange, orange, grapefruit, loquat, kumquat, passion fruit, pomegranate, persimmon, pear, peach, and mulberry. Schedule a tour of this unique gem before it is too late!

Tucked into the foot of Mt. Wilson in Sierra Madre, this California Ranch home blends seamlessly into the landscape with a 1950s-era design by celebrated architect Cliff May. Contemporary construction and materials bring out the best of May's iconic plan-book, a single-level layout featuring four bedrooms, luxe baths, a family room and generous living spaces. Chefs will love the kitchen appointed with honed countertops, open shelving and a vintage stove, all rendered in stylish neutral tones. Vaulted ceilings and exposed beams are clad in beautiful natural wood; walls of glass and clerestory windows bring glorious sunshine and extend the interior into lush, tranquil surroundings. Relax, dine, garden and play in the flat yard, your serene and private environment in this rarefied enclave. Head up the street to Bailey Canyon or hike the scenic trails of Mt. Wilson, part of the joy of Sierra Madre living that includes nearby coffee, dining, markets, and a stellar elementary school.

A place to call Home is found in this Sierra Madre single-level, three bedroom, three bath traditional located in a preferred area within this charming town.Lovingly and impeccably maintained by its owners, this home is move-in readyoffering system upgrades on all levels and added features for the new owner'sbenefit and enjoyment.There is an immediate welcoming impression upon entry with warm wood flooring flowing from the living room to the connecting dining room and kitchen areas that are highlighted by the sun-filled picture windows and sliding glass door allowing easy flow to the newly- designed entertainer's yard completed in 2022. The home offers a nicely sized kitchen for meal preparation and the convenience of an eat-in-kitchen for those on-the-go. The adjacent laundry area was redesigned for convenience and added pantry and storage space. The primary bedroom with three quarter en-suite bath is located at the end of the hallway for a peaceful retreat, offering newer carpet, paint and closet remodel. The home offers two additional bedrooms each with hardwood flooring and two additional bathrooms; a full bath in the main hall and a three-quarter bath for guests. The pride and highlight of coming home to 120 Holdman is the newly designed rear yard offering a salt-water pool with the added features of a Baja shelf, waterfall, lighting and large spa. There is a built-in BBQ with bar seating, a firepit area and a covered patio with plenty of room for relaxation around a 75'' TV. Backyard entertaining is further enhanced by striking views of the ever-popular hiking trails & peaks of our beloved San Gabriel Mountain range. Bonus: Owners have prepaid the Solar lease until Nov. 2034. Truly your next place to call Home ~

Situated in one of the most desirable areas of Sierra Madre, this beautifully remodeled three bedroom and one and a half bathroom home offers a fresh and modern living space. The remodeled kitchen and bathrooms are undoubtedly attractive features, offering new white oak cabinetry, fixtures, and finishes. The backyard boasts lush landscaping and mature trees with so much potential. Bonus room behind the garage with possible ADU conversion.

Exceptional multi-level contemporary home in one of Sierra Madre's most desirable neighborhoods. The home has a retro-vibe with the original 1960's light fixtures and colored windows. The first level features living room with fireplace, dining room, large eat-in kitchen that leads to screened in porch. Upper level has 2 bedrooms and full bathroom, main bedroom has a vanity area and amazing views of the valley from the balcony; lower level has 1 bedroom and three-quarter bathroom. The fully fenced, private backyard features sparkling pool and spa. Two-car attached garage with storage. Come and make this your dream home!

Beautiful, light-filled Victorian 3-level end unit townhome located in the desirable town of Sierra Madre. The original owner was an art enthusiast and kept her home pristine. This stylish, semi-open floor plan offers a spacious living room with peek-a-boo mountain views, a fireplace, plantain shutters, and a powder bathroom. The sizable kitchen has tall upper cabinets, an ample pantry cabinet, and designer granite countertops that continue to the backsplash. The dual-purpose dining room with picturesque bay windows can also serve as a home office with built-in cabinets and a desk. Through sliding glass doors, you have direct access to the deck from the dining room, which leads to a large, fully enclosed private yard with access to the community area. Upstairs you will find a sizeable primary suite with a fireplace, walk-in closet, bay windows, and en suite with spa tub. The hallway has a wide landing, many built-in cabinets/linen closets, a spacious guest bedroom, and a full-size bathroom. On the ground floor is a generous two-car garage with an approx. 250 sq. ft. multi-purpose utility room with built-in workbench, shelves, and laundry area. The possibilities are endless for its use; you may even consider a wine cellar or gym. These 16 immaculate townhomes are just south of the Sierra Madre Public Library, sited over approx an acre of land. Residents share five guest parking spots lovely gazebo, ample green space, and two pets under 20 lbs are welcome.

With Seller Financing Options better than any bank, you can enjoy resort-style living within this meticulously maintained and custom crafted Mid-century Modern-inspired post and beam design by renowned architect John Gougeon inspired to bring health, nature, flow, and function to those fortunate enough to reside here. Step inside, let the good vibes rush over you, and be transformed by an intriguing minimalist space of glass and wood with a large clerestory, 13 ft ceilings, and floor-to-ceiling windows. At the heart of the home sits a generous Kitchen featuring double Thermador ovens, a professional fridge, an expansive bar overlooking the breathtaking view of the lap pool, and the jacuzzi under the backdrop of majestic mountains. Leisure together in all the common spaces or retreat to your own private spaces to relax and recharge. The very spacious primary bedroom features an expansive custom closet and ensuite bathroom replete with a steam bath and dry sauna. Every room flows effortlessly outdoors, so you can feel at one with nature. Also environmentally conscious, this property is xeriscaped, with two dry creek beds running on both sides of the gazebo, a paver patio, and a variety of abundant fruit trees, and the home runs on solar power with a newer reflective roof. Welcome to The Canyon! We've got the 411 on 411 Santa Anita Court. Nestled in a desirable neighborhood of Sierra Madre, this charming single story ranch house could be your next home. The house has 3 spacious bedrooms and a large office which can be used as a fourth bedroom. The living room and den are perfect spaces to entertain friends and family. Relax in front of a roaring fire in the living room. The den opens up to the very private back yard. In addition to a lovely lawn, brick patios allow enough space for al fresco dining and lounging. This stunning light filled turnkey Victorian townhouse with an excellent floor plan is situated in the heart of Sierra Madre. The spacious living room has crown moldings, large windows overlooking the beautiful gazebo and landscaping plus the San Gabriel Mountain view. Hardwood floors throughout the living, dining and the kitchen area. The formal dining room opens to a private balcony and can lead down to a fenced private yard which is perfect to enjoy the beautiful outdoor living in Southern California. There is a powder room on this level. The master suite has a fireplace, a walk-in closet and with a treetop view towards the backyard. The second bedroom overlooking the great landscaping of the complex and has fantastic mountain views through the large windows. The second bathroom is conveniently located next to the 2nd bedroom. An extra large linen cabinet wall is at the landing area of the top floor. The two-car attached garage has a 250 SqFt bonus room with an in-unit laundry facility and a great space which can be used as a home office, hobby room or even a private wine room. The following updates have been completed by the current owner 1) New HVAC system & attic ducts were installed in May 2022. 2) New water heater & garbage disposal installed in 2019. 3) Flat roof was replaced in June 2022. 4) Indow window inserts were custom made in 2018 & is easy to re-install. 5) Interior painting completed May 2023. 6) Exterior painting work is under way now and should be completed this summer. Special assessment has been paid through HOA by the seller. The monthly HOA covers water, trash, exterior maintenance and earthquake insurance. There are 5 guest parking spots in the complex and ample street parking spaces available for visitors.

Located in the highly desirable north Arcadia Highland Oaks neighborhood, this traditional home is in Sierra Madre with Award Winning Arcadia schools. This home features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a spacious living room with a fireplace, dining room with a vaulted wood ceiling with skylights and a fireplace-perfect for hosting meals or gatherings, a remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances, double oven, and caesarstone countertops, family room with views to backyard and access to the large deck-ideal for an indoor/outdoor lifestyle. Additional highlights include hardwood floors, numerous large windows bring in an abundance of natural light, and the laundry is conveniently located inside the house. There is a patio off the family room for outdoor dining and entertaining. There is a basement with a bonus room attached which can be used as an office or additional storage. The two-car attached garage has more storage space. Newly landscaped front and backyards-the backyard is fully fenced and has a pond with a waterfall which creates a serene and relaxing outdoor space. The property boasts many mature trees, adding to the overall charm and appeal of the home. This is your opportunity to live in one of the nicest areas of Sierra Madre.

Located on a quiet and peaceful street, this tri-level, craftsman style, 4 bedroom, detached single family home is full of natural light and wonderful character. The main level has a warm and welcoming living room area with a built in bookshelf that opens to the dining area. French doors in the dining area open to a charming balcony with lovely trees outside. The kitchen is open to the living and dining spaces and has honey-colored wood cabinets. On the other side of the kitchen is a lovely breakfast nook space that is filled with light and opens to another balcony. A perfectly positioned powered room completes this wood-floored main level. Upstairs are three bedrooms, all with ample closet space and flooded with beautiful sunlight. The spacious primary bedroom has an ensuite bathroom with soaking tub and dual sinks. A very large closet completes this fantastic suite. A stackable washer and dryer are conveniently located on this level. The fourth bedroom is located below the main level and has its own ensuite full bathroom. This large bedroom also has French doors that open to a nice, quiet patio. The two-car attached garage also has an extra storage room. This lovely home is located within walking distance to the fantastic cafes, pubs, and coffee shops that Sierra Madre has to offer. It is also walking distance to a great park and the public library. All of this plus super easy and convenient freeway access to the 210 make this a perfect home.

Calling all nature lovers! This single-level traditional home is perched among mature trees atop a private canyon bordering the city of Sierra Madre and Arcadia's desirable Highland Oaks area. This tranquil location provides dramatic views of the mountains and city lights. The backyard is a private retreat, often frequented by the abundant wildlife that calls the canyon home. The rear of the house has floor-to-ceiling windows that bathe the home with light and affords beautiful views of the expansive yard. There is a generous eat-in kitchen, spacious living room, and den. Additional features of this home include a two-car garage, hardwood floors throughout, new electrical panels, and recently updated central heating and air conditioning. Located just minutes from downtown Sierra Madre, hiking trails, Wilderness Park, and easy access to major freeways, this home offers the perfect combination of privacy and convenience.

The front entry welcomes you to a large living room with built-in bookcases, fireplace and original hardwood floors. French doors frame the wisteria covered pergola leading to the backyard. The entry hall opens to the formal dining room, adjacent to the eat-in kitchen. Designer E. A. Daniell took pride in creating, 'the best place to relax in a home, a cozy den' - this home offers three such cozy areas for relaxing and entertaining. Have you been searching for the ideal townhome in Sierra Madre? This end-unit and move-in condition townhome is situated in the heart of "Wistaria City" and may be exactly what you're looking for. This two-level unit offers a private backyard, a 459 SF two-car garage, and a 256 SF storage room that is presently staged as an office. The open floor plan offers an entry area, living room, kitchen, and dining room on the main level, as well as a powder room and additional storage. From the dining room, you have direct access to the deck which leads to the ample-size private backyard. Upstairs you will find a large primary suite with a fireplace and walk-in closet, a wide landing with linen cabinets, and a spacious guest bedroom with mountain views and easy access to a 3/4 bathroom. Below the main level is the two-car garage, in-unit laundry room, and separate storage room. The current owners have recently painted much of the interior, installed new carpet, and made other important improvements. For example, the rear-facing windows are double-paned Pella windows; the central HVAC ducts were replaced in 2021; and the refrigerator, washer, and dryer were all replaced within the last 2 years. Located just south of the Sierra Madre Public Library, the Morgan Court HOA is a well-run community of 16 townhomes sited on over an acre of land. Residents share 5 guest parking spots in addition to ample green space, and two pets under 20 lbs are welcome. The monthly HOA fee covers water, trash, and exterior maintenance. The HOA has approved a special assessment to repaint a substantial portion of the exterior this summer, which the current owners have already paid! If you are searching for privacy, serenity, and a spectacular Sierra Madre location, then this townhome may be the perfect match for you.

Charming single family home is located in the picturesque city of Sierra Madre on a spacious lot providing ample outdoor space for relaxation and entertainment. Tucked on a picturesque street, this spectacular Sierra Madre haven might just be what you're looking for! This enchanting Spanish-inspired haven is a residence you'll be proud to call your own! Truly a sight to behold, its impressive curb appeal is defined by stunning details and intricate design elements that will take your breath away. From the red tile roofing to the wrought-iron accents, every feature has been carefully crafted to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere. A grand shade tree and ornate inlaid gate entice you to explore this amazing abode. As you step through the artisan entry, prepare to be dazzled by a sophisticated modern interior where crisp white tones pair with gorgeous hardwood flooring. Graceful archways connect the sunlit foyer to the light, bright main gathering areas. A well-equipped kitchenette and a full bath with a walk-in shower mean you can easily host overnight guests or perhaps even generate rental income. Outside, alfresco parties are bliss on the covered herringbone brick patio. The gentle sound of a tiered fountain creates a peaceful backdrop for meals under the tile-roof pavilion. Additionally, you have a downstairs office, a laundry room, and a gated driveway. Located in a highly sought-after area, you'll be just minutes away from some of the city's best restaurants, shops, and entertainment.
