This cozy traditional home offers 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms, kitchen, separate dining room, seating area w/fireplace, living room and laundry area on the main level. The home also offers a bonus/Rec room with a 3/4 bathroom with its own entrance, located and accessed from the rear of the home. Upon entering you will find that the open living room leads to both the dining room and seating area w/ fireplace. From the seating area you can access the laundry area and upstairs deck which leads downstairs to the bonus room & backyard. The deck has stairs leading down to the bonus room with that can be used as a guest room or office space. Just blocks from the quaint Sierra Madre Village and Mount Wilson hiking trails. Do not let this gem pass you by!

Welcome to this new modern interpretation of a Craftsman style home! Impeccable design with character and a great location, wrapped with new construction.  Expansive open floor plan with a Great Room with high ceilings (over 10ft), fireplace, decorative beams, traditional wainscoting, 55” TV , formal dining area, open kitchen with abundant storage, walk-in pantry, lrg island w/ marble counter & breakfast bar, and high-end steel appliances (48in Viking fridge/freezer, 48" DCS range) and a pot-filler faucet.  Traditional wainscoting continues down the hallway, past the powder room, leading to the 3 Guest Bedrooms and Master Suite. Master has a private en-suite bathroom with marble flooring. The hallway guest bath has a double vanity, porcelain hexagon tile flooring, glass tile backsplash, separate door for shower/bath or water closet privacy.  Master Suite has a sitting area, accent wall, built-in speakers, fireplace, large walk-in closet w/custom cabinets, and classic barn door for the bathroom. French doors leading to outdoor master deck with mountain views.   House features: wood flooring, high ceilings, 8 foot doors, central alarm system, central vacuum system, tankless H2O htr, Hansgrohe plumbing fixtures, Emtek Arts & Crafts style door hardware, custom cabinetry and trim throughout, solid surfaces & marble counters, designer lighting fixtures, dual air conditioning units, Cat-5 for internet/phone and cable wiring, interior fire sprinklers, drought tolerant landscape.

$400,000+ invested in rebuilding, upgrades, & customizing w/high-end Arts & Crafts finish work. This totally rebuilt (in 1998) 2,898 sq. modern Craftsman is hidden from the street, 11,770 Sqft. lot. North facing, quiet street. 3 BD, 3BA (1bath in workshop). Well designed & open floor plan, finely finished 1920s era details everywhere inside and out. Finish work that one would expect from a highly restored original. No small detail was overlooked. The front entrance has fine exterior finish work of wood trim, set against cedar shingle siding in era appropriate colors and tones. Exterior lamps by "Arroyo Craftsman". Large front door is Frank Lloyd Wright designed stained glass. A formal entry allows you to choose between the large family room, dining & gourmet kitchen, or to the left, a large living room with river rock fireplace. High cathedral ceilings in living & family rooms. 2 bedrooms on the East side & large master suite on the West side that features a living room type sitting area. 1 East side bedroom used as a den/office/library finished with custom solid wood book/display cases. Gourmet kitchen features custom cherry cabinets, 6 burner Thermador Professional stove, center island w/sink. Arts & Crafts wallpaper are Bradbury & Bradbury. Stained glass work is Frank Lloyd Wright design, high-end water fixtures are Hans Grohe Germany. 2 car garage has 10'x20' workshop & 1/2 bath. The photos will help to complete the story about this fine Sierra Madre Arts & Crafts Revival

Three charming bungalow style units with VERY low rents. Long term tenants. Property is priced to reflect ability to build multiple units. Zoned R-3. Buyer to check with City of Sierra Madre regarding restrictions, number of units that can be built, moratoriums, etc. Property is NOT on Sierra Madre Historic Preservation list but will be subject to a "Historic Survey" for the City prior to any demolition.

Can you say locacation, location, location! This charming California Bungalow is adorable on the outside and AMAZINGLY spacious inside. Bedroom #2 has a private exterior entrance and built in cabinets, potential for a home business. Bedroom #3 has a built-ins and original moldings. There is a separate fully permitted studio, adjacent to the gar.

Split level home built in 1975 on view lot over 26,000 square feet. This home was designed to accommodate the very wide frontage and feature fantastic views of the valley. The views and layout make this a perfect home for entertaining. The large living room features two large picture windows with views of the valley and a wood burning fireplace. The formal dining room overlooks the living room and has french doors opening to the newly built deck. The deck is incredible for entertaining and also to enjoy the views. The entry way has a wall of mirror with a large fresh water aquarium in the center. The family room has an adjoining room that features a bar and sitting bench while stained glass windows add a special touch. Again these rooms have incredible views. Upstairs has a master bedroom and master bathroom with two large separate sinks and extra large counter space. A walk-in closet and additional closet provides an abundance of space. Soaking tub and shower with enclosure is included. The master also has a balcony with sliding glass doors that provides fantastic views. The two other bedrooms share a bathroom with soaking tub and shower with enclosure.   A wine cellar provides another great area to enjoy. One wall has custom rack for wine bottles. There is a table and chairs and bench seating for your guests. It has always been very popular and special. This home is located in the northern most area in Sierra Madre and very private. Three car garage.

This prominent post modern home offers an exclusive opportunity to own a custom-built home that is extraordinary in style and character. This elegant remodeled contemporary home is located in northwest Sierra Madre on a beautiful tree-lined street. Upon entering the upper level of this expansive home you are welcomed by a vaulted-ceiling living room with a grand stacked stone fireplace and built-ins. Just off of the living room is a large dining room with fireplace and an updated kitchen with center island and stainless steel appliances. The entire property has been professionally landscaped with water conserving plants.

Built in 1964 this residence has been occupied and cared for by the original owner. Comfort, Style, Luxury & Character. Don't miss out on this beautiful Craftsman-style home with 3 bedrooms, 3 baths and located within an excellent neighborhood within Sierra Madre! This charming cottage located in the sought after Sierra Madre canyon features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, darling living room with wonderful windows and sliding door leading to the outside entertaining area which you can view the canyon ambiance, quaint kitchen with beautiful windows and amazing views of the canyon. Walk to hiking trails, Mary's Market, parks and in to downtown while enjoying all that Sierra Madre has to offer!! Wake up and relax in this charming canyon cottage you will call home!!

Serene Sierra Madre duplex is a golden opportunity to own an investment property. Built in 1948, this single level duplex has been very well maintained. The master suite is an elegant retreat with a spa-like bath and beautiful view. The backyard is a park-like space that has multiple areas for entertaining. The home features exterior cameras, SONOS surround sound with mini iPad controls, onQ technology, intercoms & 11-14 ft ceilings. A must.

Welcome to this sprawling single-level, traditional mid-century home. Situated nicely an enormous 14,256 sq.ft lot (just under 1/3 of an acre), this multi generational home is built around a covered patio overlooking a full guest house, gazebo, fire pit & over sized pool (20X40). A short two block walk brings you to a vibrant village, park, & all this safe foothill town has to offer. Living room with cozy gas fireplace. Kitchen features soapstone counters & pecan cabinets. Ensuite master bedroom. Three additional large bedrooms, one with a kitchenette & private bath. One bath features a custom walk in tub as well as an infrared sauna. Tankless water heaters in main house, as well as guest house. Central air/heat. Copper plumbing. Freshly refinished floors & interior paint. Double paned windows. Detached guest house with kitchen & 3/4 bath. Square footage shown includes 360 sq.ft. guest house. Sizable workshop. Pool has solar heating. An abundance of healthy, bearing fruit trees with drip irrigation. Perfect for entertaining or quiet enjoyment. Award winning schools, minutes to the Goldline, inviting hiking trails & recreational opportunities.

Features authentic craftsman millwork replicated throughout the home such as continuous head-trim over the doors & windows and Craftsman Z-splice wood joining accents using salvaged old growth Douglas fir from Vancouver Island. An excellent opportunity to purchase a home in the much sought after Hastings Oaks community in Sierra Madre. This ground floor, two-bedroom condo features a sun-filled living room with vaulted ceiling, fireplace, skylight and two luxuriously updated bathrooms. The master retreat includes access to one of two private fenced patios. The home has been upgraded with plantation shutters and slate and laminate wood floors. Association offers a pool, recreation room and community laundry. Parking Spaces: 82 & 30..

Back on the market The first thing you notice upon entering this complex is how lovely and well-maintained the property is and how welcoming it feels. With a bit of a woodsy vibe, homeowners will enjoy spending time indoors and out with two patios plus a balcony off the master suite. Add to that a community pool and spa and the charming village'' of Sierra Madre with its theatre, shops, restaurants, cafes and parks just a short walk away and you have a winning combination! This recently remodeled townhouse has three bedrooms and two baths upstairs and a half bath downstairs providing ample space and privacy for guests or a home office. A handy laundry area is situated right off the beautifully remodeled kitchen with quartz counters and a dining area leads out to the lower patio providing b.
full_street_line: 263 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit F

text: Location, charm and in the Heart of Downtown Sierra Madre only begins to describe this Bungalow home offering two bedrooms, one bath, an office and separate detached studio/workshop. This home exudes all that Sierra Madre is known for and is move in ready. From the moment you open the door you are invited into the living room featuring light oak laminate floors and coved ceilings. The kitchen is open and spacious with abundant cabinetry, stainless steel stove, dishwasher, space saving pots and pan hanger and built-in wine refrigerator. French doors off the dining area lead to an outdoor deck area with mountain views and is perfect for Al Fresco dining. A natural gas line hookup has been installed for the summer barbecue. The full bath has period charm complete with a claw foot tub/shower combination. Cabinetry has been added in the hall providing extra storage space. To round off this home there is a detached Workshop/Studio with an attached 1/2 bath with it's own gas and electric meters. Tankless Water Heater, recessed lighting, Trex like decking, Central Air and Heat, and numerous fruit trees make this the perfect starter home and is definitely an alternative to condo living. Welcome Home!

Known as part of “The Jameson Legacies” this custom built Victorian Farmhouse is situated on a charming tree-lined street. This delightful home offers a wrap-around porch, 9-foot ceilings and custom milled moldings, wainscoting and fireplace mantles. There is a formal entry, living room with fireplace, formal dining room that opens to a side patio, a spacious family room with fireplace and charming breakfast area with built-ins. The 2003 updated kitchen features a walk-in pantry, Viking stove, double ovens, warming drawer, convection oven, microwave, Sub-zero refrigerator, trash compactor, Bosch dishwasher & wine chiller. There is a spacious master suite with fireplace, sitting area, balcony access and luxurious bath. Also features: solid wood interior doors, Baldwin hardware, wood flooring, Casa Blanca ceiling fans, elevator; central vacuum, laundry shoot, dual air & heat, 2 laundry rooms, Pella windows, mature trees, automatic irrigation system, pull-down stairs in garage for attic storage, romantic custom-built gazebo and a 3-car garage.

South facing Historic 1908 Craftsman located on a quiet treelined street just a minutes walk to the downtown village of Sierra Madre. Huge lot with lots of backyard space/mountain views. The home has been lovingly maintained by the long time owner and has many updates. Upgraded electrical system. Entering into the home you discover the artistic beauty of days gone by with beautiful interior finish carpentry work done by 1908 era craftsman. Maple floors in the formal dining room & living room. Beautifully updated kitchen with either birch or maple cabinets. Large and modern master suite with a huge master bath featuring oversized tub & separate shower. The home has separate Den/retreat & a large fully finished bonus attic area running the length of the home of approximately 544 SQFT. not included in the taped SQFT. of the home. This bonus room is currently being used as a 4th bedroom. The backyard is massive with stunning mountain views. In the rear of the property sits a large garage of approximately 613 SQFT. built in 1995, lots of workshop & attic space, RV Storage. According to the City Building Department there is potential to build a second unit in the backyard area of up to 800 SQFT. Buyer to verify this potential second unit directly with the city.

This 1912 bungalow has been meticulously updated. The home offers 2bed. & 2bths, measuring 1,559sf., a living room w/fireplace, dining area & original stained glass windows. The kitchen offers high-end appliances, custom counters, cabinetry and wood floors. The main floor also includes a bedroom w/built-ins, main bath & laundry area. The master suite is located on the 2nd level and offers lots of light, updated bath w/walk-in shower, & specially designed closets. The professionally landscaped grounds offer 13 irrigation zones, drip irrigation and an underground dry well to catch rainfall. The front yard offers drought tolerant, terraced landscape, water fountain and Mahogany deck with built-in lights. The lush rear yard offers an edible garden on raised beds with room for more landscaping. The detached 2-car extra-deep garage has been designed with an office/work station, data lines connecting with the home, built-in cabinets, epoxy floors, a/c, ample storage in the re-enforced attic space. Other amenities include, home generator, tank-less water heater, water filtration system, dual zone A/C & forced heat system, updated elect. & plumb., updated windows and custom shades. The home also offers new exterior paint, concrete drive & newer property fences.

A MUST SEE - This stylish, single-story entertainer’s home with 4 bedroom & 4 baths has been remodeled and expanded with numerous upgrades. Located at the top of a cul-de-sac with twilight views of the city and fun and friendly neighbors! The open and airy gourmet kitchen has custom maple cabinets, granite counters, large island and breakfast room. With 2 private, large master suites, this home is ideal for a family with kids, in-laws, extended family, or guests. What else will you see when you visit? Beautifully remodeled bathrooms with custom vanities and Carrara marble, built-in closets and storage throughout, double-paned windows with shutters, large Jacuzzi, Movie-like projector & screen, 2-car detached garage + 2-car carport and much much more... remote-controlled Pergola that extends your living area to the spacious, landscaped yard with mature trees and nature perfect for entertaining or a relaxing evening at home. Do not be mistaken this was not a flip; this family made this their dream home with an European design and top quality materials. Lucky you, they were unexpectedly relocated by their company for work! Short walk to Sierra Madre schools, parks, shops and restaurants and close drive to the Gold Line.

This architecturally significant Victorian home has been remodeled to perfection. Lucky Baldwin purchased the land, entitled Park Manor, in 1900 and it is rumored he built this home for his sister. Tasteful updates co-exist with carefully refurbished original design elements. The beautifully remodeled kitchen has soapstone counter-tops, custom cabinets with appliance barns and interior lighting, and high quality Thermador appliances. Original bead-board ceilings and wainscoting in the kitchen and dining room have been lovingly restored, and hardwood floors run throughout. The formal dining room features a vaulted wood ceiling, bay windows, and a fabulous light fixture. High ceilings and original windows allow plenty of light. Upstairs is a serene Master Suite featuring an original claw foot tub, separate shower, pedestal sinks and bead-board wainscoting. Two additional bedrooms, another remodeled full bathroom, and original built-ins complete the second story. Downstairs is the.

On a view lot, you will enter this lovely split level home with an open floor plan. The views from the living room and master suite are incredible! It features a spacious living room-dining area that is next to the kitchen with tile floors, wood cabinets, granite counter tops, and an eating area. All appliances are included. Upstairs feature the master suite with a newer bathroom, granite counter tops, double sinks, and an extra-large 3/4 shower, walk-in closet, and a balcony with views of the mountains. The 2 spacious bedrooms share a full bathroom with double sinks, bathtub and tile floors. The family room has an open floor plan with a 1/2 bathroom, back patio with views, and direct access to the 2-car garage. Central air and heat, alarm system, and partial hardwood floor. Beautiful 3 bedroom, 3 bath two story cape cod style home on lovely Sierra Madre Street. Constructed in 1995. Features Central A/C and forced air heat. Formal dining room, 2 car detached garage and concrete driveway. Open den, breakfast area, inside laundry room/closet. Beautiful mountain views.

Located in a coveted, serene location of Sierra Madre and sited on a 1 acre parcel, this revived 1960s classic modern has a flat lot and sweeping unobstructed views. Enjoy the architectural interest and sleek beauty of this 3,468 sq ft home featuring 5 bedroom and 3 baths. The modern design offers an open floor plan, an entertainer's kitchen with high-end Viking appliances, an expansive dining room/ living room and deck all taking full advantage of the 180 degree mountain and city views. The first floor offers vaulted ceilings, a 10'x20' steel framed/fused bamboo deck, a half bath, and a master suite with a soaking tub, separate shower and views. Also on the first floor is an additional bedroom suite. The lower level offers three bedrooms, a full bath, large media/recreation or family room and access to the manicured backyard with DG paths and multiple entertaining areas. All exterior features are architecturally consistent with the home's 1960s modern design. In addition, there.

This gorgeous single-level custom home is located in prestigious Sierra Madre with Arcadia's award-winning schools! Newly rebuilt and expanded in 2016, the property boasts a contemporary open floor plan and new designer upgrades throughout. There are 4 spacious bedrooms (3 w/ walk-in closets), each connecting to a bath. The resort-like master bedroom suite has built-in speakers, relaxing pool and mountain views, large walk-in closet, and a luxurious bath with double sinks, spa-like 'wet room' shower and free standing tub. The gourmet kitchen features stainless steel appliances, soft-close cabinets, marble backsplash, and an oversized granite island and breakfast bar. The bright and cheery great room is an entertainer’s delight with built-in surround-sound speakers, 9-foot ceilings, gas fireplace, and doors which open up to the large backyard with sitting area overlooking the pool and spa. Other upgrades include wood floors, recessed LED lighting, copper plumbing, fire sprinkler system, dual pane windows, tankless water heater, wide circular driveway, 2-car attached garage with apoxy floors, and so much more! Prime location with fresh air, breathtaking mountain views, and minimal traffic. Near schools, parks, grocery stores, shopping and entertainment.

Exceptional Sierra Madre multi-unit complex packed with old world charm and character. Six units of 5,313 total sf are located on tree lined street with lot of 9,506 sq. ft. The building consists of one 2-bedroom/2 baths+ den unit, four 2 bedroom-1 bath units and one 1-bedroom 1 bath units. The front 2 bedroom unit also has a den. Current Rents are below market and have upside potential. Property is well maintained: Water heater about 5 years old; hot water lines were installed to exterior of building; stairs and upstairs walkways coating redone; wall A/C unit; newer fence on East side of property

Lovely 2 bedroom 2 1/2 bath townhome close to downtown Sierra Madre Village. Both Bedrooms have their own private bathrooms. Warm fireplace in the living room, both bedrooms upstairs with an open loft area that could be used as an office space. Master Bedroom has a balcony overlooking the back patio. Sliding glass doors lead to a private patio with in ground spa. Laminated flooring throughout most of home with a tile entry. Central AC, Central Vacuum system. Laundry hookups in the attached 2 car garage with direct entrance to kitchen and dining room. Kitchen has tile counters with built in Oven and Microwave. Gas Cooktop. Dishwasher and garbage disposal. Small complex has only 8 units. Do not miss this affordable home in a one of a kind town!

HUGE PRICE REDUCTION: Mid-Century, North facing Ranch home sits on a lovely Sierra Madre street Zoned R1 Residential. The home has been owned by the same family for over 55 years. nice floor plan, 3 good size bedrooms with a bathroom on each side of the home. Featuring a living room, large family room with fireplace and a formal dining room. An update to central heat and A/C has made this home very cozy in all weather conditions. The front windows lookout to a fabulous Mountain view of the San Gabriel National Forest. This home is on a large 8,988 SQFT. traditional lot with lots of frontage and plenty of room to expand the home if desired. The huge back yard is your very own private park with beautiful shade trees. The downtown village of Sierra Madre, or the large Sierra Vista Park with a public swimming pool is just a few minutes walk from the home. Sierra Madre elementary and brand new middle school are the most sought after schools in the Pasadena School system. The home also features a 2 car garage with direct access to the home & plenty of built-in storage. Extra multiple car parking in the driveway +room for a small RV. The home has many vintage original Mid-Century features. A nice clean slate waiting for you to add your own personal touch.

A rare opportunity to purchase "Dos Robles", a private Craftsman sanctuary in Sierra Madre, named~after two oaks that shelter this retreat like property. The main 2BR/2BA 2 story 1932 Craftsman, has been updated w/ wonderful details throughout: HW floors, beamed ceilings, windows & doors. MA BR w/ sitting area, walk in closet, en suite bath w/ decorative tile. Upstairs is the 2nd BR w/ its own balcony. The artist cottage (built 2012) which is currently being used as an in-law suite, has the same Craftsman detail, 3 large rooms, full BA, FP&rose garden. Perfect for hosting family or creating a great work of art! Relax under the trees in your new hot tub overlooking almost 1/3 acre of lush grounds, magical paths, grassy lawn with fruit trees, fountain, fire pit w/ cozy seating areas & outdoor BBQ kitchen for entertaining. Complete w/ solar panels, water filtration, security system & an extra large garage w/storage. At night it comes alive w/ breathtaking twinkling lights and lit pathway.

First time on the market in 55 years this Sierra Madre home sits high on a hill near the end of the cul-de-sac perfectly situated to take in the views of the mountains and valley below. The home features 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, a grand living room, dining room and lanai. The kitchen has been remolded with custom black walnut cabinetry, stone counters and massive center island. Other features include hardwood floors in most of the living areas, a fireplace, central AC and a California basement laundry room. The over 18,000 SQ foot lot has a 4 car garage for the car enthusiast and yet still has plenty of space to garden or just relax and enjoy the views. This is a Trust Sale sold AS/IS, court conformation is not required..

Stunning, spacious and updated one level condo, end unit, loads of light throughout, private patio, MORE LIKE A SINGLE FAMILY HOME THAN A CONDO. Open floor plan, high ceilings, large living room with fireplace and sliding door access to private patio, formal dining room, updated kitchen with island, walk in pantry and access to private patio. Master suite with beautiful updated bath, 2nd bathroom recently updated. Hardwood floors, central heat and air,lots of upgrades, skylights, closet built ins and electrified mirrors. Front door faces Montecito Ave. 1 car attached garage and 1 car detached garage. Low monthly fee, and beautifully maintained complex. (Baldwin Mgt.) Easy access to town and park, just one block north of Sierra Madre Blvd. A pleasure to show!.

Located in the much sought after neighborhood of North Sierra Madre, this beautiful 3 bedroom, single-story, ranch-style, pool home is the picture of light and elegance. Architectural features, like hardwoods floors, flagstone, and wrap-around picture windows allow natural warmth and light from the moment you enter. The family room, with its own separate fireplace, opens out onto a covered patio and the pool area perfect for entertaining. The kitchen has its own eating area, with an adjacent, separate laundry room and half bathroom perfect for pool guests. The private master bedroom has a tastefully upgraded master bath and double closets. There are two other bedrooms with tons of natural light, and a full bathroom off of the hallway. This very functional, bright floor plan make this the perfect place to call home.

In charming Sierra Madre on a street of picturesque homes, this well maintained Mid-Century Ranch features an open flowing floor plan, lots of natural light, a brick ribbon walkway to the front door and formal Entry; 2080 sq ft on an over 9000 sq ft corner lot. The Kitchen/Great Room is the heart of this home. An open Kitchen w/glass front cupboards, garden window, built-ins, and Breakfast area shares a counter bar with the Great Room and its Family and Dining areas w/sliding glass drs to the patio. Spacious Living Room is warm and inviting with an attractive corner fireplace. The Master Suite retreat offers lots of closets, a bath with double sinks, and sliding glass drs to the patio, garden. There are two additl BR's, and a hall bathroom. A two-car garage with automatic opener. The garde.

Nestled in the foothills of Sierra Madre this two-story Craftsman home has been rebuilt and expanded with high-quality materials while respecting the original integrity of this turn-of-the-century home. There are Craftsman style windows, mahogany crown moldings, baseboards, woodwork and beams and handcrafted fixtures and detailing throughout. This charming single-level Spanish Bungalow is located in an ideal Sierra Madre location just 1 block south of Sierra Madre Blvd. This turnkey property was just remodeled & upgraded throughout and is move-in ready. The home features 3-beds, 2-baths, living room, kitchen w/ dining area and an inside laundry closet. The original bathroom and kitchen are totally remodeled and there is a recently added 2nd bathroom (with permits). Central Air & Heat were just installed, as well. Other recent updates include new paint, new wood floors, new appliances, new driveway, and new landscaping. The property features a landscaped front yard w/ a charming porch, back yard w/ patio, a detached 1-car garage, carport, and a huge basement with tons of storage space.

This one of a kind Santa Barbara Style Estate was custom blt by the owner of Mur-Sol Const for himself using the finest craftsmen & materials obtainable. Located on a quiet cul-de-sac on a huge lot offering total privacy. This hm was designed with entertaining in mind, the great rm has a 20' open beam ceiling & a massive wood burning fpl. It is open to the kit, game rm, + outdoor living area. The kit is a gourmet chef’s dream, w/ an abundance of counter & storage space. The alder cabinets were custom made & the counters are marble, the backsplash is marble & travertine, the appliances are top of the line pro series & the floors are travertine. The game rm features a barrel ceiling veneered with split bricks, + an amazing stand behind, walk up wet bar. There is a 890 sqft outdoor covered living area with an open beam ceiling & a mammoth wood burning fpl. The beautifully landscaped backyard looks like a park + the custom pool, spa, & water features are spectacular. The 475 sqft qst quarters could be converted to an additional 2 car garage making the total 5 cars. This magnificent estate features a huge 31,908 sqft lot & has absolutely no deferred maintenance, it shows like a brand new showcase house. This amazing hm could not be duplicated for this price!

This pristine canyon hideaway has been beautifully restored both inside & out. The home is located in a quaint area of the safe, "All America City" of Sierra Madre, featuring award winning schools, a vibrant village atmosphere, & historic hiking trails. Careful, loving attentions been given to preserve each notable detail. Each tranquil room is infused with natural light. Living Room with Franklin type fireplace/heater. Kitchen with tasteful white tile. Dining area with vintage builtins. 2 bright bedrooms, one opens to a spacious deck. Den/Office, or 3rd bedroom (there is a closet). Updated full bath. Separate Laundry Room. Hardwood floors. Efficient "mini-split" A/C & Heat. An abundance of windows. Lots of creative storage, as well as a basement. Ornate ceilings & moldings. Sizable upstairs deck with mountain & valley views. Terraced hillside with patio seating. Parking is exclusively granted by adjacent neighbor for $50. per month. Graced with the sounds of a brook. A short creekside trail walk to "Mary's" Canyon Cafe. Vacation at home, yet a short drive to the Goldline, freeways, Old Town Pasadena, & all that L.A. has to offer. Welcome home!

Lovely Single Level Rancher located in a prime Sierra Madre neighborhood! This well cared home is ready to move into or add your own style. The interior of the home is warm and inviting with great living space. The spacious entry has the original terrazzo floors and steps down to the living room and dining area with a central fireplace. The updated kitchen opens to the cozy family room which has two large sliders leading to a large patio area, perfect for entertaining while enjoying the lush backyard. There is a generous Master bedroom with remodeled en suite, 3 additional bedrooms, 1 & 1 ½ baths, Laundry room, many built-ins and storage cupboards. This home is situated on a beautiful tree lined street within walking distance to everything Sierra Madre has to offer!

Gardener's Paradise in the upper Sierra Madre canyon. Three bedroom, one and three quarter bathroom home. Huge kitchen/family room with wood-vaulted ceiling and fireplace, custom stained-glass window, and large picture window overlooking the garden. Large living room with built-in bookcases. Gleaming hardwood floors in tow front bedrooms. One bedroom with attached 3.4 bath can be used as guest suite. The yard has many fruit trees and interesting plants. Parking for four cars-a big plus in the canyon. Front and back yards for relaxing in the canyon.

Located just 3 blocks from quaint downtown village of Sierra Madre and 2 blocks from the recreation center with pool, this lovely, well-maintained home is on the market for the first time in 30 years! You will be delighted with the functionality of this family home. The entry leads to the desirable open floor plan concept. The living room/dining area features a stone fireplace, a cozy conversation/reading area and a perfect office/nook. The den can easily be used as a fourth bedroom as it has a closet and double pocket doors for privacy. The main bathroom has a porcelain hand-painted sink and stained glass window. Other features include: CA & Heat, water softener, ceiling fans, attic fan, plantation shutters, roof with 50-year warranty installed in 2005, newer water heater, lush landscaping, orange tree and two relaxing patios in the private backyard. Truly a lovely home!

Wonderful 1920's Traditional home on a pretty tree lined street, short distance to neighborhood shops/restaurants and Memorial Park. Features include a formal entry hall, elegant living room with bay window, formal dining room, and a large family room off the sunny kitchen with breakfast nook. The family room opens to the spacious backyard through French doors, perfect for indoor-outdoor entertaining. Upstairs features include five bedrooms, two of which are en suite. Fine interior appointments include hardwood flooring, 9ft ceilings, built-in bookshelves, and crown moldings. Additional features include new plantation shutters, new fencing, foundation bolting, a newly renovated garage, drought tolerant landscaping, and mountain views..

Fantastic canyon home w/views and parking! This spacious 3 bedroom 2 bath home offers 1648 interior square feet, which is quite large for canyon living. Entering through the front door you will immediately appreciate the high ceilings and original hardwood floors. The downstairs family room is currently being used as a master suite. Kitchen and dining room flow seamlessly onto an expansive deck with wonderful city light views. Parking is not a problem here. This property has a long driveway and 2 car covered carport. If you're looking to live in the canyon......this home is not to be missed!

Beautifully remodeled Sierra Madre home situated in a wonderful quiet neighborhood in north Sierra Madre. Great curb appeal and in MOVE IN CONDITION. Features include: 5 bedrooms (1 master sized bedroom on the first level ) and 4 spacious bedrooms on the second level ( with views). Large living room. Formal dining room. Family room with fireplace. New custom kitchen with breakfast bar and dining area along with new custom cabinetry and custom lighting, top of the line Thermador appliances and new Quartz countertops. Other features include New double pane energy efficient windows and sliding doors throughout. New beautiful Oak hardwood flooring. New recessed lighting. New custom storage cabinetry. All new interior doors and hardware. New paint throughout interior. Very large closets in each bedroom and plenty of storage space throughout home. Central air conditioning and heating system. Large laundry room. Oversized double garage with lots of storage space. Beautiful private backyard for entertaining. Heated pool and spa. RV parking and room for 3+ additional vehicles.

Nestled off a secluded cul-de-sac road, this gorgeous clean-line modern with a flair of contemporary accents was designed for entertaining. The finest of materials, finishes and design combine to make this an absolutely incredible home. Property is perched above the street and takes advantage of gorgeous City Lights and Mountain views virtually invulnerable to being blocked. Quality of construction and craftsmanship is apparent in this 4 bedroom 4 bathroom masterpiece. Huge Gourmet Kitchen is stunning and an entertainers dream with Thermador ranges, pot filler, Thermador fridge/freezer, warming drawer, two dishwashers a wine chiller. Beautiful large center island with beautiful granite counters and back splash. Fabulous corner master suite with sitting area with explosive city & canyon views. Master bath with separate shower, beautiful tub & over-sized custom walk-in closet are a sight to see. Beautiful High Ceilings in virtually the entire property, wood floors, new carpeting, crown molding, convenient laundry room area and 3 car attached garage are just a few more amenities that this immaculate property has to offer. Come enjoy paradise with gorgeous views while still being close to Downtown Sierra Madre, you will not be disappointed.

This is a fabulous opportunity for buyers looking for an unaltered home with a fabulous open floor plan that can be transformed into the home of their dreams. Located in a very private setting at the top of a quiet cul-de-sac street in upper Sierra Madre with gorgeous city and mountain views. Structurally this home is very sound and the tile roof was installed about 5 years ago. Don't miss this opportunity to create the home of your dreams in a very tranquil surrounding.

This very desirerable ONE LEVEL condo is located within walking distance of the quaint village of Sierra Madre. This home features a DOUBLE ATTACHED GARAGE with laundry which is a real benefit !!! Features include , two spacious bedrooms and two baths, a formal dining room and a very large updated kitchen with an eating/work area. Living room and kitchen lead to a private seating patio. Very quiet and peaceful location in a 16 unit complex. A real Sierra Madre treasure, which rarely comes on the market.

text: Location-Location-Location...This beautiful hard to find updated home is located in the desired area of Sierra Madre. This home has 3 Bedrooms, 2 baths, den/library, living room with fireplace, formal dining room, laundry room and breakfast nook area in the kitchen.. Other features include: a large master bedroom suite with own bathroom, walking closet and lots of cabinet space, updated kitchen & bathrooms with custom cabinets and quartz counter tops, new wood flooring throughout the house, new Samsung stainless steel appliances, crown moldings, recessed lighting, all new lighting and plumbing fixtures, upgraded electrical and plumbing, upgraded electric panel and new central A/C, custom paint, automatic sprinkler, and more...... In addition to the main house, there is a sunroom with approximately 200 sqft which is perfect for an office, hobby room, music or art studio, etc. There is a second room attached to the garage that is perfect as a work shop/tool room or storage. There are plenty of storage and cabinets in this house! The large back yard is very private with fruit trees, vegetable garden and a lighted court great for badminton/basketball and perfect for entertainment.

Rebuilt in 2016 this home is located in a rustic canyon setting near hiking trails. It has an open floorplan and was completely renovated with new systems and contemporary finishes to meet today's needs while maintaining elements such as the covered front porch, hardwood floors and crown moulding that evoke the charm of a bygone era. In addition to the spacious living & dining rooms and the kitchen, which features shaker style cabinets, stone counters and stainless appliances, the main floor also has a large bedroom with direct access to the rear patio, a walk-in closet, and bath with walk-in shower. Upstairs, there are 4 additional bedrooms, 2 of which have access to the covered verandah with tree-top views, and 2 full baths, as well as a generous landing that provides additional space. N.

Excellent opportunity to develop prime land in Sierra Madre.  Beautiful quiet street, views of the mountains.  Walking distance to downtown Sierra Madre. All structures need major rehabilitation. Property is sold for land value only and in as is condition. The house on the property was built in 1910. This property is located in the Fairview/Sierra Madre Tract.

Back on Market!! Here's your 2nd chance at this charming Sierra Madre Canyon cottage has views from the Mountains, the Pacific Ocean and Catalina Island which you can enjoy from a wonderful large 300 square foot deck off the living room. The home has been remodeled and updated so you have the best of both worlds, the rustic nature of the foothills outside and the modern amenities inside. The home has an abundance of natural light, stainless steel appliances, laminated flooring, updated kitchen with stone counters as well as updated bathroom. There is a basement that has been updated and converted to a Family Room and office. Wonderful space that could be a great media center as well. The basement square footage is not included in the assessor's data but has been included for appraisals and insurance. There is a large yard that is great for gardening or pets. Home also features a 2 car garage that is a convenience and rarity in the Sierra Madre Canyon. Come see it today and you will fall in love with the surroundings, views and comfort of this one of a kind home.

With an amazing location and large landscaped frontage to W Grandview, this classic two story 3 bedroom and 2 bathroom home is ready to be restored. Featuring a gorgeous wood floor staircase, bright and open living room, downstairs den/office, downstairs bathroom, and galley kitchen with adjacent dining area. Charming Single Level Cottage on a highly desirable street in Sierra Madre. Peek-a-boo city light views from Living room and Patio area.  Living room boasts a large front window and fireplace. Eat-in Kitchen has original details in beautiful condition, a Wedgewood Stove that is included, plenty of storage and a door to the side yard and patio. Separate Laundry room has lots of closets and direct access to backyard. The generous Bedroom has built ins and is adjacent to the large Bathroom with tub and shower.  There could be many possibilities for adding additional living space to the beautiful River Rock accented Lot.

The perfect opportunity for a home builder or individual to build a dream estate on a flat 25,097 square foot lot situated on one of the most serene and beautiful streets in all of Sierra Madre. Complete plans for a masterfully designed approximately 4,500 square foot estate with pool by award winning architect Douglas Ewing of Ewing Architects, Inc., as well as topographical and boundary surveys are included in the sale. The two structures currently on the property, a single-story Spanish style bungalow and detached garage with artist studio above, have been deemed NOT historically significant by a city research firm. This and the fact that the existing plans incorporate all existing trees, allow the next owner to move forward easier. A truly rare opportunity to build a new home surrounded by grand historic estates in an idyllic enclave of Sierra Madre..

Come see this turn-key condition, single-level condo, conveniently located 1/2 block away from the charming village of Sierra Madre. A lovely entry hall leads to the spacious living room with sliding glass doors out to the cozy patio. Featuring a fireplace with gas starter & gas log, the living room opens to a charming formal dining area which has an entire wall of built-in cabinets with granite counter, great for storage & display. The spacious eat-in kitchen is open to the dining area & has sliding glass doors out to the charming covered patio. There is a separate laundry room adjacent to kitchen. Both Kitchen & Laundry have been beautifully remodeled with white cabinetry & granite counters; both refrigerators & stacked washer/dryer are included! The spacious master suite offers two closets (one is a walk-in) & adjacent custom remodeled master bath. This unit is light & bright with brand new carpet & paint! There is a detached 2-car garage with auto opener & built-in storage cabinets, a short distance from the patio gate. Other features include: custom tiled bathrooms, ceiling fans in both bedrooms, central air & heat. Don't wait, these single-level condos don't come on the market often & sell quickly!

Situated in North Sierra Madre and built in 1992 this lovely home measures a generous 2,860 square feet. The dramatic entrance opens to a 2-story formal living room with fireplace and bay window. The living room is adjacent the dining room which opens to the kitchen. The open floor plan offers the popular family room/breakfast area open to the kitchen combination and is separated by a breakfast bar. The family room features a wet bar and sliding doors open to the back yard. Up the grand stair case is a spacious master bedroom with two closets (one walk-in) and a spacious master bath. There are 2 bedrooms upstairs with access to a Jack & Jill bath. There is also a 4th bedroom down stairs (currently used as a gym) with access to a full bath. Other features include: separate laundry room, direct access to the 2-car garage, central AC, and a security system. The assessor shows 2,552sf. Appraiser measurements at 2,860sf & floor plan at 2,827sf. No obvious additions since built in.

Wonderful single story traditional Ranch home located in a sought after neighborhood in North Sierra Madre. Fantastic quiet location with wonderful views of the foothills. Home with tons of potential. Great square footage. Open floor plan. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Large living room with fireplace. Family Room with French doors. Galley kitchen. Dining area. Master bedroom with French doors that open to a large patio. Laundry room. Newer Central air conditioning and heating system. Newer sewer line from home to city main. Over sized double attached garage with storage. RV parking and room for more vehicles. Huge lot with so much potential. Situated among higher priced neighboring homes. Best priced home in the area.

Located in the beautiful city of Sierra Madre, this home features 4 bd 3.5 baths. The three guest bedrooms are generously sized, with one including an en-suite bathroom. The master suite features a walk in closet, an additional wall to wall closet, a fireplace, sliding doors that lead to an outdoor courtyard and the master bath complete with double, granite vanities and a large, walk-in shower. The formal dining room looks out to the sunken living room complete with a fireplace and two stunning, leaded glass windows. The family room has beautiful hardwood floors, a fireplace, a leaded glass door leading to a courtyard, and on the other end, sliding glass doors leading to the back yard. The kitchen has been completely remodeled with custom cabinetry, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a farm sink. The utility room is directly off the kitchen with ample storage space, and a half bath. The entire home has been updated beautifully with great attention to detail..

Graced with a cozy front porch this lovely traditional home features a two story formal entrance and open floor plan living. The living room features a traditional fireplace and is open to the dining room. This home offers a well-designed kitchen with a cozy breakfast nook that is open to a spacious family room with fireplace and wet bar. All three rooms offer a view of the back yard. One bedroom, bath and laundry room are conveniently located on the main floor. The generous sized master suite offers a huge walk-in closet and a luxurious bathroom with a double vanity and spa tub.The large backyard features a lattice covered patio perfect for large gatherings with friends or cozy family dinners. There is a sparkling pool with new electric child-safety cover and new pool pump/filter as well as a spa. Other features: central air & heat, direct access 2-car garage, security system, new exterior paint and a very short distance to down town Sierra Madre and easy access to the 210 freeway.

NESTLED IN THE HEART OF PEACEFUL SIERRA MADRE CANYON, THIS CUSTOM MEDITERRANEAN WAS QUALITY BUILT IN 1992. IT HAS WONDERFUL CURB APPEAL & IS EQUALLY LOVELY INSIDE. THE DOWNSTAIRS IS OPEN CONCEPT, FEATURING CATHEDRAL CEILINGS, A COZY CORNER FIREPLACE, SOARING TWO-STORY WINDOWS, & IS OPEN TO THE FAMILY STYLE DINE IN KITCHEN. COMPLETING THIS LEVEL IS A 1/2 GUEST BATH AS WELL AS A SEPARATE LAUNDRY ROOM. UPSTAIRS, THE SPACIOUS MASTER SUITE HAS A ROOMY WALK IN CLOSET & ENSUIE FULL BATH WITH DUAL SINKS. THERE IS AN ADDITIONAL BRIGHT BEDROOM WITH ANOTHER ENSUITE FULL BATH. THE CAREFREE YARD IS LANDSCAPED WITH WATER-WISE PLANTING, & FEATURES A TRANQUIL FOUNTAIN & TIMED SPRINKLERS. THERE IS AN ABUNDANCE OF WINDOWS, EACH WITH A PLEASANT VIEW. ALL LOCATED IN THE DESIRABLE CITY OF SIERRA MADRE WITH ITS VIBRANT DOWNTOWN, AWARD WINNING SCHOOLS, & ENDLESS RECREATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES. GORGEOUS HARDWOOD FLOORS, WIRED FOR SURROUND SOUND, GAS FIREPLACE FEATURE, REMOTE CNTROL THERMOSTAT, C/A & HEAT, INTERIOR FIRE SPRINKLERS, BIG BASEMENT WITH TONS OF STORAGE, PEDESTRIAN GARAGE DOOR OPENER, 2 CAR ATTACHED GARAGE OPENS TO INTERIOR OF HOME, + AN ADDITIONAL 3 OFF STREET SPACES STROLL TO A CONVENIENT CANYON CAFE, MINUTES TO THE GOLDLINE & FREEWAY. WELCOME HOME!

Beautiful turnkey split-level Sierra Madre retreat. Property appraised in October 2015 at $850,000 - see attached supplements for appraisal. Property boasts Viking Appliances: Refrigerator, dishwasher, stove and microwave. Previous owner remodeled the home and added square footage with permits just over a year ago. Current owner has added: LifeSource whole house conditioning and water filtration system, reverse osmosis water filter, new sewage ejector pump, and a custom fiberglass door with dog door. Long private driveway to park numerous cars and there is a private grass area on the side of the home that is perfect for relaxing or for your pets. Master suite on the bottom level also has a huge bonus storage room, which can be used as additional closet space. Property is just minutes from downtown Sierra Madre.

Serenity, light and openness define this well-loved mid-century home nestled on a private cul-de-sac with mountain views. From a tranquil courtyard, a slate entry with floor-to-ceiling windows opens to a step-up living room and dining room embraced by glass and a deck overlooking three garden areas. The spacious kitchen's eating area opens to the entry courtyard and access to the lower-back garden. This with a circular traffic pattern between the living room, dining room and kitchen makes for great entertaining. A surprise'' downstairs opening onto the lower-back garden mirrors the living/dining-room space. It has a family room with fireplace and two studies,[ one of which could be a bedroom. The bedroom wing on the entry level has an ensuite bedroom with sliding doors to an upper garden, a laundry room and two bedrooms with one bath. Perfect for indoor/outdoor living, it enjoys the small-town charm of Sierra Madre while having easy access to Pasadena and 210 freeway..

Wonderful single story cottage nestled in the peaceful Sierra Madre canyon. Home features two bedrooms, plus a den that would be perfect as an office or nursery, and one bathroom. Remodeled gourmet kitchen features travertine tile counter tops and floors, recessed lighting, stainless steel appliances and plenty of storage space. The open floorplan features a formal dining area & living area with hardwood flooring and skylight. Back bedroom features French doors that overlook the spacious backyard. The second bedroom features a walk-in closet with stackable laundry. Additional amenities include hardwood flooring & recessed lighting throughout, handcrafted beveled glass doors, drought resistant landscaping, stone walkway, newer water heater & dual pane windows. Private outdoor patio with mountain views is perfect for entertaining. Close to hiking trails & everything Sierra Madre has to offer, yet removed and secluded from the city bustle..

Beautiful End Unit town home in a fantastic complex. Unit is located in back of the complex and extremely quite. Overlooking the beautiful pool area. 2 master bedrooms + Loft. Living area with fire place. Kitchen with garden window. Dining area. Large master bedrooms in each with their own private large balconies. walk-in closets. A great loft used as an office area and small sitting area. Central air conditioning and heating system. Attached double garage. Association pool and spa. Walking distance to great bakeries, coffee shops, restaurants and shopping. Close proximity to shopping in Pasadena as well.

Bright and open townhouse with soaring ceilings and skylight creates natural light throughout. One of only 6 units in this stylish complex steps away from downtown Sierra Madre with its quaint atmosphere, shops and restaurants. Highly desired 3 plus bedrooms with 2 bedrooms and full bath on main level. Master bedroom on its own private level with adjoining master bath and dressing room with 2 wall to wall vanities and walk in closet. High above the living room is a loft perfect for a home office or curling up and reading a book. Custom designed windows frame mountain and treetop views. Living room offers a focal fireplace and an abundance of wall space for displaying artwork. Generous sized dining room with vaulted ceiling, built in kitchen. 3 panel French doors open to a generous sized balcony off living room, plantation shutters, powder room on main level, direct access to garage.

Wonderful 3 Bedroom 3 Bathroom home in the beautiful City of Sierra Madre. Thoughtfully and extensively remodeled in 2005 this home has been lovingly cared for. Two of the bedrooms and bathrooms are located on the first floor with the private master bedroom and en-suite bathroom upstairs. The gourmet kitchen with granite island includes sub zero refrigerator and Thermador gas range. Custom cabinetry and wood floors are found throughout this home. There is also a spacious living room, family room, dining area and laundry room. Outside is a rock patio, saltwater pool/spa and numerous areas to relax, entertain and just enjoy living in Sierra Madre..

This Elegant 2 story Victorian home has been beautifully maintained and updated offering 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a new professionally landscaped and hardscaped yard by designer Haynes. As you enter up the front walkway of this beautiful home you are welcomed to a tranquil park like setting complete with a wonderful a stream, pond, trees and plantings. The inviting front porch is suitable for all types of gatherings any time of the day. In addition, the home has high ceilings, updated electrical and copper plumbing, newer roof, new oak wood flooring downstairs and refinished hardwood flooring upstairs. This is an amazing place to make a home..

'Minimalist' architectural style, could have Historical significance. CHECK WITH THE CITY OF SIERRA MADRE. Comfortable home in need of much up-dating. Cosmetic fixer. Super location. Sold 'as is.' Seller will perform no repairs. Sunroom off garage as well as work room. Laundry area off kitchen. Very private backyard with mountain views.

This lovely 2 bedroom 1.5 bath end unit townhouse has been completely & tastefully updated. The unit offers 988 sq. ft. (apprx.) of living space with an open floor plan. The 1st level offers a space saver kitchen featuring ample custom made cabinetry, custom made counter tops, new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, stove and built-in micro hood. The spacious dining & living room with sliding glass doors leading to your patio is also on the first level along with the tastefully designed half bathroom. The 2nd level offers a fully customized 3/4 bathroom with walk-in shower, laundry hook-ups, custom vanity and counters and is just steps away from the 2 spacious bedrooms. The north-facing bedroom offers a private balcony and gorgeous partial mountain views.   This light-filled townhouse also offers: custom new floors, updated plumbing, updated electrical, recess lighting, double pane windows, custom closet doors and custom closet space-saver shelving along with custom paint & molding throughout. The complex offers a poo and community room. Location and privacy make unit #21 your welcoming retreat Buyer is advised to verify all information.

This property is nestled in the highly desirable Hasting Oaks Condominium Complex in Sierra Madre "the village of the foothills". Within walking distance of downtown, great restaurants and the Sierra Madre playhouse; you are close to all Sierra Madre has to offer. Do you need to get away and get "in-touch" with nature? You are minutes away from the San Gabriel Mountains favored for hiking, camping and afternoon retreats. This 2 bedroom, 1 .5 bathroom condo has a front garden patio and a balcony off the dining room with residential and tree-top views. Downstairs with wood floors and plantation shutters. Kitchen with custom wall coverings, ample cabinets and pantry. Assigned parking with 1 garage unit with storage and a second space. With a community pool and rec room, this the perfect property for your buyer to call home!

Charming Mid-Century Sierra Madre Classic, with lots of windows and light streaming in every room. The oversized lot is landscaped, fenced and with large trees in the back yard which offer shade and peacefulness. The living room has a fireplace , built in book shelves and built in TV. The dining room opens out to the back patio and is very light and bright. The kitchen has tiled counters with room for an additional eating area. Two bedrooms are well sized and have large double door closets. The master has a walk in closet and lovely brand new ultra modern bath and large sitting deck off the bedroom. There is a double garage, ample lot and lovely sitting areas outside. Central heat and air.. A must see.

Estate " The Artist Dream Come True" Craftsman Style with separate 2 story studio approximately 700-800 sq-ft (could become guest house by adding a bath). This home sits on two lots with two separate tax rolls. (View property map) Lots 22 & 27. Lots together approximately 17,000 sq-ft. Beautiful landscaped front with circular driveway, delivering you to the large front porch where you can sit out and enjoy the view and outdoors. Enter through double french doors into the large entry leading you into the vast great room, featuring high cathedral ceilings, large kitchen w/center island, large family room, w/fireplace. This will make you say "wow, this it", the family that dines together stays together. There are 4 bedrooms one being a master suite with walk in closet, 3 baths, formal dining room and living room w/fireplace. Great floor plan with skylights throughout for lots of natural lighting, and many windows throughout to view the lovely gardens. Wonderful home for entertaining or tea with the Queen! A must see! A home where dreams never end.

Rare 16,869 square foot lot in a natural setting with many trees and accented with boulders backing up to the canyon stream. Situated on this lot is a charming two bedroom, one bath home with central air and forced air heating, separate laundry room, one car garage and multiple off street parking. The feeling of nature abounds from every window. Come experience the peaceful sounds of the stream in this special property.

Lovely east facing townhome with light streaming in from the large living room window with cozy seating, dining room window and skylight in the stairwell. Plantation shutters in most rooms, too. Upstairs, all bedrooms have plenty of light with the master bedroom having its own private balcony. The master bathroom has a wall of windows and separate shower and soaking tub. The floor plan flows easily from the large living room with fireplace to the formal dining room. The kitchen has ample cabinet space, a great walk in pantry and tons of counter space. Unusual in a townhome, there's a separate laundry room conveniently located upstairs and lots of linen cabinets, too. There's still more storage in the attic and there's a two car attached garage. Located in the All America City of Sierra Madre, this home is located within a short distance to restaurants and shops.

Quaint Sierra Madre Cottage. Enter into a light and airy living room with a large picture window and brick gas-wood burning fireplace. The formal dining room can easily seat 12 or more guests. The kitchen is newly remodeled with white Shaker cabinets, granite counter tops, engineered wood floor, as well as a new stainless steel dishwasher and oven-range. The master bedroom has 3/ 4 bath with tile floor, counter and shower. Two of the bedrooms are conveniently located around a full bath. The fourth bedroom could be used as a den which is adjacent to the laundry room and stairway that leads to the finished basement as well as the backyard. Fresh paint and new carpet throughout. Included in the backyard is a pergola/patio perfect for summer evening barbequing. A bonus feature, located at the rear of this property, is a 1600 square foot garage with over 12 foot high ceilings. Seller is owner and real estate agent and reserves all rights for services.

SIERRA MADRE MODERN CRAFTSMAN HOME WITH ALL THE AMENITIES. THIS HOME FEATURES TWO MASTER SUITES. ONE IN THE DOWNSTAIRS LEVEL AND THE OTHER IN THE UPPER LEVEL. OTHER FEATURES INCLUDE A FORMAL LIVING AND DINING ROOM. YOU WILL ALSO ENJOY THE OVERSIZED FAMILY ROOM THAT IS ADJACENT TO THE ELEGANT KITCHEN FEATURING TOP OF THE LINE VIKING APPLIANCES. THE EXTENSIVE USE OF CHERRY, MAPLE. OAK AND WALNUT WOODWORK THRU OUT THE HOME ENHANCES THE ARCHITECTURAL DETAILS OF THIS SHOWCASE RESIDENCE. THERE IS ALSO A FULL LAUNDRY ROOM UPSTAIRS. THE UPSTAIRS MASTER INCLUDES A FIREPLACE TO WARM UP TO WHILE ENJOYING THE VIEWS. THERE ARE THREE SLEEPING PORCHES THAT EXPAND THE USEFULNESS OF THE 3300 FEET OF LIVING SPACE THAT THIS HOME OFFERS. THERE IS ALSO VERY USEFUL STORAGE AREAS THROUGHOUT THE INTERIOR AND EXTERIOR OF THE HOME. A LARGE OUTSIDE DECK OFFERS A RELAXING PLACE TO ENJOY THE COOL EVENINGS OR MORNINGS. THE TREE COVERED PRIVATE BACK YARD IS A PLACE FOR YOUR FRIENDS OR FAMILY TO ENJOY WHILE YOU ARE ENTERTAINING. ENJOY THE PICTURES AND SEE ALL THE AMAZING DETAILS OF YOUR FUTURE HOME.

This delightful Cape Cod style home offers a cozy front porch and wonderful curb appeal. Although built just 20 years ago, the kitchen & baths have recently been remodeled. The living room offers wainscoting, a traditional fireplace and is adjacent to the formal dining room also featuring wainscoting & built-in china cabinets. The kitchen was updated in 2010 and offers tray ceiling, granite counters, gas stove, dishwasher, refrigerator, under cabinet lighting, built-in microwave & is open to a charming breakfast nook with built-in bench seating & view of back yard. The master suite offers a walk-in closet, ceiling fan & a luxurious bath updated in 2013 with double sinks, vanity & high quality cabinetry. One bedroom and a bath are located on the 1st floor. Other features include: crown mold

Charming traditional style home built in 1940, located on a corner lot. This home features a large living room with fireplace, 2 bedrooms, newly remodeled kitchen with eating area, and a full bath. Detached garage at rear of property with driveway off Coburn, has a laundry/service area. Fully landscaped front and rear yard with sprinkler and drip system. Rear yard has enclosed separate garden area, brick patio, and is fully fenced. Additional amenities include: new kitchen cabinets with granite counters, glass tile backspaces, new appliances, new tile floor; updated bath with new tile around tub, new tile floor, new tub enclosure, new cabinet with sink, and new fixtures; fresh interior paint throughout, all new light fixtures, new wall-to-wall carpet, new ceiling fans in both bedrooms, new window blinds on all windows, new water heater, new forced air heat unit and new ducting, new attic insulation, central air conditioning, and much more. Great location, ample room to add-on to the home if desired. Move-in condition.

Set back on a large 8,374sqft lot is this beautifully maintained 4 bedroom, 2 bath home in the wonderful city of Sierra Madre. Upon entering, you are greeted by an abundance of light and gleaming hardwood floors which greatly highlight the spacious floorplan. The updated kitchen showcases granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a quaint eating area. Located directly off the kitchen is the formal dining area which opens onto the living room with inviting stone fireplace. Sliding glass doors provide direct access to the tranquil backyard with paved patio, making it a great entertaining space. A 2-car attached garage, laundry room and welcoming front porch complete this beautiful home..

Stunning Classic Modern. This Architecturally designed Single level home has been beautifully updated with no detail overlooked.This home greets you with a private courtyard entry opening to a large living room with expansive windows and hardwood floors. The open floor plan leads to a great room w/ gourmet kitchen,dining & family room. The kitchen has hardwood floors, custom quarter sawn oak cabinets, quartz counter tops, large chefs island w/ sous sink,perfect to gather around. Viking frig, Thermador Range & Dishwasher complete this dream kitchen. Family Room has hardwood floors,brick fireplace & large sliders opening to patio,salt water pool & spa,& private backyard. The dining area is accented by a large picture window framing the view of the pool and backyard. There is a master suite w/ large walk-in closet, spacious spa-like ensuite w/ over sized shower,all custom! There are 2 generous sized bedrooms w/ a full hall bath, & a Separate Laundry Room. The in-law suite has its own entrance & separate access to patio and pool, is spacious and designed with a sitting area, small dining table and queen sized bed with a large ensuite. This room could also be a games room or an additional master suite. All Within walking distance to Village shops, Restaurants.

This beautiful craftsman style townhouse was built in 2013 by Bowden Development and lived in for only one year 2014-2015 and is designer perfect and ready to move in !!! Main level includes a light and bright living room with custom designed window treatments adjacent dining room includes a beautiful rose etched light fixture designed just for this craftsman style townhouse, a wonderful custom kitchen with granite counter tops, oak cabinets and huge walk in pantry. A lovely guest bathroom downstairs. Dark hardwood floors throughout on lower level. Garage access on lower level with custom built cabinets that has ample storage. As you make your way up the stairs the tastefully carpeted stairway has a good sized master bedroom with walk-in closet. The bathroom in the master bath has gorgeous tile and flooring. The view from the master bedroom is amazing! The laundry room is upstairs with storage and stackable washer and dryer are included. The additional 2 bedrooms and bathroom are upstairs. This townhouse has it all.. the location is ideal for walking to shops, parks, hiking trails, eating establishments, having front row at our hometown 4th of July parade as well as the local coffee shops and theater in this magical town Sierra Madre!

Located in the wonderful city of Sierra Madre, this charming three bedroom, one and three-quarter bath home is located on an expansive 12, 160 square foot lot. The home has recently been painted inside and out. The kitchen was updated with new cabinetry, granite counters and tile backsplash. Refinished hardwood floors are throughout most of the home. The living room features a wood burning fireplace and sliding doors leading to the backyard, where the possibilities are endless. Numerous fruit trees; oranges, lemon, tangerine and mature pines set the backdrop. Central air/heat and a long paver stone driveway leading to the attached garage are all additional features of the home. Welcome Home!

What an excellent investment opportunity! These two completely separate one-level homes are situated nicely on the lot to allow absolute individual privacy to each other. They are located on a desirable North Sierra view lot. Each was built in the 1950's & is very well maintained.   The front home is 3 bedrooms, 2&3/4 baths, a den with a fireplace, inviting front porch & a back view deck.  The rear home is two bedrooms & 1 bath, & boasts an open concept living area, opened beam ceilings & a deck off the kitchen.  Each has a separate outdoor space, central air & heat, hardwood floors & separate utility meters ( except water). Sprinklers front & back.  A five car covered carport provides plenty of off street parking as well as an abundance of storage. Nicely landscaped.  Perfect for extended family, income units, or live in one & rent the other. Imagine, TWO separate homes in Sierra Madre for only $500,000 each!  WELCOME to this quiet village, with its vibrant downtown, award winning schools & excellent recreational opportunities.  Property is zoned SRR175, with a use code of duplex.

PRICE REDUCED-Traditional Family Ranch: First time offered for sale since completed in 1985 is this newly renovated 5 bedroom,3 bath, 3634 sf. Ranch Style home on a large 10,237 sf. lot. Located on one of Sierra Madre's most beautiful streets lined with mature Jacaranda trees. White Iceberg roses line the fence as you approach from the street. The home offers three separate living areas including the large living room, family room and game room with two gas or wood burning fire places. The renovation includes new paint, new roof, new oak wood flooring, new granite counter tops, sinks, and faucets with the latest upgrades including Moen Motion Sensor Faucet, LED lighting, digital thermostat and switches. The kitchen has a beautiful butcher block island and bar with walk-in pantry and cherry cabinets. Amenities: Central Heat/Air, whole house central vacuum and fan and solar vent, new Noritz Tankless hot water heater, New Wine Cellar. This home shows and lives better than described.

Blocks from quaint downtown Sierra Madre is a home with a plus, a rear cottage as income rental or guest house. In the main home, hardwood floors, crown moldings and baseboards define the upper level. Near the living room fireplace, sweeping windows overlook back yard with mature trees and treetop/peekaboo city lights views. Recessed lighting appears here and in the kitchen, with its custom cabinets, stainless appliances and granite counters. A breakfast bar links to the dining area. Two bedrooms and a den (now bedroom) plus full bath complete this level. Below are a family/game room with fireplace and wet bar, office area with custom cabinets, spacious bedroom, full bath, laundry room. Central heat/air, newer sash windows, roof, fencing and automatic gate. Two-car attached garage, ample boat/RV parking. Rear cottage has private patio, living room, bedroom, full bath, modern kitchen with dishwasher, and washer/dryer hook-ups..

New Cape Cod style single level home in the heart of Sierra Madre. Construction was completed in 2014 and this property has never been lived in! Features include 3 bedrooms, 3 baths, security system, custom fixtures, and an open flowing floor plan. The kitchen features granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, and custom cabinetry. The kitchen opens up to a family room with fireplace that overlooks the spacious rear yard. Living Room and Dining area with custom wainscoting and split plantation shutters throughout. The 10 foot ceilings throughout give the rooms great volume and the designer touches give them elegance. The outdoor covered patios and spacious rear yard allow for California living at it's best!

Located in the wonderful city of Sierra Madre on an expansive 19,230 sqft lot is this classic ranch style home. Upon entering, beautifully refinished hardwood floors carry you into the spacious living room with inviting fireplace and large windows, making it a light and bright space. This flow seamlessly continues into your open kitchen and elegant dining area which overlooks the beautiful patio and lush backyard. The master bedroom features a large walk-in closet, comfortable bathroom and enough space for a sitting area. There are 2 bathrooms and 2 other bedrooms, along with a office/den room. A 2 car attached garage, long driveway and various fruit trees complete this lovingly maintained home.

This stunning home is located in the northeast hillside area of Sierra Madre. Remodeled in 2007 there is a unique level of quality and craftsmanship difficult to find in today's marketplace. It is 3,100 sq ft of the finest Spanish Mission detail and design available. As you enter the impressive foyer you will be greeted by a custom leather wrapped display niche. To the right is a living room with 35 mile views. The Big Room encompasses 1,530 sq ft and includes a media area, kitchen, and dining area. The gourmet kitchen is suitable to accommodate 2 cooks and the dining area seats 8-10 people. French doors lead to a large 1,200 sq ft patio with built in bar, refrigerator, and sink. The patio welcomes a stunning Pebbletec Pool with multiple water features, a 6 person spa, fire pit, and custom.

Only the second time on the market, this ultra private Pueblo Revival home designed by award-winning architect Doug Ewing in 1989 sits on 1.19 acres in the foothills of the San Gabriel's, in the quaint, town of Sierra Madre. The home, won an AIA award in 1992 is surrounded by mountains & oak trees, & has views to downtown Los Angeles, Palos Verdes Peninsula, & Catalina Island. Every window boasts a wonderful view. The interior detail continues the Pueblo look with vigas in the ceilings, latillas in the dining room ceiling, Saltillo tiles or wide-plank wood floors, & huge boulders set into some of the walls. Walls are coved, windows are inset, as are the doors. The flow of home lends itself to entertaining. The main suite has a sitting room/TV room; main bathroom as a deep cast-iron tub. 2 guest bedrooms have their own full bathrooms. 2 fireplaces, gourmet-kitchen, two 2-car garages, mature fruit trees, large grassy area that has access to Bailey Canyon..

Picture Perfect 1922 Craftsman. Completely redesigned and expanded in 1995 with 3 bedrooms and 2 baths including a large second story master retreat with a separate sitting area, walk in closet, large bath, private deck, and cathedral ceilings with stunning mountain and tree top views. Ultimate curb appeal with low maintenance landscaped yard with river rock lined driveway. Modern elegantly designed open concept layout creating the ideal place for entertaining and everyday family living. Enjoy a good book in front of a fire in the fantastically beautiful inglenook. An abundance of windows and skylights fill the home with natural light. Kitchen with center island opens to the family room and out to the covered back deck expanding the living space, ideal for year round dining. Enjoy Front Row seats for the Sierra Madre 4th of July Parade and kick off your New Years Eve as the Sierra Madre Rose Float passes by en route to the parade. Just a short walk to the center of Town, parks, schools.

1925 Spanish charmer on a quiet tree lined street in the highly desired town of Sierra Madre. Beatrix Potter would feel right at home. Some of the wonderful character of this 20's home: hardwood floors, wood burning fireplace, sideboard, built in china chest and built in cabinetry in dining area; mullioned French doors and windows. One of the bedrooms has a small walk in closet. Kitchen with antique Roper range included as well as refrigerator. Security system. Bonus window encircled 15.6 X 11.6 sunroom with 1/2 bath not included in stated square footage. Additional storage under sunroom.

Remodeled 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home in the desirable Arcadia school district. Situated on a large corner lot above street level. The Kitchen is state of the art with custom cabinets, quartz counter tops, back splash and all new appliances. The dining/family area have Milgard French doors that lead to the private rear yard. Located in The Woods'' of Sierra Madre this lovely home is situated on a quiet cul-de-sac amongst estate sized homes. Sophisticated & Classic Modern. Come see this amazing artist's retreat. Cozy 20's bungalow on spacious 6774 sq. ft. lot with an abundance of trees, including avocado, California Oak and more. Welcome to one of the most charming homes in Sierra Madre! This Hacienda style Spanish home is built around a large central courtyard paved in antique brick and shaded by large, fruit bearing avocado tree. Character abounds in this 4 bedroom, 2 bath home. Tucked away in quiet and secluded Sierra Madre Canyon, 'built in' 1979 makes this home 'newer' by canyon standards. Noteworthy features come in the form of central heating and air, a freshly painted interior, new carpet and flooring, and plenty of parking. The sounds of nature and running water (from nearby Santa Anita basin) make canyon life complete. A wooded hiking trail runs along the basin and ends near Marys Market. A local grocery and coffee house. Close to village shops and restaurants, and minutes from popular Mt. Wilson and Bailey Canyon hiking trails, there is much to admire in this great property.

Held for ~50 years, this delightful newly painted and refreshed 4 bedroom, 4 bath home is full of potential - the rare combination of peaceful retreat with breathtaking views, entertaining gathering place, and a safe home to settle in and grow. Some will consider this a ONCE IN A LIFETIME OPPORTUNITY! Sierra Court, located in Sierra Madre Canyon, consists of 15 units in 12 individual, whimsical cottages, placed on 8 lots with a combined 33, 000+ sqft of lush landscaping with Sycamore and Oak trees, shrubbery, flowers, stone walkways, water ponds and a footbridge to Mary's Market! In these serene, magical surroundings, you will find the 15 units with a total building area of apprx. 7, 548 square feet - one 3 bedroom, four 2 bedroom, nine 1 bedroom (three of the 1 bedroom units have either a den, sitting room or office as well as bedroom) and one studio - an outdoor laundry area, storage buildings, custom signage, etc. Originally constructed between 1916 and 1935, the units have been very well taken care of and remodeled over the years, most with dual pane windows, skylights, ceiling fans, laminate counters, etc. while maintaining the charm and character as originally built. A few have split air systems, fireplaces and most have a balcony, deck and/or patio. The long time tenants enjoy listening to the rushing water of the creek (actually the Sierra Madre Wash!) and the overall peaceful ambiance of the property. Rents are LOW with lots of room to GROW! This property is more than just an investment. It's a chance to own a piece of Sierra Madre history in the heart of the Canyon. In respect to the Tenants, PLEASE, do NOT drive in or walk on the property!
