With soaring double-height ceilings, this Mediterranean home has both WOW factor and the updates you need to live comfortably and happily ever after. Light, bright, and airy, the double-paned windows let the sun in and keep the heat out. The view from the kitchen is to your private backyard oasis, a park-like space to play, garden, have bar-b-ques, and dine alfresco under the pergola. There is room for a pool.The gourmet kitchen features custom cabinets, range hood, dishwasher, refrigerator, and built-in stove, and has space for enjoying breakfast while watching TV in the nearby Home theatre room. Up the elegant wrap-around staircase, with banisters painted a crisp white is the master bedroom which has a large walk-in closet, an ensuite bathroom with soaking tub and shower. A dedicated laundry room direct access to the two-car garage, central air and heat, and an alarm system offer additional comfort and protection.

Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac north of W. Grandview Avenue and near the foothills of Sierra Madre, this charming 1947 traditional style home offers 2 large bedrooms, 1 full bath, and a spacious sunroom. Enter the home through a covered front porch & into the spacious living room, which features a fireplace and views of the front and rear yards. The light-filled formal dining room provides a view of the flowering drought-tolerant garden. The cheerful kitchen features plenty of counter space, built-in gas cooktop, built-in oven, newer dishwasher, newer French-door style refrigerator, and newer laundry hook-ups. At the rear of the house, a large sunroom can be used as a family room or third bedroom. This room features dual pane windows & French doors which open to the fenced-in private grassy yard. The detached oversized single car garage has storage space and direct access to the separate laundry/utility room with a 1/2 bath. Attached to the rear of the garage is a finished bonus room/office with its own entrance and wall A/C unit. In addition, a large heavy duty shed can be used for storage. The yard is a fruit tree lovers paradise and is a great area to enjoy the mountain views and fresh outdoor air under the newer custom-built covered patio.

Incredible ''wow factor'' renovation in Sierra Madre! Stunning townhome with European designer flair is magazine perfect and loaded with high-end features, finishes, and fixtures: spacious private patios, soaring ceilings to 22 ft, large architectural windows, exotic hardwood floors, Porcelanosa tile, custom steel railings, recessed dimmable lighting, sleek ceiling fans. Gourmet kitchen offers vast storage in specialty pantry and Alno custom cabinetry, Ceasarstone countertops, chef's appliances include convection steam oven and hood by KueppersBusch, Liebherr refrigerator, and Miele dishwasher. Bathrooms are lovely with Victoria and Albert soaking tub, bidet, washlet, custom cabinetry and European tile, Toto and Philippe Starck appointments. Direct access two-car garage, laundry, green belts, swimming pool, spa, guest parking. Excellent life-style near restaurants, parks, hiking and Sierra Madre Village.

Re-Imagined single-family home that is set up as two units. It's just a stone's throw away from the Sierra Madre business district. Food, drink friends and dessert are only steps from its front door. Consider this wonderfully bright updated home before you make a commitment to a condo or townhome and a lifetime of HOA fees and regulations.Packed with amenities in its 825 square feet, the home features 2 bedrooms a large bath and an updated kitchen with new high-end stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, zoned air-conditioning, and indoor laundry area.The bonus includes a separate unit ideal for a studio, an office or guest quarters when visitors arrive. It is complete with kitchenette, bath and its own entrance.This bright cozy home has so much to offer its new owner. Call for appt to view today!

Priced to sell: Wonderful End Unit town home in a sought-after complex in charming Sierra Madre. This immaculate, light-filled town home is situated in a quiet and beautifully maintained complex with a lovely pool, spa and barbecue area. Spacious floor plan featuring 2 large master suites and a loft ideal for use as an office or small den. Close proximity to Sierra Madre Downtown Shopping District and just a short distance to great bakeries, coffee shops and restaurants. Each master suite has its own private bathroom, separate balcony and large walk-in closet. Living area with guest bathroom, vaulted ceiling and custom fireplace. Kitchen with stainless steel appliances, pantry, granite counter tops and garden window. Dining area with built-in serving area. Central air conditioning and heating system. Central vacuum system. Plantation shutters throughout. Attached double garage with ample storage space. Unit is set back from the street and extremely quiet. Also a short distance to Whole Foods, Hastings Plaza, Metro Gold Line Stations and great hiking trails. This is MUST SEE!!!

Custom-built Craftsman Farmhouse home built in 2005 features a wrap-around front porch with a soothing water fountain. Enter into the dramatic foyer with soaring ceilings through a beautiful frosted glass front door. Step-down living room has a fireplace, gourmet kitchen has top-of-the-line appliances, stone slab counter tops, center island w/cook top & beautiful solid glass bar top-kitchen opens to large family room. Gorgeous formal dining room with French doors & wainscoting. Separate office on first floor offers a built-in desk and many built-in cabinets. The master suite feels like a retreat & features fireplace, high vaulted ceiling, huge custom-built walk-in closet. The master bath has French limestone, shower, spa tub, double sinks & custom-lit wood and stone niches for a dramatic effect. Convenient laundry room on 2nd floor with mahogany cabinetry and a sink. Large two-car garage with 220v for electric car, drive-though feature, custom cabinets and a 425 sq ft loft. Automated privacy gate on driveway provides a fully-fenced backyard. Beautifully landscaped & hardscaped front & back yards-with attractive exterior lighting. This beautiful home is within walking distance to the quaint town of Sierra Madre: many dining options, shopping, Sierra Madre Playhouse, close to Mt. Wilson Trail & other hiking trails, fun town events during the year (Wisteria Festival, 4th of July Parade & many more) & near many excellent schools. A wonderful small town to enjoy life!

Back on the market and priced to move! The possibilities are endless with this large 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath townhome set on a quiet street in charming Sierra Madre. This comfortable, roomy townhome features a large living room with fireplace open to the dining room and a lovely private patio with an open kitchen for easy entertaining. A guest bathroom, and laundry room with direct access to the 2-car garage round out the first floor.Upstairs has 3 bedrooms and a fabulous outdoor deck for entertaining or for the kids to play. The large master suite with two generous closets and full bath features a balcony with mountain views. The second bedroom, currently used as an office, features a large closet and mountain views. The third bedroom, currently used as a den, features built-in bookcases and opens to the amazing outdoor deck. This large townhome is perfect for those looking to purchase a home in Sierra Madre and take advantage of the excellent schools or those looking to downsize with all of the comforts of home yet less maintenance. Move in just in time for summer and enjoy the swimming pool and spa just steps away from your door. All it needs are a few cosmetic updates and you'll gain immediate equity. Don't wait - priced at only $394/sqft this will go fast!

Excellent opportunity for buyers and investors! This 3 bedroom, 2 bath traditional single level home with pool and spa is located on a quiet cul-de-sac street in desirable and highly sought after Sierra Madre. The notably large remodeled kitchen has an oversized granite center island with welcoming french doors to the outside. Remarkable home with a tremendous amount of opportunity--- your final touches will make this your dream home.

This unique property is sheltered by trees and hedges that screen a simple, rebuilt, bungalow. The single level home offers multiple french doors that open to extended outdoor living areas: a private dining deck, landscaped courtyard, and several fruit trees. In addition to a living room with fireplace, the kitchen and dining room share a large open space. The bedrooms are arranged along a South-facing gallery that opens to the deck and private garden. Bleached wood timber trusses support lovely vaulted ceilings. The floors are finished with flagstone and solid oak. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, beautiful upgraded leaded windows, and generous built-ins. The master bedroom has a fireplace and direct access to the patio, garden, and spa. The granny suite at the rear is connected to the main house by a second sunlit gallery, and has a living and bedroom area, spacious bathroom, kitchenette, garden area, and private entrance. This suite would make a great home office. The unique attached direct access 2 car garage is very spacious and offers great built-ins and central heating and air.

Stunning one of a kind remodeled home, set in the highly coveted Sierra Madre foothills. Located in a cul-de-sac street, this serene home features extremely high end finishes. The remodeled chef's kitchen boasts SS appliances, including a Professional six burner Thermador range top with griddle. Double oven, extremely large refrigerator and freezer, huge farmhouse sink, oversized granite island with a large amount of storage. Look out the kitchen bay window to enjoy a delightful view of climbing jasmine intertwined with baby roses. Wake up in the Master Bedroom Suite with the San Gabriel mountain view as a backdrop. Large walk-in closet and private master bath includes dual sinks, large soaking tub, designer finishes, custom cabinets. Exquisite large powder bath downstairs. The spacious lot is beautifully landscaped with numerous fruit trees, three raised vegetable beds, large above ground spa and outdoor lighting. Sizable storage area under the house. This home is perfect for entertaining, as well as family living. Close to city center, shops, parks, hiking trails and restaurants. This is the home your clients have been looking for.

Sierra Madre Charmer w/ a GUEST House! This charming home sits on one of the best streets in Sierra Madre w/ gorgeous mountain views. Offering perfect curb appeal, this 3br/2ba home has a spacious front porch with sitting area. Entering the home, guests are greeted with a light and bright living room where a striking fireplace sets the stage. The dining room is adjacent to a modern kitchen w/ stainless steel appliances, Quartz countertops, island and laundry room. French doors lead to the deck, a BONUS guest house w/ kitchenette, and sparkling pool. This very special home sits on a 11, 395sf lot, featuring a beautifully redesigned backyard with ample room for expansion.Enjoy the charm of simpler times, but with modern conveniences such as central A/C, dual pane windows, copper plumbing, refinished hardwood flooring, custom lighting, updated bathrooms, and so much more. 454 Manzanita is located moments from award winning Sierra Madre Schools, hiking trails, parks, recreation center, library, Playhouse, Whole Foods Market, Trader Joes, and the town's shopping & dining district. This contemporary oasis is a MUST SEE!

This Beautiful Single Level Home sits on a lot of 28, 973 sf which is the largest lot for sale with this price range in the entire city of Sierra Madre! Gorgeous Mountain View and the Perfect Location decide its value! The home has 3 Beds 2.5 Baths with approx. 3, 100 sf living space. Newer Roof, Newer Windows, Newer HVAC Systems, Newer Plumbing Systems, Newer Spacious Kitchen with Granite Counters and Thermador Appliances. Also the home has been recently remodeled with new Flooring and Painting throughout. Bright and Open Floor Plan! The Family Room has natural sunlight and it looks modern and peaceful through many Open & Large Windows. The additional Living Room adjacent to the kitchen is ideal for entertaining guests while looking out to the Spacious Backyard. This property is also very ideal for any Investor and/or Developer looking to add-on additional square footage to truly take advantage of its large lot size. The Master Suite also has its own kitchenette and Sitting Area. The outdoor living is private and serene setting, perfect for entertaining and large parties. There is also a Solar System installed which save lots electricity bills! The potential is endless! Bring your imagination, talent, and this place can be yours!!!

A precious gem, lovingly recreated in 2008 as a 1920's craftsman style cottage. The home begins with a wrap-around porch with French doors, on two sides, that extend the living area of the living room and kitchen space. A two-sided river rock fireplace anchors the living room, and is adorned with Batchelder style tile, adding warmth and charm. The living room also features a custom grand wall of floor-to-ceiling shelving and cabinets able to display an abundance of treasures. The kitchen adds to the theme with craftsman style cabinetry and hardware along with a large island and granite countertops. Hardwood floors throughout. A built-in desk, window seat, and pantry make for easy living with plenty of storage. The generous size bath has custom cabinets with a granite counter top. In the nice size bedroom, cottage details continue with beadboard wainscoting and custom built-ins. Moving outdoors, the fireplace, with tile mural, is a focal point for a cozy seating area. Period lighting adds to the 1920's feeling. Dual-pane windows, central air and heating, enclosed space for stackable washer and dryer, and a carport with electric car charger complete the amenities that make this a truly wonderful place to call home. Nestled in the foothills of Sierra Madre.

Absolutely stunning and recently renovated home in Sierra Madre. This open concept, single story home is a must see. The home features a new kitchen with navy lower cabinetry, white upper cabinetry, quartz countertops, marble tile custom backsplash, eat in kitchen area, custom built-in bench seating and tons of natural light. The kitchen and dining space open to the living room which features vaulted ceilings, gas fireplace with custom herringbone marble surround and surround sound with recessed speakers which continues throughout the entire home. The home offers three large bedrooms including an oversized master suite with sitting area, walk-in closet and completely updated bathroom with dual vanities, jetted soaking tub and separate tiled in glass shower. Two bedrooms and a large full bath featuring an oversized marble tile walk-in shower complete the living area. Located on a private lot on a quiet street and close to downtown Sierra Madre. Newly renovated with new roof, copper piping, tankless water heater, flooring, kitchen, baths, etc. This property is turnkey and ready to move in.

This traditional style home is located in a very quiet and well kept neighborhood on a private street at the end of a long driveway. The huge lot is all flat and usable providing lots of privacy. In addition to the 3br 2ba home there is a large detached one bedroom, 3/4 bath guest house that also has a living room and kitchen. The main house features an updated kitchen with newer cabinets and granite counter tops, updated bathrooms, a wood burning fireplace, central air, 2 large covered patios, and a two car attached garage. The spacious back yard offers plenty of room to expand and add a pool. The main house is approximately 1400 square feet and the guest house is approximately 686 square feet totaling 2, 086 sqft. Guest house has its own city assigned address, 228 1/2.

You won't find a place anywhere like this in LA. The Sierra Madre canyon neighborhood is a nature lover's dream- with big old trees, river rock walls, a running stream, a walking path, the occasional wild animal, sounds of birds, and plants everywhere. You can feel tucked away from the noise and light pollution of LA, but conveniently access the rest of the city when you need to. This storybook cottage is upgraded for modern living. The kitchen (designed for beauty and functionality) includes custom cabinets that optimize storage, quartz counter tops and big kitchen sink. The home also boasts mini-split custom heating/cooling system, cedar-lined walls, solid strand zero VOC finish bamboo flooring, 100% pure wool chemical-free carpet, freshly painted interior & exterior, new roof, repaired/replaced siding, new front and rear doors, reinforced stone cement wall and stairwell, and gorgeous flowering step gardens complete with hanging baskets.Enjoy scenic views of Mt. Wilson from the comfort of your patio. Grab brunch at Mary's Market Cafe, just a short walk down the street. Or head into downtown Sierra Madre and enjoy the shops and restaurants in this charming small town. This home comes with two private parking spots and is a short walk to the stream, Nature Friends LA and hiking trails. All of this comes with a great zip code, known for having the leading schools of PUSD. Don't miss this opportunity!

Immaculate hard to find ONE level condo within walking distance of the lovely sought after village of Sierra Madre. There is a fireplace in the living room, an in house laundry room, central heat and air and drought resistant landscaping throughout the complex. Dont miss out on calling this home ..

text: This beautiful and spacious home is part of the Jameson development in the quaint town of Sierra Madre. The attractiveness and custom features are carried throughout the house. Breakfast room off kitchen & family room. The large family room boasts a fireplace, built-in shelves & wet bar making this an ideal area for gatherings & entertaining. A bedroom suite is located on the first floor. Powder room off hallway. Laundry room w/sink & bathrm. The luxurious master en-suite w/vaulted ceilings & retreat/study w/fireplace, is approx. 700 sf. Balcony w/mountain views. The cozy loft w/built in book shelves, is perfect as a reading area for many moods. Expansive stand-up attic. Private backyard with mature landscaping including plants & fruit trees which create a serene setting for outdoor relaxation. Entertain under the covered patio complete w/fans. Additional features-3 car garage w/storage, central vacuum, hardwood floors(engineered), 2 FA/CA systems & 3 fireplaces. Close to restaurants, shops, hiking trails, etc. This is a beautiful home in the charming foothill village community of Sierra Madre!

Absolutely adorable and turnkey traditional home. There are hardwood floors, crown molding and a fireplace in the living room. French doors open from the dining room to a large deck perfect for entertaining. There is a large flat grassy yard with room for expansion or a pool. The remodeled kitchen has granite counters, custom cherry wood cabinets, a Thermador gas range, a wine fridge, Travertine flooring, recessed lighting, under cabinet lighting, and a large walk in pantry. The bathroom has travertine floors and granite counters. The home has a whole house fan, central heat and air, double pane windows, skylight, copper plumbing, updated electrical panel, newer sewer line, 2 car attached garage with built in cabinetry. There are ceiling fans in each bedroom. The interior and exterior was freshly painted. There are automatic sprinklers and a NEST thermostat. Weber Gas Grill with gas hook up included in the sale. Great walkability to the wonderful village shops, restaurants and other amenities..

Impeccable condition, charm, views, quaint town and redesigned for today's living... a beautiful 1915 Craftsman style home located near the mountains of Sierra Madre! The home offers 4 bedrooms, including a master bedroom suite upstairs, and three bathrooms plus a beautiful family room with vaulted ceiling. Upon first entering the home you feel the charm of the Craftsman era with the wood detailing, built-in bookcases, wood shutters, bay window and fireplace. The original Douglas fir wood flooring throughout most of the house has been meticulously refinished and the quality of care that touches every nook of this house is evident. Entertaining flows seamlessly with the open floorplan that keeps family and guests connected from the dining area through the kitchen into the breakfast area and spilling out into the family room with its vaulted beam ceiling, wood burning fireplace and doors leading outside to patio and yard. Outside features a patio, grass yard and finished bonus room. Upgrades include central air conditioning, home alarm system, environmentally sensitive ductless room air conditioner, water softener/filtration system, copper plumbing, new drought tolerant landscaping, stainless steel appliances, and hot water recirculation system. Nearby is the Bailey Canyon Trailhead, and the quaint town of Sierra Madre with its coffee shops, restaurants and shopping area. Move right into this incredible and charming home and come home to Sierra Madre!

Welcome to this wonderfully renovated single story bungalow, nestled in one of Sierra Madre?s most picturesque neighborhoods. Your home has been completely remodeled and upgraded with designer elegance throughout. Walk into this well designed open floor plan and be captivated by the warm sense of natural light reflecting off the solid hard wood floor and beautiful colors. Features include 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, including a generous Master Suite with ample closet space, a spacious private bathroom and doors leading onto the majestic yard. Upgrades include a upgraded roof, electrical panel, plumbing, solid hardwood floors, finishes, recessed lighting, windows, hardware and branded fixtures which provide a sense of quality and happiness. The all new quartz kitchen presents perfectly styled backsplash, stainless steel appliances and flows harmlessly to the living/dining areas with views over the perfectly landscaped backyard, boasting over 12, 000sqft. Enjoy your spacious back yard with an alluring trimmed patio, colorful plants, palm trees and plenty of privacy. This home is perfect for entertaining or kicking back and relaxing.This is a fabulous location, close to downtown Sierra Madre and hiking trails, also convenient to get to Pasadena shopping like

Built in 1935, this adorable cottage has a lot to offer, including a separate home in the back. The front home has a large entry area, one bedroom and one bath, plus a nice sized living room. There is new flooring, central heat and AC, upgraded bath and partial upgraded kitchen. The one car detached garage has a shed attached with room for a washer and dryer for the front home. The back home has one bedroom, an office or 2nd bedroom, and one bath. It has central heat and AC and laundry in the home, upgraded kitchen and bath. The lot is over 6600 sq feet, which gives plenty of private space for each unit, and a beautiful mountain view. The back home is also permitted, so it is legal!!! The home is in an excellent location of Sierra Madre. It is walking distance to shops, restaurants and all that Sierra Madre has to offer.

Located on a quiet and secluded lane in the southeast section of this ever-popular village community, this one-story with northerly mountain cap views received a front exterior remodel by the current owners giving the home a very appealing Spanish Hacienda flair. With its enchanting front garden with ample adjacent parking plus a wide, multi-car drive to an attached three car garage, the home offers spacious public rooms and a delightful covered patio overlooking its very peaceful rear grounds. Special features include an expansive family/dining room combination with hardwood floors and a corner brick fireplace, built-in kitchen, and a large master bedroom with adjoining bath. There is room at the south side of the property for additional vehicle parking. Immediately adjacent to Arcadia and its major shopping centers as well as close to its own village shopping and restaurants, this is an ideally located home with great potential for updating and expansion.

Craftsman style townhomes built in 2005, two blocks from quant Sierra Madre Village in the foothills above Arcadia, minutes from Old Town Pasadena, easy 210-134-110 Freeway access, 3 bedroom, 2 1/2 bath, master suite with spa tub & shower stall, laundry closet adjacent to bedrooms, open kitchen-dining-family room with balcony on the second floor over looking living room with fireplace and patio, formal entry way, bonus room with walk in storage closet adjacent to 2 car garage with storage cabinets.

Truly a treasure of Sierra Madre! Wrought iron gates enclose the European style hedged entry that leads to a grand staircase of Austrian tile. An Austrian immigrant, Karl Graf, commissioned a European artisan to design this 1925 masterpiece which is often viewed as a Mediterranean or Spanish architecture. Mr. Graf fancied himself to be royalty & commissioned the 'Coat of Arms' paintings in the grand entry. Other coveted features such as 2 fireplaces & a fountain with Batchelder tiles and gum-wood paneling throughout the lower floor add to the old world charm & character. The living room, formal dining room & master suite are grand in both elegance & size. Notable features: arched doorways, impressive gum wood doors, coved ceilings, double staircase, 9' ceilings, pool, pool house, 2 ponds & a charming 1 bedroom guest house.

Price reduced $200, 000!! With a vast architectural heritage spanning 4 centuries, Haciendas express a romantic beauty with their arcaded silhouettes, rich colors and natural materials. That is what guided this owner to custom design and build this Hacienda compound that can never be duplicated. Sitting on a combined 2 lots totaling 25, 994 sq. ft. is the main house with oversized 2 car garage and 602 ft of covered veranda, Casita with 1/2 bath and 105 ft of covered veranda. PLUS separate additional 513 sq ft garage with possibilities to be a granny flat or guest quarters .SEE SUPPLEMENT FOR ADDITIONAL POSSIBILITIES! Hand picked Mission tiles adorn the steps leading to arched 8 ft front door of this much admired home. some of the custom delights are: 20 ft ceiling dramatic 25.6 X 22.4 beamed great room with focal floor to ceiling fireplace and double French doors. Swing open the double French doors in this 22.4 x 18 Master Suite and listen to the silence. This home was built for privacy! Kitchen with the look of old offers double drawer dishwashers, new wall oven, 48 in G.E. Monagram refrig., new 6 burner stove and oven, hammered copper farm sink. Adj. butler's pantry walk in storage. Colorful laundry room/hobby room with abundance of storage and counters. 6 in Brazilian walnut flooring, tasteful marble and granite and Mission tiles t/o. 100 year Mission tile roof, 10 ft ceilings, 8 ft knotty alder arched interior doors. Floor plan and full list of amenities in supplement

A rare opportunity to own one of the most wonderful homes in Sierra Madre, featuring breathtaking panoramic valley views, modern renovations, and open airy living spaces. This beautiful upper Sierra Madre Canyon home contains 3 spacious bedrooms, 3 refreshed baths, and one large bonus room! The master bedroom contains a custom built walk in closet included with a vanity, as well as a double sided fireplace in the bathroom and bedroom! With two balconies, you get incredible views of Mount Wilson. This home also contains quality hardwood floors, beautiful granite counter tops, fresh paint, and a new garage. The square footage measures 2, 281 square feet. This home is especially unique and ready to be lived in!

The San Gabriel Mountains sit as a backdrop to this lovely traditional home in the charming town of Sierra Madre. This beautifully maintained home has a spacious open floor plan with 5 bedrooms, and 4 baths. The home features two master suites, perfect for extended family. The west master suites bath has been newly remodeled with quartz counter tops, heated floors and towel rack, newly tiled walk in shower, and full mirror with custom lighting options. The east master suite bathroom has been updated with a marble counter, custom sink and tiled shower. One of the guest baths has been newly remodeled with Ming marble counter tops. The homes open floor plan features the kitchen with new soapstone counter tops, counter seating and custom cabinetry. The kitchen opens to a spacious family area which has a fireplace with large custom stone mantle, wood flooring, buffet with storage, dining area, vaulted ceilings, and high private windows that provide bright natural light to the entire space. The family/kitchen area opens through french doors to a wood deck and landscaped backyard with raised vegetable boxes, chicken coop and spectacular mountain views. The wood burning fireplace, new jacuzzi, all make for great entertaining and relaxing with family and friends. There are 2 attics, one with a whole house fan, an alarm system, security screens on most windows, fire sprinklers in all rooms.The front yard features drought tolerant plantings with rain capture system.

Welcome home to this beautiful 3 bedroom, two and a half bath town home in the highly sought after "Meadows". This town home has been recently painted, newer carpet, vaulted ceilings, remodeled kitchen, dining area with large slider to a private patio, Living room with fireplace, spacious master with en-suite, walk-in closet, and balcony. An additional large deck is off the upstairs hallway and 3rd bedroom that is perfect for outdoor living. MUST SEE - freshly painted interior throughout! Charming single-story home with mountain views! This lovely turnkey home offers the feel of a retreat yet minutes away from Downtown Sierra Madre, golf courses, public transportation, restaurants, shopping, and hiking trails. Features include a concrete circular driveway, a bright & airy open floor plan, 2 fireplaces, an expansive living room and dining area, large sliding glass doors that lead to an open patio with wood composite deck, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. Other features include a lovely reading area or sunroom, ample closet space, Japanese style walk-in soaking tub for your or your parents to enjoy, laundry room next to kitchen, 2-car detached garage, central heat & air, solar panels, updated electrical, copper plumbing, ABS sewer line, and extensive landscaped grounds with many mature fruit trees. Welcome to the Village of the Foothills in Sierra Madre, one of the nation's greatest small towns. Nestled on a quiet tree lined street, this charming Single Family home offers unique, solid craftsmanship with an abundance of natural light any highly selective buyer will appreciate. Just steps away from downtown, beautiful mountain hikes, wonderful shops, restaurants and minutes to Pasadena and Arcadia. This 3 bedroom, 2 and 3/4 bath includes kitchen with stainless steel appliances, open floor dining and living rooms for entertaining, hardwood floors, central heat, A/C, extra storage throughout and 3 water heaters. A spacious master suite with added room for closet, laundry or storage space. This unique property also features a large backyard and extra room with 3/4 bath for additional studio, office space in detached garage. Welcome to the Village of the Foothills. Welcome Home.

Hard to find, beautifully maintained Duplex located in north Sierra Madre. The front unit consists of 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom with a claw foot tub, living room and kitchen with spacious side porch to enjoy outdoor dining.  The back unit is 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom with a large living room and kitchen with breakfast nook.  Each of the homes have their own back yards, central heat and air, copper plumbing, upgraded electrical panels, and washer/dryer hookups. Down the long concrete driveway with brick ribbons, you find a one-car garage that has been converted to an office with plenty of storage space. Enjoy the city lights to the south and gorgeous mountain views to the north. This is a perfect opportunity for investors or owner occupied.

Corner unit with so much potential to create your ideal home! Single level unit located right by the pool in The Meadows. text: Located at the base of the Foothills in Sierra Madre, this home has been in the same family since its inception and available for the first time on the open market. This is your opportunity to tap into the potential this home has to offer. Classic mid-century lines lends to its subtle yet striking curb appeal. As you enter, light streams through expansive windows and French doors that flow out to the spacious backyard where mature landscaping provides a wonderful sense of privacy. A stately brick fireplace defines the formal dining room space from the living room. The generous kitchen features a large picture window and opens out onto the family room! At the end of the main hallway, you'll find a master suite with it's own private bath. Three more bedrooms and a bathroom, along with a laundry room and even an office off the living room completes this comfortable floor plan

This gracious 1939 traditional has been expanded and extensively renovated with good taste and a gentle touch. Situated on a truly amazing 23, 102 SF flat lot on a quiet street, the property offers complete serenity, minutes away from Downtown Pasadena, and steps away from ''Downtown'' Sierra Madre. The house features a formal entry foyer, an airy living room with high ceilings, a formal dining room, an updated kitchen, and a wonderful library. There are 3 bedrooms and 2 1/2 baths. There is a park-like back yard, with multiple patio areas, a pergola, and an outdoor fireplace. A ''garden house'' (currently used as a gym) adds to the fun. The property is steps away from Alverno, La Salle, and Sierra Madre Elementary School. Located behind gates, the backyard offers a secure haven where kids and pets can play safely. Many mature trees on the property enhance the serenity and privacy. An orchard of fruit trees provides a bountiful harvest. Southern California living at its best!

Situated amongst the foothills of Sierra Madre on a quiet street, this charming 1920's Tudor cottage is located on a large, private lot and offers high-end modern upgrades including a newly renovated kitchen featuring new cabinetry, quartz counters, wide plank wood flooring and stainless appliances. The oversized main living area offers an open concept living/dining space with wide plank wood look flooring and features 9' ceilings with original detailed crown moulding, tons of natural light from the picturesque windows and a stunning fireplace with Batchelder tile surround. The gourmet kitchen offers grey custom cabinetry, custom backsplash, white Quartz countertops with ample counter space, stainless steel appliances and is adjacent to the laundry room/mudroom area which boasts tons of cabinet and storage space and a folding counter for laundry. The new upgraded wide plank wood flooring is continued throughout the entire home. The master bedroom is spacious & airy with and features an en Suite master bath and closet. A secondary bedroom and full bath complete the living area. The spacious detached garage offers ample storage and a spacious attic which could be converted into a separate living space. The detached garage features a permitted office/guest quarters with cork flooring, skylights and a brand new HVAC system (approximately 243 square feet). The private backyard is perfect for entertaining guests and observing nature. Close to shopping, dining & entertainment.

Adjacent pool and spa.Laurel Gardens is a uniquely desirable address - built in 1995 with just 6 units...4 of which are still occupied by original families.An oasis in the center of vibrant Los Angeles County, it's no wonder so many want to call Sierra Madre home!

The kitchen with designer counter tiles includes new stainless steel 5-burner cooktop and new dishwasher. Wilson and Yucca hiking trails are close by.Don't miss this treasure tucked away in the foothills of one of best kept secrets in CA. Sierra Madre the ultimate small town USA. SWEET DIGS!!!

Hard to find and Charming Newer Construction in the heart of beautiful and quaint Sierra Madre; built by prominent and local builder Bowden Development Inc. Beautiful hardwood floors in the living room and kitchen, and italic tile in all the bathrooms as well as beautiful upgraded carpets in the bedrooms. Professional and Beautiful landscaping with automatic sprinkler system and a 2 car attached garage add to the beautiful curb appeal. This will not last, and will not come around very often in this area.

BACK ON MARKET!!! HUGE PRICE REDUCTION!!! Very motivated Seller! Immaculate condition, beautiful home located in the quaint town of Sierra Madre. Charming traditional 2BR, 2BA home located in the unique foothills community or  Sierra Madre. Designer details & upgrades done throughout. Butlers panty adjacent to kitchen has Italian marble bar counter & beveled glass door cabinets. Family room features private office area, vineotemp wine refrigerator & ceiling fan. French doors in family room and bedroom open to garden like patio. Main BA has designer flooring with nine inlaid US Dollar coins that accent medallions. Main house has 1,295 square feet (taped) and guest house is 336 square feet (taped), buyer to verify. A wonderful home that has been taken care of with great pride of ownership and attention to detail throughout.

What could life be in this charming red cottage? Simple and fun, relaxing and inspiring! This two bedroom mid-century could be the perfect home for the nature lover, an artist, a writer, or anyone in search of a canyon retreat where creativity can flourish within the comforts of its four walls, or outdoors in a rich natural setting of rocks and garden areas under the canopy of towering trees. First time in the market in over 40 years, this well-maintained single story house has an expansive living room, a quaint eat in kitchen, and a full bath. Private and inviting, the backyard is a beautiful mesh of spaces for exploring nature, soothing rest, or honing skills for hobbies and crafts. Nicely integrated into this park-like setting are storage sheds and the stand alone laundry cottage. Tucked in the Little Santa Anita Canyon neighborhood in the foothills of much sought after Sierra Madre, one can easily forget that big city hustle and bustle is just minutes away. The City of Pasadena is next-door to the west, Arcadia to the south, and Monrovia to the east. Live an uncomplicated life and enjoy your next chapter in this Southern California home where you belong.

Spectacular Remodeled Family Home. Located on one of the most desirable quiet streets in the charming town of Sierra Madre. Single story that feels spacious yet cozy. It has a formal dining room and a laundry room. One bedroom has a beautifully detailed built-in hardwood Library with a retractable queen size Murphy Bed. This home has a game/entertainment room with a large wine rack and a wet bar that can be rolled away and easily converted back to a guest suite with full bath. It opens up to the backyard via large double glazed sliding doors. The outdoors are peaceful and relaxing with a sparkling heated pool and Jacuzzi, fire pit, multiple lounging areas and low maintenance landscape. Doors and windows are all quality Milgard double glazed. Less than half a mile to downtown Sierra Madre Shops, Restaurants, Cafes, and Schools. Couple of minutes to the 210 freeway. You don't want to miss this dream home opportunity - It is a must see.

Beautiful, single level Sierra Madre home. Expansive, gorgeous grounds with a large courtyard and patios that beautifully merge the indoor/outdoor living spaces. This spectacular Sierra Madre home is located on a private street at the base of the foothills and provides the feeling of seclusion with the convenience of being located just minutes from Downtown Sierra Madre's shopping & dining. Recent upgrades include re-plastering of the pool, a new tankless water heater, and new sewer line out to the street.  Do not miss this remarkable home!

Cozy, traditional-bungalow style home in award-winning Sierra Madre community. 1 Bedroom, 1 bathroom, spacious outdoor deck perfect for entertaining. Located in north Sierra Madre at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac this lovely homes offers mountain & valley views and a guest house. Highly sought after Single Level 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with hardwood floors, living room with fireplace, kitchen with nook, separate family room with French doors that open to a lush backyard with swimming pool and detached garage. This Sierra Madre ranch-style home is located in the ARCADIA SCHOOL DISTRICT! It is situated atop a gentle knoll in the highly sought-after Highland Oaks neighborhood. Nestled in the canyon a traditional home freshly updated with a spacious open floorplan, bright, airy and located in a quaint and peaceful street of desirable Sierra Madre Canyon. This lovely home is situated in north Sierra Madre on a spacious 8, 712 sf lot and boasts tranquil mountain views. There are gleaming hardwood floors throughout most of the home. Classic elegance blends with a thoughtful floor plan to create this exceptional Ranch style home nestled on a quiet street in the coveted neighborhood of Sierra Madre! The lovely landscaping entices you up the walkway to explore this wonderful home. The formal entry leads to a warm & gracious living and dining room where a stately fireplace compliments the classic columns, fine moldings and hardwood flooring. Light streams in through the plate glass and French door along the back of the family room perfectly framing the lush landscaping and bringing a sense of the outdoors inside. The scenic landscaping includes patio and recreation areas for you to enjoy the flourishing fruit trees and beautiful Japanese Maple trees. At the heart of every social gathering is a stylishly updated kitchen that features wood cabinetry, granite counters, hardwood flooring and a breakfast nook. Down the hallway, you will find 4 generous bedrooms with handsome plantation shutters and hardwood flooring, along with two tastefully upgraded baths that completes this comfortable layout.

Views of mountains, San Gabriel Valley delight every day. Lemon trees outside the breakfast room window and mature trees grace your 2/3 acre. Original wood paneling in the dining room, built-in breakfront, enclosed bookcase and custom shelves in the living room, along with antique lights equal peaceful elegance. Windows galore bring the outside in and high ceilings bring a leisurely, uncrowded look throughout. The formal dining room lends itself to entertaining while large bedrooms give opportunities for meditative moments. Downstairs there are large rooms that can become whatever you desire: office, family room, bedroom and a lrg basement for a work shop and unbelievable storage. The swimming pool, spa and garden area ringed by trees call you to relax and enjoy time with family & friends.

The Sierra Madre is a quaint city nestled between Pasadena and Arcadia. The serene neighborhood is situated along the Foothills and streets are lined with giant trees. MOVE-IN condition with room for EXPANSION later. New roof , concrete driveway, windows, bathrooms and laundry room. Newer wood flooring, kitchen cabinets with granite counter-top. Spacious and private backyard for family & friends gathering. Large lot with room for expansion, including to add an accessory dwelling unit (ADU) for rental income. Convenient access to neighborhood eclectic shops, restaurants, entertainment and freeways.

Custom blt in 2004 this grand shingled Craftsman sits on a picturesque tree lined quiet street. Enter through majestic oversized Craftsman door to soaring ceilings that allow your eyes to travel up to 2 story high windows and floor to ceiling 2 sided river rock show stopper of a fireplace. Flexible floorplan offer both formal and casual living and dining spaces. Double French doors with transoms in LR, fam room, den/downstairs bedroom allow for true indoor/outdoor California living. Chef's kitchen w/ 48 in. Viking stove, 36 in. blt in GE Monogram refrig, trash compactor and Miele DW. Granite counter tops and center granite eating island with veggie sink. 2 pantries and abundance of custom cabinetry. Fam rm opens to tree studded private backyard ready for those large gatherings. Coveted downstairs bdrm with full bath. All three bdrms upstairs en suite. Master suite w/ elegant slate fireplace, cozy sitting room w/French doors and wraparound deck. 10.9 X 10.3 dream closet with center island w/his and her blt in dressers. Masterbath w/his and her vanities, oversized glass enclosed shower w/bench, separate soaking tub and towel warmer. 3 fireplaces, oak floors t/o most of home, whole house fan, dual zoned FA/CAC, over 500 sq ft garage and so much more!

Serene 2 bedroom, 2 bath home within a very desirable neighborhood in the heart of Sierra Madre, CA. Measuring 1, 260+/- sq ft, the property features cooper plumbing, central air and heat, and a spacious front deck perfect for entertaining. Built in 1934, this peaceful home is very conveniently located within blocks of the The Village of the Foothills, a popular landmark and charming downtown shopping district. The property is less than one quarter mile from Mount Wilson Trail for hiking and one half mile from Sierra Madre Elementary-Middle School, boasting a top school report rating of 9. Fruit trees and a private front lawn setting complete this unique condominium alternative opportunity.

Rare, New Custom Built Home in Sierra Madre!This Special, Turnkey and Stylish Home has much more than meets the eye. There are 2 additional bedrooms with shared bathroom downstairs as well as a large separate laundry room. The spacious backyard provides you with countless opportunities for relaxation or fun with Mountain views.This beautiful home is nestled in the very charming and welcoming Community of Sierra Madre, a village with endless qualities.

Sweet Charming Sierra Madre Canyon Home with Fantastic City View. Large Lot along with a 2 car attached garage with is a rarity for Canyon living. So much character throughout this special home. Single Level open floor plan with lots of windows and great wonderful living spaces. Living room with fireplace. Large kitchen with center Island. 2 spacious bedrooms that open up to a private covered patio area with amazing city views. Newer Central air conditioning and heating system. Upgraded electrical, re-enforced foundation, Newer insulation, Newer water heater and more. Various outside entertaining areas surround the home and beautifully merge the indoor/outdoor living spaces. Attached double garage and on street parking as well. Serene quiet neighborhood. Near hiking trails and to Old town Sierra Madre. Feels like a wonderful escape form the busy city atmosphere but only minutes away from shops, restaurants, Freeways and Metro.

MAJOR REMODEL OF UPPER SIERRA MADRE POOL HOME. New roof, new plumbing (including new main water line to house, new line to the backyard and new yard irrigation front and back with automatic timers), new electrical, new dual pane windows, new kitchen and bathrooms, new plaster in pool, new stamped concrete pool area/back patio, new driveway and also new landscaping. The large lot features not only an amazing pool with waterfall but also a generously sized new back lawn. Just a few blocks to the popular hiking area of Bailey Canyon Park. This four bedroom, two bathroom home is an oasis that has been lovingly restored and is ready for a new owner to make a lifetime of memories.

This 1913 three bedroom 2 bath Craftsman home has undergone a detailed restoration maintaining the original charm and character of the home while providing all of the upgrades currently expected in homes today. Features include a kitchen with newer cabinets, granite counters and stainless appliances, breakfast nook, dining room with original wainscoting and French doors opening onto a front porch sitting area. Other features include hardwood cherry floors, a double fireplace providing a cozy atmosphere in the living room and den, a 1st floor master bedroom, newer copper plumbing and electrical wiring.  The 2nd floor includes 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, library and outdoor deck. Outside the home has a 2 car garage, professionally installed landscaping and a backyard deck ideal for entertaining

Nestled away in the hills of Sierra Madre, this property is perfect for an Investor, Developer or Home Buyer Looking for a Major Fixer. The property consist of a small 1 bedroom 1 bath home 667 Square Foot Home on a 3525 square foot lot and is in need of extensive repairs. The property is being sold in an As-Is Condition and the Seller will not consider any request for repairs. Please note this may require a Cash Buyer as it may not be possible to get any conventional financing on the property. The location of the Property is ideal for individuals looking to be close to nature but not too far from Downtown Sierra Madre and all of its amazing amenities. The Sierra Madre Canyon is a nature lover's dream with large oak trees, natural streams, wild animals, and numerous walking paths. It is a perfect escape from the Los Angeles noise, traffic and light pollution. All potential Buyer's should complete their own due diligence, investigations and inspections of the Property. This includes but is not limited to surveying the land for potential boundary issues (there may be some), inspecting the physical property for habitability, unpermitted items & code violations, and gathering information from the City, State & Federal Government regarding zoning, government regulations & potential uses for the property. All potential Buyer's shall be aware that any potential sale will require court confirmation.

A stately Sycamore tree guards the entrance to this picturesque, 1928 Craftsman home with multiple income producing opportunities. A gracious veranda fronts the home while a wisteria vine-covered pergola anchors the east side and offers an intimate area for outdoor entertaining. Upon entering the main home, you experience a sense of quiet and unpretentious comfort. The well-polished hardwood floors reflect the warm glow of sunlight and the focal point of the living room is its generous fireplace. Original wood trim, plate and picture rails and a built-in buffet evidence the handmade craftsmanship and quality you've come to expect from an earlier era. A reverent renovation of the kitchen provides modern amenities while preserving its classic simplicity. The upper level offers a main bedroom with en-suite bath and dressing area. There are two additional bedrooms (one with a charming balcony overlooking the front yard) and a full bath. Attached to the main home with a separate entrance is a one bedroom apartment with a full kitchen and bath. It can be used as part of the main home or rented out. Lastly, a charming, two-story carriage house offers two bedrooms, full bath, kitchen, office, and living room with fireplace. The grounds are spacious and open with many options for gardening, entertaining or just relaxing while taking in its naturalistic of its many trees and plantings. This is a rare offering with unmatched character and charm in a most desirable area of Sierra Madre.

THE SIERRA MADRE VILLAGE IS CALLING YOU!This beautiful 2 bedroom/2 bathroom single-level townhome is located in the heart of Sierra Madre. The living room features vaulted ceilings and a fireplace so you can relax and enjoy an evening at home, or exit through the sliding doors, onto the private patio, and enjoy a classic California evening under the stars - perfect for entertaining. The eat-in Kitchen is spacious, offers plenty of storage, and opens into the dining room. The master suite features a walk-in closet and an en-suite. Other features include freshly painted interior, a detached 2 car garage, and central air and heating. Conveniently located near Sierra Madre's Civic Center, many restaurants, shopping, library, post office and the Sierra Madre Playhouse.

text: Located in beautiful Sierra Madre, this newly renovated single-story traditional 4-bedroom home features a bright and open layout. There's a spacious living room with a brick fireplace, as well as a fourth bedroom/home office with an updated bathroom, that connects to the formal dining room with a wine closet, and chefs kitchen. The remodeled custom kitchen features stainless steel appliances, Alder cabinetry, and natural quartzite counters. Open either of the two 16 foot sliding doors to a large outdoor patio area perfect for entertaining and outdoor dining. The primary bedroom suite is located on the east wing of the house and features a large shower and dual sinks with dolomite stone counters and marble flooring. There are two additional secondary bedrooms with a renovated full bathroom across the hall. Outside in the back is a flat grassy area surrounded by trees and vegetation. A gated entrance from the driveway leads into the back to the covered carport that fits three cars. Being less than three blocks from Sierra Madre Elementary and Middle School and the Mount Wilson hiking trail, this home is in a great location and provides terrific amenities.

Fall in love with this mid-century home located in the highly sought-after town of Sierra Madre. This home has been in the same loving family for over 60 years. Living is easy with this well-designed floor plan, mountain views and sun-drenched rooms. The living room features an original stacked stone fireplace and a wall of windows. The kitchen is open to the dining room great for a chatting with friends and family while you're cooking. The master suite includes a walk-in closet and bath with a double vanity. The expansive yard has matured landscaping including many fruit tress - apple, pomegranate, tangerine, fig and lemon trees and room for a pool. Other highlights include a large family room with dining area, 200 amp electrical panel and finished two car garage. Close to Kersting Court, Bailey Canyon, Memorial Park, and many restaurants.

First time on market since built in 1962, this exquisite one level beautifully maintained California ranch is located on one of the most desirable cul de sacs in sought after Sierra Madre. Built by the family that still owns the property , no details were spared in creating features that invite pleasant restful rooms with plentiful views of the mountains and greenery. As you enter the expansive living room an extraordinarily large fireplace greets you in addition to very broad windows showering in light. As you proceed to the family room, a really GREAT room, it is very spacious and connects to the kitchen and exterior patio and sun porch. The kitchen is a chefs delight with ample counter space, an island with sink, a walk in pantry, a breakfast eating area and views of the very expansive back yard. There are three oversized bedrooms and a fourth bedroom/office with fireplace and ample closets and shelving. Each bedroom is adjacent to a bathroom for added convenience. The yard is comprised of almost a half an acre of greenery with a sparkling pool and spa. A double garage with additional workshop and attached is a bonus room with over 600 square feet that could be a pool house , gym or with upgrades could become qualified for an ADU (Additional Dwelling Unit). This is truly a Sierra Madre treasure, built by a long time Sierra Madre family and perfect for the modern day family.

Retreat and escape from the hustle and bustle of city living for a more tranquil lifestyle. This delightful home located in the serene canyon of Sierra Madre offers that and more. Built in 1984 this two-story home features two-bedrooms, a full bath and the laundry area on the first floor. Upstairs a vaulted ceiling provides an expansive feeling and an open floor-plan concept that marries the living room and the dining area with the kitchen. The living room features a fireplace and has sliding doors that open to a cozy balcony where you can enjoy the outside or gaze at the stars. The generous sized master suite has a large walk-in closet and a full bath. Walking throughout the canyon of Sierra Madre will quickly become your favorite pastime as you will discover something new with each walk as well as enjoying the sounds of a nearby babbling brook as you cross charming foot-bridges. Also, just a short distance away is Mary's Market, a quaint Canyon Market-Restaurant that is reminiscent of days gone by... For those who love the outdoors, there are a number of wonderful hiking trails nearby. And, when it is time to leave this little slice of heaven and return to work, the 210 Freeway is only 2 miles away. Don't miss your opportunity!

Remodeled three-bedroom, two-bathroom Sierra Madre home. The home features engineered oak hardwood flooring, LED lighting, and high ceilings throughout. Large, open concept kitchen with new cabinets, quartz countertops with a waterfall island, and a custom range hood. Master suite with a walk-in closet and an oversized bathroom with a stand-up shower and double vanity. Large backyard and a detached 2-car garage.

Are you searching for a quiet canyon life in north Sierra Madre? Surrounded by the mountains and within walking distance of Mary's market and hiking access to the famous Mount Wilson Trail, check out this single-level home built in 1960. Featuring 2 Bedrooms, 1 Bathroom, central air and heat, and newer roof and garage door. The kitchen has a bay window, recessed lights, and stainless steel appliances. The open floor plan and numerous windows provide a lot of light throughout the spacious living room and separate dining area. The large master bedroom includes a vaulted ceiling, generously sized closet with closet organizer and sliding mirrored doors, ceiling fan, and sliding glass door to the private rear patio and backyard. The attached 2-car garage has laundry hookups with direct access to the house.

Serene Mid-Century with incredible views and rare private road location. Built in 1953, this property features the beamed ceilings, indoor/outdoor living, and relaxed atmosphere that make houses of this era such a joy to call home. The primary bedroom enjoys its own private level, an en suite bathroom, and a deck perfect for morning coffee. The main level boasts dramatic views from an open great room, providing living and dining with sliding doors to a large deck for entertaining. The floor plan is rounded out with two additional bedrooms, a main bath, and kitchen with breakfast nook. Just up the road from historic Lizzie's Inn and Mount Wilson Trail Park and adjacent to hiking trails, this property offers a chance to escape from the hustle and bustle while still being close to the best Sierra Madre has to offer. Quaint shops, restaurants, and breathtaking nature make Sierra Madre a foothills small town favorite locale.

This 1950's ranch style home is nestled into the beautiful Foothills in highly sought after Sierra Madre. It is meticulously landscaped in the front and is located on an impressive 18, 880 sqft lot with multiple fruit and shade trees. On this quiet street sits this light and airy 4 bedroom, 2 bath home which has been recently updated with new carpet and luxury vinyl, fresh paint inside and out, a revamped laundry closet, 1 updated bathroom, and a new roof. The family room has a charming wood burning fireplace with a glass sliding door, that not only brings in a lot of light and has stunning views of the backyard, but leads you out to a cozy covered patio that truly feels like additional living space. The backyard holds your detached 2 car garage with attached workshop, which has a separate meter from the home and 2 additional storage sheds. There is also space for an RV with a clean-out, water and electricity all ready to go. This property is a must see!

Presenting the picturesque Victorian style property built in 1890. From the extravagant ornamentation, custom woodwork, stained glass windows, gilded details & patterned bargeboard, the property's striking details quietly convey the grandeur of the Victorian era. Enjoy the fabulous facade w/ the dramatic courtyard built around large oak trees. The west wing of the house opens to a lovely porch & consists of the spacious formal living room with decorative fireplace, trey ceiling, large windows & leads to the formal dining area that can accommodate large gatherings. In this wing you will find 3 BR & 1 BA. The back parlor is the kitchen w/ stainless steel appliances, skylights & an open area for entertaining. Adjacent to the kitchen is the private master bedroom w/ seating area that opens to the backyard & the master bath w/ jacuzzi tub, shower & double sink. The east wing is the front parlor that serves as a reception hall w/ large entrance floor to ceiling doors w/ leaded glass windows & opens to the courtyard which is perfect for extravagant entertaining. Entertainer's backyard w/ screened patio, mature trees, lush plantings & a path that will lead you to the charming gazebo. Circular driveway & Victorian lamp post are some add'l features this house has to offer. Property is not on the list of the historical properties. Please see floor plan.

Gorgeous two story unit located in the heart of Sierra Madre! The 2 bed, 1.5 bath houses the best of both worlds with its view of city lights contrasted with the location's quaint, small town feel. The downstairs is home to an open floor plan with plentiful amounts of natural light beaming into the large great room and dining area. A four burner gas stove, updated appliances, and copious amounts of storage would make any chef feel at home! Additionally, the downstairs offers a laundry area that leads to an attached two car garage, and powder room with entrances through both the living space and laundry area. The upstairs houses the primary bedroom with its gorgeous front porch complete with a view of the San Gabriel Valley. Similar to the downstairs powder room, the full bath has an entrance from the primary bedroom, with an additional entrance from the upstairs hall. The second bedroom is spacious and has great natural light aspects. Additional amenities include the garage's extra storage, linen and cleaning closets, and downstairs front patio located off the dining area. A community pool/spa and BBQ area complete this desirable complex which is conveniently located within close proximity (a few blocks!) to downtown Sierra Madre--an area filled with fabulous shopping and dining!

Let your cares melt away at this exceptional Mid-Century Modern home bathed in natural light. This elegant home offers 3 bedrooms and 4 baths, plus a flex room offering endless possibilities as a study, home theater, gym, or playroom, this home is thoughtfully designed for modern living. Italian porcelain tiles and high end custom hardware and doors set this apart from other homes as no expense was spared during the recent renovation. The generous floorplan is open and inviting, with expansive views courtesy of the incredible floor to ceiling windows. The spacious chef's kitchen, with coffee bar and gleaming quartz countertops, flows into the airy family room that sweeps into the adjacent living room, where you'll find convenient access to the backyard, and plenty of space to lounge or work from home. An entertainer's dream, gather with friends around one of two sleek fireplaces, stargaze from the patio, or relax by the inviting pool and spa, where the open space surrounding you fosters a sense of relaxation. The master retreat has a custom walk-in closet, and a luxurious spa inspired bathroom with soaking tub, while the additional bedrooms are well-appointed and comfortable. Sophisticated bathrooms and a charming laundry room round out this beautiful home. French oak floors, smart features, and immaculate finishes, make this cul-de-sac beauty equal parts comfort and style. With copper plumbing, a dual HVAC system, motorized custom shades, ample closet space for storing necessities, and a spacious garage with new built-in lighted workbench and cabinetry, you don't want to miss this beauty.

Situated on the western end of Sierra Madre, 475 West Grandview is a custom-built architectural gem designed by Bob Leese of Cahill and Leese architects and sighted on over 22, 000 feet of mature grounds. With 5BR, 7BA, and 4, 900 square feet of living space across two levels, this expansive estate abounds with a flexible floor plan. For those looking for the beauty of country living with the convenience of the city, welcome to a spectacular, enchanting estate. Pass under an imposing porte cochere, home to a 1-car garage and a 1-bedroom guest house with a fireplace to find an enchanting New Orleans-style French country home featuring the warmth of a brick facade, gas-powered light fixtures, patinated wrought iron balconies and French doors. Studded with California Live Oaks and pristine landscaping, the estate, built and inspired by MaryRose and Tom Courtney, well-known throughout the Southland as being the go-to of accomplished high-end builders, pride-of-ownership is found at every detail. Inside, intricate design details, a testament to the quality of craftsmanship honed over 40 years of building luxury estate homes. A formal light-filled living room and nearby library provide tranquil spaces for leisure and entertaining, while the gourmet kitchen with a breakfast area, adjacent over-sized dining room and family room provide for informal entertaining. The gourmet kitchen offers most every amenity available to the modern cook and features custom-designed and built cabinetry that effortlessly complements the French-tile backsplash and Michelangelo marble countertops. French doors open to a spacious covered patio, the pool, and lush grounds. The primary suite with its elegantly appointed sumptuous marble bath and adjacent master lounge with a fireplace features stunning San Gabriel Mountain, treetop and vista views offers the perfect respite. Each of the additional three second-floor bedrooms offers its own privacy and views. Outside is an entertainer's paradise, presenting a sparkling 40' pool and jacuzzi, and an open-air brick-accented pool house with a large seating area, built-in barbecue and a fire-pit. Adding a sense of depth and set on the diagonal, a brick-faced 'pigeonnier' building generously houses a three-quarter bath and changing rooms. This is an estate-home that offers a sense of privacy and peace rarely found within city limit, a rare offering and magnificent setting that is sure to impress and enchant.

The Montecito ... A rare investment opportunity in Quaint Sierra Madre, one block North of Sierra Madre Blvd. A town without stoplights, nestled beside the San Gabriel mountain range. Currently, an option to LIVE in the front 3 BD/2 BA unit, or keep all 6 rented out. This property has been family-owned for decades, is well maintained, and has been improved over recent years. Three units have been renovated floor to ceiling, including electrical. The other three units: one has had all new flooring and all of them have various updates and improvements. Ample parking with a 2-car parking attached to front 3-bd unit, and a carport structure - all with storage and open parking in the back/top of the property. Onsite laundry, leased equipment, operated via an app. Unit A may be seen/shown now and has central air conditioning and a fireplace. The other 5 units have window/wall AC units. Tenants pay their own metered electric and gas. Newer asphalt and painted parking markings entire exterior. Newer complete exterior paint/shutters to building. Parking: Private 2-car for front unit, all others have 1 designated carport + an open space if needed based on occupancy. Water/Sew/Trash combined as one. Public Record is incorrect: SIX Units, totaling 12 Bedrooms and 7 Bathrooms. A no-pet property. No sign on property - please be accompanied by agt/appt.

Welcome to this one owner, home like Victorian townhouse. This 16 unit complex was fashioned after Postcard Row in San Francisco with its enchanting architectural details. Don't let this amazing opportunity pass you by! This wonderful home is located in the quiet, serene Sierra Madre foothills with breathtaking views. Located in the foothills of Sierra Madre, this 3-Story traditional provides a serene living space with multi-level decks that capture commanding views of the city and mountains. Stylishly updated rare 3 bedroom and 3 bath townhome is ideally located near downtown Sierra Madre. A treasured home with every convenience and amenity for a wonderful life in the Village Community of Sierra Madre. Ideally located near downtown Sierra Madre this large, updated, 1542 sq ft, 2 bed 2 bath, gem is ready for its new owners! This is a second-floor unit so no neighbors above you. You will love living within walking distance of all that downtown Sierra Madre has to offer. So much to love about this home and community!

Back on the market - please email me to request copies of inspection reports and disclosures. A peaceful setting and prime location are only part of the allure this mid-century home has to offer. Located on a quiet cul-de-sac this home offers new flooring and carpeting throughout, new exterior and interior paint and beautifully landscaped front and back yards. There is a spacious living room with brick fireplace and a large dining room with access to and views of the expansive backyard. The kitchen also offers views of the backyard allowing you to watch over the children during meal prep! There is a large room on the south side of the home that could easily be a 4th bedroom or a combination bedroom-office. The north side of the home has 3 additional bedrooms, one being a master suite with access to the back yard. For the gardening enthusiast, you'll love spending time in the yards and picking the fruit from the lemon, blood orange, loquat and tangerine trees. Just a short distance to the quaint downtown village of Sierra Madre you'll find eateries, shopping, coffee shops, as well as being near hiking trails in the Sierra Madre Canyons, Eaton Canyon and Chantry Flats.

This exceptional property consists of a 2 bedroom and 2 bath house with a 2 bedroom 1 bath guest house situated on a large 20, 504 square foot lot. The main house was built in 1949 and has 1, 636 square feet. It offers a living room with brick fireplace, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, formal dining room, den with built-in desk, and book cases, galley kitchen with tile counter-tops and breakfast area, laundry room with sink, enclosed patio, CA and heating and detached 2-car garage with covered walk-way to the back door.The guest house was built in 1982 and has 1, 008 square feet. It offers a living room with wood beamed cathedral ceiling, kitchen with breakfast bar, dining area in the living room, 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, laundry room, walk-in closet, sliding glass doors to the covered patio, CA and heating and it's own detached garage.There is a large green belt separating the two houses and a large front yard. This property provides many possibilities to an owner/occupant, investor and developer. It's also located in one of the best neighborhoods of Sierra Madre close to St. Rita's Church and the Sierra Madre business, shopping and restaurant district. Great opportunity to own a property with amazing potential!

This 1894 Victorian house titled, the Clark Carriage House is a registered historic property in the charming city of Sierra Madre. It was moved to her current location in 1936. She has had a colorful history and was just recently purchased and restored to her original beauty with brand new 21st century amenities and luxuries in mind, including electrical, copper plumbing and central HVAC system. This magnificent property sits back elegantly under the majestic oak trees that surround the property, as your eyes gravitate beyond the lush green front yard to the home's white facade with black accents, and intricate brickwork. Once inside, you are welcomed by the Entry and Powder Room, as you look right of the Entry there is a quaint late 19th century winding staircase, leading you to two sunny and airy Bedrooms and bathroom with views of the mountains and the carefully landscaped Backyard. On the left of the Entry is the Living Room, which has a restored gas log fireplace and new mantle along with era specific restored windows facing the front yard. The open floor-plan concept connects to the completely remodeled and redesigned Kitchen with a sitting area, brand new stainless-steel appliances and stone countertops and to a bright and spacious Dining Room surrounded by windows with views of the lush Backyard and the majestic oak trees in the rear of the property. Adjacent to the Living Room is the redesigned Master Suite with walk in closet, stunning Bathroom with double sinks and a large shower, with windows and rear door, which connect to the back yard. Off the Master Suite, there is a yet another charming door which leads you to the Side-yard for your peaceful and quiet times as you savor your morning cup of coffee, read a book, stare at the stars, or just simply rest in privacy. As you look into the huge Backyard, you are naturally drawn to the corner of the back yard where there is a brick and stucco finished wood burning outdoor fireplace, and a Barbeque bay with electricity and gas lines available for your choice of outdoor kitchen appliances. The overhanging oak tree, brick laden patio along with neatly landscaped backyard is perfect for entertaining, dining al fresco under the outdoor chandelier, or for a quiet retreat as your eyes wander out to the majestic views of San Gabriel mountain. Garage has been converted to an ADU with full kitchen, washer and dryer ready, bathroom and Stand-alone AC. Call for your private showing of this TIMELESS HOME.

Life in Sierra Madre has never felt more serene than while living in the comfort of one of Sierra Madre's most coveted neighborhoods. The home has a wrap around porch with built in BBQ overlooking a ground in natural stone heated Spa. Serenity close to Down Town Sierra Madre awaits

One of two new construction masterpieces, coupling thoughtful, open flow and natural light with all of the amenities needed for true energy-efficient, modern living in Sierra Madre. Move in & enjoy this sophisticated home!

Spectacular ranch style pool home located in the heart of Sierra Madre. The upper level of the home features 3 beds & 2 baths and the bright and airy loft that overlooks the front of the property offering a splendid view of the mountains. The spacious Master bedroom features an en suite bath, French doors, and walk-in closet. The piece de resistance of this luxury townhome is the private elevator with direct access from the 2-car attached garage to the upper level of the residence! Additional features include the laundry & custom cabinets in the garage, central air/heat and security system. This home is a rare find!
full_street_line: 638 W Sierra Madre Blvd Unit A

text: 4 OLD Oak Trees shade the grounds of this 1/4 ac lot. Abound with flora And Fauna, waterfalls & grass, Walk-around deck and front porch to view the beautiful gardens. This charming single wall construction built in 1900 has plenty windows for natural light. Office space could be 3rd bedroom. Big Master suite plenty storage Kitchen remodeled 2004 capturing the complete home feeling. Three car garage Three carports. that's protected parking for six cars!

CHARMING 1929 TUDOR NESTLED ON A QUIET TREE-LINED STREET, PRIME LOCATION 2 BLOCKS FROM THE HEART OF SIERRA MADRE; THIS BEAUTY HAS THE ADVANTAGE OF A DARLING STUDIO BACK HOUSE, PERFECT FOR ARTISTS, HOME OFFICE OR USE YOUR IMAGINATION, CITY GRANDFATHERED IN THE STRUCTURE 4 YEARS AGO; HUGE TANDUM CAR GARAGE WITH WORKSHOP BUILT INS, PERFECT FOR IN HOME WORKSHOP; FEATURING; 2 BED 1, 1/2 BATH; 1260 SQ FT OF BEAUTIFUL LIVING SPACE; HARDWOOD FLOORS THROUGH-OUT; SPACIOUS LIVING ROOM WITH FRENCH SLIDERS OPENING UP TO THE COLORFUL FRONT YARD; LARGE DINING ELCOVE OFF THE KITCHEN WITH OPEN CONCEPT PLAN; OFFICE DEN OR RUMPUS ROOM WITH FRENCH DOORS LEADING OUT THE THE WRAP AROUND BACK DECK; SPACIOUS ORIGINAL KITCHEN READY FOR A FRIENDLY TOUCH; NEWER DUAL PAIN WINDOWS THROUGHOUT; LOTS OF BUILT INS FOR STORAGE AND CHARACTER; FULL BATHROOM HAS WALL TO WALL TILE, NICE AND LIGHT AND BRIGHT; TASTEFULLY LANDSCAPED WITH FRUIT TREES IN THE BACK; ALMOST 9000 SQ FOOT LOT, ALTHOUGH A LOT HAS REMODELED AND IMPROVED OVER THE YEARS; THERE IS MORE ROOM FOR POTENTIAL WITH UNUSED BACKYARD. FAMOUS SIERRA MADRE WISTERIA ADDING TO THE UNIQUE AND SPECIAL TOUCH OF THIS VERY SPECIAL HOME; DON'T MISS THE OPPORTUNITY TO OWN A SLICE OF HEAVEN ON HIGHLAND AVE.

First time on the market since 1947! Calling all developers/investors, this 13, 468 square foot lot is 77 feet wide by 175 feet deep and is zoned R3. According to the City of Sierra Madre's Building Department guidelines - it appears 4 units can be built on this property with a maximum of 7, 927 square feet. You are highly advised to verify any development opportunities with the Sierra Madre's Building Department. There is currently a modest home of 1, 286 square feet on the lot with a 2-car garage. The home offers a spacious open living room to the dining area and offers views of the expansive back yard. It is located just a hop, skip and a jump to the quaint downtown village of Sierra Madre with eateries, boutique shopping, coffee shops, and is close to hiking in Sierra Madre Canyon, Eaton Canyon and Chantry Flats. Easy freeway access as the 210 Freeway is only half a mile away. Don't let this opportunity get away!
Great cul-de-sac location. Appliances, furnace, A/C newer. Home has not been on the market since 1980. Great bones, can become a great home with a little elbow grease.

This beautifully cared for light and bright Traditional Ranch home sits among mature trees and lush landscaping in the village community of Sierra Madre. The heart of the home has a gorgeously remodeled kitchen which features a center island with a prep sink, quartz counters, custom cabinetry, 6 burner Thermador cooktop, double ovens, huge side by side Sub-Zero refrigerator/Freezer, under counter microwave, architectural lighting fixtures and a buffet counter for dining or watching the chef prepare meals. Off the kitchen is a cozy breakfast nook and a large walk-in pantry. The adjacent family room with fireplace and wet bar opens to the well appointed kitchen. The family room offers wall to wall windows and French doors marrying the interior space to the outside covered patio, pool and garden. The Master Suite with fireplace has French doors leading to the pool area. Off the master bedroom are walls of closets leading to the remodeled master bath with spa tub and granite counters. Adjacent to this area is an office/exercise room. The three additional bedrooms and two remodeled baths, with marble counters offer plenty of room for family or visiting guests. Adding to the splendor of this lovely home are beautiful refinished wood floors, carpeted bedrooms, living room and dining room a utility room/walk-in linen closet and a laundry room with direct garage access.
