The resort-like environment of the back yard with a private patio area overlooking the pool, spa and re-imagined koi-pond has new outdoor lighting and a water conserving manufactured lawn among the lush landscaping. It is the perfect place to gather and unwind with family and friends. This outstanding property is a MUST SEE !

Perfect opportunity to live in one home while collecting income from the second home which can assist with the mortgage payments! Relax and enjoy the tranquil mountain view from the cozy front porch of this charming mid-century built in 1951. Kick off your shoes and cozy up to the fireplace in the spacious living room. The roof, windows and interior/exterior paint are new as of 2015. There are beautiful wood floors, an adjacent dining area off the living room and a charming and functional kitchen. The main house consists of 1, 202 sf, 3 bedrooms and a bath and is occupied by a tenant. One bedroom opens to a large deck on the back of the home. There is an attached, finished, 1-car garage with laundry. The attached permit shows the back house is permitted as a 'guest house - work shop' with 864 sf. It has 1 bedroom, 1 bath with views of and access to the back yard. The back house has been rented for years. It is currently rented for $1, 350 and has a long-term tenant. All utilities are included. The spacious back yard is perfect for family gatherings, kids to grow and explore and is completely fenced. Both units have central air and heat; the fridge, stove, microwave, washer & dryer in the front unit are included and the fridge and microwave in back unit are included.

UNIT A JUST LEASTED FOR $1200, so imagine the potential to create more equity aside from the increasing market prices! Chance to own a part of history in this unique enclave of Sierra Madre. Located next to Mary's Market in the Sierra Madre Canyon area where you're surrounded by nature. The 'Kozy Korner' as it is warmly referred to by everyone features a large unit around 750 sq ft where one could live and rent out the other units. There are a total of 5 units with 4 other units all leased out and updated with an estimated total building sq ft of 1, 800. The largest unit will be ready for immediate lease or move-in upon close of escrow. UNIT D IS THE LARGEST UNIT WITH A POSSIBLE RENT AROUND $1800/mo. The surrounding neighborhood offers a park-like atmosphere where one can enjoy all the outdoors have to offer and just minutes from trails. These units have always had lots of people trying to move in when there is a vacancy. Improvements to the Kozy Korner complex are as follows: New roof, plumbing work, electrical, remodeled units A B C & E, soundproofing, and sewer main replacement all at a cost of $120, 458.

This exquisite mid-century home has been completely remodeled and reimagined to perfection! Ideally located on a quiet street this sophisticated home is a short distance to the quaint downtown village of Sierra Madre and Memorial Park with a children's play area, BBQ area, an Amphitheater where summertime picnic concerts are held & tennis courts. A dramatic open-concept floorplan offers a spacious living room/dining area that seamlessly flows through to the gourmet kitchen. Meal prep is a breeze in the Chef's kitchen featuring a center island, comfy breakfast room, spacious pantry closet, stainless appliances, farm sink and Calcutta counters. A cozy brick fireplace provides character & warmth to a separate den/office ideal for those working from home. Adding to the splendor of this fashionable home, both bathrooms have also been stylishly remodeled. Off the living room & breakfast room a large covered patio is perfect as an outdoor living area for intimate family gatherings or entertaining on a grand scale. The generous lot offers room to add an Auxiliary Dwelling Unit (ADU) and still have room for the kids to play or to add a pool/spa! The newly finished 2-car, detached garage could be a great gym for the workout enthusiast or used as a second home-office. Features: new windows & doors, new flooring, new HVAC, new electric panel, new water heater and cooper plumbing and too much more to mention...

This Spanish Hacienda is located on a huge lot in a prime area of North Sierra Madre in a extremely private setting. Although it needs updating, this home has tremendous potential. The main house has 3, 838 sq ft and features 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, formal dining room, living room, great room, pool, spa, and three fireplaces. There are also 2 one bedroom, one bathroom guest houses, one is 803 sq.ft and the other is 595 sq.ft plus there is a 313 sqft workshop. This expansive property with 175 ft of frontage consists of two separate parcels. The front parcel for the main house and one guest house is 26, 933 sq.ft. The back parcel with the other guest house and work shop is 14, 841 sq.ft and can be sold separately and the city will issue a water meter. There is an easement in favor of the rear parcel to use the neighbors driveway for ingress and egress. The total square footage of the house and two guest houses is 5, 236. The total square footage for both lots is 41, 774. This is perfect opportunity for an extended family.

This charming 4 bedroom & 2 bathroom 1965 North Sierra Madre home is nicely located on a quaint cul-de-sac offering privacy for quiet living. Upon entering the home you are greeted with a formal living room with brick gas burning fireplace as the focal point of the room. The living room flows nicely into the dining room that looks out on the lush and serene exterior garden area. The kitchen has been updated with granite counter tops, gas burner cooktop and stainless steel dishwasher. The family room is spacious with sliding glass doors that lead out to the sunroom area perfect for an in home gym or children's play room. The sunroom is an additional 340 square feet making the total square feet of the home 2, 268. Outside of the sunroom is a spacious backyard with both patio and grass areas. You will also find the two car garage in the backyard. The bedrooms are found down a hallway off of the entry of the home. Three of the bedrooms share a full bathroom that includes a dual sink vanity with an abundance of storage. The master bedroom has a private three quarter bath that has been recently remodeled with porcelain tile, a dual vanity sink and a glass enclosed shower. The master is spacious and includes a walk in closet. This home is in close proximity to downtown Sierra Madre, local hiking trails and overall in a fantastic neighborhood.

Welcome to this charming Sierra Madre home nestled in the woods. The sound of water and views of nature will help you relax. The two-level home features eat-in kitchen, 2 bedrooms (one up and one down), first floor bedroom has a fireplace, living room upstairs with French doors that open to a large deck for entertaining, laundry room upstairs, and parking for 2 cars. Mary's Market is just down the street and there are great hiking trails nearby. This is truly a special get-away from hectic city life.

Nothing compares to the tranquility of living in the canyon. The peaceful feeling of being away from it all with the convenience of the city just a short drive away. Thats life nestled in the Sierra Madre foothills of the San Gabriel mountains. Tucked behind a blooming bougainvillea sits a 2-bedroom cottage with a living room with gleaming hardwood floors. The bright airy family room features french doors that lead you to a breathtaking deck. The spacious deck spans the length of the home creating an enchanting entertaining space amongst the treetops. Downstairs is a large two room basement waiting to become your studio or guest quarters. Atop the canyon where parking is a premium, the street to street lot features a long driveway with space for 3-cars plus a detached 2-car garage with access from the backyard. Sierra Madre, known as the Village of the Foothill is home to two top public schools, a charming downtown shopping and dining district, serene neighborhoods and lots of green space. This private hideaway is just a short walk to breakfast or lunch at the canyons favorite eatery, Mary's Market. Residents of Sierra Madre love their town for its neighborliness, top-notch city services, community events, and picturesque setting. If you are looking for a tight knit community in a beautiful neighborhood look no further than 595 Alta Vista Dr.

Built in 1908, this Dutch Colonial style home is referred to as the Coffey-Schwartz Residence. Sitting on a 17, 206 sq ft lot at the end of a cul de sac, this home is perfect for country living in the middle of the city. As you enter this home, you will be welcomed into an elegant house filled with wonderful character that feels like home. You will discover this wonderful 4 bedroom home has hardwood floors, a spacious kitchen and plenty of natural lighting. The large back yard is perfect for entertaining friends and family! Situated in a peaceful, quiet and desirable neighborhood in Sierra Madre! Seller is presently preparing the home for sale. The virtual tour will follow. A signed CAR Form PEAD-V is required from anyone who will be entering the property - Showings require 2 hour notice. Strict adherence to CAR guidelines as well as any local ordinance mandating the use of protective gear (e.g. masks, sanitizer, gloves) is also required.

Best buy in one of the best locations! This charming and inviting 2 bedroom + bonus room - 1 bath home has all the major upgrades already done! Such as a newer roof, copper plumbing, replaced main sewer line to street, double pane windows - and we believe there is real hardwood oak flooring under the carpets! Newer refrigerator and washer dryer units - fully fenced in rear yard - covered front porch for warm evenings & star gazing -convenient covered patio in the rear yard - large 2 car garage with beautiful brick paver driveway and view of the hillside mountains. Extra bonus room could be a small office/den or even a 3rd bedroom! Good size lot 6000 sq. ft. Superior walkability score - close to Sierra Vista Park, shops - restaurants, and the village! Create your own style with just a few upgrades to make this home your own! Priced to sell fast!

Welcome to this beautifully remodeled 1916 charmer for those wanting to get away from all the hustle and bustle of the city. A unique Dutch Door welcomes you into the living room dining room combination and a recently remodeled galley kitchen with top of the line appliances and fixtures next to the half bath on the first floor. Upstairs there is an open landing for relaxing, reading, writing or entertaining that separates the two bedrooms and a 3/4 bath with new tile and fixtures. Outside you will find plenty of spaces to meditate and relax in either the private back hillside view patio featuring terraced river rock seating or the front patio while you listen to the seasonal brook that leads to Mary's Market and Canyon Cafe. Wildlife abounds in the canyons where you will find complete privacy. Next to the brook there is an outside storage shed that could become a playhouse in the front yard along with plenty of room for private seating and entertaining.

Pleasantly tucked away at the base of the San Gabriel Mountains in Sierra Madre, this executive property is surrounded by nature and offers tranquil mountain and canyon views. This sumptuous estate built in 2002 offers a highly desirable one-level floorplan. Discover an inviting environment and open floorplan through the foyer which is open to the spacious living room with fireplace. The family room has a second fireplace and features clerestory windows that offer splendid views of the mountains and a sun-filled formal dining room. The well-appointed gourmet kitchen with island & walk-in pantry makes meal prep easy. The breakfast area will easily become your favorite room in the house as it offers the perfect spot to relax with a cup of tea and a good book while taking in the majestic mountain and canyon views. Relax in the grand master suite which features serene views of the back yard and mountains, large walk-in closet and a luxurious master bathroom. The 3 additional bedrooms are en-suite. The mountains wrap-around the verdant & secluded backyard offering the perfect setting for intimate nights with family or entertaining on a grand scale. It is sun-filled all day & features lemon, orange, fig and grapefruit trees. There is a laundry room & a direct-access 3-car garage. This estate is a short distance to the quaint village of Sierra Madre with eateries, boutique shopping, & is close to hiking trails in Sierra Madre Canyon, Eaton Canyon, Bailey Canyon and Chantry Flats

Charming single-story cottage features 3 bedrooms and 1 1/4 bath situated on a large lot Zoned R3 with expansion potential. This home was remodeled in 2007 and features a gas fireplace, wood floors, ceiling fans, large laundry room, recent exterior & interior paint and a new concrete patio. The kitchen includes custom cabinets, granite counter tops and custom back splash. This beautiful property a few blocks from historic downtown Sierra Madre filled with restaurants, entertainment and award winning public and private schools. Don't miss this unique opportunity!

Built in 1949, this mid-century modern gem is a MUST SEE! Located on a quiet cul-de-sac in charming Sierra Madre, 90 Monterey Lane consists of 1, 859 sf of living space on an 8, 865 sf lot. This gorgeous home consists of 3 bedrooms with solid wood flooring and beautiful built-in closets and drawers, 2 bathrooms with travertine stone finishes, a large living room with French door access to the backyard, dining room with built in shelves and designer pendant fixture, and an oversized kitchen with custom cabinets and new quartz countertops & new large format tile floors. There is an additional bonus room off the kitchen and another bonus room off the backyard. Plenty of windows and doors allow an abundance of natural light and an indoor-outdoor feel. Enter the backyard through various French doors to a backyard great for entertaining and enjoying the Southern California weather. The new paver stone patio with garden lights above is great for dining or lounging by the sparkling pool, or lay on the new grass in the side yard while enjoying a view of the mountains. Enjoy being blocks away from Sierra Vista Park, Sierra Madre Dog Park, and just moments away from Downtown Sierra Madre and Santa Anita Fashion Park.

Nestled at the foot of the mountains is this zen-like haven providing the perfect escape! For those who desire luxury, this property offers a cottage with bonus rooms, nature inspired bathrooms and extra space for canyon style living. Explore the tiered flagstone walkways, nature paths and a bamboo garden with a waterfall for quiet contemplation. Designed to retain the mountain miner's cabin aesthetic with modern updates for comfortable living, a covered alfresco creates a warm welcome to this one-of-a-kind home. On one side there's an upper bedroom looking out to the hills, a cozy bathroom with a slate rock shower, a renovated kitchen with modern appliances and dark wooden cabinetry, as well as a lower living area with antique touches throughout. The separate living area is light-filled with double doors that open to a private patio. This home features a 2 car garage equipped with a workbench, ample wooden shelves and a laundry area. An open air living area with a sun roof and screened in patio rests between the two structures, perfect for lounging. Wooden decks dotted throughout the terraced lot provide sweeping views over the surrounding landscape. This unique home enjoys an enviable location within the highly sought-after and often tightly-held Sierra Madre. This picturesque neighborhood is nestled between Pasadena and Arcadia, ensuring convenience while maintaining a relaxed and leafy suburban feel near nature.

Ideally sited on a corner lot this desirable mid-century modern home is perfectly situated to maximize the views. Relax on the front patio with a good book and enjoy the sunshine, the tranquil views and watch the deer stroll by... Discover an inviting environment through the foyer to the spacious living room boasting valley views, built-in shelving for displaying family treasures and a cozy fireplace. There is a spacious formal dining room offering a lovely view of the valley. The family room offers wall-to-wall windows and French doors marrying the interior space to the outside covered patio, pool and gardens. The family room is open to the well-appointed kitchen making meal-prep easy. The spacious master suite also flows out to the backyard/pool and has an adjoining luxurious bathroom. Two of the four bedrooms are south-facing and also offer serene valley views. The secluded backyard features views of the San Gabriel Mountains and is the perfect setting for intimate nights with family or entertaining on a grand scale. The exterior of the home was just painted and there is new drought-tolerant landscaping.

This is your opportunity to get a home in Sierra Madre at an affordable price! This is a fixer but can be lived in as-is. Tax assessor shows 2 bedrooms, 1 bath but there is a 3rd room with closet that may have been considered a den when built. This could be your 3rd bedroom, office, study, etc. Home has a large living room, galley kitchen with tile counters and a large sunken family room which has direct access to garage. Family room appears to be an addition and not part of the square footage on record. The family purchased this home in 1962 with it's current floor plan. Laundry area, deep sink and water softener in garage. Large back yard with Koi pond and Mountain Views. This is a trust sale with no court confirmation required. View Matterport 360 Virtual tour at:

First time on the market in 30 years!! This diamond in the rough wont last long!! This home in the beautiful area of Sierra Madre also known as The Village of the Foothills and is one of the best places to live in California. This 2 bd 1 bath home is approximately 976 square feet sitting on an impressive 7859 square foot lot. There is a 1 car tandem garage that opens to the front and back yards. This home has so much potential and will be great for a savvy investor or a family willing to give it a little TLC. Sierra Madre schools have a great reputation and are rated above average. This city is also known for its historic trails, fine dining, specialty shops, museums, parks and art galleries. On any given day residents will find something exciting going on in this town. This city is just about a half hour drive from Downtown Los Angeles.

GREAT OPPORTUNITY TO OWN A HOME IN SIERRA MADRE! Located in one of the San Gabriel Valley's most sought-after communities and faces north toward the gorgeous San Gabriel mountains. This property originated as a single-story, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, over 2000sqf with custom tile work and BIG LOT of over 8, 000sqf. The living area is open and spacious, including a large family room, dining room, sunroom, and large open-concept kitchen that with a grand island, quartz counters and stainless steel appliances. The windows have been newly upgraded, there is a newer roof, and that the property has forced heat and A/C. It is very close to the town's charming shops, restaurants, famous hiking trails, celebrated Sierra Madre Playhouse and is walking distance to highly rated schools within the Pasadena Unified School District.

Want to escape the city vibe? Look no farther than 415 Sturtevant Drive in the Sierra Madre Canyon just 20 miles from DTLA. It is a beautiful 1922 single family cottage just minutes to the Village of Sierra Madre, Mt. Wilson Trail or Mary's Cafe' in the canyon. This Craftsman style home has 2 bedrooms and one bath of approximately 827 square feet on a 4, 285 square foot lot with a one car garage and additional parking for two cars. There is a beautiful oak tree shading the walkway to the front patio and entrance. Upon entering you will find newly refinished 100 year old original wood flooring throughout the living room, dining room and both bedrooms. There is new tile in the kitchen and bathroom and fresh paint throughout. You can enjoy the outside patio, rock garden and there is storage under the house in the garage/wine cellar. This is a great retreat or permanent escape from the stress of city life where you can relax in the quaint canyons of Sierra Madre which still servers as an attraction to musicians, artist and writers. The area was once Carter's Camp with cabins built for those seeking a healthy retreat such as the Nature's Friends Retreat just short walk up the street.

This is your opportunity to purchase a traditional, single story Sierra Madre home from the original owners who have lovingly cared for it for 51 years. This home sits on a corner lot and has open concept design with 3 bedroom and 2 bathrooms. The double door entry leads you to a large family room with vaulted, beamed ceiling and opens to the kitchen with breakfast bar and has sliding doors to the well-manicured yard. The family room has plenty of room for entertaining and dining. There is a formal living room off the entry with a beautiful stone fireplace and a large picture window with shutters looking out to the front yard. The kitchen, which is open to the family room features a breakfast bar, dishwasher, gas cooktop with hood, double sinks and double wall ovens. There is also a laundry closet with hookups for a washer and gas dryer. Down the hall, you will find 2 good sized bedrooms and a common bathroom with a large vanity area and tub. The large Master Bedroom has ample closet space, a ceiling fan and sliding doors to the back yard. The Master Bathroom has a large vanity/make-up area and a walk-in Shower with glass wall and hand-held faucet. There is a large attached 2 car garage with automatic opener and easy access to French door in the kitchen. The comfortable, fenced back yard has a raised deck, concrete patio area with brick detailing and a nice grass section. See 360 Virtual Tour at

First owners and first time on the market since 1978. The property was remodeled over the years and features new kitchen cabinets and appliances, granite counters and modern lighting. There is an enclosed patio leading to the staircase to the back yard with several fruit trees and an entertainment area for family and friends. Converted garage with a kitchenette, has a separate side entry, a full bath, suitable for college grads or parents quarters. Basement storage room or home office. Steps away from downtown Sierra Madre shops, banks and restaurants.

This Special, Turnkey and Stylish Home has much more than meets the eye. The Single level custom build, boasts an open floor plan with abundance of living space with four bedrooms, three and a half bathrooms, separate living/gathering areas, and a gourmet kitchen with quartz counters, large Central Island, custom cabinets, and high quality appliances. This home has a lovely master suite with spa like master bath and walk in closet, second bedroom with en-suite, as well as 2 additional bedrooms with shared bathroom. The backyard provides you with privacy for relaxation and a generous patio for outdoor living /dining. The large front yard and covered porch offer countless opportunities for fun visits with friends and neighbors, front row seats to the famous Sierra Madre 4th of July parade and Mountain views. This beautiful home is nestled in the very charming and welcoming Community of Sierra Madre, within walking to distance to our quaint village and all its restaurants, parks and entertainment.

Beautiful custom built tri-level unit facing the mountains. Only 8 units in complex Brick decor with English features. Front door opens to living room, formal dining , kitchen with all newer appliances, den that could be 3rd br and full bath. 2nd floor has 2 bedroom suites, master has fireplace, walk-in closet, large 3/4 bath. and patio. Lower level coming in from the garage is approx 600 sf (not included in the square ftg.) and could be the 4th bedroom, large rec rm or family rm. 3 private patios. Loads of storage thru out. Walk to downtown restaurants, SM Playhouse, park or just a fun walk. A must see and u will sell.
full_street_line: 500 W Sierra Madre Blvd Apt B

text: A Perfectly Pleasant Place~ Charming and romantic hideaway, this mid-century cottage sits in a woodsy setting of Sierra Madre near the Mt. Wilson trailhead. It feels like an artist's retreat in the mountains with bucolic private grounds, secret garden areas, and birdsong. Unique features include; windows adorned with richly colored stained glass, a stone rock fireplace, exposed wood beamed ceilings, hardwood flooring, a fun and swanky kitchen with original cabinetry and a dining area with knotty pine paneling. A dramatic and oversized bonus area where the garage used to be is lined with windows, parquet wood floors and vaulted ceilings with wood rafters. It's prepped and ready for new designer ideas and finishings ( space is not included in the square footage count). The perfect starter home for the creative architectural and home renovation enthusiast. Design ahead of its time as there are endless opportunities to develop its potential. This home was lovingly cherished by the previous owner for over 40 years. Such a great find, it's that home that you will never sell!

In the quaint village of Sierra Madre you'll discover this comfortable traditional style home that has not been on the market since 1990. You'll appreciate the convenient location close to downtown Sierra Madre as well as being a short distance to Sierra Madre Elementary School. Located at the base of the San Gabriel mountains, hiking trails are just a short distance away. This diamond in the rough provides the perfect opportunity to personalize the home with your own selective touches! The spacious living room and dining area boasts a custom-built fireplace and lots of windows allowing an abundance of natural light to fill the room. A family room in the back of the home offers access to the backyard, boasting six varieties of mature fruit trees. A spacious kitchen features a cozy breakfast area perfect for casual dining. There is a large detached multi-purpose shed currently used as the seller's office and gym. There is also a second shed for ample storage. As of the date of this listing, Sierra Madre Elementary has received a high rating on GreatSchools.org as well as CaSchoolDashBoard.org.

Forget about life in the fast lane and slip into something more comfortable. Cocooned in the curve of a lushly wooded cul-de-sac at the base of the Sierra Madre foothills, sits a premier oasis for body and soul. A Zen-like calm suffuses throughout with earthen textures, simple shapes and green views that give a sense of quiet. The vision is contemporary and sophisticated with a newly painted interior that is both enveloping and open to nature. The landscaping has been given a facelift to allow the naturalistic beauty of the gardens to be enjoyed from inside or out. The kitchen and baths have been updated with a modernist vibe. Bamboo floors grace the living room and main bedroom while the other two bedrooms sport new carpet. The two car garage is attached. Walking distance to "Mary's Market" in the lower canyon for coffee and breakfast or a delicious sandwich. Sierra Madre offers a sense of place, peace and belonging in the bewildering patchwork that is Greater L.A.

Welcome home to stunning Mid-Century Modern style in beautiful west Sierra Madre! This bright and spacious home boasts a wonderful floorplan and is full of possibilities. To the left of the entry foyer sits a chic living room with a statement fireplace. The space is open to the dining room and filled with vibrant, natural light thanks to the oversized windows looking out to the west and the north. Beyond the dining room, find the galley kitchen with plenty of storage space and ample room to whip up delicious meals with ease. You'll be delighted to find a cheerful breakfast nook looks out to the beautiful backyard and opens to the back patio. A pass-through counter connects the kitchen to the family room, which includes a second fireplace. In true Mid-Century style, a huge sliding glass door provides the perfect indoor-outdoor flow and a wonderful view of the backyard. To the right of the entry foyer find a hallway find the bedroom quarters. Two bright, good-sized bedrooms and a bathroom sit at the front of the home, while the master en suite is conveniently tucked to the rear. From the master, you enjoy access to the backyard via a sliding glass door and you're also treated to a stunning mountain view. The backyard is private and peaceful, offering plenty of room for pets, gardening, and playing. A detached two car garage completes this lovely home. With great bones and a great neighborhood to match, wonderful possibilities abound 430 N Michillinda Avenue!

Move right in to this Sierra Madre townhome in a convenient location close to shopping, dining and transportation. Offering 2 bedrooms + 1.5 baths, you can't beat this price and these amenities! Tile flooring downstairs, granite counters, large private, gated patio plus a balcony terrace off of the dining area give you lots of space to enjoy the outdoors! There's also central HVAC, two parking spots, one covered, extra storage, and an association pool, spa, and community room.

This mid-century traditional has been professionally updated in the past three years and offers an open-concept kitchen/family/dining room, gracious living room with fireplace, and remodeled baths serving the primary suite as well as the other two bedrooms. Updated laundry/mud room adjacent to attached garage. Newer hardwood floors, carpeting, dual pane windows, interior and garage doors, tankless water heater, roof, concrete driveway, and delightful front yard landscaping. This is a wonderful home in the ever popular village community of Sierra Madre.

Back on market, buyer did not perform. Charming cabin-like home in the popular city of Sierra Madre. Knotty wood paneling along with hardwood floors, create a warm and inviting space. A very spacious living room with fireplace and sliding glass doors to the outdoor patio and beautiful gardens. An open floor plan as living room is open to the kitchen with movable island. The kitchen is open to another living area with beautiful stained glass window and views and access to the garden. Two bedrooms with hardwood floors and full bath off the hallway. Four steps down to the en-suite third bedroom with walk-in closet and 3/4 bath. The gardens in front and back are beautiful and so loved by the owner. Charming children's playhouse in the back yard serves as a gardening shed. Recently painted interior and some exterior. Sierra Madre is known for its small town charm. Many very good restaurants and retail stores in the downtown area.

Tucked away in the San Gabriel Mountains is this delightful Sierra Madre Canyon Cottage. Delight in quiet mornings or relaxing evenings while enjoying the lovely valley view from the large deck. The living room/dining area have walls of French windows allowing an abundance of natural light to fill the rooms. Just off the kitchen, is the perfect area for a home office-work space. Located downstairs is one bedroom and one bathroom which lends well as a cozy and private master retreat. The charming, fenced backyard is private, welcoming and offers river rock accent walls, stone patio, large corner deck and plenty of room for children or pets to romp. The home has had extensive earthquake retrofitting by the prior owner. Property upgrades that are newer: Trex deck & railing, exterior paint, insulation in attic, double-paned windows, copper plumbing, gutters and fascia at roof line, new Limoges porcelain hardware throughout and new baseboards and moldings. Just a short distance away is Mary's Market, a quaint Canyon Market-Restaurant that is reminiscent of days gone. Don't miss this delightful property!

Charming and comfortable, post and beam home is surrounded by lush landscaping and privacy! Entry with a double-door closet leads you into the Living Room and Dining Area which has a vaulted, beamed ceiling, numerous windows decorated with plantation shutters, fireplace, and a sliding glass door that exits to a private covered patio with a peek-a-boo view of the mountains. Kitchen features built-in stainless appliances - refrigerator, 4-burner gas range, microwave, and dishwasher. There's also a garden window above the Kitchen sink and a large pantry. Adjacent to the Kitchen is the Family Room with a built-in bookcase, laundry closet, and an exit door to the side yard. Nearby are 2 bedrooms, a 3/4 bathroom, and a hallway that leads you to the Master Suite with a large walk-in closet, full bathroom, window seat, and an exit door to another private patio area with plants and an oversized spa. Schools, shopping, and transportation are easy to get to. Sierra Madre is known for its 4th of July parade, Mt. Wilson race, and walking trails. Sierra Madre is a quaint town that's very appealing to many people!

Romantic Canyon Character home loaded with fine architectural details throughout. Great parking area in front of the home. Idyllic river walk walls and pavers lead up to this magical 2 bed 2 bath property. Living room with two sets of french doors and a Franklin wood burning fireplace. The kitchen includes a new gas range, new refrigerator and washer and dryer. The 2nd bedroom is on the upper level is a light filled setting with treetop views. The En-suite has french doors style windows and a remolded 3/4 bath. The entire infrastructure of the home has been upgraded. Seeking something unique in the Canyon along a very private street....look no further. More pictures to be uploaded soon

Wonderful end unit town home in a highly desired complex with beautiful grounds in Sierra Madre. This unit is set back from the street and offers the utmost in privacy. It is only one unit away from guest parking and the inviting pool, spa and barbecue area. The lower level features wood floors, a living room with fireplace, guest bath, an updated kitchen with garden window and a dining area. The second level has two spacious bedrooms, each with its own bath and private balcony. In addition, there is a loft that is ideal for an office or small den. Additional amenities include newer carpeting, vaulted ceilings, central heating and air conditioning and a central vacuum system. The two car attached garage has direct access into the kitchen, laundry hook-ups and ample storage space. Conveniently located near restaurants, parks, shopping, hiking trails and transit.

Unique and Rare Multifamily Home in Sierra Madre! Listed for the first time in over 40 years, this highly desirable triplex is an ideal blend of investment potential and living possibilities. Pride of ownership is evident in each unit with exceptionally neat landscaping and meticulously maintained interiors. Driving up to the property, you immediately notice natural exterior paint tones, a brick paver driveway, and two distinct structures consisting of one duplex and one single-family unit. Perfect for on-the-go individuals, each 2BR/1BA unit in the duplex features a 1-car garage, modern conveniences, and daily comforts. Entering, you find honey-hued hardwood floors, neutral colors, and a large living and dining space. Each kitchen features ample cabinetry, gas range, and granite countertops. Both bedrooms are generously sized and share a full bathroom! The 3BR/2BA single-family home is located further back behind a gate. Explore to find an open floor plan, a living room w/fireplace, and a dining area w/herringbone patterned hardwood floors and French doors to an amazing patio and a detached 2-car garage. Remodeled for convenience, the eat-in kitchen has gorgeous wood cabinetry, gas range, built-in microwave, and granite countertops. The spacious master bedroom includes an en suite. Other features: laundry hookups in each unit, central A/C & heat, and more! With tons of potential for positive cash flow and monthly residuals, this triplex will not last. Schedule a tour today!

Gracious home like condo that is one level, 2271 square feet in a 10 unit complex. One of the largest condominium units in Sierra Madre! Large entry opens to generous sized living room and formal dining room with an open concept family room. This unit offers 3 oversized bedrooms and 3 full baths. Direct access to a large 2 car garage. All brand new paint throughout the unit along with brand new appliances. Entire complex newly painted and re-landscaped. This property is a must see and will not last long!
full_street_line: 555 W Sierra Madre Blvd Unit C

text: Wonderful family home located in the most desired area, Sierra Madre. Expansive 5 bedrooms with 3 baths.  One bedroom and bath is located on the ground floor for "Grandma or Grandpa". Owner has lived there over 50 yrs. raising a family of 8.  Large lot with views of the mountains on a quiet cul de sac street. Family and friends have enjoyed the pool, koi pond and workshop.  Two patios for Summer evening entertainment. Two fireplaces, one in the formal living room and one in the dining room.  Den/family room for movie night and an office upstairs. Master bedroom is oversized with its own patio for morning coffee or curling up with a good book This home has it all, complete with many happy memories over the years.

Sierra Madre lifestyle living. This enchanting 2 bed, 2 bath townhome located just two short blocks from the quaint restaurants and shops in the area, is waiting only for its next owner to enjoy for many years to come. As you enter you are greeted by the inviting living room with its cozy fireplace. The remodeled kitchen offers sparkling granite countertops, custom cabinets, and an ample dining area which opens into a private outdoor patio perfect for entertaining family and friends alike. The en-suite primary bedroom, with its own private balcony, is a peaceful retreat from life's everyday hustle and bustle. A spacious in-unit laundry room, attached two-car garage, shimmering pool and spa, park-like grounds, BBQ area, and close proximity to many hiking trails make this a property that will be coveted by many.
full_street_line: 299 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit D

text: Yes!!! A townhouse within walking distance of Sierra Madre Village could be yours! This crisp clean home with high ceilings and a spacious floor plan offers balcony access and plenty of natural light. Recently painted throughout, you can easily move right in and enjoy. A split level with TWO separate bedroom areas makes privacy easy, and each has it's own bathroom. One bedroom has a quaint patio all to itself. Wood laminate flooring throughout offers easy upkeep. In the attached garage, you'll find the laundry hookups and plenty of storage. There is also a community pool area with mountain views.
full_street_line: 137 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit D

text: This storybook 3bed/2bath home has served its family for over 50 glorious years and ready for your happily ever after! Modern upgrades for this charmer include: new roof, solar panels, new AC and furnace with built in UV air purifiers, recessed lights, updated kitchen and bath, heated pool for entertaining all year long! Once you pull into the expansive driveway, the inviting porch begs you to pause, enjoy the fresh air and watch for the bees and hummingbirds in the beautifully landscaped front yard. Enter into a warm formal living room with fireplace, dining room with farmhouse chandelier and the (permitted) enclosed patio is just what's needed for a home office and perfect nook for children's play area. The kitchen is spacious for a breakfast nook, custom cabinetry, countertops, plenty of pantry space for every kitchen gadget you might have and a dedicated laundry room with more storage! Natural light pours through the open floor plan and warms every corner of the house through wide sliding doors from the Mountain View backdrop in the backyard. This is the quintessential neighborhood to celebrate life where children are free to run and play in this quiet suburban paradise and your neighbor is your best friend. Welcome home!

Single story pool home in the heart of Sierra Madre with beautiful views of the San Gabriel Mountains! This home has gradually been upgraded/updated since 2013. Some noteworthy upgrades from 2013 include a new dual zone furnace & AC, whole house fan, tankless water heater, newer copper plumbing throughout the whole house, new landscaping & landscape drip system. In 2014 a new roof was installed, along with a new garage, a new tiled bathroom/shower and more! A seamless addition took place a few years ago adding a 4th bedroom & 3rd bathroom. There is a master bedroom en-suite, as well as home office/homeschooling area, children's bedroom and guest bedroom en-suite. The kitchen comes complete with Fisher & Paykel double-oven, new over the range microwave, vent, pantry and more! There are newer dual pane windows throughout the majority of the home, along with a 3-panel dual pane slider which leads to the patio & pool area. Two outdoor decks, plus plenty of custom storage. Close proximity to downtown Sierra Madre, schools, the local YMCA, 2-baseball fields, tennis courts and a dog park!

This classic Craftsman cottage presents the perfect opportunity to realize a dream. Let your imagination take shape and breathe fresh life into this old time charmer. Strong possibilities exist both inside and out for a recast of character. Sit on the quaint front porch and take in the stunning views of the San Gabriel Mountains or spend hours tending the many fruit trees in the rear garden. Walk to the village for coffee or a meal in one of Sierra Madre's outstanding restaurants. Explore options for an ADU??? Home is the beginning of all journeys and this one is just waiting for a new traveler.

Seller is motivated! Write an offer! Enjoy beautiful sunrises and panoramic views from this charming Sierra Madre canyon home. Make breakfast on the commercial grade stove with industrial range hood in the spacious kitchen, and have dinner alfresco outside on your wooded private patio. The pine paneling and stained glass windows, the arts and crafts style tile, complement the many updates and upgrades like central AC, and heat and recent exterior paint and replacement of exterior doors and hardware. If you want to get away from it all everyday come and tour this artists retreat.

Located on a peaceful street in North Sierra Madre, just a few blocks from Mater Dolorosa retreat center, this lovely Traditional has been home to the same family for nearly 2 decades and it exudes the charm of the small-town of Sierra Madre, a true community that many liken to ''Mayberry''. It is just a few blocks from the highly desired Sierra Madre Elementary School, and the fun downtown - a ''hang-out'' destination including restaurants and charming small-town retailers as well as many parks too, making it the perfect place to enjoy the outdoor activities like the famed yearly Wistaria festival.The home was built in an era when redwood siding, arches, and glass door knobs were the norm. Original phone nook, hardwood floors, bay windows, and a large window seat are just part of the charm of living here at the ''gateway to the foothills.'' There is a large and bright living room, two good sized bedrooms, and a particularly large bathroom for a house of this age. Best of all, for those who long to make this house their own, the bathroom and kitchen are ready and waiting for their personal stamp.Central heating and air about 4 yrs old and newer water heater.A large deck in the private delightful back yard, shaded by a majestic tree, and a drought-tolerant front yard professionally landscaped with fruit trees and beds to grow your own veggies add to the enjoyment of calling Sierra Madre home.

Stunning Spanish Monterey nestled in highly coveted Sierra Madre and located in the highly acclaimed Sierra Madre Elementary School area. This masterly estate resides on a stately .34 acre lot and features four bedrooms and three bathrooms. A beautiful entrance leads you into the grand living room bathed in an abundance of natural light. Gourmet and updated kitchen offering high end stainless steel appliances, gorgeous cabinetry, eat in area, wet bar and extra built-in freezer drawers. The kitchen is open to the cozy family room that offers a fireplace and Saltillo tile flooring. A formal dining room sits adjacent to the kitchen. Downstairs also features a full bathroom and a perfect work from home office space. Upstairs is the Master suite which epitomizes the perfect retreat with a fireplace, spa-like bathroom with soaking tub, separate shower and dual sinks as well as a massive dressing closet. Upstairs also features three additional bedrooms and one full bathroom as well as a screening room with built-in screen and projector that tucks away into the ceiling, perfect for family entertainment. Venture out to the tranquil backyard to enjoy the patio with built-in Viking BBQ, plenty of room for Al-fresco dining and seating for family and friends. The lush backyard also features a peaceful waterfall. Two-car attached garage, radiant heating for the downstairs, dual AC units and a bonus detached structure round out this spectacular home.

Located in the Arcadia School District! Quiet surroundings and a comfortable lifestyle welcomes you to this lovely Ranch style home that has not been on the market since 1970. This provides the perfect opportunity to personalize the home with your selective touches! A cozy front porch beckons you to sit, relax and enjoy the mountain and valley views as well as the view of the lovely drought-tolerant landscaped front yard. The spacious living room and dining area boasts walls of floor-to-ceiling glass marrying the interior space to the outside patio and backyard. Both the living room and dining area offer built-in hutches to display family treasures and offer extra storage. The kitchen features a cozy breakfast area perfect for casual dining. Convenient direct access to the 2-car garage is off the kitchen and laundry area. Two of the three bedrooms are ensuite. The back patio is perfect for entertaining friends and family or intimate al-fresco dining. Mature landscaping in the spacious backyard provides privacy and is perfect place for active children or the gardener in the family. New CA & high-efficiency heat installed less than a year ago. Don't wait as this charmer is sure not to last!

Beautiful updated home in the desirable town of Sierra Madre. The house with south facing entry has been renewed in every single room! To begin with, granite counter tops in kitchen and all 3 bathrooms. Crisp white cabinetry and new stainless steel refrigerator, double oven and dishwasher. Open concept in kitchen and family room with breakfast bar. Osmosis faucet in kitchen sink with water softening system throughout the home. Wood burning or gas fireplace. New recessed lighting in common areas and bathrooms. Two electric turban fans in attic for cooling. Ring security system installed. This is prime real estate close to walking trails and quaint village atmosphere. Great school district with Mandarin taught at Fields Elementary. The garage has epoxy shield, with an extra covered parking space behind it.

Truly turnkey stylish townhouse upgraded and spacious. Small gated well maintained complex 2 blocks from the heart of Sierra Madre Village. Stroll over to shops, restaurants, theatre, parks, hiking trails in this sought after award winning safe and quaint town. Living room features focal fireplace, recessed lighting, glass sliders to generous sized patio extending your entertaining area. Wood like laminate floors throughout entry, living room, dining room and kitchen. Newer contemporary grey carpeting upstairs. Expansive kitchen with abundance of cabinetry, 18 bottle wine fridge, open pass through to cantilevered dining room. Convenient powder room downstairs. 2 master suites, hallway and master bath with skylights streaming natural light. Attached 2 car garage with direct access to townhouse. Recent upgrades: paint, carpeting, dishwasher, new front door and hardware, garbage disposal. 2016: new roof 2010-2014: New copper plumbing, doublel pane windows, new central air and heat, water heater. Complex has pool and cabana.
full_street_line: 125 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit E

text: SIERRA MADRE SAFE HAVEN Tucked at the foot of the San Gabriel Mountains in a private enclave of four newer (2008) homes, this Contemporary Craftsman style residence gives opportunity for safe haven. Thoughtfully upgraded and lovingly maintained by the original owners, it presents as an oasis where the comfort keeps coming. The floor plan flows seamlessly from living room to dining room, kitchen, breakfast area and family room. Custom cabinetry enhances the dining room and family room. In addition to the second floor master bedroom and bath, there are three en-suite bedrooms which afford many options: bedroom, home office, gym, library/study, etc. The enclosed patio and garden with its stunning, drought-resistant plantings envelop the visitor in a cocoon of peace. There are several areas to entertain or simply sit in silence and absorb the calm. Walk to the charming village of Sierra Madre for a coffee or meal. Roam the many hiking trails that are just a stone's throw away. As many yearn for community and space and rethink the suburbs, this home covers all of the bases.

Privacy abounds! You're sure to admire this lovely estate on nearly half an acre surrounded by lush landscaping. Kick your shoes off & relax near the fireplace in the living room while enjoying the manicured garden views. The spacious dining room features a wall-of-windows marrying the interior space with the outside gardens. A comfortable family room with fireplace offers built-in shelving to display family treasures. Ahhhh the kitchen, a true chef's dream! Meal prep is a breeze in this well-appointed kitchen with large center island, huge side-by-side built-in refrigerator-freezer, cozy breakfast area, separate food prep area and a butler's pantry/bar area. One of the 5 bedrooms is located on the north end of the home with an adjoining bath. The master suite offers a luxurious master bathroom, his & hers walk-in closets and has access to a gorgeous backyard. The huge lot offers plenty of distance from your neighbors and is dotted with endless fruit trees and has a serene spot to rest a spell and gaze into the pond. All summer barbecues and pool parties are sure to be at your house in the verdant and secluded backyard with refreshing pool, rejuvenating spa, an outdoor kitchen area and trellis covered patio. Truly chic California living at it's best!

great income property with Two house and two parcels on 181 & 185 Alegria that located in the center location of the most desirable street in Sierra Madre. 1) 181 - Main house: has completed renovated with all new material such as new AC; new kitchen with marble countertop; new wood floor; new windows; fresh paint entirely etc.. additional large size of renovated basement with bedrooms downstairs. 2) 185 Two large one bed room unit that has a good size of 1 bedroom SUITE which all completed renovation inside and out. must come to see the nice and great neighborhood area. good rental income area. HUGE lot size - sqft 21319 good for future use. Fully occupied with high income.

A striking, updated home located in the highly acclaimed Sierra Madre Elementary School area. Unfolding behind the front door is a sweeping floorplan featuring a beautiful kitchen/family room combination that creates an ambiance you don't want to leave. Formal living and dining rooms connect with a see through wood-burning fireplace plus 4 bedrooms and 2 baths in their own wing of the home. Incredible mountain views from the elevated back yard grass area as well as views of the valley lights below from the living room and private patio garden just off the living room French doors. The large master bedroom suite features walk-in closet, with its own stack clothes washer/dryer, and a new master bathroom with oversized soaking tub, tile shower and double sinks. There are three additional bedrooms and another remodeled bathroom featuring a barn style door that separates the shower area from the double sinks. As you walk into the kitchen, your eye is carried immediately over the spaciousness of the kitchen to the incredible breadth of the family room that features vaulted ceilings, expanses of paned windows, and the French doors accessing the well-designed back yard. The back yard features a lovely patio, perfect for intimate gatherings and barbeques, and a raised grass area, all with stunning mountain views. Additional features of this home include a private office room located off the living room, 2 ccar garage, two central air conditioning systems and new dual glazed windows!

Mid-century modern on a 19, 599 square foot lot in the upper canyon neighborhood. This two bedroom, one bathroom home features a living room appointed with a brick fireplace, wood beamed ceilings in the main living areas, hardwood floors and a kitchen with ample cabinetry. The dining room has a sliding glass door that leads to an expansive deck with peek-a-boo city light views. The yard is canopied by majestic oak trees. Other amenities include newer plumbing, roof, updated electrical, new light fixtures, freshly painted interior and a single car garage.

Stunning 1961 Bauhaus-inspired Pool Homedesigned by Karl Heinz Wiebach, this 3 bed mid-century modern was renovated to its 1960s glamour in 2015. Entering through private courtyard room, you discover a lush sanctuary framed by floor-to-ceiling windows. Open floor plan greets you, with hardwood floors, tongue and groove ceiling, and fireplace; a perfect canvas for your personal design touches. The master has an en suite marble floor bathroom, with quartz double vanity, Toto faucets, and toilet. From the master, the private pool invites a refreshing plunge.Kitchen features quartz countertops, custom cabinets, and stainless steel appliances. Two additional bedrooms, and bath with generous walk-in shower. Equipped with green features, Jeldwen sliders and windows, and raised vegetable garden. Low maintenance xeriscaping in front/side yards, kid-friendly grass in courtyard and back. Well-regarded Elementary school district, hiking trails nearby, and proximate to town amenities.

Ideally located, adjacent to downtown, this delightful 1787 square foot Sierra Madre town home, is beautifully appointed. Wood beamed the light filled living room centers round a striking stone fireplace adjoining an open dining area with garden patio views. Marvelous, modern kitchen with Maple cabinetry, self closing drawers, Quartz counter-tops, glass tile back-splash, stainless appliances, built-in pantries & under-cabinet lighting. A sunny window overlooks a wood buffet in the adjacent casual eating space. Upstairs the bedroom's are open & airy with vaulted ceilings including an impressive master-suite with over-sized dressing area, veranda like balcony & fabulous mountain vistas. Each bath has been meticulously upgraded with granite counter-tops, custom vanities, fixtures & master with Jacuzzi tub. Additional amenities: Custom laminate flooring, plantation shutters, central air & heat, stairway & bathroom skylights, laundry room with rinsing sink, double attached direct access garage, automatic gated complex. So whether relaxing on the roomy private patio, taking in the mountain views or just enjoying this exceptional town home with restaurants, playhouse & local market nearby ...All this can be yours in the quaint community of Sierra Madre!!

First time on the market for this Custom Built home in prestigious Sierra Madre. The home consists of 3 Bedrooms and 4 Baths totaling 4, 217 Square Feet of living space situated on a meticulously landscaped 20, 506 Square Foot lot. Complete, with Pool, Jacuzzi and Koi Pond, this Spanish Style Villa is awaiting you. Built in 1996 with an eye for entertaining this property will be sure to captivate your senses. The interior boasts a bright and airy Spanish Garden design featured around a garden Atrium in the middle of the home. A large master bedroom and master bathroom is equipped with large walk in closets, main shower and steam shower and delightful vanity counter space. Master bath also features a bidet wash. The guest bedrooms each feature their own bathrooms and view the front of the property. All bedrooms and offices are carpeted and Spanish Tile floors the remainder of the open home. The Custom kitchen with built-in appliances boasts its own fireplace. Entertainers Dream

Mature trees canopy desirable East Mira Monte Avenue where this lovely, updated mid-century home is located. For the nature lovers, the Mount Wilson Trailhead is just down the street! Much of this 2, 041 sf home has been updated or improved within the past 5 years. Since 2015 the home was enlarged by adding a new kitchen combo dining area/den as well as adding a fourth bedroom, a half bath and finishing the 210 sf basement which offers a multitude of purposes: gym, home office, storage, etc. Basement square footage is NOT included in the 2, 041 of the home. Meal prep is easy in this well-appointed kitchen with center island and stainless-steel appliances. The open-concept kitchen, dining area and den all feature tranquil treetop and valley views. Recent upgrades include: heat pump, recessed lighting, cooper & ABS plumbing, refinished wood flooring, interior & exterior paint, roof, updated electrical, new electric water heater, and dual-pane windows in some rooms. There is a detached, over-sized garage with ample driveway turn-about area and a separate large storage room under the house. As an added bonus, for the 'new normal' work from home clients there is a newly built, stand-alone 120 sf studio/office with electricity, ethernet and heat & air. The beautiful front & back yards feature drought tolerant landscaping and three rain barrels for storing rainwater for future use. The spacious back yard offers room for a pool and includes mandarin, 2 avocado, lemon and orange trees.

For the first time on the market after 50 years, Welcome to this adorable home nestled on a sprawling 11, 140 SQ FT of flat lot against the glorious backdrop of San Gabriel Mountains. The house was built in 1910 when it was only surrounded by acres of Orange Grove in the quaint city of Sierra Madre. The charming cottage offers 1376 SQ FT of living space including an airy and bright living room, a den/office that can be used as a third bedroom, the spacious kitchen with plenty of cabinets and stainless steel appliances and a bathroom on the first floor. There's also the dining room with wood panel ceiling next to the kitchen adorned with a handsome fireplace and surrounding windows all around which make it a perfect spot for your entertainment. The second floor offers two bedrooms. There is also the landscaped backyard with a covered patio that awaits your al fresco dining. The house has been remodeled throughout years including Redwood sidings, Copper plumbing, upgraded electrical, newer water heater, dual pane windows, wall insulations and enhanced foundation and newer gutters. This is the dream property that you have been waiting for!
agent: Shida Y. Adams, Broker Associate with Compass

text: Lovely home in quaint Sierra Madre will capture your heart with its prime location and peaceful, breezy character. Enjoy the open living/dining area with cozy fireplace, skylight, & bay window that looks out over the garden and San Gabriel mountains. Feel the warmth of the classic knotty pine kitchen with its light, breezy dining nook and unique display shelves. The romantic bedroom hosts rich mahogany walls, a candle-lit fireplace, large windows and room to exercise, work at home, or curl up on a couch. The master bath has generous counter space with oak cabinets, tile shower, and space for a cozy chair for some secret solitude. The 2nd bedroom features bright corner windows, wood accents, double closet, and built-in cupboards & drawers. An adjacent bath offers a traditional tub/shower, linen cabinet and large bonus closet. Other features: new carpet throughout; a remote 'whole house' fan that quickly draws cool evening air inside, abundant storage, and a garage with large work bench for projects, including extra overhead lighting & rafter storage. Enjoy a bonus shed for bikes and gear as well as a perfect spot to plant your veggie garden in the back yard. This Sierra Madre treasure is walking distance to eateries, boutique shopping, Starbucks, and close to hiking in Sierra Madre Canyon, Eaton Canyon and Chantry Flats.

Nestled away in the Sierra Madre hills resides a charming home with 1-bedroom and 1 bathroom. This home sits on a spacious corner lot offering a nicely landscaped exterior with lots of greenery and privacy. The interior of the home features wood flooring, lots of windows that illuminate the space with natural light, as well as plenty of storage space! The cozy kitchen has sleek countertops and stainless-steel appliances, along with a door that leads you out to the side patio. The side patio also includes the laundry area. This is perfect for an investment property or even for a first-time home buyer! Close to Hastings Ranch which is the place to be for Christmas Lights, hiking trails, schools, and parks! Less than 5 miles away from Vons, In-N-Out Burger and Starbucks.

Welcome to this beautiful Craftsman style home set against the majestic San Gabriel Mountains in the highly sought after community of Sierra Madre. Attention to detail is present throughout this quality built home, with recent decorator perfect upgrades, as well as energy saving additions. Features include a grand entry with a step-down living room, with a custom stone fireplace; a dining room with French doors, wainscoting and designer wallpaper. The state of the art kitchen is open to the family room with custom built-ins. A charming screened-in porch, off the kitchen and family room, leads to the outdoor entertainer's delight.  There are three well appointed bedrooms off the grand upstairs landing with built-ins. The cozy master suite, with vaulted ceilings, has a fireplace and a large luxurious bathroom.  The additional bedrooms, with custom built-ins, share a full bathroom. One bedroom features a large outdoor balcony for enjoying beautiful sunsets and mountain views. The private backyard paradise includes a state of the art spool, with dramatic waterfall and light features, and a gas fire pit. The chef's delight outdoor kitchen features a built-in island, equipped with a barbecue and a gas /wood fire pizza oven, as well as a sink, beverage refrigerator, and ample bar top dining area. The cozy pool house, (approx 360 Sq Ft per REST), includes a living area with built-in cabinets, a bathroom and laundry room. Truly a turn key home within the charming city of Sierra Madre.

Imagine your dream home, full of light, plenty of space for little feet or paws to run, & a natural ease that invites daily laughter & joy. That dream is a reality at 694 W Highland Ave! Resting on a peaceful street lined with majestic pines, this updated traditional is the perfect place to call home. Left of the entry, step into the bright, spacious living room with picture frame windows offering inspiring views of the San Gabriel mountains. In the evening, the whole family can curl up near the handsome wood-burning fireplace. Next, find the dining area with a second fireplace that adds comfort & elegance. The open dining area flows easily to the gourmet kitchen which boasts gorgeous wood cabinetry, gleaming stainless-steel appliances, & seemingly endless counter space. Transition easily from the whimsical sunroom to gorgeous backyard, where you can enjoy an after-dinner glass of wine under the elegant pergola. On the west side, find the home's bedrooms, each is large enough to comfortably accommodate a queen bed & plenty more. The master en suite includes two large closets & a beautifully remodeled bathroom. A second remodeled bathroom boasts dual vanity sinks & stylish grey flooring. The home's private backyard is lush, but easy to maintain. Trees & other plants surround the property, adding beauty while preserving your privacy. California Dreaming has never been more perfectly brought to life than in this move-in-ready, rejuvenating, & sunny home. Don't miss your chance.

Magnificent vews, enchanting gardens, privacy in a great community and a focus on energy efficiency. Privately situated on expansive gated grounds, this Mid-Century view home flows easily between the living and family rooms w/both formal and casual dining areas. The main house is a 4bdrm 3ba split level and a legal studio apartment is on the lower level with its own entrance, kitchen, bath and off-street parking. The 4th bedroom has been converted to a wood paneled office and is part of the quiet bedroom wing. Impeccably maintained w/lush landscaping & spa. Patio decking offers space to entertain and enjoy the fabulous views of the Los Angeles basin, downtown LA, Long Beach and Catalina island & the San Gabriel mountains. The backyard features mature fruit trees, oak trees and more entertaining space. The property has been updated with many energy efficient features including solar panels, attic fans, electric and manual awnings, and low-albedo roof (2007). The garage is wired for an electric car. The kitchen and baths were completely replaced in 2007 including all plumbing and electrical. There is also a private Sauna.

A little slice of heaven, this 1300+ square foot Sierra Madre Canyon home uses every inch of its square footage. The first-floor hosts 5 rooms; living room, family room & dining room along with a beautifully designed kitchen fully remodeled in 2018 with stainless steel appliances, granite counters and a farmhouse sink. The first-floor full bathroom includes a claw foot tub with the shower conversion. The second floor boasts two large bedrooms one with a 3/4 en suite bathroom. Enjoy the in-ground pool, jacuzzi and mountain views from the multi-tiered decked backyard! With two garages, one for parking and one for storage, & a paved parking space you will not need to search for parking.

Stunning California ranch, beautifully appointed, located in the quaint village of Sierra Madre. Desirable single-level open floor plan. Living room has large picture windows, recessed LED lighting, a natural brick fireplace. Dining room has an expansive glass section that opens onto a vine-covered patio. Northern walkway leads from the patio to a sparkling pool with a built-in fountain. Master bedroom overlooks the pool, a sliding glass door opens onto the pool deck.Southern walkway leads to a large shaded area, perfect for play or outdoor dining. Several areas to entertain or simply sit in silence and enjoy the mountain views. Attached 2 car garage has finished walls and flooring, LED lighting, and radiant barrier insulation. Off-kitchen laundry room includes a Samsung washer and dryer. All mechanical systems have been replaced within the last 5 yrs, including furnace and air conditioning, ductwork, water heater, high-efficiency pool pump, plumbing fixtures, refrigerator, and range. Attic was cleared and fully re-insulated 4 years ago, minimizing the need to run the heater and air conditioner. Best of all, the home is situated on a quiet cul-de-sac.

A 1930 craftsman chalet, lovingly restored to its original splendor on a triple lot in the heart of historic Sierra Madre Canyon, just up the street from Mary's Market. Pass through the cozy porch into a spacious living room with high open-truss ceilings, stone fireplace and large dining alcove. Rich wood surfaces throughout and Douglas fir flooring. Newly renovated farmhouse kitchen with shaker-style cabinetry and built-in appliances. A wood-paneled hallway provides access to two bedrooms (one with an en suite half bath), to a convertible den, and to a full bath with antique and vintage-style cabinets and fixtures. Both the house and garage are covered by slate roofs. There is a towering pine, a mature oak, and fruit trees. Extensive exterior stonework, lush lawns, built-in outdoor barbeque, concrete and stone patios, and a Swimex lap pool. Storage space in basement and attic. Generous paved driveway providing ample off-street parking, plus a 1-1/2-car garage that mirrors the silhouette of the house and could possibly be converted to a detached guest cottage, studio or granny flat. Approximately 250 square feet of secure space is available in the basement for laundry, storage, changing bathing attire, and exercise equipment. A shower and/or toilet could easily be added. There is also approximately 150 square feet of illuminated storage in the attic, accessible through a drop-down stair in the convertible den.

Situated in the lovely city of Sierra Madre is this charming and completely remodeled north facing home with beautiful mountain views. As you enter, you are taken back by all the natural light throughout. Open and spacious living room with a modern electric fireplace and built-ins, separate dining area which is adjacent to the gorgeous kitchen. The kitchen offers tons of cabinets, Quartz counters, stainless steel appliances, soft close cabinets with access to the back yard. A primary bedroom with a full bathroom and walk-in closet; a second bedroom and a 3/4 hall bathroom. A sprawling back-yard with a covered sitting area, a spacious area in the back which can be used as a sports court, wonderful grapefruit tree and a two car garage. Just some of the features are: HVAC, LED recessed lights, new flooring, newly laid grass at the front and back yard, crown moldings, dual pane windows, sprinkler system and so much more. Located near many local shops, restaurants and hiking trails with easy access to the 210 freeway. Must see to appreciate!

This light and open Traditional home sits on a leafy tree shaded street in the highly prized City Of Sierra Madre. Beautifully updated. featuring 4 generous sized bedrooms. A master with walk in closet and en suite bath with soaking tub, separate steam shower and marble and subway tile detail. The open floor plan offers a living room with fireplace, French doors, wood floors, opening to a family room with built in bookcases. The den, perfect for an office, has French doors overlooking backyard, patio, pool and spa. The heart of the home gorgeously remodeled kitchen features soft close custom cabinetry, center island, Viking and Dacor appliances, pot filler and architectural light fixtures. New tankless water heater plus copper plumbing, ceiling fans and so much more. Relax on the inviting front porch, gaze at the mountains from your pool or spa, walk to Bailey Canyon, Mt. Wilson Trail or the enticing shops , restaurants or theatre in Sierra Madre's quaint downtown.website: 421northgrove.com

THE WINDS , A prestigious area in Sierra Madre. This finest Spanish custom built home is situated on a cul-de-sac amongst estate sized homes in impeccable condition and craftsmanship. The first floor flows with impressive foyer, beamed ceilings LR, formal DR, practical FR, guest suite, a study, wine cellar & laundry room. The bright kitchen with center island downdraft cooktop, marble counters, Sub-Zero refrigerator and separate Chinese kitchen. Upstairs has two additional bedrooms with in-suite baths, an elegant office with built ins and balcony. The grand master suite features a vaulted ceiling, fireplace and large picture window with mountain view. The luxurious master bath features double sinks, separate tub & shower, huge walk in closets for him and her. The beautiful lush landscaping designed by a famous garden designer, a rose garden on the east, and a private courtyard with SPA on the west. The backyard is the best place for entertaining and family events..a fully covered patio, swimming pool, spa, vegetable garden and grassy play area. Other amenities include 3 car garage, 4 sets of AC/heat. This unique home was constructed with special cement panels by Truss-Tech Building Systems.. the world's advanced thermal insulation reinforced concrete structure. It has incomparable advantages in terms of earthquake resistance and other indicators with ordinary wood-concrete structures. Who will be the next lucky owner for this special home? Just come and see!

Relax on the front porch of this delightful Craftsman style home custom built in 2000. Cozy up to the fireplace in the living room which boasts a soaring ceiling while natural light fills the room. The well-appointed chef's kitchen with center island makes meal prep easy; and the adjoining breakfast nook is perfect for casual dining or a comfy place to enjoy morning tea. The formal dining room is perfect for dining with friends or intimate dinners with family. A wall of windows in the family room with fireplace creates an inviting environment offering views of and access to the verdant backyard. Enjoy a tranquil backyard view from the upstairs balcony in the master suite which features a large walk-in closet and a luxurious master bath with jetting tub. Two additional bedrooms upstairs share a Jack-&-Jill bathroom. One of the four bedrooms is desirably located downstairs and features an adjoining bathroom. The beautifully landscaped backyard complete with custom pool, spa and built-in barbeque offers a resort-like environment to gather and unwind with family and friends. Adding to the splendor of this lovely home: wood flooring downstairs, new carpeting upstairs, large laundry room & direct garage access. California living at its best don't wait!

In the quiet of the Sierra Madre foothills just minutes from the center of town, a newly remodeled Spanish style home awaits its newest owners. Elegantly designed iron and glass doors welcome you into this light-filled two-story home. The well-thought-out floor plan flows easily through the entire downstairs as it features a beautiful living room, formal dining room, opening up to the kitchen and family room that begs to host holidays and all the large social gatherings. The back wall of windows and glass doors reveals an expansive flat backyard - rare in today's market. This home is as comfortable being ground zero for entertaining as it is enjoying every day pleasures like snuggling in front of the stone wall fireplace. All three of the bedrooms and bathrooms are over-sized, with one bedroom and bathroom downstairs, and the remaining bedroom, bathroom and master bedroom suite upstairs. In the master suite you can escape out to the large attached patio and watch the city lights dance in the distance, or step into relaxation in the spa-like oversized shower. The attached two-car garage features plenty of extra space for trucks, toys, tools or who knows...maybe even a gym. Remodeled from top-to-bottom, with this special home you only need to bring your bags and start living. Welcome home to 679 Camillo Road.

Pack your bags and make this carefree gem your own. On one of the most desired, lightly traveled streets in the Upper Canyon, you have the best of both worlds: the canyon vibe with walking distance to all the village of Sierra Madre offers. Enjoy the restaurants, shops, theatre, hiking trails and parks. Award winning Sierra Madre is rated one of the safest cities in the U.S. This bigger than it looks 2 bedroom 2 bath home features a generous sized living room with focal fireplace, glass slider opening to L shaped patio, picturesque adjacent oak tree studded property thrills the eye with its expansive natural beauty without the cost of maintenance. Cozy kitchen opens to dining area and den. Newer central air, roof and exterior paint. Property can accommodate 3 small to regular sized cars. Feel yourself decompress as you take in the views from every window of trees, the canyon and the city lights. Come vacation at home! Virtual tour and floorplan at 292oldranch.com

The curb appeal & modern colors outside are a window into this beautifully remodeled mid-century home. Up the front steps & through the covered front patio one enters the front hall leading to an open living space. Walls were removed & beams were added w/ permits to create the open floor plan. Waterproof vinyl flooring was added throughout the property. The dining area sits next to a wood-burning brick fireplace. The kitchen is a chef's delight w/ an oversized island w/ quartz countertops & a sink. In the kitchen there is an abundance of soft-closing cabinets & drawers, a marble back splash, stainless steel appliances & a solar tube adding additional light to the space. There are 2 bedroom suites & 1 additional bedroom & bath off the hallway. The spacious front bedroom has a mirrored closet, windows & has access to a bathroom. Bedroom suite one at the back of the home has plantation shutters, tree top views & an attached three quarter bath. The largest bedroom suite has a walk-in closet & its own attached bathroom. Set near the foothills, the fully fenced back yard has a covered patio & a terraced grassy yard. There is a finished space w/ a mini-split HVAC system off the garage. There is also a half bathroom for convenience off the oversized 2 car garage & extra space. Additional features are a powder bathroom, copper plumbing, a new furnace & ducting, & a whole house fan. Located in the desirable Sierra Madre community, this modern updated home is ready for the new owners.

Location, Location!A desirable area of Sierra Madre's friendly neighborhood community. Close to shops, restaurants, churches, schools, hiking trails & parks. A neighboring town to Hastings Ranch.Property offers a great potential for first time home buyers.Needs some TLC or bring your imagination & plans to transform this home & upgrade to a modern style home of your dream. It has a large covered patio good for family events & enjoy the big yard for barbecue & orange picking. A MUST SEE!

Situated in the sought-after Marlborough Terrace area of Sierra Madre, nestled in the foothills yet within walking distance to downtown Sierra Madre, this home is perfect for those looking for a low maintenance home and yard. With wood floors throughout, this home offers two bedrooms, one bath plus an office, dining room, a kitchenette with views of the mountains, central air/forced air heat and is filled with an abundance of natural light. Located in a quiet and friendly neighborhood with low traffic, this beautiful home is ready to move in and enjoy! Relax in your serene backyard with a lovely outdoor patio area, a graveled firepit for those special times of entertaining your guests, surrounded by a luscious landscaped yard and views of the San Gabriel mountains. Enjoy the restaurants, shops, theatre, hiking trails and parks. In 2020, Sierra Madre was rated California's 5th safest city.

This storybook home is tucked away at the end of a cul-de-sac in the beautiful and progressive Sierra Madre. Children are free to run and play in this quiet, suburban paradise. Pull into the expansive driveway and take a good look - the home gives the impression that it has been waiting for you all along. Upon entering, the home has the power to lift your mood with honey colored hardwood floors and sunlight that saturates every corner. Each spacious, bright room is a blank canvas for you to fill - with family, friends, party guests, or that giant armoire you inherited (trust me, you can fit it all).
