A prolonged hallway with glass display shelves makes this home an art lover's, or collector's, dream. Travel back in time to the 60's in the blush pink kitchen, fully equipped with upscale retro appliances that will surely be fun conversation pieces at your next BBQ. There are 3 access points to the courtyard. Unfortunately, this courtyard might ruin your life. You will be begged, mercilessly, to host the next birthday party, dog playdate and every holiday that requires outdoor eating and merriment. To finally getting around to pitching that tent and sleeping under the stars. This substantial paradise of greenery will treat your tired soul at the end of a long day. Not to mention, enjoy the succulent mandarin oranges that grow from November to May every year. This home truly is the gift that keeps on giving.

Known as Wisteria City , Sierra Madre gives you that small town feeling while keeping you accessible to downtown and the San Gabriel Valley. You will find a move-in ready, single level home among a quiet complex and offers beautiful views of the San Gabriel Mountains. The floor plan is bright & open, highlighted by neutral tones throughout the home. Features include; open dining room that leads to your private patio, a powder room, laminate flooring throughout, recessed lighting, 2 parking spaces, community laundry room and a community pool with recreation room. Located near Sierra Madre's downtown shopping district, parks, Hastings Ranch shopping, the Metro Gold Line, Old Town Pasadena, 210 freeway & great schools.

Great potential! New paint and flooring will go a long way to transform this 3 bedroom 1.75 bathroom townhouse in small 3 unit complex located in the heart of Sierra Madre. This unit features 1 bedroom on the lower flower with full bathroom and 2 bedrooms on the second floor with shared 3/4 bathroom. Upstairs one of the bedrooms has a walk in closet and direct access to shared bathroom. Linen closets in both upstairs and downstairs hallway and all the bedrooms have large closets providing plenty of storage. Kitchen has a breakfast nook and slider leading to fenced patio. Additional dining area located off the kitchen. There is direct access through the kitchen to the two car attached garage where the laundry is located. Living room features vaulted ceiling and fireplace. Great location with high walking score. 5% deposit required. The Administrator of the Estate received Full Authority, no court confirmation required.

text: A VERY Rare Opportunity! Homes in Sierra Madre with this Amazing View Do Not Come Along Often. This is A Custom Built Executive Family Home with Views from most rooms in this wonderful neighborhood. You are immediately welcomed at the entry court yard, and once inside you are greeted with a beautiful wrap around staircase. The spacious Living Room has high ceilings, a centerpiece fireplace, and extra tall windows that look either to the front courtyard and the mountains, or through the Dining Room windows to the City views. The kitchen is light and bright with granite counters, double oven, built in microwave, double stainless sink and once again a view that will welcome you. Don't miss the walk in pantry, or the casual eating area, which peeks into the Family Room with triple sliding door that invites you to the outdoor entertaining area with a large covered patio, a natural gas fire pit seating area, spa and pool, grass yard and again City Views from Downtown to Catalina. Don't miss the quiet bedroom and bathroom downstairs for your guest. Upstairs Invites you to the large master bedroom, bath, and walk in closet, there are two other bedrooms and another bath on this level, but lets not miss the Bonus Game Room for family and friends including a bar area with sink, built in wine refrigerator, and many built in cabinets. You can't miss the 3 car garage, which has a 220 plug, and still leaves you room in the driveway for more. parking. Don't miss this opportunity.

Beautiful Modern Farm House meticulously renovated w/guest house, large pool and a detached oversized 3 car garage w/RV/boat parking area. Situated on a huge lot, completely enclosed w/city & mountain views. Lots of character & charm throughout this very special property. Main house features a bright floor plan w/picturesque views onto the pristine grounds. 3 bedrms and 2 bathrms. High ceilings. Gorgeous new oak hardwood flooring. Living rm w/built-ins & fireplace. Formal dining rm. Spacious bedrms w/large closets. Kitchen w/lots of cabinetry for storage. Other main house features include; custom window treatments & blackout shades for temperature control, newly installed custom wainscoting and molding, new tankless water heater, new air conditioning system w/new air ducts & a special enhanced Uv100E Ultraviolet system that kills airborne bacteria. Updated electrical system. New water main line. Bolted foundation. Backyard features a nearly 600 sq. ft. patio w/ city views and great for entertaining large parties & gatherings. The entire front and back yards have been newly landscaped w/custom lighting along w/ a new wireless irrigation system. There is a also a large pool w/a spacious private patio area, a bocce ball court, large grassy lawn and a custom designed raised vegetable garden. There is also a beautiful one bedrm guesthouse w/fireplace and a kitchenet perfect for in-laws or home office. Also a 3 car garage & a gated RV parking area. A Must see property!

Cozy and warm townhouse in a small but well managed complex with security gates just, two blocks from Sierra Madre Village. This unit is stylish and open, with a generous sized kitchen opening on to the dining area, which in turn opens down to a large living room with recessed lighting and large sliding doors to a comfortable private patio area. The open floor plan has plenty of natural light and wooden floors throughout the lower level. The kitchen has a good sized pantry and plenty of cabinetry, there is also a powder room downstairs. Upstairs has two master suites, one with a large walk-in closet, and skylights for more natural light. Attached two car garage with laundry below accessible from ground level. Roof was recently replaced, and the unit is low-maintenance and well looked after. Shops, restaurants, theatre, parks, hiking trails all nearby in the award winning Sierra Madre town.
full_street_line: 125 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit B

text: This five-bed three-bath Sierra Madre home sits on a quiet tree-lined cul-de-sac overlooking the beautiful San Gabriel Valley. The covered front porch welcomes you into the home and accentuates the homes curb appeal. Entering the home, the living room and den welcome you in and are naturally lit by the large south facing windows. As you pass through the living room you enter into the breakfast area and kitchen that feature sliding glass doors that lead to the quiet backyard. The kitchen leads into the formal dining room ideal for both holiday dinners and special occasions. Off of the breakfast area is the spacious guest bedroom with high ceilings and access to the backyard. The backyard is lined with mature hedges that provides plenty of privacy but allow the space to feel open and inviting. The sizable concrete patio is perfect for summer gatherings and cook-outs and has enough room for multiple sitting areas. The second floor features a private master suite with dual closets and a master bath with jack and jill vanities, a soaking tub and a tiled shower enclosure. Along with the master suite the second-floor features 3 additional bedrooms with large closets, a large bathroom big enough to accommodate multiple people and plenty of built-in storage.

Set under the backdrop of the San Gabriel mountain range, lies this single level home in the idyllic community of Sierra Madre. The nearly 7, 600 square foot lot has a lovely home with 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. Come and see what quality construction looks like. Notice how the ceiling and the walls line up in a perfect line. The plastering work is PURE ART. Notice also the beautiful and authentic hardwood floors. The galley kitchen is original but amazingly modern in design. It looks out to the dining room and den and has the modern preparation triangle. As far as the neighborhood, the home recalls a far simpler time when everyone knew the owners or assistants at Taylor's market and the Pantorium cleaners. Lucky Baldwin and Happy Liquor proprietors give you a neighborly nod as you enter their establishments: everyone knows your name. In a county of cookie cutter homes and unfamiliar neighbors stands this '55 custom home. A lot of great things were made in '55: the Cadillac, the Ford Thunderbird and of course, this home with its great bones. You can envision the backyard with the majestic mountains and your Sunday barbecues with tubs of Mother Moo Creamery ice cream. A new water heater has been added in the last 4 years, the sewer line has been updated to the street , and A/C was updated in 2007. Take this original and make it your home. This is a Trustee sale without court confirmation needed.

The quaint Village of Sierra Madre is located just a couple blocks from this lovely traditional home. There is a desirable open floorplan from the living room to the dining room into the breakfast room and kitchen. Sliding doors open to a large trellis covered patio that flows into the backyard. There is also a quaint side patio that makes for a perfect barbequing area. The backyard is visible from the breakfast area and kitchen allowing the busy cook in the family to watch over the children while they are at play. The master bedroom offers a dressing area and master bath. The interior of the home has been freshly painted and there is new molding and trim. Other features include: central air and heat, ceiling fans, plantation shutters, and a detached 2-car garage. Ideally situated on a generous 13, 127 square foot lot, the huge backyard provides seclusion and features a refreshing pool creating an inviting and tropical environment for intimate nights with family or entertaining on a grand scale. Truly California living at its best!

This unique lot has many upside potentials and only one of the few lots left in the upper Sierra Madre Canyon. This lot offers spectacular views of the valley and city lights at night. This lot currently has a city moratorium in which the moratorium does not allow a water meters to be installed on lots less than 15, 000 sqft making the development of this parcel not duable for the moment. City will not specify when moratorium will be modified.But if lot is purchased and tied together with the adjacent property that is also for sale MLS#WS20104755. City will allow for a dwelling unit of up to 1200sqft of living area to be built on the lot making this a great investment for someone looking to create a additional source of income or to have extra space for visitors to enjoy peace, tranquility, and nature. This lot has many uses and perfect for someone interested in purchasing together with the adjacent property. Possibilities are great and city views and the peace and tranquility are even better...Owner is willing to Negotiate so Dont Hesitate to Make Your Offer..Preliminary drawings of Owners intent to built as a separate parcel are available upon request and can be used for the additional dwelling unit. The adjacent home is 3bed, 2bath and was recently remodeled. Has Spectacular views of the Valley and tremendous upside potentials. IF PURCHASED TOGETHER WILL CONSIDER A SOLID OFFER IN THE $925, 000 RANGE FOR BOTH.

The dreams of one family to develop and create an estate with a Santa Fe Revival architectural style as their 'forever' home becomes the opportunity of a lifetime for the new stewards. Quiet surroundings, a desirable cul-de-sac and situated just a short distance from the downtown village of Sierra Madre. Six years ago, the sellers artfully completed half their dream as the 35, 000 gallon, salt-water pool and spa, surrounded by Santa Fe Revival style adobe-like walls were complete with hand-painted tiles. The custom 2, 020 sf brick pool deck was built with a Della Robbia weave pattern and has porcelain tile inserts. The pool area offers a tranquil mountain view! Also included in the backyard is a majestic Oak tree and citrus trees. While the home has deferred maintenance, it is the perfect diamond in the rough, ready to be reimagined and completely rebuilt, expanded, remodeled, etc. With a lot frontage of 105 feet and a depth of 188 feet, this nearly a half-acre, flat lot allows the new owners to artfully compose and create a fabulous lifetime estate. An addition of 700 sf to the house should not require Planning Commission approval - buyer to verify with proper government authorities. Additional features: original building plans and a property survey are available to the buyer. The property has engineered drainage in place, subterranean conduit for electrical from house to the 720 sf garage and recent copper water main line installed from house to meter.

Quiet surroundings and a cul-de-sac location is the site of this lovely, completely remodeled and reimagined home to create a modern masterpiece boasting an open floorplan concept. The spacious living room features a dramatic stone fireplace. Discover a delightful dining room that is open to an ultra-modern kitchen with custom German cabinetry with soft close drawers and doors, large island and Quartz counters. This well-appointed & updated kitchen makes family meal prep easy. The master bedroom features a spacious walk-in closet & a beautifully remodeled modern bathroom both with trendy exposed sliding doors and it offers access to the backyard and spa. The main bath has also been remodeled with stylish modern touches. Entertaining is a pleasure under the large covered patio with a generously-sized spa that is perfect for relaxing or enjoying with guests. There is additional off-street parking on the side of the garage. The completely fenced and grassy backyard offers plenty of space for children to romp and play! Reference the attached 2-page list of upgrades and improvements. Conveniently located this family home is just a half mile from the quaint Village of Sierra Madre with shopping, dining, theater & offers nearby parks with pool and a library.

With plenty of areas to relax or entertain, this house features fresh interior paint, a welcoming living room with decorative fireplace, a dining room that opens up to the expansive family room, and French doors that extend your living outdoors to the covered patio, where dining al fresco is always open. The wine refrigerator in the kitchen will ensure perfectly chilled beverages year round. Enjoy morning coffee or tea & scones at your breakfast bar while gazing on the newly installed countertops.The private master suite is nestled away from the other rooms and has a built-in closet system and cozy bathroom en suite. 2nd & 3rd bedrooms are perfectly proportioned and have access to the 2nd bathroom, which is remodeled with subway tiles & hex tile flooring. With wood floors, crown moulding, recessed lighting, ceiling fans, plantation shutters, & fully-fenced in spacious backyard, don't miss your opportunity to move into this sought after neighborhood.On an end lot, located on a desired street & minutes to Memorial Park and the charming shops & restaurants of Sierra Madre's main street.Seller had plans drawn for garage to be converted to master retreat w/3rd bath, included w/sale.Check w/ city for MULTI-FAMILY zoning and possibility to add ADU!

Canyon living at its best! 839 Woodland is one of the rare larger properties to grace this cul-de-sac, flanked by a magnificent mountain backdrop and a gentle babbling brook. Enjoy the serene sounds and tranquil vibe from any one of the home's five dedicated outdoor spaces including a charming front porch, a central garden courtyard, a sunny side yard off of the family room, a private master suite deck, and a deck above the garage perfect for stargazing and lounging under the breathtaking night sky. The master suite exudes a modern canyon design with vaulted ceilings, generous amounts of natural light and a recently renovated bathroom. The updated kitchen features quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances and opens to the dining area and family room. Highlights of this home include an office space with garden views - perfect for virtual meetings and family zoom calls, and two deeded parking spaces in addition to the one-car garage. Close to hiking trails, Mary's Market, and just minutes from downtown Sierra Madre and Pasadena. 839 Woodland embraces the indoor-outdoor lifestyle that only a canyon retreat like this can deliver.

Charming 1944 Craftsman home with a fabulous newer built guest house. House is set back from the street with a a beautiful English garden style landscaping with roses, private court yard with a large patio for entertaining, water fall feature and an in ground Jacuzzi hidden by trees. Main house features include: Living room, quaint family room with built- ins and fireplace. Dining area. Galley kitchen with lots of cabinetry. 2 bedrooms downstairs with one full bathroom and 3/4 bathroom and laundry area. Large loft that could be a 3 bedroom or a great office with city views and lots of storage space. Large Wonderful private patio area in the back with grassy lawn with partial city views. Newer Guest house features: 1 bedroom, large bathroom with walk-in shower and spacious living area with island.kitchen facilities and sky light. 2 tank less water heaters. Newer composition roof. Central air conditioning and heating. Carriage house small one car garage that could be a wonderful workshop. Property still has so much potential to add on and expand existing structure. A few blocks from town with great restaurants, coffee shops and shops.

A beautiful retreat nestled in the Upper Canyon of Sierra Madre. This private sanctuary in lush setting is its own Paradise. Main house + cottage/studio. Main house -3 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms. Open Floor Plan. Bright and light living room and dining area with vaulted ceilings and recessed lighting. Wood burning fireplace in living room for cold canyon nights. Charming kitchen with granite counters and tiled floor. Granite breakfast counter in kitchen. Large laundry room off kitchen. Spacious master suite. Many Upgrades and features - brand new roof, brand new FA/CA, brand new wall AC in cottage, newly painted inside and outside, hardwood floors, storage sheds, pool, car port, additional off street parking behind gate, etc. Detached, self contained cottage/studio with separate address and water heater. This darling cottage exudes cuteness and coziness. Vaulted exposed beam ceilings. Wood burning fireplace. Tiled floor. Kitchen area and bathroom with shower. Stackable washer and dryer hookups in bathroom. 2 car carport attached to studio. Many cozy patios and sitting areas in yard to enjoy pool and canyon views. A Canyon Gem with Ambiance, Serenity & Scenic Mountain Views!!!

Architectural style abounds in this artfully composed home designed by Stiles O. Clements, best known for his Spanish Revival Adamson House in Malibu and the 'Batman' house in San Rafael. Originally built as the guest cottage for the legendary Green & Greene Camp house located north of the property. Many original architectural elements remain throughout including wood burning fireplace with octagonal chimney, beam ceilings, barn and Dutch doors, built-ins and hardware. Experience true California indoor-outdoor living in the spacious living room, connected by French doors and walls of windows to the exquisite central patio and professionally landscaped gardens. The treasure of this property is the majestic 100+ year old Englemann Oak tree that canopies the outdoor space. Most all rooms offer easy access to the outside in this U-shaped plan. The well-appointed modern kitchen makes meal prep easy and there is an adjoining breakfast area perfect for casual dining with a view. The verdant backyard features a Pergola with outdoor kitchen by Lou Watanabe beside the pool and spa creating the perfect setting for intimate nights with family or entertaining on a grand scale. Situated on just over a quarter acre, the Camp House cottage is truly one of a kind!

Spacious 2bedroom home located in beautiful Sierra Madre. Single level home with no stairs has been lovingly care for and is ready for its new owners. There are 2 large bedrooms each with abundant closet space, a newly remodeled full bathroom off the hallway and 1/2 bath in front near the living room. The interior of the home has been repainted and ready for immediate move-in. The kitchen has been newly remodeled with lots of counter space and a pantry. New white cabinets and appliances throughout. There is a side patio with access to the 2-stall garage that contains numerous built-in shelves. The flooring throughout the home is beautiful bamboo. The whole house is surrounded by new windows and a sliding glass door. The master bedroom and family room open to a newly refurbished Trex maintenance free deck in the back yard with mountain and city light views. The backyard is a private oasis with gorgeous rare and mature cacti, fully grown pepper and pine trees, and fully fenced in privacy. The front yard has beautiful views of the mountains and a lovely rose garden. From this beautiful home, you are within walking distance to the beautiful community center and park containing a pool, baseball fields, tennis and basketball courts, Sierra Madre schools, our lovely downtown, and beloved Rose Float Building! This is a perfect starter home with architectural plans drawn up for a master bath and 3rd bedroom. It is also great for downsizers looking for a spacious single level floor plan.

Fantastic Sierra Madre home situated on a quiet cul-de-sac street set against the beautiful foothills. Wonderful neighborhood. Priced to sell and with tons of potential. Nice curb appeal with a wide frontage. Traditional single story home features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with a great spacious lot with pool and plenty of yard space. Features include large living area with fireplace and dining area. Galley kitchen with eating area. Huge family room/rec room. Hardwood flooring. Central air conditioning and heating system. French doors. Wonderful backyard with sparkling pool, patio areas and spacious yard space for kids play area and more. Attached double garage with large driveway for additional vehicles. Close proximity to town and easy access to freeway, metro and great shopping areas.

Located atop the foothills of Sierra Madre, this spectacular & stately south-facing home features 180-degree views of the valley.  This custom-built estate features outstanding curb appeal, premium architectural design w/ exquisite quality, and modern amenities galore. The one-of-a-kind property is located in seclusion and features the highest quality materials & professional selections throughout. This magnificent home has 4,673 SF of living space w/ 4 bedroom suites, 4.5 baths, an additional 375 SF utility/laundry room, and is situated on a 16,854 SF lot. Amenities include an open-concept floor plan, high ceilings w/ detailed custom wood work, gourmet kitchen w/ professional grade appliances, an elevator, family room w/ wet bar opening to the kitchen, additional den, formal living room w/ 2-story ceilings, large bay window w/ views & natural light, and a stunning fireplace. The lovely landscaped grounds feature a 2-tiered backyard. The lower tier has a grass area & large patio w/ built-in BBQ, ideal for outdoor dining & entertainment. The top tier has another large grass area w/ views and is an ideal location for a pool/spa.  The 1,200+ SF garage is a car enthusiast's dream w/ room for 4-6 cars, built-in storage, and a bonus storage room w/ an additional  bath. A 4-zone HVAC system and advanced security system w/ multiple cameras are just a few of the other features. This well designed home is ideal for indoor & outdoor entertaining and must be seen to truly appreciate.

Nestled in the foothills of the San Gabriel Mountains, this single-level home in beautiful Sierra Madre is not to be missed. This adorable craftsmen home is on a quiet street north of Grandview Ave. Entering from the comfortable, covered front porch you are welcomed by the charming living room with hardwood floors flowing into the dining area. The gorgeous, recently updated chef's kitchen is large and bright with an island, recessed lighting and two skylights. Open from the kitchen is the family room with access to the peaceful, spacious backyard with pool and spa. The bedroom off the kitchen has direct access to the half bath and could be used as an office. Two more bedrooms and full bath are at the back of the home. The covered laundry area is next to the California basement just outside the family room. There are many options for this home from having a useable, entertaining backyard for outdoor freedom and peace or a family home with good schools and a sense of community. Come for a tour to make this wonderful home yours!

Don't miss out on an incredible opportunity to build the home of your dreams in an amazing location in the serene city of Sierra Madre. Nestled against the San Gabriel Mountains below Mount Wilson, this lot is a rare chance to build your home with stamped plans from Sierra Madre. This large lot of 16, 667 square feet includes plans for a luxurious Single Family Residence. Submitted plans include a 700-square foot Studio/Pool house, a 1128-square foot historically significant bungalow and a 2352- Square foot single family dwelling, and a garage. Plan includes remodeling existing units. Proposed single family residence includes Great Room, Kitchen, Main Bedroom, with two bedrooms. Plans blend relaxing scenery with modern angled roof and covered patio. Gorgeous landscaping plans, with paved paths, wood deck, and incorporates existing mature trees like Magnolia, Oak, Pine, Jacaranda, and Sycamore. Plans will build a fantastic indoor/outdoor entertaining home. Check out the plans and renderings!

Your search for the ultimate safe haven ends here at this three bedroom, shingle-sided craftsman/ranch that will be home at first sight. Anchored by a magnificent Magnolia tree, an expanse of lush green grass rolls up to a covered front veranda where you can sip tea or lemonade and watch the world go by. Upon entering the home, you'll be charmed by its clean lines and colors that calm. An inviting fireplace and large picture windows grace an open concept living/dining room. The vibe is warm and livable with upgrades that include wood floors, a newer kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances, and remodeled baths. Outdoor living is enhanced by several separate sitting/entertaining areas including a pergola shaded patio and a side yard with a fire pit. The entire rear yard is enclosed allowing for the utmost privacy and safety. The two car garage is easily accessible and offers an abundance of storage. This home offers easy living within walking distance to the village of Sierra Madre, a town of porches and parks with a wonderful sense of community.

Endearing and Quintessential. This Mid-Century Modern home features a style that consists of a classic, understated look and clean lines with minimal fuss. Functionality is vital in the open floor plan where the great room hosts family time, entertaining, music and even quiet space to reflect once the double doors open to the lush backyard and soothing babble of the water fall. The prominent vaulted wood ceilings in the kitchen frame the mountain views beautifully offering sanctuary to every hungry soul that walks in. Granite counter tops, custom built cabinets, and a cooking island covers any chefs need to cook and feast. With three bedrooms, there's an extra fourth room to spare, a perfect set up for an office or school at home. Business up front and relax in the Sedona inspired backyard! Once the outdoor barbeque is done smoking, the boulder fire pit will resume heating responsibilities or some may prefer the built-in spa for full relaxation. This home has it all including a short walk to the heart of town and school, maybe a hop, to the park and pool, shops and mountain trails! Come and make yourself at home. Home, sweet home. Ranch style houses have long been a staple of the California landscape. Ranch style homes are all about making the most of the California climate and enjoying indoor outdoor living.  This sprawling single story ranch will not disappoint.  Ideal for indoor/outdoor living and entertaining.  Telecommuting and schooling from home are a joy with the many indoor and outdoor options to rotate your view throughout the day.  Walls of windows in each room provide ideal natural lighting.  The 5 sets of sliding glass doors encourage you to step outside and enjoy one of the best yards in Sierra Madre.  The classic Dutch front door provides privacy while still connecting you to the outdoors.  Magical park like setting enclosed by an impressive ranch style fence that extends your living space. This 2650 Sq Ft home features 4 large bedrooms including an oversized master retreat with soaring ceilings. Large living room and formal dining room ideal for entertaining.  Bright kitchen with views to the front yard and the pool. Separate laundry room.  Numerous updates including new hardwood flooring throughout, crown moldings and baseboards, renovated primary bath, pebble tec pool with iron fence, copper plumbing, three decorative fireplaces, brick walkways and patio. Poised on a prime cul de sac with stunning mountain views, amazing neighbors in perfectly manicured homes, and famous for the South Canon Summer Concert Series.  This is not just a house, this is a wonderful place to live.

This Beautifully refurbished light-filled Townhome is located right in the heart of Sierra Madre. It features 3 Bedrooms, 2 1/2 Baths, 2 patios and An attached 2 car garage with direct access and laundry area. The bright and cheery living room features high ceilings, a fireplace and French doors that lead out to the charming patio with Mountain Views. High above the living room is a wonderful Loft that overlooks the living area and would be ideal for an office/den/play area. The kitchen and large dining area are all set up perfectly for entertaining. The plantation shutters that you will find throughout the home definitely compliment the stunning contemporary lines. The Master bedroom has a spacious dressing area, Large closet, built-in cabinets and plenty of additional storage. The bath has dual sinks, granite counter tops, travertine tile and an oversized tub.This small 6 unit gated complex is walking distance to everything wonderful in Sierra Madre. Check out the Virtual Tour!!

Beguiling two bedroom 936 sq. ft. bungalow with equally irresistible 368 sq. ft. one bedroom, living room and full bath separate structure. The main house, warm and inviting, offers a flexible floor plan consisting of 2 bedrooms, small reading room, full bath and expansive remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counters opening to the dining area or small family room with double wood and glass French doors opening on to artfully and professionally redesigned backyard with 2 patios, lush greenery and a zen like feel. Central air and heat. Separate sun filled studio enchants with living room w/ built in bookshelves, bay window, vaulted beamed ceilings and 2 large skylights. One bedroom plus generous sized full bath. Central air and heat.MAIN HOUSE: New 30 year roof installed in 2008; Vinyl commercial grade 35 year Amitco/Spacia flooring installed in 2008; New microwave, refrigerator, washer and dryer and garbage disposal in 2008. New double oven and stove hood in 2015. Full bath new cabinets, sink, vanity, granite counter, plumbing, glass shower/tub enclosure in 2008. BACK STUDIO: New 30 year roof and gutters in 2008; bamboo flooring, shelving cabinets and closet in 2010. Additionally, new fencing and gates, instant hot water heater; backyard landscaping in 2008; fruit rees 2015; front landscaping 2016; curbside walkway 2013.

Charming single story home in one of the most desirable Sierra Madreneighborhoods. Nestled on a beautiful tree-lined street, features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. A spacious master suite with a remodeled bathroom offers direct access to the patio and garden. The living room boasts beautiful hardwood floors, a built-in bookcase, a fireplace, and an open, spacious feel overlooking the beautifully landscaped front yard with hand-cut Tuscan paversentrance & driveway.The formal dining room area offers French doors leading to the beautiful, private and enclosed backyard with a wood deck patio, mature orange, peach, and Lemon trees, relaxing distant tree views, and raised beds planters for growing your own vegetables. Ideal for hosting outdoor parties on cool summer nights. The kitchen is bright with natural light and a laundry area. Other features include freshly painted interior with designer colors, central air, newly refinished hardwood floors, and a 2-car detached garage. It is located within walking distance to Memorial Park, restaurants, shops, Playhouse, and more. Easy access to Mount Wilson and Bailey Canyon trails, truly is a peaceful place to be.This property has been lovingly cared for and has not been on the market for the last 30 years. This is a very rare opportunity to own a unique property in the Sierra Madre. Please view the Video - 3D Tour

Below the southern edge of the Angeles National Forest is the City of Sierra Madre, which is made up of 3 square miles that residents call home. Centrally located between Pasadena and Arcadia, lies 405 Fairview Ter. This corner lot, single family home, alongside its colorful cul de sac, is awaiting your presence. Built in 1962, is this irresistible 3 bedroom, 3 bath, well built traditional style home. Oozing with endless upgrades and its original hardwood flooring, inside Fairview Ter, is a gorgeous knockout! Professional stainless steel chef appliances, surround its modern style island kitchen. Enough cabinet space to fit any size family, with a personal built in toaster warmer, great for entertainment. Granite countertops add a classy finish to the kitchen. Two separate living areas, with fireplaces. A MUST SEE! Large utility room with a comfort station tucked in between, this 1960's brilliant architectural planning. Ceiling fans in all bedrooms with its original authentic wardrobe cabinets. Both bathrooms provide a sparkle of contemporary design. The master bath showing off its his and her sinks, the highlight of this washroom, is its impressive shower, enclosed in glass casing and an eye gazing tile. All blinds, fixtures, and paint are new, as well as the tankless water heater. A inviting backyard, with a wholesome greenery surrounding. A partial shaded covered patio area, for privacy. Something is shining near the foothills in Sierra Madre and it won't last long!

COMPLETED RENOVATED WITH MOVE IN CONDITION !! Private Gated Property that sit on almost an acre lot. Offers 4 bed 3 bath plus an approximately 675 square feet guest house with 1-bedroom and 1 bath. Lot is neither sub-dividable or, buyers to verify with City. Seller did renovation on Dec 2019 with new kitchen, new bath rooms; new widows; fresh paint; new Air condition. Also, the gust house is been newly updated as well with all new features! MUST See to appreciate !

A rare contemporary masterpiece, designed and owned by a local architect. The house boasts a unique floor plan, imported woods and benefitted from extensive upgrades just three years ago. The house sits on a large lot and has multiple views in every direction, from the mountains to city lights which are visible in panoramic splendor from the living room and kitchen. This home is one of a kind, and offers a serene, private and inviting environment. There is a 30 foot waterfall on the property, and several other features that complete this architect's delight. Nestled in the highly desirable neighborhood of Sierra Madre, this home is a must see.

This Beautiful home where nature is present neighbors are phenomenal and the feel of peace and tranquility is abundant. Nestled in the upper canyon of Sierra Madre and very near the Mt.Wilson hiking trails but yet only a couple of minutes from society. This home has recently gone thru many upgrades all completed with permits. Home was once a 2bed, 1bath home but is now a Beautiful 3bed, 2 full bathrooms and one of the bedrooms being a master bedroom. Home has a open floor plan to kitchen, living room, and dinning area and a separate washroom. The upgrades done consist of NEW roof, cooper plumbing, 200amp electric panel, recess lighting, central air & heating, tankless water heater, floors, tile, fixtures, new dual pane / tempered glass windows, new stucco, crown molding, paint job, new cabinets wit quartz counter tops. A new large balcony deck leading out from master bedroom to relax after a long day and enjoy the peace & tranquility of the neighborhood. Their is also a new terrace at rear of property with spectacular city views ready for a Jacuzzi or to entertain guest. Minor cosmetic work is still being done and will be completed home is being sold AS IS with no additional alterations or changes upon request. INTERESTED ON EXPANDING or OWNING ADDITIONAL LAND. Owner is also selling adjacent lot MLS#WS20104859 this Lot has Spectacular views of the Valley and tremendous upside potentials. IF PURCHASED TOGETHER WILL CONSIDER A SOLID OFFER IN THE $925, 000 RANGE FOR BOTH.

Set back from the street, this 3-bed, 3-bath Mid-Century Modern Sierra Madre home has been beautifully remodeled and is ready for its next owner. The gated front yard includes a grassy lawn, front patio & plenty of off-street parking including an attached 2-car garage. The entry leads up and into the spacious light-filled living room with beautiful hardwood floors that continue throughout the home. The kitchen features plenty of counter space and the adjacent large dining area has a convenient built-in sideboard and opens to the back patio, perfect for alfresco dining. The master bedroom includes an ensuite bath with separate shower & tub and has backyard access. The east wing of the home features two additional bedrooms & a full bath. The backyard features a large, open patio area, grassy yard, fruits trees including cumquat, orange, lemon, pomegranate, & avocado, access to the California basement providing extra storage and a standalone studio could function as a guest house, office, exercise room or den. Closed to schools, parks, shops, restaurants & transportation, this move-in ready home truly has it all!

This spacious light-filled condominium is located in the quaint town of Sierra Madre.  The first level features a living room and dining room with a 2-sided see-through fireplace, a lovely walkout patio is outside the living room for outdoor dining and there is a large kitchen with eating area.  The powder room is on the first floor.  Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms including the master suite with walk-in closet, outdoor patio and the bathroom has double sinks.  The laundry is located on the second level.  The 2-car garage is located on the bottom level and has a large storage area.  This lovely condo is within walking distance to the town center for dining and shopping and is close to hiking trails.

Located just blocks from beautiful and quaint downtown Sierra Madre with local restaurants, yoga studios and shopping is this stunning 5 bedroom, 5 bath home, sited on a gorgeous lot with spectacular city views, is sure to be the new gathering spot. A beautiful front entrance with natural lighting that opens up to a large foyer with high-ceiling and an enormous family room with twilight city views! Gorgeous updated kitchen features stainless steel high end appliances, granite counter tops, beautiful cabinetry, large kitchen nook as well as a fireplace. The living room offers formal and spacious sitting area with fireplace and beams creating a perfect stunning space while the lavish Dining Room is great for large parties and family gatherings. The unique office with vaulted wood ceilings offers a balcony with Mountain Views is a perfect space to work from home. The Master Suite embodies a perfect retreat with a fireplace for those cold nights, as well as a spacious balcony with gorgeous city views, it includes a spacious walk-in closet & a remodeled bath with upgraded features, includes a spa tub, steam shower with dual shower heads. Additional features include: surround sound system, dual zone A/C system, security system, 3 car garage with a loft, butlers pantry and large Washer & Dryer room.The backyard is every entertainers dream with a Salt Water Infinity Pool & Spa with a waterfall, built in BBQ with a covered Patio and pure outdoor elegance with amazing 180 degree views.

Near the heart of downtown Sierra Madre, this exceptional property features two houses on a corner lot showcasing a vintage 1907 Main house which sits at 119 Auburn Ave. The home has 3 bedroom 2 baths & a 2 car garage (1, 462 sq/ft Taped per R.E.S.T.) and a completely detached 1 bedroom, 1 bath Cottage with a single car garage and attached laundry room.(537 sq/ft Taped per R.E.S.T.) Perfect for use as a separate Guesthouse or an opportunity for rental income. The Main house has an expansive wood front porch with original v-groove ceiling. Gleaming hardwood floors throughout, fireplace and formal dining room. Currently the 3rd bedroom is being used as a sitting room and there is an airy room off of that being used as an office. Remodeled modern kitchen with period custom quarter sawn white oak cabinetry, artisan tile, professional Thermador range, eat in dining with banquette seating & walk-in pantry. Added pluses include in house Laundry Room, large usable basement, 2 car garage with extra workspace and driveway space for multiple cars. The Cottage also has hardwood floors, with new range, new paint, and new window treatments. Private entrance, secluded covered patio and separate driveway afford privacy. Wonderfully located, walk down to the village of Sierra Madre or walk up to hiking trails.Per Assessor property is shown as a duplex. Buyer is responsible to verify all measurements, permit status and proper use of property.

This classic American cottage could be home at first sight! With some vision and revision, it can be a place where old traditions are carried on and new ones are born. Original hardwood floors are yearning to be revitalized. The kitchen has served its family well over the years and is now ready for a refreshing facelift. The focal point of the living room is a stunning brick fireplace just waiting for a cold winter's eve. Endless possibilities present with the grounds: perhaps an ADU? a pool? or both? All of this home's a stage and you can write the play and be the new director! Easy stroll to the village shops and restaurants. Close to public transportation.

A Contemporary and Architecturally Stunning live/work loft in Sierra Madre. This is an amazing place to call home with an inviting space that has natural light, an open floor plan, 12 ft+ ceilings, exposed mechanical, mountain views and french doors. With 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, designer kitchen, limestone counters, large center island, custom Oak cabinetry & stainless steel appliances. A spiral staircase leads to the spectacular roof top deck/lounge with city and mountain views perfect for entertaining. Other features include steel and wrought iron balconies, an oversized 2 car garage with opaque glass door, central AC/heat, concrete flooring on the first floor and hardwood on the second floor, laundry area, an outdoor shower area with views and skylights. No HOA. Walking distance to downtown Sierra Madre's shops and restaurants. Truly an architectural gem!

It features the best of California living...it's a 1950's home that has been reconfigured and re imagined.The house has three bedrooms each with en suite baths, and a lovely powder room. The open floor plan has vaulted ceilings, an outdoor living room, new white oak hardwood floors, new plumbing, heat and air conditioning, recessed lighting, new electric fireplace, all new stainless steel appliances, and all new bathroom cabinets, tiles, and fixtures.Light and bright, new landscaping, citrus grove, new poured driveway, and lovely smooth coat stucco. This house has it all.

Nestled in a superb location within walking distance to old town Sierra Madre, this 2 bedroom, 3 bath townhouse has been completely renovated with state of the art upgrades. A marble entryway greets you as you enter the open-concept living room with vaulted ceilings. The kitchen boasts a large island, ample quartz countertops and backsplash. The kitchen also houses brand new appliances throughout including an in-island wine refrigerator, a large cast-iron farmhouse sink, and touch-activated faucet. A beautiful terra cotta tile patio right is off of the dining area. The first floor also includes a Arabesque-style bathroom with marble floor tile and a quartz countertop. The stairs are adorned with a wrought iron handrail. The spacious master bedroom includes a walk-in closet and a sliding glass closet. The vaulted ceilings bring in ample natural light from the skylight above. A gorgeous master bath houses custom-made dual vanities with quartz countertops and a massive, glass-enclosed shower with dual shower heads. The second bedroom offers a sliding-glass door entry to the second story patio with mountain views. The guest bathroom hosts custom-made double vanity with quartz countertops and overhead storage and has been conveniently fitted with washer/dryer hookups to allow the option of either garage or upstairs laundry placement. Additional features include a brand new UV air conditioning system, large two-car garage with shop flooring, and new solid doors throughout.
full_street_line: 499 W Sierra Madre Blvd Apt B

text: Lovingly cared for in its authentic state this home & guesthouse are much to be desired! Built in 1932, this Tudor style home with vintage character intact alongside tasteful modern updates. First time on the market since 1964, the period elements include original sconces, built-ins, fireplace with ornate Batchelder tile, barrel and cove ceilings. The spacious living room opens into the dining room with an enclosed charming sun room ideal for reading or relaxing. On the other side of living room is a welcoming office/family room with many windows, built-in desk, and private exit. The inviting kitchen offers eat-in-area, open shelving, new porcelain farm sink, new terra cotta tile, restored retro tile and sliding glass door leading to deck overlooking the massive backyard. Bedrooms are ample with walk-in closets. The attractive remodeled bathroom has a pedestal sink and glass walk-in shower. Upgrades include beautifully refurbished hardwood flooring, newly painted exterior/interior, and retrofitted earthquake foundation. Bonus feature is a separate 1 bedroom guesthouse with cozy living room, and roomy bathroom with walk-in shower and closet. The lot size of 13, 872 sq.ft. offers many fruit trees and lots of potential for adding ADU, pool and other endless possibilities. This home is located near Sierra Madre's downtown with restaurants, shops and award winning schools. This home reflects true pride of ownership and awaits a new lucky owner to carry on the legacy.

Known as the ''Village of the Foothills, '' Sierra Madre is a quintessential American small town community & this well-loved condominium home is the perfect retreat for LA's busy lifestyle. This move-in condition, two level property is tucked into a quiet location of the complex & offers beautiful views of the San Gabriel Mountains from the north facing bedroom & balcony. The open floor plan is bright & airy, & highlights a living & dining area w/porcelain flooring, windows w/a southern exposure, & a large glass sliding door opening onto the private & spacious front patio. There are 2 BRs w/abundant closet space & bead board ceilings, & a remodeled full BA located on 2nd level. Add'tl features include; a powder room, wood shutters throughout, ceiling fans, an invisible screen door, 2 parking spaces, community laundry room, storage locker & cabinet, & a community pool & recreation room. Close to Sierra Madre's downtown shopping district, trail heads, parks, Hastings Ranch shopping, the Metro Gold Line, Old Town Pasadena, freeway access, & terrific public & private schools. Don't miss this opportunity to create a home ''Where Your Home Happens.'

Stunning Cape Cod home thoughtfully designed in a relaxed, California style by its' owner, a nationally-known Interior Designer. Wonderful ambiance, light filled rooms, abundance of warmth & detailed charm. Gorgeous hdwd floors, paneled hallways, delicate wainscoting & architectural details. Open kitchen, a cook's dream, w/SILESTONE counters, stainless appl's, lge kitchen island, breakfast bar, walk-in pantry & sunny dining bay. Cozy family rm graced by plantation shutters, bevy of windows, striking floor-to-ceiling brick fireplace.Formal D/R is elegantly framed w/pale hues of a scenic mural, crown molding & original waist-high wainscoting. Down a 5th B/R, a welcome office or guest's retreat. Upstairs, four additional B/R's w/plush carpeting, blt-in cabinetry, dble closets, cheery hall skylight A perfect refuge, master-suite is luminous w/soaring ceilings, walk-in closet & enchanting mountain views. Baths stylishly detailed with intricate tilework of CROSSVILLE porcelain, iridescent onyx w/custom fixtures & vanities.... master w/Jacuzzi Air-jet tub, dual sinks, corner shower Caesarstone tops & porcelain tile.Secluded rear yard offers a sylvan sanctuary, whether conversing under the canopied patio, taking a dip in the azure glass tiled pool, soaking in the raised spa or lounging under the shaded pergola. A 165 ft poolside cottage can be anything you wish!Pool-waterfall feature, dual HVAC system, all house & attic fan, copper plumbed, laundry rm, 4 yr. old roof, Att. garage.

This mid-century modern home offers a split-level floor plan and is nestled on a beautiful cul-de-sac and offers comfort, style and charm. This split-level home is ideal for entertaining friends and family. The main level offers an inviting entry with high ceilings, custom light fixtures and a few steps that lead to the spacious living room w/ fireplace and gorgeous views of the outdoors. The family kitchen is ideal for family meals around the table and offers built-in stainless appliances, spotless counters and new fixtures. The top level offers 2 spacious bedrooms each with extensive built-in custom cabinetry, a full bath, ample hallway linen cabinets and easy access to the attic. The ground level offers a spacious bedroom long with a bath and that family room with its over-sized sliding glass doors that lead to the private outside patio. Other amenities include central air & heat, recessed lights, copper plumbing, hardwood floors in the living room and upstairs bedrooms, newer interior/exterior paint, updated plumbing and electrical fixtures and newer water heater. The 2-car attached garage includes the laundry area and a new automatic garage door. Situated just minutes from the heart of Sierra Madre, local parks and hiking trails.

A sense of quiet opulence pervades throughout this sleek, cosmopolitan townhome. It is one in a rarely available complex of 6 homes within an easy stroll to the village shops and restaurants. Enter through a private, open and partially covered portico patio perfect for outdoor entertaining and a nice sized garden. A lovely fireplace anchored by two columns is the focal point of the spacious living room with its soaring coffered ceilings. This level also offers an easy access powder room. Detailed, custom tile flooring lends an air of sophistication to the entire home. A short flight of stairs leads to the formal dining room complete with wet bar which overlooks the living room and out to the patio beyond. The kitchen is well-equipped and includes a sunny breakfast room with a wall of built-ins for storage and display. The generous master bedroom boasts a wall of windows and French doors that open to a sizeable balcony with sweeping mountain and city lights views. The ensuite master bath includes a soaking tub, walk-in shower and double vanity. Two additional bedrooms, a full guest bath, and laundry room complete the upper level. There is a two car garage with abundant storage. Community pool and spa. This is a "drop dead gorgeous" townhome that will take your breath away!

Nestled on a QUIET street in Sierra Madre, this newly built home is a stunning contemporary! Architecturally designed & thoughtfully constructed, this home has a wonderful sense of luxury & style! You are drawn to the open living spaces, where light streams in through the expansive walls of glass framing the surrounding greenery and creating a seamless connection with its outdoor spaces. Soaring ceilings and Clerestory windows add a heightened sense of drama to the dining area. The gourmet kitchen features vertical grain maple cabinet, absolute black granite counters and slate floors. Free floating steps lead up to the second level where a spacious loft style landing overlooks the living areas. The master suite has a spacious walk-in closet with built-in cabinetry and a master bath that features a deep soaking tub and carrera marble counters and tile work! Two more ensuite bedrooms completes the floor plan upstairs. This home also has the added feature of an entire guest suite off the entry with its own private living area providing a completely separate space for any family member. IN ADDITION, BASED ON NEW LEGISLATION EFFECTIVE 1/1/2020 YOU ARE ALLOWED TO BUILD UP TO AN 850sqft. ADU WHICH THIS PROPERTY LENDS ITSELF TO DO. BUYER TO INVESTIGATE.

Lovely single level town home situated in the quiet park like grounds of "The Meadows" complex in Sierra Madre. This end unit features three bedrooms ,(title shows two), 1.75 baths; living room with vaulted ceilings and a cozy fireplace. The kitchen, with breakfast bar and adjoining dining area overlook the outdoor enclosed patio. New windows and AC. Plantation shutters throughout.  Newer tile flooring, carpeting, paint and plumbing.  Spacious laundry room off kitchen. 2 car attached garage. This highly desirable unit is situated in the rear of the complex near the beautiful pool and spa. Conveniently located near downtown shopping and dining, Sierra Madre Dog Park, Waterworks Aquatics and Sierra Vista Park. Sierra Madre living at its best!
full_street_line: 263 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit M

text: You must see this completely rebuilt home just steps away from the heart of Sierra Madre Village! This home was renovated from the ground up in 2018 and is practically a new home. This condo alternative gives you a low maintenance lifestyle but enough room to entertain and enjoy life. The open kitchen has stainless steel appliances, matching commercial grade under-counter Perlick refrigerator and freezer, Wolf induction cooktop and Wolf Speed Oven, in-wall faucet, sliding glass doors to the patio and a large bar / counter top for convenient dining. Kitchen was just completed in 2020. The living room is open to the kitchen and has another set of sliding doors that open to the front of the house. The large bathroom has terrazzo tile flooring, an opulent walk in shower and custom fixtures. The bedroom has a 3rd set of sliding glass doors, a ceiling fan and a large walk-in closet that is conveniently home to the laundry area. There are recessed lights, Monarch engineered hardwood floors throughout the home and a standing seam metal roof. The open floor plan and patio with pergola make this a great entertaining home and gives you outside - inside living. View Video Walk Through at

This charming and very well maintained home is located in Sierra Madre on a lovely street within walking distance of downtown shops and restaurants. This home is very tastefully decorated with a large living room with fireplace, formal dining room with cathedral ceilings and an expansive gourmet kitchen with eating bar, plus large eating area. The family room/den is adjacent to the kitchen and does include a fireplace and a lovely view of the oversized back yard. There are three bedrooms and two and one half baths . The en suite master bedroom features a walk- in closet and beautiful french doors that lead to the patio and lush back yard. The home features central heat and air for comfort and circular driveway for ease of entering and exiting. This is a must ssee Sierra Madre treasure.

Situated in the highly coveted "lower canyon" area of Sierra Madre, this adorable dollhouse is not to be missed. Located steps away from Mary's Market & fabulous walking trails, this home has it all. Walking into this special home, you will instantly appreciate the attention to detail. The custom painted mandala on the living floor is stunning. The open concept kitchen is well appointed w/an abundance of counter space, slate floors & stainless appliances. You will truly feel like you are in a tree house while cooking in the kitchen. Many updates & improvements have been made to this home including a new Mitsubishi air conditioning/heating system, remodeled bathrooms w/top of the line finishes, custom slate floors in kitchen & bedroom, custom window shades & built ins around wood burning fireplace. This property is currently configured as a 2 bedroom 1 bath home downstairs w/a studio apartment upstairs. The studio apartment upstairs is spacious & offers hardwood floors, remodeled bathroom, walk in closet & kitchenette. Stepping out of the studio you find yourself on a private patio w/jacuzzi tub & table, perfect for enjoying the beautiful Southern California weather. The studio apartment can easily be converted back to a master suite so the home is a single family residence. To round things off, this home offers an attached 2 car garage for parking. Run, don't walk to this one! Check out the 3D virtual tour:

Located in the desirable neighborhood of Sierra Madre. Easy access to Fwy 210, shops and restaurants. ---Light, airy and bright, this is how this beautiful home can be described. It's a home with a very inviting and stylish interior. Large Living room with Two-sided fireplace. ---The kitchen and dining area feature large windows and a sliding door leads to the back yard with many mature fruit trees. Incredible opportunity to have one of the most unique properties in Sierra Madre. Not only is the main residence (~1, 711 sf) stunningly redesigned in 2014 with hand-crafted custom wood flooring, sash, and trim, custom cabinetry with soft-close drawers and doors in not only the kitchen, but all the bedrooms and bathrooms, and office and wine room, too; there are stone countertops, top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, a Lutron lighting system, integrated surround sound, energy-efficient windows, and systems. Set in the backyard is the real dream: a large grassy, tree-lined yard, with uplighting, newly constructed (built in 2006) fully permitted industrial workshop (~2, 093 sf) with a bathroom, full HVAC and a storage area with built-ins, fit for a wood-working master, yoga studio, art studio, game room, ADU conversion, or just about whatever you can dream of. Atop this tall ceilinged structure is a loft studio (built in 2013; (~460 sf) with a bathroom that could be a home office. or flex space. Graciously flowing through the gated backyard is a custom Pebble Tec spa, Wolf BBQ area, covered patio with fans and an outdoor TV. Every detail of this property has been fine-tuned and done with an expert craftsman's eye. The large 2-car garage (~430 sf) is fully finished with custom built-ins and a workbench. The property has more upgrades than one can mention--see the attached list for more details. View our Video: or Click the Buttons for Matterport!

This absolutely charming single level home on one of Sierra Madre's most desirable streets, has so much to offer!  The bright and open floor plan displays attention to detail and character throughout.   Features include an entry with hardwood floors and wallpaper; a beautiful gourmet kitchen with a spacious breakfast bar,  stainless steel appliances, butcher block counters and a pantry. The adjoining breakfast area,  with a fireplace,  has picturesque windows of the beautifully landscaped front yard and mountain views. Three charming bedrooms, two en suites, one with custom built bunk beds, are well appointed off the hall.  The living room, with a second fireplace, and dining room, both with double French doors to a covered deck, welcome easy flow for indoor/outdoor California living at its best.  Beyond the expansive deck with BBQ, TV and fans is a detached oversized three car garage. Currently, one of the garage spaces, (374 SQ FT, per REST), has a Murphy bed, kitchenette, walled heating and AC and 3/4 bathroom.  Additionally, in the terraced, landscaped rear yard, are two detached sheds for extra storage with walled AC. There are laundry hook ups inside the home and garage.  Hardwood floors throughout. Security system. Circular driveway. Automatic driveway gate.  This home has so much to appreciate inside and out and all within the quaint community of Sierra Madre. Shows even better in person!  Floor Plan in supplements.

Sited in one of the San Gabriel Valley's most sought-after neighborhoods, this mid-century presents the incredible opportunity to create your dream home. Homes are not often for sale on desirable Windwood Lane and it is arguably one of the finest streets in Sierra Madre! Tucked away under mature trees, you'll relish the privacy of this lovely home located on a cul-de-sac of comparable estate properties. The well-appointed kitchen makes family meal prep easy; and the adjoining breakfast area with tranquil backyard view is perfect for casual dining, kid's homework or a morning cup of tea. A comfortable family room with soaring brick fireplace is open to the kitchen and flows seamlessly to the back patio/yard. The sophisticated master suite flows out to the back patio/yard, features a spacious walk-in closet and a luxurious master bathroom. Upstairs is an expansive room with half bath that could be a game room, office, fifth bedroom, etc. The verdant and secluded back yard with pool & spa offers the perfect setting for intimate nights with family or entertaining on a grand scale. A brick fire pit offers a cozy spot to unwind and reflect. The over-sized 3-car garage will delight most car enthusiast. Truly won't last!

Nestled beneath majestic Mt. Wilson, this brand-new custom build Craftsman style home features city lights and canyon views, thoughtfully designed to enhance the serene tranquility of its surroundings. Highly sought after 5-bed, 4-bath single-story family home tucked away in a desirable Sierra Madre neighborhood just steps from the center of town with its restaurant, coffee, and boutique offerings. With its long list of upgrades, sprawling entertainment spaces, and mountain views, you'll be lucky to call this house your new home. You'll love the updated chef's kitchen with dual dishwashers and Viking, Thermador, and KitchenAid appliances. Home offers 3 secondary bedrooms, 2 additional bathrooms (full with a jetted tub and 3/4), an individual laundry room, and an attached oversized 2-car garage. Key home features include dual pane windows, premium faucets & fixtures, dual tankless water heaters, whole-house non-salt water filtration & conditioning system, Baldwin door hardware throughout, built-in entertainment system in family room, smart home (nest thermostats + 2 HVAC systems, new interior & landscape lighting), and more on our list of upgrades. This home is a must-see! Don't miss the opportunity to call it your own!

Welcome to this enchanting cottage located a short stroll to the downtown village. It is perfectly situated on the corner of Grove Lane and a quiet alley off North Lima. If you are looking for low maintenance and a cozy getaway, this adorable abode is a is a great condo alternative or as a rental for an investor. Relax with a good book on the completely fenced front deck or unwind in your quaint and cozy fenced backyard with mountain views - perfect for pets and children. Enjoy dining under the large umbrella made with sailboat quality canvass. The stainless-steel refrigerator, dishwasher, and garbage disposal are new, and in 2015 there were several upgrades, which include: new deck with railings, concrete driveway, windows and doors, kitchen with granite counters, cherry wood cabinets, shower and spa tub, tankless water heater, wood floors, interior and exterior paint, new lighting and added motion sensor lights outside. In 2022, new blinds with top-down bottom-up option were installed, and the exterior shingles were re-stained. The low maintenance landscaping includes artificial turf in the backyard, an automatic drip sprinkler system, and drought tolerant landscaping is installed for water conservation. To complete this charming cottage is a lemon tree, a grapefruit tree and a large storage shed located in the backyard.

This charming three-bedroom bungalow is located in the heart of the village ofdowntown Sierra Madre. This charming 2-story townhome features a unique and versatile layout, with one bedroom and bath located on the main floor and the spacious master suite located upstairs. In the kitchen there is natural lighting and ample storage with an eating area looking out to the patio. There is direct access to the two-car garage, and an in unit laundry area upstairs. Making this a perfect choice for families or couples looking for a comfortable and convenient place to call home.

Welcome to 65 Monterey Lane, a single story ranch sitting on over a quarter acre of land on a beautiful tree lined street in one of Sierra Madre's most desirable locations. Located within the Village area of Sierra Madre is this charming traditional home with full guest house. The generous kitchen is filled with light and includes a spacious dining area. There are hardwood floors and newer windows throughout the 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, one level home. Adjacent to the kitchen is a mudroom that leads to the driveway and two-car garage. Accessible through a private exterior rear stairway is the guest house that is directly over the garage. The guest quarters include a living room, bedroom, study/office room, full kitchen, and bath, perfect as an in-law suite or possible rental income. The rear yard features a large grassy area and children's play space, as well as a separate carport for an RV or additional entertaining. The home also includes a large semi-finished basement with separate entrance. This is a wonderful property convenient to village shopping, restaurants, local public and private schools, public transportation, parks, and hiking trails. A true gem in the heart of beautiful Sierra Madre.

THIS SALE IS SUBJECT TO COURT CONFIRMATION!! This property is a duplex per the assessor and consists of a single family home and an apartment over the garage. This is a must see! This lovely property is perched on a hill overlooking the Sierra Madre canyon. This chalet style home is an open floorplan with a lofted bedroom, private bath and knotty pine ceilings and walls. The kitchen features original French Oak flooring, while the living room and upstairs include engineered wood. The bathroom has plenty of natural light and gorgeous white tile. French doors off of the living room open up to a lush backyard with native plants. Enjoy the panoramic mountain and canyon views while sipping your morning coffee on the tranquil viewing deck. Security cameras on property. PRICE REDUCTION!! $725, 000!!! Downtown LA 17 miles, with Metro Rail service from Sierra Madre Villa Station & Parking (3.5 mi). Huntington Gardens, Norton Simon Museum, CalTech, and JPL within 15 min drive.

Located at the north end of Sierra Madre, at the base of the foothills on one of Sierra Madre's quietest and most prestigious avenues. 72 West Carter is ideally situated less than a mile from the town's center and Mary's Market. Elegant contemporary living awaits in this impeccably reimagined home, offering unparalleled luxury! Beautifully remodeled down to the studs by La Placa Construction, this cul-de-sac abode features 4 bedrooms, 3 full baths and 1 half bath, multiple gathering areas that are sure to impress. From the recently landscaped front yard to the stunning facade, this is a residence that will delight you from the moment you arrive. Through the sleek glass entry, discover a bright and open main level displaying a fusion of neutral tones, volume ceilings with recessed lighting, and wide-plank wood flooring. Greet guests in the living room where expansive glass sliders allow an easy transition to the picturesque balcony. Intimate dinners are bliss under the glow of the stylish chandelier in the adjacent dining area. Generously proportioned, the brand new chef's kitchen is straight out of a design magazine with its suite of top-notch stainless steel appliances, gorgeous shaker-style cabinetry, gleaming quartz countertops, and a walk-in pantry. Crafted for the avid entertainer, the versatile, lower-level recreational area is a crowd favorite with its custom bar with 2 beverage fridges. Kick back and relax on cooler evenings as you soak up the warmth from the fireplace with a chic floor-to-ceiling tile. Backyard access lets you take the party outside. Wake up in the comfort of your private retreats, all graced with ceiling fans, wainscotted accent walls, and large closets for storage. Your secondary bedrooms share a fully updated bath with a double vanity and a shower/tub combo while the downstairs guest bedroom is accommodated by a bath with a frameless glass shower. Admire sensational views in the primary suite showcasing its own exclusive balcony, along with an oversized walk-in closet with built-in organizers. A barn door reveals an opulent 5-piece ensuite with a double vanity, mosaic tilework, an amazing shower with bench seating, and a spa-like soaking tub. Sliding doors open to the covered patio so you can enjoy seamless indoor/outdoor living. Multiple seating areas provide plenty of space for weekend cookouts & al fresco meals. A manicured lawn is just the right size for fun in the sun. Other noteworthy upgrades include the plumbing, electrical, roofing, windows, and sewer. Additionally, you have an attached 3-car garage, plus shopping & dining are easily accessible. Experience all this peaceful haven has to offer by coming for a tour before it's gone for good!

Prime Location!! First time ever that this custom built, well-maintained home has been on the market. Welcome home to this mid-century single level ranch style home nestled in the foothills of the quaint community of Sierra Madre. The functional floorplan, complete with new Anderson windows and hickory hardwood flooring, features a charming living room with fireplace and picturesque views of the San Gabriel Mountains; The light and bright kitchen, with custom cabinets, granite counters, Viking appliances, pantry and built-in desk, overlooks the formal dining area. Additionally, in the rear of the home, is a cozy family room with a fireplace and custom built ins with access to the lovely private backyard. This extra space could also serve as an office or fourth bedroom. A laundry/mudroom with closet and cabinets, plus a two car detached garage complete this charming home. All of this- with countless improvements- within the highly sought after town of Sierra Madre and just minutes to town, parks, trails and schools.

Beautiful Sierra Madre home located in the heart of the Highland Oaks area with Award Winning Arcadia Schools! text: 91 acres of land for sale in the City of Sierra Madre! The contiguous parcel numbers are 5764-001-019 and 5764-005-012. YOUR PRIVATE PARADISE Come discover this outstanding Sierra Madre gem situated at the base of the San Gabriel foothills with 180 degree views of the Valley, Los Angeles and Catalina. If you are looking for privacy and serenity this is the home for you. It's located on a cul-de-sac in a quiet neighborhood in the very desirable community of Sierra Madre. Sit on your front porch with mountain views and relax and enjoy the days as they turn into evenings. Take in the sunsets and the dazzling light show while sitting in your pool. Enjoy Alfresco dining under the spacious covered patio and the outdoor kitchen area. The cozy family room with a fireplace opens onto the large kitchen with a breakfast-bar island and wet-bar. Off the kitchen is the laundry room. A formal living room with fireplace and French doors lead to the covered patio. In addition there are four good-sized bedrooms and three bathrooms. The primary bedroom with En suite bath and ample closet space has French doors leading to a walled patio. One of the other three bedrooms is being used as a dining room off the family room. The entry way has brick floors that continue through the hallway to the bedrooms. There are also wood floors throughout. An oversized two-car garage with a separate storage room completes this 22, 073 SF lot and 2533 SF home that has been thoughtfully updated throughout the years.. This property with it's stunning mountainside and city lights views is a must see to believe. Welcome Home !

Two houses on a lot with deep yard located in beautiful Sierra Madre. Walking distance to downtown restaurant's, shopping and parks. Home features two bedrooms and one-bathroom, Hardwood floors, updated kitchen with custom cabinets and granite countertops. The second house with one bedroom, full bath. and kitchen.. It is approximately 468 sq ft. This is also in a area that is under new zoning. Chapter 17.32 / Chapter 17.60 can be used for business . Doctors, attorneys, architects, and others.

Nestled in the hills of the coveted city of Sierra Madre lies this magnificent 2 Story, 3 car Garage, custom build in 1990 2515 Sq Ft Craftsman Design home with 3 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms, a formal Dining Room, Living Room, 800 sq ft office/gym space. Below the house, with its own private entrance, is a self-contained private 1039 sq ft Guesthouse with 2 Bedrooms, 1 Bathroom, Laundry area, and Kitchen. Upon approaching, one cannot help but notice the specific details that were specifically made for this house such as the mahogany entry door, and custom handcrafted wood and stained glass outside light fixtures. As you get closer to the house, one is welcomed by an airy atrium adjacent to the main entry. As you enter and step onto the Landing, the same detail is carried out throughout the house with handcrafted custom light fixtures, handrails, custom made cabinetry in the guest bathroom, all oak doors, and walnut kitchen cabinets. From the Landing, your attention is drawn directly to the majestic views of the San Gabriel Valley. To the right, there is Guest bedroom with its own Bathroom with shower, and 2 large closets. The expansive Living room boasts a large fireplace with a mahogany mantle. The kitchen is equipped with professional grade appliances (Wolf stove/oven and Subzero refrigerator), and from the kitchen you step onto the inviting Zen terrace where you can spend your evenings unwinding, dining, or just enjoying your libation and reading a book in your private seating area. As you take the staircase down to the lower level, on one side is the large Master-suite with a decorative electric fireplace, sweeping views of the city with a recently renovated Bathroom with custom appointments such as a double sink, shower, soaking tub, and a master-closet with built-ins. Further down the hall is the second Bedroom. This bedroom too has views of the San Gabriel Valley, a functional fireplace, and is wired with entertainment center; currently being used as a Den-TV Room. Adjacent to this bedroom, there is a Bathroom with a shower. Once outside in the Backyard, you are captivated by the sound of the running Stream as it flows into a Pond, string light covered Patio which is perfect for entertaining, dining al fresco, or for a quiet retreat, salt-water pebble-tech Spa and Swimming Pool, outdoor Kitchen, built-in BBQ area, Bathroom, and Shower.This property has one extra parking space just a short walk for the home.

Charming and traditional single level pool home is set against the breathtaking San Gabriel mountain range. Both bright and spacious, this home boasts a wonderful floor plan including living room with fireplace. The dining room is conveniently located next to the kitchen. Three of the 4 bedrooms are located on one side of the home and share an updated bathroom including a full tub with shower. A master bedroom with bathroom and French doors to the outside is located on the other side of the home. Master bedroom could also be used as a den or home office. Outdoor living is perfect for entertaining. Enjoy a putting green, separate shed that could easily be used as a home office or playhouse, and a fully fenced pool. Invaluable features include: updated electrical, remodeled salt water pool, chimney, walkways, main hallway bathroom, windows, AC, newer flooring, 2018-foundation, water softener system provided by LifeSource, automatic side gate, newer sewer line to the street, 2010-roof, iron fencing, solar and so much more. Located with close proximity to charming downtown; explore shops, restaurants, parks, famous hiking trails, schools, and the celebrated Sierra Madre Playhouse. Come and appreciate this home in person.

The stunning Edgar W. Camp House designed and built by renowned architects Charles and Henry Greene in 1904. This beautiful property is a architectural masterpiece and a prime example of Greene and Greene's American Arts & Crafts Movement. Along with other Greene and Greene landmarks this home set a different design standard for estate homes with intricate craftsmanship and features that were considerably a higher standard in construction and design. Situated against the gorgeous foothills of Sierra Madre in a quiet cul-de-sac street with unbelievable mountain views. This landmark has been featured in many articles & architectural books and will make its big screen debut in the new upcoming Christopher Nolan movie Oppenheimer in 2023. The current owner took years meticulously restoring this amazing piece of history with exceptional attention to detail and style while keeping its architectural style and integrity. All of its components have been modernized. Home features 7 bedrooms + Guest quarters, 5.5 Bathrooms. First level: 4 bedrooms/3.5 bathrooms including guest quarters & all living areas. Second level:4 bedrooms/2 bathrooms. Large living room with dramatic ceilings and a spectacular arroyo stone fireplace that's even more breathtaking from the outside terrace. Den/family room w/fireplace & gorgeous build-ins. Formal Dining Room w/arroyo stone fireplace. Butler's pantry. Large kitchen w/eating area & room for large pantry. Primary suite w/large closet/dressing area & fully renovated custom designed primary bathroom w/Claw-foot tub & custom tile work cabinetry & hardware. Exterior consists of a Huge terrace pavilion for large gatherings and special events. Full basement. There is also expansive lawn with room for potential pool and ADU possibilities.
