Other features are; Newer Roof, PEX plumbing throughout, upgraded electrical system w/new sub panels, Tankless water heater, whole house filtration system, (2) zoned Central heating & air conditioning systems along w/all new duct work, Refurbished interior windows and trim and painted the structure inside and out, refurbished original Douglas Fir hardwood flooring throughout, new driveway along with newly designed landscaping w/special drought tolerant trees & bushes w/all new sprinkler & drip system and custom lighting around the entire perimeter of the property. This is truly a special home that must be seen. (Definite Mills ACT candidate with HUGE tax savings)

Situated up against the base of the San Gabriel Foothills is where you will find this stunning single level Sierra Madre gem. The property is ideally locted on a cul-de-sac street and corner lot providing for maximum privacy and quiet in this peaceful neighborhood. Upon entering into the foyer you are greeted by flowing wood floors that sprawl throughout the entire living space and give the home a spacious elegance. From there you find the inviting living and dining spaces which are separated by a striking raised hearth fireplace. The entertainers kitchen anchors the home with it's expansive center island, stainless steel appliances and eat in dining area. A large sliding glass door leads you to the flagstone covered patio which feels like an extension of the interior living space. Two bedrooms are serviced by the updated hallway bathroom and provide ample space. The impressive primary suite is drenched in natural light and provides direct access to the patio area. The attached primary bathroom is covered in luxurious marble tile and boasts dual sinks and high end finishes throughout. All of this includes a two car garage with EV charger setup, paid for solar, new plumbing, new sliding glass doors, tankless water heater, central heating & air and countless other updates. There you have it, an exceedingly rare to find, truly turn key home!

537-539 Sierra Madre is located within the highly sought- after community of Sierra Madre. The spacious triplex is perfectly situated on a tree-lined street and has amazing panoramic mountain views. Unit one is detached (single family house) features 2 bedrooms 1 bath built in 1949. Unit two and unit three are townhouse style and was built in 1986 with each featuring 2 bedrooms with 1 1/2 baths, total lot size of 11, 205 sq ft. You will be impressed with the newly renovated unit with open living and dining spaces, kitchen featuring granite countertops, and stainless-steel appliances. The living room has brick fireplace and is open to the kitchen and leads to the private backyard. Additional features include a laundry room on the first floor in each unit, wood flooring throughout the main living areas, central HVAC, fenced in private yard, carport parking for each unit plus guess parking. Beautiful, well maintained landscaping, close to downtown Sierra Madre. Lots of possibilities with this property as it could be the perfect income producing property with potential development for ADU's or additions.

This charming 3-bedroom 2-bathroom home is nestled in the foothills of Sierra Madre on over a third of an acre. The covered porch and entry invite you into a spacious living and dining area with a fireplace and beautiful wood floors. Meander through the upgraded kitchen to the light-filled family room, opening onto a tiered backyard that is perfect for entertaining. Relax in the shade of your oaks while sipping a morning coffee and enjoying the backdrop of the San Gabriel mountains, or head down the street for shops, restaurants and cafes, and everything there is to love about downtown Sierra Madre.

Welcome to your dream home! Nestled in the quaint community of Sierra Madre, this tastefully remodeled home stays true to the Spanish history of the city while boasting modern amenities. The crisp white backdrop allows the beautiful features of the home to harmonize never competing for attention. Dramatic kitchen cabinets paired beautifully with fine tiles and simple quartz countertops. The beautiful tiles surrounding fireplaces adding a dramatic element of design while also showcasing the wood floors. The bathrooms have classic elements while incorporating modern touches. This home has been designed with thought and pride for you!

Crafted with the avid entertainer in mind, this stunning, newly constructed Sierra Madre residence is a true showstopper and will take your breath away at first impression! Set on a sizable lot, an impressive brick paver driveway welcomes you upon arrival. Manicured landscaping leads you to the front door with the area magnificently illuminated at night by an array of lighting. Come inside to discover a neutral-hued palette across an open layout that's further enlivened by natural sunlight coming in through a host of windows. Sleekly designed, the abode's modern farmhouse style delivers a remarkably crisp, contemporary look with light wide-plank floors flowing gracefully throughout. A fireplace lends warmth to a decidedly luxurious living room where visitors can bask in verdant vistas through black-trimmed windows. The home chef can serve fine fare from the nearby kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stylish pendant lighting, elegant white cabinetry, and a 4-seater waterfall island. Bespoke details abound with a gleaming backsplash, floating wooden shelving, and gold accents defining your culinary space. A beautifully ornate chandelier makes the dining area an ideal setting for enjoying meals any time of day. Once you're ready to call it a night, 4 all-white, generously sized bedrooms with wood-look floors, recessed lights, and ceiling fans are sure to wrap you in total serenity. Glass sliders in the primary suite frame scenic views of the yard. You can effortlessly admire the panoramas from your private retreat or head out for fresh air without ever venturing far from your quarters. Pamper yourself after a long day in the sumptuous ensuite, fitted with dual vanities, chic light fixtures, a walk-in shower, and stress-dissolving tub. One of the other bedrooms could be a dedicated home office, and your additional 2 baths equally showcase clean, refined touches. Living here, you'll want to carve out time for leisure and relaxation with a sensational mulch-lined brick paver patio in your outdoor oasis. Whether you want to dine alfresco in multiple seating areas, play with the little ones, or catch up on your reading. As if that weren't enough, the immaculate home also features an attached 2-car garage and is conveniently situated near shops, restaurants, parks, and schools. Melding an exquisite design with comfort-inducing bedrooms, terrific spaces for entertaining, and a superb location, you will be instantly captivated by this gem.

Gorgeous, Modern, Architectural Home Located in a Serene Resort Like Community Nestled in the Beautiful City of Sierra Madre. Tastefully remodeled 2-bedroom 3-bathroom town home. As you enter this stylish home, you will be drawn to its stunning peaceful beauty, abundance of light, and open layout. New wood laminate flooring lead your eyes to the spacious and open living room with a fireplace. Proceed to the formal dining room, continuing to the bright and spacious kitchen with beautiful quartz counter tops, soft close double stacked cabinets, stainless steel appliances, farm house sink, and plenty of storage, both leading to a private backyard and deck, perfect for entertaining. A convenient half bath completes this level. Continuing up the stairs, you are greeted by two spacious bedrooms and beautifully renovated bathrooms with modern contemporary touches. The master suite is generous in size and features a walk-in closet with its own fireplace. The second bedroom flooded with natural light from the pristine bay windows overlooking the courtyard. Built in cabinets along the hallway provide an abundance of space and ample storage. Behind the private attached 2-car garage and laundry room, sits a finished bonus room with a private entrance and window, which can be used as flex space, office for those who need a place to work from home, or even as a guest bedroom - it just depends on what you need. If that wasn't enough, a brand new roof just installed in July! Truly a gem not to be missed!

Lovely Sierra Madre Canyon home offering a comfortable blend of indoor and outdoor living. This home was completely rebuilt in 2003 including new walls, bamboo flooring, copper plumbing, electrical and foundation reinforcement. The open floor plan is bathed in natural light through the multiple windows and solar tubes. A large rooftop deck accessible from the backyard offers an outdoor kitchen complete with a sink with hot and cold running water, electrical outlets, a cook burner and a barbecue. There is plenty of room on this 461 sqft deck to entertain, work or relax under mature oak trees. There are wonderful mountain and canyon views from the deck and you will even spot hikers on the Mt Wilson Trail. The terraced yard also offers a copper shower and soaking tub with room for two. Both have hot and cold running water supplied by a new dedicated on-demand water heater. There is a worm composting system and areas for growing your own produce including a raised bed planter. There are also multiple fruit trees. The household grey water system is also an amazing feature! The front porch and yard offer relaxed outdoor seating as well. This quiet, secluded home is located on a footpath accessible from Woodland Dr. Parking is nearby on the street or at the public lot. The canyon offers local social opportunities at Mary's Market and Cafe ( and Nature Friends social club ( Downtown Sierra Madre, with its many shops and restaurants, is 1.5 miles away. There are many nearby hiking trails including the Mt Wilson Trail which is 3/4 mile from the home.

Tucked away in the foothills of beautiful Sierra Madre is this well-maintained 2, 070 sq. ft., 3 bedroom, 3 bath home. The 10, 564 sq. foot lot has an amazing backyard with mountain views. Entering the home there is a large living room with a wood-burning fireplace. The kitchen has granite counter tops, updated dishwasher, new stove top/range, and new refrigerator. The kitchen opens up to the dining area which has great views to the backyard. There is a spacious den/family room upstairs that could also be used as a 4th bedroom. There are two bedrooms and a full hall bath upstairs. The 3rd bedroom is the primary bedroom with en suite bathroom. The park-like backyard is beautiful and can easily host large gatherings for friends and family! The brick patio leads out to a large turf area that is surrounded by numerous mature trees and drought-tolerant landscaping. There is plenty of room to build a pool or spa and possibility for an ADU. In 2017, significant improvements were made to the home, including a new roof, new upper floor AC, repaved driveway, new awnings, and new paint to the exterior of the house. Sierra Madre is one of the most charming, family-friendly towns in the Los Angeles area. This home is a three-minute walk to a park with a playground, baseball fields, and tennis courts, and a 15-minute walk to downtown Sierra Madre shops and restaurants. Close to the 210 Freeway, Pasadena, and downtown LA.

Beautiful ranch style family home situated in one of the most desirable and charming neighborhoods in the San Gabriel Valley. Sierra Madre is a hidden gem community close to great schools, boutique shopping, and abundant dining options. Nestled along a majestic cul-de-sac tree lined street, this charming 4 bedroom and 3 bathroom home offers 2, 700 Square Feet of space and is set on a spacious 17, 000 Square Foot Lot. The light filled home offers a separate large Living Room, Family Room and Dining Room all with beautiful views to the exterior garden and mountains to the North. Additionally, this home features a spacious Master Suite with an en-suite bathroom as well as an additional 3 bedrooms. A few of the upgrades include all new refinished wood flooring throughout as well as new interior paint and light fixtures. Other features include a brand new top of the line HVAC system and an attached 2 car high ceiling garage with plenty of extra parking on the driveway and a steel roof. Landscaping is beautiful with tons of color and is a joy to view with a private pool tucked on the side along with plenty of space to enhance the backyard. Easy access to local schools, mountain trails, trendy restaurants, and Sierra Madre's quaint Downtown. This property has been lovingly cared for and has not been on the market for the last 50 years. Come enjoy what this property has to offer, you won't be disappointed.

This rare and highly desirable turn key , ONE LEVEL. 3 bedroom, 2 bath condo is located in a lovely complex very close to downtown Sierra Madre. The home features an open floor plan, cathedral ceilings, a fireplace, large eat in kitchen and a very private lush patio/yard. The flooring has all been replaced and the kitchen remodeled. The primary suite is very large overlooking the back patio and yard and features a newly remodeled bathroom and extensive lighted built in closet. Also there is a very convenient door from the suite opening out to the patio. The double attached garage features lots of storage shelves and a laundry area. All appliances are included. Dont miss this very rare opportunity to own a one level condo in Sierra Madre.
full_street_line: 75 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit B

text: Welcome Home! This captivating townhome is located in the charming community of Sierra Madre where you are just minutes from restaurants, shopping, and many other local favorites. This lovely home offers a large primary bedroom, in addition to two generously sized bedrooms. Luxury vinyl plank flooring on both the top and bottom floors allows for stylish living with easy maintenance. Just off the back bedroom a sliding door leads to your own private patio excellent for entertaining, or to simply enjoy your peekaboo view of the San Gabriel Mountains. Stay cool with a newer AC unit installed in 2020 or go for a refreshing dip in the well-maintained association pool and spa! Additional features include a direct access 2 car garage, fireplace, separate laundry room, and an additional patio off the dining room. Come tour it soon, this is one you won't want to miss!
full_street_line: 263 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit L

text: Once in a lifetime opportunity to own a beautifully designed home on a large half acre lot with spectacular views of the San Gabriel Valley and Los Angeles. Located in a highly desirable and prestigious north Arcadia neighborhood, this mid-century classic is officially in Sierra Madre, and is within the Arcadia school district with easy access to Santa Anita Avenue. It is an entertainer's dream with expansive views from its windows and large decks. The large pool and built-in poolside Lynx gas grill facilitate and celebrate the outdoor California lifestyle. The home was built with privacy in mind while its open, bright, and airy floor plan showcases the sweeping, breathtaking views from almost every room. This home features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, 2 large ground-level bonus rooms, a spacious living room and kitchen, a den with vaulted cathedral ceilings, with 2 gas fireplaces and luxurious wool carpeting throughout the home. Additional highlights include custom pavement on the large circular driveway and pool area; and beautiful stonework on the large covered patio, entry walkway, and pool. The master bedroom patio opens to a dedicated hot tub area and the park-like expansive backyard with gorgeous landscaping. The lot has been extensively terraced and landscaped to maximize and create usable space. Recent improvements include an updated dual zone HVAC and new water heater, new finest quality roof, and a backup generator transfer switch. Any future updates can easily be accomplished in this timeless design, with amazing potential to customize. A house of this quality, location, lot size, and view is rarely available and won't last long.

Set on a spacious lot, this recently remodeled 1951 Mid-Century traditional style home is well located on beautiful East Grandview Avenue in Sierra Madre with Arcadia schools. Enter the home through the beautiful front yard with lighted steps, partial drought tolerant landscaping, and a long pathway to the front door. This light-filled home offers hardwood floors throughout and an open layout. The beautiful living room features a large stacked stone fireplace and opens to the dining area. The eat-in updated kitchen features granite counters with KitchenAid and Whirlpool appliances, custom designed cabinetry with pull-out drawers, built-in seating area with storage under, plus a kitchen island. Adjacent to the kitchen is a separate, spacious laundry room with built-in cabinetry and a newer half bath with Marimekko wallpaper. The relaxing primary suite offers custom built-ins, custom closets, a built-in makeup area and glass sliders offer a scenic view of the backyard. The spa-like primary bathroom has a sanctuary feel, offering custom-designed bamboo cabinets and door, imported faucets, imported lighting with high-end Italian marble and mosaic tiles in the roll-in large shower and tub has whirlpool with mood lighting. Off from primary suite there is a large office with built-in desk and cabinets with fireplace which could be a 4th bedroom.There are two good size additional bedrooms with large closets and an adjacent large updated full bathroom with slate tile, dual sinks, a large separate stall shower, and bathtub. There is a family room with sliding doors that lead you to a large tiled patio, barbecue area, and a crystal fire pit and waterfall fountain. Beyond this patio, there is a large rear yard with lots of fruit trees, andhas lots of possibilities, such as the potential for a swimming pool or accessory dwelling unit on this 14, 851 SF lot. Additional features include copper plumbing, a tankless water heater, water softener, 3 fountains, central air, and heating. The carport has large built-in storage.

In the same family for three generations, this is a rare opportunity to own one of the city's most charming residential income properties on a lovely, tree studded drive. There are four, free-standing1934-built cottage bungalows (287, 293, 299, 299.5 W. Grandview) consisting of three 2 bedroom, 1 bath units and one 1 bedroom, 1 bath unit, all on a 23, 269 sq. ft. lot, plus a 1958-built single family house with 2 bedrooms and a bath (301 W. Grandview) on its own 16, 025 sq. ft. lot. The property has been well maintained and offers possible development potential for ADUs, expansion of the house, or new construction on the expansive house lot. Special features include updated kitchens and baths, in-unit laundry facilities, central air conditioning, and private rear yards (1 bedroom unit offers wall a/c but no private yard), plus partial mountain views in a beautiful residential setting.

IMPROVED PRICE! Tucked away amid towering oaks on a secluded cul-de-sac, this contemporary Craftsman-style home, designed and built by Mursol, has been beautifully maintained by its original owners. Sited to afford the utmost in privacy, the builders took advantage of the majestic surroundings to create an architectural masterpiece that will surely impress. A stone-clad covered veranda with an artisan entry welcomes you to the two-story foyer displaying neutral tones, rich hardwood floors and impeccable mill work. Stately fireplaces adorn the living and family rooms along with plantation shuttered windows. In the dining room, elegant wallpaper adds a timeless appeal and French doors lead to the patio to let you take your meals alfresco. A gourmet, 5-star kitchen was upgraded to equip the modern chef with premium appliances (including a built-in oven, a wine cooler, and a Wolf range) and a water-purification system. Gorgeous cabinetry, a breakfast nook, and granite countertops extending to the prep island complete this expanded culinary space. Truly an inviting escape, the primary suite features a balcony, a walk-in closet, and a spa-like 5-piece bath with a freestanding soaking tub. The upper level offers three more bedrooms (one of them with en-suite bath) and a full bath. In addition, there are two versatile bonus rooms with an east-facing deck overlooking picturesque mountain and city light views. A peaceful, private haven, ideal for entertaining, the manicured grounds have a well-sized patio with a built-in BBQ and fridge. Other noteworthy items include a large laundry room, dual-zone HVAC, security system, and custom copper gutters that all drain underground to exit in the driveway. An attached, two-car garage completes this amazing abode that will not last long on the market.

Adorable home tucked away in the prestigious town of Sierra Madre! The entry welcomes you to a beautiful living room with a pot belly stove next to the French doors that open up to the adorable patio. The house features two bedrooms and a full bath, has a galley kitchen with upgraded counter top, ample storage, gooseneck faucet and cute kitchenette area. It has a upgraded bathroom and an attached one car garage. It is surrounded by lush greenery, and located near Mount Wilson Trailhead and Park. The house features lots of natural sunlight from the living room windows. This quaint home is surrounded by various fruit trees. It is miles away from city noise and it is nestled in the foothills of the beautiful and exclusive Sierra Madre Canyon. Just relax and enjoy the peaceful and serene living!

Built in 2005 and completely remodeled in 2020, this outstanding multi-level townhome is set within a community of just six units. When entering this 3 Bedroom + Den, 2.5 Bath Craftsman townhome, you'll notice right away how the home is filled with natural light from the large windows, high vaulted ceilings, and an open floor plan. Fully updated custom kitchen, subway tile backsplash, and Wi-Fi enabled appliances all opens up to the dining area. The living room is open and spacious and features a connecting private patio as well as a floor to ceiling gas fireplace. The home also has an attached 2-car private garage, EV charging outlet, and guest parking. Enjoy low HOA monthly fees and being two blocks from Downtown Sierra Madre and Memorial Park, where street fairs, parades, and summer concerts are held.

Hidden gem in charming Sierra Madre. Home with huge potential and large lot awaits the new owner with ADU possibilities! Step into a spacious living room with redbrick fireplace and oversized front window; enjoy an abundance of natural light and majestic mountain views. Living room flows into separate kitchen and dining area.Two generous sized bedrooms share a main hallway bathroom with step-in shower. Additional features include-freshly painted, new flooring in all rooms, recently installed washer and dryer, front yard landscaping, fully fenced backyard with new fencing in places, attached garage. Close proximity to 210 freeway and downtown Sierra Madre with shops, restaurants, parks, famous hiking trails, schools, library, and the celebrated Sierra Madre Playhouse.

Nestled in the enchanting Sierra Madre Canyon, this 1916 home is sure to capture many hearts. Completely move-in ready, the home has been lovingly maintained inside and out. Cross the delightful footbridge to a patio full of herbs and native plants while listening to the sounds of the creek. Once inside, many windows bathe the home in east-facing light, while the two-story floorplan is open and airy. Downstairs spaces include a generous dining room, cozy living room with fireplace, large kitchen, one bedroom (currently used as a den), and a full bath. Upstairs are two bedrooms, a three-quarter bath, and a laundry area. A backyard patio is shaded by two magnificent oak trees. Recent improvements include a new roof, a renovated foundation, central heating and air, new electrical panels, and a water-wise drip irrigation system. Extra features include: highly rated Sierra Madre schools, a detached garage, additional parking, and easy-care yard. Close to hiking trails and a short walk to Mary's Market, this sweet property is sure to sell fast.

Fabulous opportunity! Lovely hillside canyon lot in an established neighborhood with tree top views. Close to Mountain Trail and the charming town of Sierra Madre with it's quaint shops and eateries.Lot is between 306 and 380 Churchill.

Highly sought-after single level, beautifully updated, turn-key condominium located on a quiet tree-lined street in the charming town of Sierra Madre. Set in a peaceful, gated and lushly landscaped complex this three bedroom, two bath home has an open floor plan featuring a sunlit living room with soaring ceilings and fireplace leading to the dining room and opening to a charming, secluded patio perfect for relaxing over cup of morning coffee or entertaining al fresco on a warm summer evening. The large, beautifully appointed remodeled kitchen features a cozy breakfast nook and plenty of room for prep and easy entertaining. The lovely master suite with updated bath offers high ceilings and a walk-in closet with sliding doors leading to the private patio. Brand new stackable washer and dryer are conveniently located in the master alcove. The sunny second bedroom can be used as an office, a bedroom or an extension to the master. Second bathroom was recently updated. Freshly painted with gleaming wood floors in the common areas and cozy carpeting in the bedrooms, central heat and air, and skylights, this condo is priced to move! All appliances are included. Pre-listing general inspection report available confirming move-in condition. This lovely home won't last long! Showings during open houses only beginning June 22nd. Offers due Monday, June 27th.

Welcome to this 1952 tastefully updated ranch style home, nestled against the mountains of Sierra Madre, and tucked away on a quiet friendly street. Offering 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, this 1, 861 square foot home has an open and inviting floor plan, with an updated kitchen featuring Carrara marble countertops, newer appliances, hardwood floors, and a center island. The kitchen is open to the dining and living rooms, which also feature hardwood floors, a fireplace, recessed lighting, large windows, plus French doors leading to the rear yard. The primary suite is spacious, with recessed lighting, a large closet, and an updated bathroom with dual sinks and a separate toilet closet. The remaining 3 bedrooms are large, also featuring recessed lights and spacious closets. The newly landscaped rear yard showcases a detached garage, vegetable garden, loquat, jujube, and guava trees, plus a pea gravel sitting area. This 9, 338 square foot lot has so much to offer, including a long driveway, seating areas in the front and rear yards, and drought tolerant landscaping throughout with a custom drip sprinkler system. Come enjoy all the amenities of this move-in ready home, and experience the charm of the location. This home is in close proximity to Sierra Madre's charming downtown with coffee shops, restaurants, and shopping just a few blocks away, as well as Sierra Madre Middle School nearby.

Located in a friendly neighborhood in Sierra Madre, this light-filled early-century home is filled with character and charm. The long front walkway leads up to a welcoming front porch - the perfect place to sip your morning coffee. Enter into the spacious, open concept dining and living room with large windows, warm hardwood flooring & recessed lighting. Continue to the kitchen and find beautiful granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast bar overlooking the living room - great for chatting with guests while preparing their favorite meal. Both bedrooms are spacious, and the main suite features a walk-in closet, as well as an ensuite with a large walk-in shower & separate soaking tub, dual sinks, and backyard access. The backyard features a covered patio, made for entertaining, plenty of space for playing or gardening, and a fabulous avocado tree! A closed in porch houses the laundry area, a California basement, and offers plenty of extra room for game tables or storage. The 2-car detached garage also boasts a versatile bonus room which would make a great playroom, private home office, or home gym. Just blocks from the downtown shops and restaurants, Kersting Court, and Sierra Madre schools, this move-in ready home truly has it all. Welcome home!

This private, gated property feels like your own secluded estate nestled in the foothills of Sierra Madre. The driveway lined with abundant fruit trees and a park-like lawn leads to a large, gracious, traditional home with an extremely comfortable and functional floor plan providing a multitude of private living spaces. The front walk frames the gracious sun-lit entry which opens to the living and dining room providing views of the front garden and the private patio with pool and spa out back. Adjacent to the dining room is the large, bright and airy kitchen with a center island and counter for casual dining. Tucked next to the kitchen is a wonderful bonus space perfect for an office or craft room. The kitchen opens to the spectacular family room with fireplace, high beam ceiling and cozy breakfast nook with doors spilling out to patio providing wonderful flow for entertaining. At the end of the day everyone can retire to the privacy of their own private living space. Two master suites - one upstairs and one down offer the ultimate in personal privacy. Upstairs also features a sitting room and additional bedroom with views of the mountains that can be used as an office or nursery. Downstairs features an additional ensuite bedroom in the north wing and two more bedrooms with a library/office in the south wing. The icing on the cake are the two, two-car garages! You can protect your fleet of luxury vehicles or use one as the ultimate man-cave/game room with the existing standard sized pool table, bumper pool table and beautiful wood bar. Conveniently located on a quiet street one block from award-wining Sierra Madre Elementary School, it's just a short walk to the heart of downtown Sierra Madre's many shops and restaurants. With some tender loving care this is your chance to make this private, gated property a showpiece and a home for generations to come. Don't miss it. Accepting Back-Up Offers!

Welcome to 181 Colony Drive a beautiful single story mid century ranch on a corner lot in one of Sierra Madre's most desirable locations. As you approach the house from either Colony or Fane you will notice an abundance of parking in addition to the drive and two car garage. The front and rear yards have been professionally landscaped creating maximum curb appeal with native plants, river rocks and a decomposed granite walkway over a rock stream. The east facing front porch offers the morning sun and evening shade for relaxing. On entering the foyer you will notice a retro French styled kitchen with custom tiles on the left and a open living room with fireplace, dining room and den exiting to the rear patio. There are three bedrooms and two baths to the right of the foyer with plenty of closets and storage areas. The back yard has been landscaped with an abundance of native plants and fruit trees and offers a quiet serene environment to either entertain or enjoy a peaceful evening on the shaded patio. The property has been well maintained with a replaced roof, water heater and HVAC system plus just painted and cleaned for a new owner. It is walking distance to Sierra Vista Park on Sierra Madre Blvd and all of downtown Sierra Madre.

Wonderful family home nestled in the foothills of Sierra Madre in a splendid neighborhood with the perfect combination of neighbors and privacy. This home, which has been thoughtfully updated throughout the years, has the ideal flow for entertaining indoors and out. There are notes of mid-century modern as well as contemporary living in both style and character. As the day comes to an end, watch the changing colors of the western sky from the sizable yet cozy living room with its soaring, vaulted ceilings, wood-burning fireplace and chimney that rises to the ceiling. Beautiful new hickory wood floors start in the ample dining room on into the kitchen that adjoins the family room offering an open concept floor plan, without too much open concept. Off the family room is a laundry area, pantry, and a bathroom accessible from the side yard. The four good sized bedrooms are on the second floor and offer plenty of storage. A large light-filled primary bedroom features a vaulted ceiling and a brand new en suite bathroom. The property, with its stunning mountainside, treetop, and city light views, has many native drought-tolerant plants, and a sparkling pool (with safety fence stored in garage which is included). Relax on the deck or the patio where you can enjoy family, friends, the birdsong, and other visiting wildlife while enjoying the tranquil view of the mountain hillside. This home offers the perfect place in which to build your lifetime memories!

Just In Time For Summer POOL Fun! Enjoy The Prestigious Sierra Madre Lifestyle & Location! Come Discover 472 SANTA ANITA COURT! This Fabulously Spacious 1, 945 SF Three Bedroom, Three Bathroom Home, is Situated on a Gorgeous Expansive & Rare 15, 000+SF Lot (Total 2 Lots 11, 164 + 4, 000), Long Driveway, Ample Parking, Plus Huge App 900sf+/- Garage Building w/Bonus Room/Office, and 3rd Yard! Resort-Like Posh Oasis-Style Pool & Spa Summer Ready Back Yard Beckons At First Sight! Complete w/Covered Patio, Terraces, BBQ Island, & Lush Green Gardens Sprinkled w/Blooms of Color! This Serene & Picturesque Setting is Ideal for Celebrations, Parties, Relaxing, & Romantic Dining Al Fresco Evenings Under the Stars! The Handsome Front Approach, Curb Appeal & Manicured Yard Welcomes You In. The Stunning 1960's Architectural Aesthetics Are Amazing, w/Thoughtfully Designed Details & Floorplan For Gracious Living, Connections & Flow! The Stately Front Door Entry Opens to a Voluminous Living Room w/Tall Vaulted Beam Ceiling, Impressive Rock Fireplace Wall, Wide Sliders & Scenic Outside Views! Chef Ready for Delectable Gourmet Creations + Sweet Treats, This Newly Updated Kitchen is Crisp, Clean & Stylish in Luxe Shades of Gray + White, and Offers Open Counter Seating & Dining Room Access. Center Hall Leads To All Bedrooms. Master Bedroom Retreat w/En-Suite Bathroom + Sitting Area. Updated Windows & Sliders, Whole House Water & Air Filtration Systems! Two Solar Energy Systems, Fenced Yard, Beautiful Mountain Views & So Much More! Welcome Home! Ease of Proximity To All Amenities & 210 Fwy.

Classic bread and butter triplex located in a great location in Highly Desirable Sierra Madre. Perfect for owner user or investor. Huge down stairs unit is perfect for an owner user, 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, central air, laundry hook up, approx 1500 sq.ft. One of the upstairs units is a 2 bedroom 1 bath, approx. 850 sq.ft. and the other upstairs unit is a 1 bedroom 1 bath, approx 700 sq.ft. 3 single car garages, plus extra parking Separate electric meters. All rents are current. !! Walking Distance to downtown Sierra Madre.!! Conveniently located near schools, a variety of restaurants, shopping.

Traditional French Country Cottage, with its generous set back from the street and breathtaking views of the San Gabriel mountains, the approach to the residence begins at the semi-circular driveway which passes by the red-brick enhanced main entry, and continues along the east side of the home, and under to the carport to the rear and terminates at the detached, oversized two-car garage. The abundance of verdant landscaping affords the front entrance a level of seclusion that can found, found throughout upscale communities. Enjoy the fully fenced yard with its generous, finely trimmed lawn and mature landscaping; perfect for entertaining. This home is a must see and ready for your personal touch. Enter the front door and become inspired with the dramatically domed, high living room ceiling, accented by the domed picture window; reminiscent of an of solitude still found in the communities cradled by the San Gabriels. The prominent picture window is complimented on both sides with recessed bookcases. The fireplace with its marble mantle and pilasters is the perfect finishing touch for this well-appointed living room that is sure to impress. Many rooms feature wood flooring. Pass through the expansive archway into the dining room where the glittering chandelier and abundant windows and French doors compete to provide the most lighting. The French doors lead out to the front and side of the home. The home features 3 bedrooms and 3 bathroom, 2 of which are en-suite bedrooms with generous walk-in closets and views of the backyard and the San Gabriels. The formal study is tastefully accented with built-in, dark oak bookshelves and cabinets and the ceiling with its exposed dark oak beams. The bay window seating area is the perfect space for reading and reflection. The kitchen features a peninsula-positioned cooktop and large, black and white, checkerboard flooring. The cabinetry has clear glass doors The butler's pantry features generous sized countertop, ample drawer space and wall-to-wall, eye-level cabinetry with clear glass facings. The central hallway features crown molding and classic wainscoting with wall mounted light fixtures. Located in close proximity to charming downtown; explore shops, restaurants, parks, famous hiking trails, schools, and the celebrated Sierra Madre Playhouse.

You have asked for an untouched Mid-Century ranch home in original condition. This is on the market for the first time! This single-story home sits on more than a quarter acre of usable flat land. It even has chicken coops waiting for you to put to use. It features hardwood floors, original tile and period bathroom lighting, living room fireplace, formal dining room, dinette off kitchen, four bedrooms and two full baths, separate laundry room with built-in pantry and storage. There is even an enclosed porch which can be used in multiple ways. BONUS!! ... large office/workshop behind a full 3-car garage. Outside find citrus and shade trees, and room for a raised bed garden! So much of what you want!

PRICE ADJUSTMENT! Here is your chance to own a little slice of heaven in Sierra Madre! Modern-day Craftsman retreat with a Mid Century Modern vibe. The home has recently undergone a complete remodel/renovation with attention to detail throughout the entire home. Situated in a very private setting, you feel as you have escaped the hustle and bustle of your busy LA lifestyle and entered a world of peace and tranquility. Entering the front custom gate, you notice the stone paver walkway and the Craftsman details of this custom home. Walking in the front door of the home, you are blown away with the vintage charm, and open floor plan of the home. Beamed ceilings, oak wood flooring, gorgeous fireplace, walls of glass, and gourmet kitchen open to the living space. The chef's kitchen features a 6-burner gas range with double oven, stainless steel refrigerator and separate freezer, quartz countertops, farmhouse sink, and custom cabinets. Other features include a formal dining room, separate laundry room, and a massive primary suite with beamed ceilings, walk-in closet, balcony, and dual sinks, soaking tub in the primary bathroom. Additional upgrades include: Newer dual pane windows, doors, plumbing, electrical, roof, split-unit HVAC systems, and three separate tankless water heaters. Looking for separate office space, art studio, or guest house for family or friends? A separate detached ADU awaits you complete with a kitchen, bedroom, large closet, living room, bathroom, and private outside sitting area. Have a green thumb? Mature landscaping abounds the entire property, adorned with multiple fruit trees, large avocado tree, and several landscaped terraced areas. Outside of the living room through glass doors leads you to the front porch and side patio area perfect for relaxing or having dinner al fresco with family or friends. 2 large storage rooms, 2 car garage, and driveway parking for 4 more cars finish off this impressive home. Close proximity to Sierra Madre Town, Sierra Madre, Alverno, St Rita, and Gooden Elementary schools, parks, hiking trails, restaurants and shopping. Come view this exquisite Sierra Madre home, you will not be disappointed!

Mid-Century classic, single family custom home designed and built by Dennis G. Smith, AIA, for himself in 1966. Dennis G. Smith later became a partner of the well-known architectural firm, Buff and Hensman, now Buff, Smith and Hensman. The firm designed many custom homes around the Southern California area and won more than 30 awards for home designs from the American Institute of Architects. This home was featured in the August 1968 edition of Home Magazine. The large wood deck beautifully wraps around the living areas and is situated in the midst of the branches of two large avocado trees. Exposed tongue-and-groove roof decking adds warmth and texture. Wood is used extensively throughout the house, establishing a pleasant architectural rhythm. There are also custom built-ins throughout the home. Beautiful garden areas are located on both sides of the property, which enhance the architecture and offer an unmatched horticultural experience with numerous varieties of plants. The master bedroom suite includes a private patio off the bathroom. A large storage room/office with deep built-in cabinetry at rear of carport, vented to central heating and air system, perfect for a home office or hobby room. This home sits on a large 8, 900/sf, secluded, corner lot. This is truly a beautiful home.

This Sierra Madre traditional is located on a quiet cul-de-sac and is sited nicely upon a knoll offering an immediate sense of home with brick accents and a graceful multi-trunk Sycamore welcoming all to the South-facing entry. The home features well maintained original hardwood floors throughout, a remodeled kitchen and a peaceful backyard for at home relaxation and visits with family and friends. The living room and separate dining room both offer large picture windows that capture the sun and delights of nature throughout the day. In addition to the hardwood flooring, the living room features tray ceilings and a lovely brick fireplace. The updated kitchen features granite counters, tile backsplash, newer appliances, and offers a desirable open floor plan to the comfortable family room with a central brick fireplace, built-in desk and verdant views of the rear yard through large sliding glass doors. Two nicely sized bedrooms are at opposite ends of the central hallway and share a full bathroom. The home has an extra-long driveway with plenty of space for parking as well as easy entry into the kitchen or family room from the rear of the property. The backyard has views of the San Gabriels, mature landscaping, a soothing fountain and covered brick patio space for comfortable entertaining. The garage is currently being used as a workshop and has an additional room wired and ready to be used as office, hobby room or simply convenient storage. This home has been well maintained and will offer the lucky new owners an opportunity for a peaceful life on Edgeview Drive.

Unique and tightly held, this multi-generational Sierra Madre residence has been beautifully maintained by the same owner for almost 25 years! Ideally located on a 10, 062-sq ft lot, this home is located within walking distance to the local hiking trails and displays a striking curb appeal highlighted by its towering trees. Across the 2, 162 sq ft, 4-bedroom, 3-bath layout, natural light filters through the multiple updated windows. A perfect spot to curl up on cooler nights, a stately fireplace awaits in the formal living room. Steps away, the dining area basks in a chandelier's glow as rich hardwoods cascade underfoot. Cook up favorite meals in the sunlit and stylish kitchen equipped with updated counters, new fixtures, built-in appliances, and a cozy breakfast nook. The den offers beamed ceilings and its own fireplace and can be an ideal home office. Designed for entertaining, the formal living room offers a bar area ideal for your cocktail hours and oversized French doors opening to the patio. Ceiling fans create a comfortable atmosphere in the private retreats, including the primary bedroom with its cathedral ceilings, a large walk-in closet and direct access to the patio. Verdant hedges line the perimeter of the backyard, providing seclusion as you enjoy weekend cookouts on the patio. Additional perks include a designated laundry area, 2-car detached garage with storage, gleaming hardwood floors, newer carpets in the bedrooms, updated electrical fixtures and 2 separate HVAC systems. Come call this incredible abode your own before someone else does!

This beautiful 1, 429 sq.ft Sierra Madre townhouse features 2 primary suites and 3 bathrooms with an open floor plan. This home is beautifully updated and move in ready. The secure complex is walking distance to downtown Sierra Madre shops, restaurants and parks. The spacious living room features new flooring, can lights, window treatments and updated sliding glass doors that provide great natural light. The living room opens to a serene private brick patio, perfect for reading and morning coffee. The kitchen has been completely remodeled with new cabinets, quartz countertops, glass subway backsplash, stainless appliances, sink and fixtures. The kitchen opens to a large dining area that overlooks the living room and patio. Off the dining area is an updated powder bath with quartz counter tops, new fixtures, flooring and lighting. Upstairs features 2 primary suites. Both en suite bathrooms have been updated with quartz countertops, new flooring, lighting and fixtures. One suite offers a walk in shower, the other a shower/tub that has been remodeled with marble subway tile. Both rooms have large custom built closets with mirrored doors. There is direct access into the unit from the 2 car garage. Upgrades include, new roof, skylights, brick patio, interior paint, new baseboards, carpet, flooring, can lights, re-piped hot and cold water, new water heater, Honeywell temp control, newer front door and windows. The complex features a secured gate with intercom and a beautiful pool.
full_street_line: 125 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit C

text: This single-family home sits on a large corner lot with a pool in the beautiful City of Sierra Madre. Just down the street from shops and restaurants. Upon entry, you'll notice a spacious living area with two fireplaces blending into the dining room and kitchen. Off the kitchen is plenty of storage space and a laundry room. The three bedrooms wrap around the other end of the home and include the primary suite with a private bathroom. Both bathrooms in the house feature a double vanity. Access the backyard through the sliding doors or laundry room to access the pool and 2-car garage with a built-out workshop area.
Single level, 4 bedroom, 2 bath home in Sierra Madre.

Searching for an ideal abode where you can simply move in, unpack, and relax? Fully restored in 2018, this immaculate Sierra Madre residence offers just that since all the hard work has been done for you! As you step inside, a grand 2-story foyer will greet you with soaring vaulted ceilings, neutral tones, and wide-plank European oak engineered-hardwood flooring throughout. Beautiful Milgard windows adorned with custom shades usher in radiant sunlight to illuminate the open living room and chandelier-lit dining area. Sure to delight the home chef, a wall of gorgeous cabinetry houses your suite of KitchenAid CafÃ© stainless steel appliances. Chic pendants illuminate your 3-seater island equipped with ENERGY STAR alarm-activated double refrigerator drawers and Cosentino Silestone quartz countertops extending to the service window. An expansive aluminum and glass 5-panel bi-fold lanai door inspires idyllic indoor/outdoor living while framing picturesque backyard views. Custom built-ins line your entertainment spaces, from the tailor-made media unit and shelving in the primary living room to the maple banquette seating with storage drawers in the breakfast nook. An artisan wood-burning fireplace with a bespoke mantle and surround radiates warmth as you gather on cooler nights. Stylish yet elegant, the ensuite baths and powder rooms display spectacular wainscoting, Restoration Hardware custom vanities, one-of-a-kind wallpaper, and designer lighting. Wake up revitalized in your comfortable private retreats graced with large closets and recessed lighting. The main suite showcases vaulted ceilings with exposed stained wood beams, an oversized walk-in closet with a Solatube skylight, and a luxe 5-piece ensuite with a glass-enclosed shower alongside a free-standing spa-like soaking tub. Outside, your own slice of paradise awaits in the tiered backyard with custom herringbone brick, turf, Cali Bamboo TruOrganics wide composite decking, and Aquaview glass fencing. Verdant hedges line the fenced-in perimeter, adding seclusion as you take a refreshing dip in the upgraded pool with a newer motor, coping, tile, and a large Baja shelf. Other noteworthy features include updated plumbing and electrical systems, newer HVAC system, insulation, nest thermostats and smoke detectors, plus a touch screen Qolsys home security system with wireless motion detection throughout. As added perks, you have an attached 2-car garage with an Amarr steel-insulated door. Come take a tour!

Stunning Sierra Madre Compound located steps from Bailey Canyon Wilderness Park. Santa Fe style and made for entertaining. Amazing mountain views Main House features formal entry, spacious living room with built-in selves and Formal Dining Room with fireplace open to upgraded kitchen with stainless steel appliances and custom maple cabinetry. Wood and Travertine floors, open beam ceilings and great natural light provided by several skylights and multiple windows. The Master Suite is spacious with additional sitting area, walk-in closet, bath has soaking tub and separate stall shower, TV and French doors leading to private courtyard. 2 additional bedrooms, 2 additional baths and additional room currently used as a gym (could be 4th bedroom). Completing the main house is the individual laundry room with sink. Guest House features separate entrance for your privacy and comfort. High beam ceilings, skylight and large living area, kitchenette, bedroom, and full bath. Private Courtyard features outdoor kitchen, fireplace with water feature and covered veranda. Several entertaining and conversation areas with access provided from all sides of home. Grounds feature additional water feature, 2 separate electronic gates on driveway, drought tolerant landscaping and oversize 2 car garage with new automatic door. Still space available at rear of property is you would like a pool. If you like mountain views, entertaining, great natural light or need a space for guests, family or just space to roam this is it!

Situated on a lot of over one half acre in a true park-like setting, this gracious and stately two-story shuttered Colonial, built in 2002, offers first level formal living room with marble-faced fireplace, dining room with multiple windows overlooking the front grounds, family room with used brick fireplace and three sets of French doors leading to expansive deck. A cozy den, large kitchen with stainless appliances including Viking six burner and double oven range within a large center island, separate third built-in oven, Fisher Paykel two drawer dishwasher, Sub-Zero refrigerator, large eating area with built-in desk, walk-in pantry, and powder room complete the first floor. The second level includes a primary suite with newly remodeled four fixture bath plus three additional bedrooms, one and a half baths, and laundry room. The home features beautiful finish details including crown molding, exposed hardwood floors, an elevator, and more. Exterior features include full house width covered as well as open air wood deck, free-form pool with spa, large shaded play area, and a private, tree-shaded ravine. This is truly a home created for entertaining in an oak tree-studded indoor-outdoor setting with close proximity to the city's enchanting village center.

Rare opportunity in Sierra Madre. This home is a California craftsman-style beauty w/ vaulted ceilings nestled in the beautiful mountains close to many hiking trails. It boasts 2 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. Peace and tranquility are the perfect words to describe this cottage-like gem. Imagine sitting on the patio, admiring the beauty of nature while listening to the flow of the water in the creek next to the property. Originally built in 1921, this home has been completely renovated with best-in-class materials. Additional features include an oversized lot with mature landscaping for entertaining friends & family.

Welcome to this one-of-a-kind condo in the sought after Hastings Oaks community in Sierra Madre. This single level, two-bedroom home features an open concept living room and dining area with a gas fireplace, while sliding glass doors lead to a private enclosed patio. An abundance of light pours in through a skylight in the kitchen. The master bedroom with en suite bathroom includes access to another secluded patio, perfect for relaxation. The association offers a pool, recreation room and community laundry area, along with two separate parking spaces. Don't miss this opportunity to own a spectacular condo!
agent: The Hillier Group - Don & Donny Hillier - Father & Son Team.

text: A breathtaking backdrop of the San Gabriel Mountains presents this impressive 2-story Colonial sitting on a quiet lane surrounded by stately homes in the charming city of Sierra Madre! This home boasts elegant formal rooms and yet an open flow from the casual spaces into the expansive yard! The formal entry offers elegant slate flooring, a powder room for guests and a wood banister staircase. Wood framed windows & built in cabinetry spanning the entirety of the focal wall embraces the traditional fireplace with a wood mantle in this substantial living room. The den boasts an enticing built-in wet bar with mirror backing & glass shelves, a plethora of built-in cabinets & glass sliders leading out to the yard. The dining room is a bright and yet intimate space that lies right off the spacious kitchen, featuring sturdy wood cabinets, tile countertops, & a generous breakfast nook just outside the luminous sunroom transitioning to the extensive backyard. A family room right off the kitchen is distinguished with a sweeping brick fireplace, as well as access to the downstairs bedroom, complete with a private bathroom. Upstairs, you will find 4 generous bedrooms and three bathrooms, including a spacious master suite! Outside, the yard is an entertainer's delight, flaunting a sparkling pool with a spacious patio right off the cabana featuring changing rooms and a sauna. Wood fencing scattered with creeping fig, encompasses a vast lush grassy area on this expansive lot!

Set amidst the prestigious foothills of Sierra Madre, this sophisticated home has been thoughtfully designed so every detail, from the wide plank white oak floors to the custom finishes & brass Emtek hardware, exudes elegance and luxury. The foyer has high ceilings & skylights that fill the space with natural light and the spacious living room, with black granite fireplace & custom solarium, flows seamlessly into the formal dining room. The gourmet kitchen with maple cabinetry, farmhouse sink, quartz counters, island, breakfast area, & top-of-the-line Wolf appliances is perfect for one's epicurean needs. The space off the kitchen would make a great wet bar or reading nook and the large family room has a gas fireplace & wood-frame sliders to the patio. Atop the custom white oak staircase, the lavish primary suite boasts a fireplace, custom walk-in closet & spa-like bath with dual sinks, vanity, water closet, glass-enclosed shower & soaking tub. The 3 additional bedrooms are large & there is a laundry room with utility sink. The third floor has a 3/4 bath & a theater room with a balcony offering stunning views & the detached room above the garage is a great guest retreat or office. Other amenities include Amazon Alexa smart home technology, zoned HVAC, owned solar panels ($35K value), & climate controlled four-car garage with epoxy floors & LED lighting that doubles as a full at-home gym. Close to schools, shops, & trails, this move-in ready house is the ideal place to call home!

Beautifully restored and bursting with distinct Spanish Colonial character, this tightly held Sierra Madre abode is one you'll be proud to call your own! Built in 1933, this historical landmark was revitalized to its original and timeless glory while adapting to a more modern lifestyle. Set on a large corner lot, a verdant courtyard ideal for a play structure or a secluded seating area welcomes you to this magnificent residence. Step inside and discover a stately 2-story foyer clad in high-end finishes, including a fusion of Spanish multi-color magnesite flooring, crisp white tones, an elegant chandelier, and an intricate wrought-iron stair rail. Archways usher you into the grand room that features a period-appropriate built-in entertainment unit and a regal fireplace that radiates warmth as you receive guests. Soaring vaulted ceilings with exposed wood beams and Corbels span overhead, anchored by an eye-catching 10-ft crested stained glass window. French doors provide access to the covered patio. Working from home is made even better in the private office surrounded by multiple windows adorned with plantation shutters. Rich hardwoods pair with detailed dentil molding to elevate your fine dining experience in the chandelier-lit dining room where expansive bi-fold doors frame sensational views of the resort-like backyard. Explore the chef's kitchen that highlights an oversized, wood-topped 4-seater island with a built-in microwave and refrigerator drawers. A suite of designer stainless steel appliances will please the avid cook, including a 5-burner La Cornue range, a chimney hood, and a Sub-Zero refrigerator. Gorgeous shaker-style cabinetry, quartz countertops, and a subway tile backsplash are contrasted by floating wood shelves. Sweeping vistas of the San Gabriel Mountains await in the generously sized bedrooms that treat you to large closets, balcony access, and tastefully tiled ensuites. An opulent primary retreat revels in its own balcony overlooking the incredible city lights, a well-sized walk-in closet, and a luxe 5-piece ensuite that offers a spa-like experience with its steam shower and soaking tub. Crafted for ultimate entertaining, the paver-clad covered patio has plenty of seating options, including a built-in lounger. Take a refreshing dip in the pool and spa, cookout at the rotisserie grill, or enjoy a game of horseshoes. Searching for a grand estate unlike any other? Come for a tour while you still can!

The quaint, artistic Canyon of Sierra Madre is known for its eclectic architecture, foot bridges, river rock walls, trickling stream and wildlife. This custom built, streamline home with Art Deco influences offers one-of-a-kind details from the decorative ceiling in the living room to the Mission tile bathroom it oozes fine detailing. The grand living room (currently being used as a dining room) features a traditional fireplace and 9'3'' decorative ceiling. The formal dining room is currently being used as the formal living room. There is a 567-sf room with fireplace, built-in barbecue, skylights, truss ceiling and offers a multitude of purposes; an office with a separate entrance for clients, family room, work-out room, media room, etc. The lovely, updated kitchen features custom cabinets, pantry, breakfast bar, is open to a quaint den and is adjacent a full bath. Located upstairs is a full bath off the hallway, 3 bedrooms one being a generous-sized primary suite wrapped in windows and featuring an updated luxurious bathroom. Downstairs is a large room offering a multitude of uses but lends itself well as a bedroom suite with kitchenette and full bath, perfect as an in-law or guest quarters or for teenagers. Please reference the property information sheet provided by the seller highlighting the wonderful details of this masterpiece of a home! This is a must-see!

Situated in the foothills of Sierra Madre on a private street, this hidden 1930s gem has not been on the market for over 25 years. The interior of this home is approximately 2, 300 sq. ft. with 3 large bedrooms and 3 bathrooms; not including a 750 sq. ft. loft above the garage. Keeping its old world charm, updates consist of new tile roof, new plumbing, electrical, central heating and air conditioning plus on demand water heater. Renovations include new kitchen with commercial grade appliances and new bathrooms with beautiful tile keeping in line with the architecture of the home. As mentioned, there is a 750 sq. ft. loft above the garage which can be transformed into a large office, craft room, playroom, gym studio or left to your own imagination. The oversized 3 car garage itself provides plenty of room for additional cars, workshop and or storage. This beautiful 11, 000 sq. ft. lot is transformed into a forest like setting under mature sycamore trees and lush landscape of drought tolerant plants and succulents for low maintenance and, most importantly, a tranquil environment. All updates and renovations are permitted and fire sprinklers have been installed in garage and loft. Walking distance to local restaurants and shops, this is a unique property with lots of room to suit your personal needs.

COMPLETELY REMODELED SINGLE-STORY VIEW HOME in the prestigious and charming city of Sierra Madre with ARCADIA SCHOOLS . This IMMACULATE 3 bed 2 bath home is in the unbeatable Highland Oaks area on a LARGE 11, 761 SF LOT! Located on the quiet portion of north Santa Anita, this home is surrounded by MOUNTAIN VIEWS in all directions including CITY LIGHTS VIEW to the South! Enter through the formal entry and be greeted by an open modern floor plan. Gather and entertain in the light-filled Living Room with a gas fireplace, upgraded windows, and dining area. The Gourmet Kitchen features luxury brand name Viking Appliances, 48 SubZero Fridge, granite countertops, custom cabinetry, bar seating, and bright and cheery Breakfast Nook. The kitchen is open to the light-filled Family Room that has sliding glass doors that lead to the covered patio and lush rear grounds. The Master Suite features a wall of closets and an updated bath with walk-in shower and stone countertops. All 3 bedrooms enjoy mountain views and are private on the other side of the home away from the entertaining areas. The renovated hallway bath has a walk-in shower, separate jetted tub, and stone finishes. This pristine home is loaded with upgrades including professional drought-tolerant landscaping with new drip system, newer roof, newer copper plumbing, newer tankless water heater, newer engineered wood floors, security system and cameras, newer recessed lights, updated kitchen and baths, updated electrical, and new designer paint inside and out. There is a laundry room with side by side washer/dryer hookup, utility sink, and plenty of storage. The large 2-Car garage with finished walls is attached to the home and the spacious driveway can accommodate extra cars and RV/Boat parking. The expansive yard is an entertainer's delight with a covered patio, seating areas, soft synthetic turf play area large enough for a pool/play structure, and BBQ and dining areas. A+ location close to award-winning Highland Oaks Elementary & Foothills Middle School, parks, eateries, shops, Santa Anita Race Track, Arboretum, Methodist Hospital, and Westfield Mall. Don't miss this amazing opportunity to own this stunning Move-in-Ready Home! Priced to sell, this one won't last!

Views, views, and more views. A stunning mid-century single-family home with a GUEST HOUSE located in the sought-after Marlboro Terrace neighborhood of Sierra Madre (also known as the Upper Canyon). The MAIN house (1, 515 sq. ft.) has 3 bedrooms, 1.75 baths and provides expansive city and mountain views from every room of the house. As you enter the home you are greeted by an inviting open concept living room/dining room with a fireplace, which flows into the attractive kitchen, where you can't help but be struck by the incomparable views of the mountains. The main floor also includes a master suite with views that expand across the canyon, and a deck off the living room overlooking the San Gabriel Valley. The home includes central air systems, granite countertops in the kitchen, new flooring throughout the house, a renovated deck, and new exterior paint. As you walk down the winding path you can stop and read a book in the a quaint sitting yard. Continue to the GUEST HOUSE (337 sq. ft.) and you will be captivated by the lush greenery of this mountain paradise. The guest house has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a kitchen, living room and a private deck. The guest house is used as a rental unit with SEPARATE gas and electric meters and its own postal address. Continue down the path to find a small trail, which follows a babbling brook straight to the historic Mary's Market. This is one of the few properties that offers direct access from the Upper Canyon to the Lower Canyon. Welcome to your own slice of paradise!

TRUST SALE. This North Sierra Madre home, within walking distance to Bailey Canyon, is located on an amazing tree line street. The home offers over 1800 sqft of living space with 2 bedroom, 2 baths, formal living room, dining room and family room. The formal living room has the original brick fireplace with side by side built in cabinets and bookshelves. The remodeled kitchen is well appointed with stainless steel appliances including two ovens, a warming drawer, and a built-in microwave. There are stone counter tops and a kitchenette seating area surrounded by windows filling the kitchen with lots of natural light. Off of the kitchen is large family room where you can relax and watch movies on an oversized TV or enjoy the glass enclosed fireplace. The family room has an extensive amount of custom cabinetry accenting the room and providing LOTS of storage. The home has an attached studio with a 3/4 bath that has been used as a guest room or office. The oversized two car attached garage has been plumbed for water and waste line making it ideal for a potential ADU (check with City) and the long driveway provides plenty of space for parking. Walking into the landscaped backyard brings a sense of privacy and calmness with its oversized hedges and manicured garden. A perfect place to unwind and take in nature. The front yard is landscaped with drought tolerant plants for ease of maintenance. The home has some newer windows, central air and heat, downlights and hardwood floors throughout. Definitely a must see and ready for you to move right in or make it your own. This is the first time the home has been on the market in over 50 years!

Wonderful Sierra Madre home in a peaceful tree-lined neighborhood featuring 4 bedrooms including a main level bedroom and full bathroom, 3 updated bathrooms, and private backyard! Enter the foyer to high ceilings, open floorplan and hardwood flooring throughout. Formal living room with beautiful fireplace leads to the bright formal dining room, perfect for entertaining. Gourmet kitchen with Viking stainless steel appliances, built-in refrigerator, kitchen island with sink, walk-in pantry, abundant custom cabinetry, and dine-in kitchen breakfast nook with views of the backyard. Spacious open family room with fireplace and sliding door access to the covered patio. Enjoy the private landscaped backyard and patio space, great for outdoor activities and pleasant Southern California living. Convenient main level bedroom and full bathroom is a plus! Relax in the master bedroom suite upstairs with double walk-in closets, luxurious master bathroom with spa tub, separate shower, and dual sink vanities. Two additional bedrooms share the updated full bathroom. Additional amenities include convenient upstairs laundry room with sink, bonus large storage room and plentiful built-in cabinetry throughout. Attached two-car garage with direct access and paved driveway provides ample parking space. Located minutes to nearby parks, hiking, dining and shopping at downtown Sierra Madre. Do not miss all this home has to offer!

Inspired by California's mid-century modernism movement, this 1958 Sierra Madre home offers architectural appeal at the top of Baldwin where the sunshine meets the hills. The iconic 2, 084 sq. ft. U-shaped layout conforms nicely to the 11, 091 sq. ft. corner lot and allows an effortless relationship between the indoor and outdoor spaces. The inviting double doors reveal characteristic organic elements such as slate entry, two sided stone fireplace with floating slate hearth, vaulted natural wood ceiling, skylight opening to the healthy oak above and liberal use of glass enlivening the senses and drawing the outdoors in. The home encourages entertaining with open flow between the living room, dining room, kitchen and upper patio/yard space enriched with the subtle sounds of a fountain. The kitchen has simple clean lines with an adjacent office, 3/4 bath and laundry area. All three bedrooms are generously sized with large closets and some built-ins. The primary bedroom offers clerestory windows, oversized sliding glass door opening to the upper yard, floating wood dresser and floating closets, and a skylight for an abundance of natural light. In addition the room opens into a full bathroom that can be converted to an en-suite arrangement. There are two outdoor spaces offering the right balance between relaxation, entertainment, at-home gardening and abounding mountain views. There is a detached extra-tall single car garage on the south side that can easily become an ADU, workshop or pool house (lower yard has strong potential for a lap pool). In addition, there is a classic two-car carport on the north side for easy access to and from the home. Two additional driveway spaces allow for plenty of off-street parking. This much-loved home is in close proximity to the downtown village for boutique shopping and restaurant hopping and enjoyment of the parks, hiking and nature trails that are a treasured part of the Sierra Madre lifestyle.

NEW PRICE: This is the first time on the market for this stunning Hacienda that was lovingly built in 1988 by its present owner. Privacy abounds as you meander along the cobblestone driveway to this tree studded expansive 18, 000 + sf. lot. This property consists of a two story, four bedroom, three bath home with an attached two-car garage. In addition, there is a second two-car garage with a 217 sf. attached office and bath. The entire unit is heated and air-conditioned which could make it an ADU possibility. As you enter the main home you will be delighted by the soaring ceiling & windows in the entry foyer. A graceful staircase leads to the second floor where you will find the main suite which features a fireplace, walk-in-closet and spa-like bath with Jacuzzi tub. Two additional bedrooms share a bath. This same level has a balcony garden that overlooks part of the grounds and is a perfect place for relaxing with a good book while listening to the wonderful sounds of silence or the birds singing in the abundant greenery. The main level has a bedroom and bath for guests, a family room with fireplace and cocktail bar. Off this area is a patio with a built-in BBQ. The living room with fireplace and dining area have French doors that lead to additional patios. The many windows in this area bring the outdoors in, yet giving you the feeling of privacy in this hidden oasis. The chef's kitchen features granite counter tops, Viking appliances, custom cabinetry and opens to a sun-filled breakfast area perfect for your morning coffee. Other amenities include wide plank cherry floors and tile floors on the first level and wide plank birds-eye maple floors in the master suite area . There is also a laundry room, and a hard-wired alarm system. This property is truly a work of art not to be missed.

Nestled in the heart of downtown Sierra Madre, this 3 bedroom 2 bath Townhome is an end-unit with open floor plan. As you walk in, you will be greeted with the spacious living room with an over-sized window that invites plenty of light in. The one bedroom and bathroom downstairs offer great convenience. Master suite on the 2nd floor with walk-in closet and a spacious bathroom. This property has many great features such as vaulted ceiling, laminate flooring, granite countertop in the kitchen and much more! The private yard is perfect for summer barbecue and family gatherings. Sierra Madre is one of the the most charming and family-friendly small towns on the West Coast. Just a few minutes' walk to downtown for shopping, dining, library and park, not to mention a short drive to Arcadia and I-210 to Pasadena and Downtown LA.
full_street_line: 49 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit C

text: Opportunity knocks! Welcome to this fantastic opportunity to own a wonderful duplex in the heart of Sierra Madre. First time on the market in almost 50 years! This property offers two separate homes on the lot, an ideal opportunity for an owner-user to live in one and rent the other or for the investor. The charming front home was built in 1910 as per public records and offers approx. 900sf. with 2 bedrooms and 1 bath, laundry area, deep closets and a generous side/rear yard area. The rear home was built in 1955, as per public records, and offers 669sf. with 1bedroom, 1 bath, fireplace, laundry hook ups and a private yard. Both homes have separate electrical and gas meters. Located within walking distance to the SM Elementary school, the SM Middle school, as well as the downtown shops, restaurants and parks. Buyer to verify all information. Don't miss this opportunity!

Spectacular regenerative gardens encompass this large 11, 000+ lot high in the Foothills above the quaint village of Sierra Madre! As a professional horticulturist and organic garden curator, the owner has spent years developing the perfect food forest ecosystem for water conservation and self feeding. The certified wildlife habitat garden with beautiful blooming Matilija poppies greets you as you enter the property. Over 40 mature fruit trees dot the landscape including apple, banana, persimmon, guava, pomegranate and many varieties of citrus. Built in 1947, the home was extensively renovated and remodeled in 2012 to provide a more open floor plan and indoor/outdoor flow. The kitchen was modernized with stainless Kitchenaid appliances, 5 burner Fisher and Paykel gas stove top, Silestone quartz counters, breakfast bar, skylight and outdoor serving bar. The reconfigured primary suite is a wonderful respite with walls of glass overlooking the gardens and a large bathroom with soaking tub. Additional 2012 renovations included plumbing, electrical, HVAC, windows, solar reflective roof and many other energy efficient features. Family owned since 1956, truly a special home and property to enjoy and cherish!

This absolutely enchanting two story Monterey Colonial Revival exudes charm reminiscent of a Carmel cottage. Offering numerous upgrades from the past seven years, the home features formal living and dining rooms, family room, sun porch/office, and a primary suite with balcony which provides sweeping mountain views. Additional features include newer two-zone central air and heating, whole house Life Source water filtration system, numerous lighting fixtures, large storage basement, and much more. The private rear yard offers three distinct sections - a completely refinished pebble finish pool with new tile, coping and decking, a two-level patio with built-in Lion grill plus bar and flatscreen TV, and a beautifully landscaped shaded garden and open lawn area. This is truly a private oasis with mountain and city lights views yet a short distance to the ever popular village center.

Mid-Century Modern Beauty nestled along the Foothills in charming Sierra Madre. From the moment you walk up to this gem you will notice how cared for it was by it's long time owner. The exterior of the home was recently re-imagined with drought tolerant landscaping. The driveway and patio have new pavers through-out. As you walk inside you will be pleasantly surprised to find an updated kitchen with a large island, excellent lighting, open concept with plenty of storage. There is also a kitchen nook with a deck for outdoor dining or a good book. The dining area has an adjacent courtyard with a nice view of the outside greenery. As you move down the hallway you will find Three large sized Bedrooms with a fourth Bedroom or office option. A den/playroom/office. The Main Bedroom sits on a private floor. It boast a sitting area, balcony, walk-in closet as well as a recently renovated bathroom with marble through-out. Walking distance to restaurants and shops in Downtown Sierra Madre. Minutes to the Arcadia Mall, Pasadena and Downtown Los Angeles with the serenity of small city living.

Nestled in the Santa Anita Canyon of Historic Sierra Madre, this home offers so much more than most homes in this unique private setting with Outstanding views and vantage points from every direction you look! Parking is an absolute premium anywhere in the Canyon & this home offers multiple parking with a huge driveway, carport & lots of extra parking below! This 1918 Craftsman beauty captures the essence of it's time with modern amenities such as central heat and A/C, 5 burner gas range, dishwasher, upgraded partial copper plumbing, Tankless H20 heater, 2 fireplaces, a washer & dryer located in the enclosed porch & additional foundation retrofitting. As you approach the Craftsman entry front door with a cut beveled glass window, highlighted by the many craftsman style casement windows with interior wood trim casings throughout the living area, only to endear you deeper to this special property. One never tires of the endless views, whether you are standing at the front door, viewing the city lights or through your windows both upstairs & down or simply taking in all of the natural surroundings as you look towards those magnificent San Gabriel Mountains. Beautiful upgraded maple cabinetry & kitchen features. This open floorplan allows you to add your own style when it comes to decorating this home! Hardwood floors are featured throughout this home, a muted green color palate is set against beautiful wood appointments with an upstairs Craftsman Batchelder style tile fireplace & custom wood mantle. Upstairs bathroom features a retro beehive pattern floor tile with subway tile on the walls & shower. Vanity is period style with granite counter & lovely accent mirror. As you ascend down the circular staircase you are greeted by an oversized room that can be a 2nd or a huge primary bedroom with a charming brick fireplace downstairs & an oversized bathroom with a private entrance.
