Potentially, you could rent this space and still maintain privacy upstairs.The property offers so many options in regard to gardening, w/orange & a lemon tree, terraced garden areas or just enjoy the patios with their numerous views. If you are looking for a serene private retreat, with unbelievable views at the top of the Canyon, look no more!! Delight in this exceptional value for only $1, 200, 000 to capture the historical charm of the past, with many significant upgrades to modernize the comforts of today with all the value of this one of a kind property for the future!

Tucked away in the Foothills of the Sierra Madre mountains, you will find this charming corner home within close distance to multiple hiking trails, as well as located in the unique Sierra Madre canyon neighborhood. A spacious living room with windows overlooks the gorgeous backyard. Both bedrooms are filled with natural sunlight with views of the Foothill Mountains. Granite counter tops in the lovely bathroom separates each bedroom. Exit the roomy kitchen to the balcony where the views of Mt. Wilson await. This house sits on a three-car garage as well as a car port, with space to set up an art studio or private office. Start summer off right with this home's amazing fenced in private backyard with beautiful trees abundant with flowers. This cozy home has central heating and air conditioning to assure you always have the perfect temperature.

Elegant townhome in the heart of Sierra Madre, off the main Street with its own 2 car garage. There are garden patios both off the kitchen and on the front of the unit. A formal entry, an open spacious living room with a fireplace, a powder room, and a kitchen dining room off a large patio with access to the garage. Upstairs there are 2 large bedrooms each with its own bath, and a balcony with the primary bedroom and a laundry area. This spectacular townhome is in close proximity to restaurants, shopping, parks, hiking trails, and all Sierra Madre has to offer. An end unit with only one common wall and abundant light. No public opens houses.
full_street_line: 506 W Sierra Madre Blvd Apt A

text: Located in charming Sierra Madre, this 5 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom home boasts 4, 329 sq. ft of living space on a gorgeous 15, 246 sq. ft. lot. The backyard features a large swimming pool with overlooking patio and balcony. Completely remodeled around 2013, the interior offers a massive Great Room with hardwood floors and a stone fireplace that is perfect for entertaining. Large sliding doors open to a patio overlooking the swimming pool. The chef's kitchen has carrara stone countertops, built-in refrigerator, 6-burner range and wine refrigerator. On the far side of the Great Room, is a short hallway leading to two spacious bedrooms with ensuites and the giant master suite with beautiful sitting area, fireplace and large master bath with carrara stone flooring, dual vanity, bathtub, glass-enclosed shower and walk-in closet. Sliding glass doors open from the master bedroom to the patio. The opposite side of the home has a bedroom and up a short, half-flight of stairs, an office/bedroom with doors opening to a balcony overlooking the pool. A door opens to a basement area for storage, water heater and furnace. A separate, large, under-house storage area is accessible from the back and front yards. Horseshoe driveway with two gates. New carpets in most of the bedrooms. Dual air conditioner. Sprinkler system in front and back yards. In a very convenient location, near the shopping center, Whole Foods, park and school.

Charming home tucked away in the prestigious town of Sierra Madre! Entry welcomes you to the main level offering a kitchenette area, laundry area, bathroom, one car garage and amazing views from several patio areas. As you walk up the stairwell to the upper level you will find a spacious living room with French doors to a covered deck surrounded by lush greenery, an eat-in kitchen, two bedrooms and a full bath. Near Mount Wilson Trailhead and Park, and just minutes from schools, downtown, shopping and restaurants.

Located on desirable tree lined street in beautiful Sierra Madre! In addition to this traditional home, this property has a new ADU. Front house is 1, 600 Sq Ft, boasts a new kitchen, large family room withing dining area, 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths. The New Adu is situated towards the back of the property and has an open floor plan, large kitchen with island, sliding glass door to private patio, its own laundry area, 2 bedrooms, one with large ensuite and other with hall bathroom. Detached 2 car garage and separate room, could be a workshop or storage. Walking distance to all Sierra Madre has to offer, parks, restaurants, and shopping!

Midcentury modern architecture in California was cultivated in part by the award winning Pasadena-based architects Ladd & Kelsey who are tied to many of the iconic buildings of Los Angeles modern architecture - including but not limited to the Norton Simon Museum, the Busch Gardens in Van Nuys, and the master plan and buildings for CalArts in Valencia. Thorton Ladd designed this serene midcentury home in 1949 and it features all the wonderful architectural details one would expect including walls of glass, sky lights, cement floors, high ceilings, and a well-designed floor plan. There are two large patios - one in front and one in the rear - offering solitude and privacy. The one off the kitchen features a lovely cactus garden and the soothing sounds of a fountain spilling into a Koi pond, while the other off the living room is larger and offers multiple places to entertain. There is also a large flat area at the top of the rear terraced yard that has a nice vegetable garden and a European-style pea gravel patio. A detached three car garage is great for parking and/or storage. Located on a private lane in the beautiful foothills of Sierra Madre with close proximity to the towns' charming restaurants, hiking trails, excellent schools, parks, markets and shops, this home is an oasis awaiting its next fortunate owner.

Take an elegant step back in time with this stunning, single-level, mid century modern stunner! Beautifully situated in the foothills, this special property features exquisite walls of glass providing amazing panoramic views of the San Gabriel mountains and of the San Gabriel Valley to downtown Los Angeles. Its desirable location provides easy access to the area's best hiking trails while affording convenient access to shops and restaurants in the nearby quaint Sierra Madre Village. Wonderfully appointed views from each room bring nature and a sense of peace indoors while providing the comforts and amenities of a modern home. Newly landscaped, the rear yard features multiple patios and balconies canopied by the well known Wisteria vine that is listed in the Guinness Book World of Records and a sparkling pool perfect for lounging and entertaining. This home is also featured in the annual Sierra Madre Wisteria Festival. The interior of the home is also ideal for entertaining as it is full of light and is thoughtfully laid out, allowing for a graceful flow between interior rooms and the outdoor spaces. The den's and living room's sliding glass doors lead to a rear patio and seamlessly connects to the dining room and bright remodeled kitchen, all of which offer stunning views of the rear yard. Additional features include two fireplaces, a living room, and a large enclosed dry bar.

Vacation at Home- California Style Rush home from work to the playful personality of this single-level, mid-century charmer and put yourself in a good mood!! Designed for living, it makes the most of site and light with rooms that breathe with comfort and confidence. Numerous upgrades include new paint throughout, new wood flooring, all new windows and electrical, and remodeled bathrooms. The current owner oversaw a complete face-lift of the backyard which included professionally designed pool, spa, pergola/patio, landscaping and lighting. Sit on the patio for morning coffee or evening happy hour and watch the mountains change color with the rising or setting of the sun; or turn the other direction and gaze at the twinkling lights of the city after sunset. In addition, Solar Panels were purchased, not leased, and will pass to the new owner. There are architectural plans for a kitchen remodel which have been signed off by the city engineer. This is the nicest place you will ever wake up! It epitomizes casual elegance - California style!!

Location, location, location! The home is a few blocks below the foothills in beautiful and quaint Sierra Madre. The owner resided there for over 50 years. Features 4 bedrooms and 3 full baths, lovely entryway, fireplace, and wonderful potential for remodeling.

Charming Tudor style house at the base of the foothills. Close to walking and hiking trails, parks, close to town center and Sierra Madre Elementary and Middle School, Alverno Heights Academy and La Salle. Efficient floor plan with large living room opening to a patio, dining area adjacent to the updated kitchen, powder room and large two car garage. Upstairs are 4 bedrooms and two baths. Quiet setting and almost a private drive.

Welcome to the highly sought-after neighborhood of the Sierra Madre Canyon. With two bedrooms, one bathroom, and approximately 944 square-feet of livable space, this quaint, south-facing house is just what you're looking for as it contains a nice office/den area next to the living room with bright windows which let in ample sunshine, a very spacious kitchen that has its own skylight for more natural light and also has access to the outdoors and laundry room, and great closet space in each bedroom. You will enjoy peaceful and serene living here in the foothills of the beautiful Sierra Madre Mountains.

Originally built in the early 1900's as a tea house and social gathering center for artists from around the world, the Wistaria House has just undergone an extensive remodel and tasteful expansion, transforming it into a sophisticated and light-filled contemporary home with over 4, 000 SF of space spread over two floors. Nested privately in the coveted hills of Sierra Madre, the home has 180 degrees of unobstructed views of the San Gabriel Valley, downtown Los Angeles skyline and beyond. With close proximity to Bailey Canyon and Mt. Wilson hiking trails, the towns' charming restaurants, excellent schools, parks, markets and shops - while still giving you the feeling that you are away from it all. A truly one-of-a-kind home; a beautiful presentation of form, function and versatility. Entering through the formal entry, one immediately enjoys the stunning views and natural light from the main level's beautifully scaled open concept floorplan and walls of glass. Wide-plank, European white oak floors welcome you into the main level, which showcases a great room with soaring wood-beam ceilings and multiple skylights, fireplace and dining area, a gourmet kitchen with professional grade appliances, designer accents and a breakfast bar. Media room with adjacent guest bath, a large sunroom with bi-folding glass doors out to a large balcony and the primary bedroom and bath, as well as a second bedroom/office. The downstairs level features two additional bedrooms that share a hall bath, plus a large bonus room with ample closets and cupboards for storage. Glass doors lead out to the famous Wistaria vine which beautifully canopies the upper garden area and yard. Hard and soft scape surround the precession to the lower yard area where a tranquil oasis awaits you. A Serene pool and spa with decking, BBQ area and pergola were completed in 2012. See the Wistaria House like you've never seen her before. This extraordinary home presents a truly unique opportunity.

Suburban-Urban Living -Walk to everything Sierra Madre has to offer from this Light Bright 3 bed 3 bath Bungalow In the heart of Sierra Madre. Once you enter you will find original hardwood floors and newer plantation shutters throughout. The living room has a decorative gas fireplace and leads to an open dining area with arched built-in China cabinet. One bedroom is located off the dining room and leads to a hall and first floor full bath. The kitchen has white cabinets with ceramic tile white counters and stainless-steel appliances. The laundry hook ups are at the back of the kitchen separated by an archway. There is also a prep sink , cabinets and utility closet located in the breezeway between the dining room and kitchen. An office is located to the left of the kitchen and it's also a passthrough room that leads to a stairway and a light filled downstairs primary suite. The suite has a walk-in closet as well as a bath with walk-in shower.The primary suite opens with French doors to a private paver stone patio that wraps the side and back of the home. It has a great indoor-outdoor feelThe final primary suite is found up a beautiful oak staircase. It has the same footprint as the primary suite below. A bonus is the balcony overlooking the patio.Currently this home is used as a single-family residence but could be used as a commercial space or possibly split into 2 units. (Please check with the city for verification of specific use.) The area is Residential Professional so you may live and work here too.Other features: ample storage, a two-car garage and a basement.

What an incredible setting! This gorgeous property located in charming Sierra Madre is tucked back off the street allowing for privacy and providing beautiful views of the San Gabriel mountains. The landscape is stunning, framing the home with native drought tolerant plants and shading it in a canopy of oaks. Entering the home, the main living area has great flow. The living room has high vaulted ceilings and a large fireplace at its center and opens to the dining room and kitchen. The kitchen has been nicely updated with custom wood cabinets and stainless steel appliances. Two bedrooms share a full bathroom with double vanity and the third bedroom has its own attached three quarter bath. The primary bedroom has a vaulted ceiling, a large bathroom with striking stone countertops and a large walk in closet. Sliding doors open out to the backyard where there is a large pool, an outdoor dining area, a built-in barbeque area and several citrus trees. Additional spaces include a small bonus room (which the current owners use as a workout area), a spa, two garage bays (which have been converted into fantastic offices/Bonus space) and a darling oversized shed that looks like a little barn. The property is an environment unto itself. The privacy, seclusion and lush landscaping create a relaxing resort-like feeling. This special home is located in charming Sierra Madre, a town that is three square miles of pretty neighborhoods and serene natural beauty. Open houses Wednesday 3/09/2022 10-1 and Thursday 3/102022 10-2

Welcome to this grand, Tuscan-style villa, set against the backdrop of the majestic San Gabriel Mountains, near the base of Mount Wilson Trail in north Sierra Madre. Masterfully reimagined, rebuilt and expanded in 2008, this custom home exudes warmth and character and offers everything you would expect in a new home. Attention to detail begins with the extensive use of stone inside and out and continues through the dramatic double door entry into the breathtaking living room with high vaulted open beam ceilings, a stone fireplace, hardwood floors and floor to ceiling picturesque French doors. The spacious, gourmet, eat-in kitchen with a breakfast bar island and dining booth, offers the chef Pro Series stainless steel Thermador appliances, marble counters with stone backsplash, hammered copper sinks, custom cabinetry and stone floors. The kitchen flows seamlessly and allows for easy indoor/outdoor entertaining in the formal dining area, adjoining family room, or on the easily accessible covered patios and grounds. The cozy family room, with vaulted ceilings, stone fireplace and hardwood floors, features custom built-in workspaces. This showcase home features four well-appointed bedrooms, including two master suites, one on the main level with an outdoor patio and the main en suite on the upper level. The private upper level has a gorgeous light-filled open office space with breathtaking mountain views. The grand-sized master suite enjoys a luxurious bathroom, with dual sinks, a large walk in closet and a balcony overlooking the gorgeous backyard. The sprawling grounds of this hidden treasure are very private and serene and offer amazing mountain and city light views. All of this within the very desirable community of Sierra Madre. A must see to believe.

Bright Sierra Madre Townhome. This small town at the foot of the San Gabriel Mountains harkens back to Old California, with its library built in the 1880s, a sweet walkable downtown with charming shops and restaurants, and with majestic mountains with miles of trails as the backdrop. This is a little corner of LA that turns back the hands of time. Wander the lush paths of The Meadows, that rare, small community with space and trees, and lush landscaping. A sparkling pool, spa, and barbecue area hosts your celebrations. The downstairs of your little slice of heaven has a cool boho feel, a spacious open concept where you can cozy up to the warm gas fireplace, or step out to your private patio to take in the morning birdsong. Your kitchen is all granite counters, and stainless steel appliances, and loads of storage to keep your bounty tucked away. A laundry room (with even more storage!) leads to an attached 2 car garage. Upstairs, the high ceilings make the large rooms feel even larger. Soak in the sunlight flooding into the main suite from the upstairs balcony. This is your retreat. Your getaway. The small town feel is enhanced by the numerous parks. But Pasadena with its sophisticated restaurants and shops, is right there. Downtown LA is not far away. You can get to everything. But will you want to?
full_street_line: 263 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit B

text: This stunning 3-bed, 2-bath with guest house, Cape Cod style home in sought-after Sierra Madre has been tastefully transformed throughout the years while maintaining its 1930's charm. The inviting front yard leads into a beautiful living room with original built-ins, wood-burning fireplace and French doors to the back patio. The dining room is open to the updated kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, breakfast area, and coffee bar. All three bedrooms are considerable in size. The primary suite has custom closets, a cozy fireplace, and French sliding doors that lead out to the back patio. The luxurious, spa-like primary bathroom includes limestone flooring, a contemporary frameless glass enclosed shower, soaking tub, and dual basins. The landscaped private backyard is perfect for entertaining on the custom slate tiled patio and features natural elements including a koi pond, plunge pool, mature oak tree and a grassy area for lounging or play, all set afoot of the majestic mountain view. Additional outdoor amenities include a shower, a generous storage shed, and a private rear driveway with additional parking. The detached guest house, which would make an excellent ADU, is currently being used as recreational space with a large great room with vaulted ceilings, laundry room, convenient half bath, and a separate office - the perfect work from home space. Notable features include central A/C and heat, high ceilings with crown molding, hardwood floors throughout, storage in every nook and crevice, and an abundance of windows providing this south-facing home with a steady dose of natural light throughout the day. Close to schools, shops, restaurants, and hiking trails, this house is the ideal place to call home!

Tucked away at the foothills and ready for you to move in and enjoy, this elegant Sierra Madre residence captivates you with its comforting style, beautifully designed entertaining spaces, and small-town feel! Inside, abundant natural light gently accentuates the mellow interior through numerous, large windows. Vaulted ceilings tower over the sunken living room that accompanies your guests with an intricately detailed fireplace. A sure delight to the home chef, the kitchen treats you to a suite of stainless steel appliances, handsome cabinetry, and sleek granite countertops. Whether you're hosting casual coffee get-togethers or lavish dinners, there's a formal dining room and a built-in breakfast nook to accommodate both. Lush views create a serene backdrop for the family room where you can enjoy unwinding with your favorite beverage from the adjacent wet bar. Indulge in the space and inviting ambiance of the upper-level primary suite that lulls you to sleep with warmth from another fireplace. Aside from offering private balcony access, it lets you relax in a soaking tub under the glow of vintage-style lighting. Admire the verdant gardens surrounding the private backyard from the multiple sitting areas and the covered patio. As a bonus perk, this must-see gem features a 3-car garage and has a great public school system. Come take a tour before it slips you by!

Fabulous home in charming Sierra Madre neighborhood. Meticulous and tastefully remodeled with new copper piping, new 200 amp electric panel, all new windows and high end shutters, all new bathrooms, new water heater, new kitchen with quartz countertops and appliances. Step into an inviting living room and family room overlooking a pristine pool and views of the mountains. This comfortable 3 BR home consist of an oversized Master Suite and 2.5 baths. Easy to maintain with solid maple hardwood flooring throughout and a low water maintenance landscape. Blocks away from award winning Sierra Madre School and charming Sierra Madre Village. Make this house your home!

Don't miss seeing this stunning modern, Craftsman style townhome located in the quaint mountain village of Sierra Madre! Close to hiking trails, restaurants and shops located in the old town area, this spacious home offers room for everyone. Old world charm, craftsmanship, and attention to detail exquisitely fuse with modern design. Period Craftsman features such as hardwood, granite, slate, wrought iron hardwood and stone throughout. Located in front of this custom complex of 6 detached homes, this freestanding townhome with no attached walls is the largest in this lovely complex. The first-floor bedroom has the advantage of full privacy, with an entrance through either the garage or front entry, offering a spacious bedroom, bath and direct access to the generously sized and delightful patio. Light, bright, and airy throughout, this home is freshly painted inside as well as a just recently painted exterior in 2021. Boasting points are many: formal entry, hardwood floors, French doors, spacious rooms, top of the line cabinetry, doors, and casement windows. The Chef's Kitchen is especially wonderful: granite counters, stainless appliances, a charming breakfast nook which opens to the balcony. Special touches include a custom Craftsman mission style tiled fireplace, in the large living room, a walk-in closet, with wonderful built-ins, in the master bedroom, a bath with a spa tub, two separate laundry areas/rooms and an attached two car garage with workspace. The flowing floor plan makes for great day to day living or entertaining. Craving outdoor spaces? A front patio, lovely private patio, is accessed from the first-floor suite, and two charming balconies off of both the dining room and breakfast nook, all answer that need. This home is simply gorgeous, filled with high end, designer touches. Occasional tree top views add to the overall charm. Truly move-in ready! Come visit and see for yourself.

You can't beat this amazing OPPORTUNITY to remodel/rebuild in the coveted city of Sierra Madre! Walk to Mary's Market, live amongst the beautiful Oaks and in the serenity of the canyon. Property has a legal water meter, electricity, parking and a garage. The structure has a new roof and is structurally sound. It has no amenities so bring your contractor and your imagination and make it yours TODAY! -Cash Only

Prime Sierra Madre location. Lovely newly remodeled 2bedroom 3 bath Townhouse nestled in the heart of Sierra Madre. Walking distance to the popular village. Newly installed flooring paired with new molding greets you as you enter the freshly painted interior. As you descend into the living room and take in the stunning mountain view with abundance of natural lighting. Delight the home chef in the cheerful kitchen equipped with new quartz counter tops, new cabinets and new stove. Retire into upper-level primary retreat adorned with new flooring, paint and a cozy fireplace. From downstairs you will have direct access to your newly landscaped private patio. This spectacular Townhome is in perfect close proximity to the coffee shops, restaurants, shopping, play house , parks and hiking trails. So much to love about this Townhome and Community.

Stunning 1950's Modern Ranch home with pool house and incredible pool on a large lot in the sought-after City of Sierra Madre. The main house was recently painted. Hardwood flooring throughout most of the house, tile flooring in the large family room and carpet in the primary bedroom. All bedrooms are located down the main hallway. This home offers 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms in the main house. In addition, the recently updated pool house with vaulted ceilings and new windows includes 1 bedroom with walk-in closet, 1 bath, living room/dining/kitchen.From the pool house, a spectacular view of the pool/jacuzzi and spacious yard. Gourmet kitchen with a large granite island/eating bar, stainless Wolf/Subzero appliances, and plenty of counter and cupboard space spacious laundry room located off the kitchen with Samsung washer and dryer front-loaders as well as ample cabinets and storage space. Spacious primary bedroom with glass sliding doors that providing access to a patio , large walk-in closet, and adjoining private primary bath with double pedestal sinks with oval jetted tub and separate shower.Large fireplace in the sizable family room with beautiful large built-in bookshelves/entertainment center with windows galore, and sliding door. Wonderful natural lighting throughout the house gives a very open feeling to the home. Formal living room with fireplace and wood floors in the dining area. Large two-car attached garage with access to house and backyard. Plenty of storage throughout. Newer heated pool, jacuzzi, and patio with a fire pit surrounded by gardens and a fabulous mountain view. Large grass area and swings to enjoy . The patio offers a large area to entertain that also includes a patio/awning cover that provides ample shade. Professionally landscaped, tall mature trees, fruit trees including avocado, peach, plum, ruby grapefruit, Meyer lemon, orange, and blood orange, raised vegetable beds, and a grapevine.Solar panels were installed in 2020 and ARE PAID FOR provide 80% of power for the house. Two air conditioners and heaters in the main house and 1 of each in pool house.Whole-house water filter. Walk to hiking trails and enchanting downtown Sierra Madre.Convenient location -close to shopping, schools, and restaurants. Don't miss out on this beauty!!

Desirable corner unit with view of San Gabriel Mountains. View from patio, living room, balcony & front bedroom. Great unit location. Front of the unit is not obstructed by any building. Bright & airy unit w/ open floor plan. Living room w/ sliding glass door open onto the spacious patio. Living room is open to spacious dining area. Half bath on main floor. Spacious bedrooms w/ large closets. Front bedroom w/ sliding glass door has direct access to balcony. 1 covered carport & 1 parking space. HOA amenities include courtyard, swimming pool, community room, community laundry room. Well-maintained complex w/ mature landscaping.

Masterfully rebuilt in 2007, this Craftsman-style home boasts modern amenities yet sustains classic charm. A true collision of past and present awaits you in the charming mountain retreat of Sierra Madre. Authentic craftsman millwork has been carefully replicated throughout - major features of this stunning touch include: continuous head-trim running over doors and windows and Craftsman Z-splice wood joining accents made with salvaged old growth Douglas fir from Vancouver Island. The entire upstairs consists of a luxurious master suite with a spacious bedroom and lovely mountain views, a master bath with step-in shower and large walk-in closet, a balcony close by for enjoying your morning coffee. The living room offers direct access to a large covered front balcony, a nice retreat for relaxing and enjoying the evening valley lights. The dining room features a masonry wood burning fireplace with access to the outside. A dynamic kitchen with cabinets appropriate to the period, but keeping with the modern conveniences feature Silestone counters, Thermador induction cooktop, KitchenAid built in refrigerator and Fisher and Paykel two drawer dishwasher. Exceptional living continues into the serene and outdoor space. Enjoy the tranquil garden surrounded by trees and mountain view. Invaluable features include: Attached 1 bed/1bath guest quarters with separate entrance. A detached studio perfect for a home office, art studio, gym or workshop. Please reference the attached for extensive additional Features and Amenities. Come appreciate this home in person.

Welcome to this tranquil multi-level craftsman influenced home flooded with natural light. Located in Sierra Madre's rustic Upper Canyon, this newer home has 4 Bedrooms/2 Full Baths/2 Powder Rooms and is surrounded by mature oak trees, with 4 exquisitely tiled patios and decks offering sweeping canyon and mountain views. Upon entering you will be greeted with an abundant amount of natural light in the living room with 11 foot ceilings, a beautiful fireplace and hardwood floors throughout. There are also French doors leading to the patio deck, a powder room and coat closet.On the next level, the hardwood floors continue throughout, with a spacious family room with 10 foot ceilings and double set of French doors opening on a patio deck, perfect for the morning coffee. The large kitchen provides an island and luxury Jenn-Air stainless steel appliances: a double oven, cooktop, & side-by-side refrigerator as well as a large pantry room and plenty of cabinet space. Open to the kitchen is a breakfast nook and a spacious patio deck, perfect for outdoor cooking and dining. Adjacent to the kitchen, is the roomy formal dining area, with recessed lighting. A good sized powder room services this level. Up a short flight of stairs, there are two spacious carpeted bedrooms, with natural light throughout, sharing a Jack and Jill bathroom. Just down the hallway are the laundry room with additional storage and a convenient linen closet.The primary suite with 9 foot ceilings is truly a couples getaway dream, on its own top level, with dark hickory hardwood floor and abundant natural light offering sweeping city, canyon and mountain views through the large bay window and French doors leading to a spacious outdoor patio with motorized awning. The bedroom can easily fit a King size bed, and still have plenty of room. There is also a large walk-in closet. The en-suite bathroom is a showstopper, with luxurious high-end finishes. A beautiful modern tub, a curbless walk-in shower, dual floating vanities, illuminated medicine cabinets and a separate toilet room. Sharing this level is a large fourth bedroom currently used as an office space.The ground level attached 2-car garage provides a lot of additional storage space and is accessed via a paved driveway with enough space to accommodate multiple vehicles.

Welcome to this inviting 1926 Spanish-style home on South Sunnyside Avenue nestled below the mountains in Sierra Madre. Sited on a 7, 490 square foot lot, this 2 Bedroom and 3 Bathroom home is sure to draw you in with its classic architectural details and comfortable feel. The original red oak hardwood floors have been newly refinished and stained throughout the home and many rooms have been repainted, bringing in a fresh feel. The front covered porch is an enjoyable space, and is perfect for relaxing and overlooking the yard. Enter the home through the Living Room, which features: a Batchelder tile fireplace; hardwood floors; and, 2 sets of French doors, one leading to the covered front patio and one leading to the side patio. The light-filled formal Dining Room also has a set of French doors which lead to the side patio. Through the Dining Room is the Kitchen, with a window above the sink overlooking the backyard and an adjacent Breakfast Nook. The 2 Bedrooms on the main level have large windows with plantation shutters, spacious closets, and hardwood floors. The hallway Bathroom features a shower, separate bathtub, and a beautiful wood-carved vanity with a mirror and drawers. The lower level of the home offers a variety of uses with its 3 rooms plus a Laundry Room. The additional 1, 322 square foot lower level showcases a bright and spacious finished Family Room or Entertainment Room, 2 potential Bedrooms with closets and windows, and 1.75 Bathrooms. Additionally, there is a spacious hallway with a large closet and a workshop. The lower level can be accessed through a staircase in the Kitchen and a separate exterior staircase in the backyard. There is a long Paver stone driveway which wraps around to the back yard, and a large covered front porch. The backyard features a detached garage, a Paver stone patio, an Orange tree, and a Liquid Amber tree. This home is in close proximity to Sierra Madre's charming downtown with coffee shops, restaurants, and shopping just a few blocks away. The home also sits just one block from La Salle High School and is a short distance from Trader Joe's and Whole Foods. Additional home features include Central Air and Heating and earthquake foundation bolting.

Updated classic colonial with a guest house sitting on a quiet street with city lights views! The main house is 2326 sq ft with a 535 sq ft detached lovely guest house. Walking through the front door you will be impressed with a spacious living room with 10.5 foot high ceilings with crown moldings, wood floors, a built in cabinet and a marble faced fireplace. Actually there are 3 fireplaces in the front house. This home is made for easy entertaining with double French doors opening to a court yard with a flag stone large patio. Walking through a detailed molded entry is an extra large dining room with 9.5 foot high ceilings and also with a fireplace. The butler's pantry has plenty of storage cabinets in addition to the walk in pantry. In the kitchen are recessed lights and a seated nook for those sunlit breakfasts with instant hot water for your coffee. Granite counters are adjacent to the built in refrigerator. A separate laundry room with sink leads to the back yard with pines and a flowering tree. On the other side of the house are 2 bedrooms, both with bathrooms and walk in closets. One bedroom has a fireplace. The house has been updated with Central Heat with a new furnace in 2019 & new air conditioner in 2020, Nest thermostat, partial copper plumbing. In the back yard is a pretty guest house also with central heat & air, recessed lighting, copper plumbing, another fireplace and a full kitchen! This home has it all! If you want to live up on the hill with deer roaming free, then this home is for you!

Ideally situated atop a knoll, this south-facing, mid-century home has had only one owner since it was built in 1965. The sun-filled living room features a cozy brick fireplace and is adjacent the dining area. New flooring was installed in the entry, family room, kitchen, hall, laundry room and one bedroom. Also, there are several new light fixtures, and the interior has been freshly painted. The family room is open to the kitchen and features sliding doors that open to the backyard. The master suite features a three-quarter bath, there are two additional bedrooms, a full bath in the hallway and a separate laundry room offering access to the side yard. You'll enjoy spending time on the back patio as it is the perfect place for intimate family meals or get-togethers with friends while appreciating the views of the majestic San Gabriel mountains. The spacious backyard is perfect for children and pets. There is a 2-car detached garage and a long driveway that can accommodate several vehicles! The property location is highly desirable as it is in north Sierra Madre and on a street not heavily traveled. Nearby is the quaint downtown village of Sierra Madre with eateries, boutique shopping, Starbucks, and close to hiking in the Sierra Madre Canyon, Mount Wilson, Chantry Flats and Eaton Canyon and the Sierra Madre Elementary School.

Adorable Single Story Home in Sierra Madre! Some of the features of this 1, 224 Square Foot home are: 2 Bedrooms; 1 Bathroom; Expansive Living Room; Formal Dining Room; Laundry closet: Large Eat-In Kitchen with lots of Cabinets; Enclosed Patio/Recreation room great for entertaining (not included in square footage); Hardwood Floors; 1 Car Detached Garage; Plenty of Storage; Mountain Views; There is so much potential to either build a dream home or rehab the existing home!! Close to Parks, Recreation Center Pool, Shopping, Hiking Trails and Sierra Madre Dining! See the 3D Tour at

This sophisticated and serene single-story traditional home is perfectly situated in the quaint town of Sierra Madre. Defined by charm and elegance, this home has been completely remodeled and updated throughout. The inviting front porch and entry sets the stage for this fabulous home. The expansive living room with a fireplace and sliding glass doors flows beautifully into the dining room w/wainscoting. Enjoy the state-of-the-art gourmet kitchen with custom cabinetry, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, built-in wine fridge, and breakfast bar. The open floor plan extends into the large but cozy family room featuring built-in bookshelves and desk. The spacious master suite boasts two closets, an elegant bathroom with dual sinks, and ample room to relax and enjoy views of the beautiful backyard. Three additional guest bedrooms with the fifth bedroom currently being used as a home office. The outdoor living space is extraordinary with an amazing covered patio, built-in bar/BBQ, fire pit, saltwater pool and spa, sports court and center stage area all set amongst the English gardens and walkways. The separate and private guest house offers almost 900 sq ft of living area including a living room, dining area, kitchen, oversized bedroom with dual closets and recently remodeled bathroom with large shower. Additional amenities include gorgeous hardwood floors throughout, crown moldings, recessed lighting, and 2-car direct access attached garage. Come experience this spectacular property located in a highly desirable neighborhood.
This Sierra Madre two-story home offers a two-car garage.

Nestled beneath Mt. Wilson, this majestic mid-century masterpiece is situated over an acre in an astounding secluded setting that erases the boundary between your living space and the beautiful outdoors. The three-level design by local architect Harlan H. Pedersen, a long-time Sierra Madre resident, captures the best of both contemporary details and Mad Men era indulgences. Modern updates include a sleek kitchen with custom cabinetry, generous built-in storage, and quartz countertops, as well as a primary bedroom with sunken stone-lined tub, and shower with a luxurious steam unit. Pamper your visitors with their own private entrance to the downstairs guest unit, and allow them to enjoy the custom infinity pool/ spa/ grotto with 11 waterfalls all handcrafted from natural three river stone imported from Idaho, the installation affords its own expansive views of the mountains as well as the city lights far below. Magical. Attention to detail is apparent throughout, from the architecture itself to the vibrant lighting cast from the original Cuatro Lunas globe pendants. The dramatic great room soars with floor-to-ceiling glass and post and beam vaulted ceilings that emphasize breathtaking views, with a gas line-equipped fireplace that sets the mood for sophisticated relaxation. Admire the majestic, unobstructed mountain views while listening to the trickle of waterfalls from the hillside above the infinity pool. Simply walk out onto the front balcony to take in the stunning nighttime views of the city below or from the private balcony from the primary bedroom to savor a true retreat-like experience.

Rare opportunity to buy vacant land in the City of Sierra Madre. Located on an establish street with a buildable rectangular 7, 537 sqft lot and potential view of city lights. Previous home was a 1921 Craftsman bungalow multi-family. Property is zoned for Single Family Residence. Check with the City for development opportunities. Enjoy the gorgeous mountain views and short distance to Sierra Madre canyon. Great opportunity to build a DREAM home!

On the market for the first time in over 40 years, this 3 bed, 2 bath home situated on a .37 acre lot is a rare opportunity for its newest owners! Nestled in the foothill of Mount Wilson and within walking distance to all of downtown's amenities, this is an oasis of pure Sierra Madre magic. Coveted single story house with a smart floorpan, handsome bones, and charming details thoughtfully and meticulously maintained. Newer roof, copper plumbing, updated electrical, double pane windows, newer appliances, wood paneling, working fireplace, water purifier/softener, and serene landscaping with a reverence for the surrounding environment. Amongst the majestic oak and redwood trees, enjoy a cup of coffee or a glass of wine and the company of loved ones on the canopied porch swing. With its terraces, verdant views, and backdrop of the San Gabriel mountains, this home is ideal for both relaxing and outdoor entertaining. This home is complete with a laundry room, a spacious garage with interior access, exterior outlet for EV charging, and a driveway large enough to fit an RV, boat or potential ADU. Easy 210 freeway access, bike and transit routes. Hike one of the many nearby trails or take a stroll to the neighborhood's hot spots including Beantown, Syndicate Coffee + Bakery, Monsieur Crepe, Poppy Cake Baking Company, Dakota + Rowan, Nano Cafe, Casa del Rey, Corfu, Yui Restaurant, Mary's Market, Mother Moo Creamery, and so much more! There's a reason why people flock to Sierra Madre and stay for a very long time.

Serious about perfection? This sweet 1923 Spanish-style bungalow checks all the boxes. Enter the front door to a freshly painted living room with gleaming hardwood floors and ample windows that allow the sunlight to stream in. Comfort and warmth come to mind! The kitchen offers newer stainless steel appliances and plenty of room to move around during mealtime preparation. Both bedrooms are light and bright with hardwood floors and spacious closets. On late afternoons, grab a cup of tea or a cocktail and watch the mountains illuminate with alpenglow from the privacy of the rear gardens. Recent upgrades include professional landscaping with a complete drip system, new interior and exterior lighting, earthquake retrofit and a new roof. A detached single-car garage presents the possibility of an ADU or separate studio/office. This charmer, sited on a lovely, tree-lined street, is just a stone's throw from the village center of Sierra Madre.

This single level, mid-century ranch style home offers endless opportunities for the designing mind. Owned by the same family for several decades, it offers 4 bedrooms and two baths. The elongated family room has a fireplace and a wall of windows overlooking the large, 8, 211 square foot flat lot. Possibly an ADU or a pool in the future?? Detached two car garage with workshop. Let your imagination take shape and create a masterpiece!

This two-story home in Sierra Madre has 4 beds, 3 baths, & an expansive backyard. Entering through the front door, one is struck by the entry with high ceilings, hardwood floors, the grand staircase with the custom rail, & the Tom Dixon lighting. The home was recently renovated & has hardwood floors all over the home. To the left of the entryway is the living room with a gas fireplace. Accessed through the living room is the dining room that has French doors to the side of the home. The dining room opens up to the kitchen. The kitchen is equipped with KitchenAid stainless steel appliances. Next to the kitchen is the family room which has French doors to the back patio & backyard. Off the hallway is a 3/4 bathroom. The downstairs bedroom is located to the right of the entryway with French doors that lead to the front yard. The master bedroom upstairs has a vaulted ceiling, a gas fireplace with stone finishes & a loft area off the rear door & an ensuite bathroom. The second upstairs bedroom has windows that overlook the backyard. The third upstairs bedroom has a window view of the front yard. Off the hallway is the second upstairs bathroom. The laundry room is located upstairs. There are so many things to love about this beautiful home, especially the backyard with the tree that provides a pleasant shade. There is also a finished two-car garage. You won't want to miss the opportunity to call this home yours!

Stunning! Don't miss this opportunity. Walk through an expansive glass entry into this magnificent, completely remodeled 5 bedroom, 3 bath, 3 car garage luxury home, nestled in the hills of Sierra Madre. From the open concept kitchen with all new high end appliances, through the living and dining spaces, you are welcomed into a truly impressive space. This home boasts a brand new everything from the air conditioning, roof, windows, garage doors as well as all new exterior and interior paint, new landscape, and Lutron Caseta Automation ready, there is too much to list! The seller spared no expense on this special move in ready home. Relax and enjoy the sought after Sierra Madre address and know you are home.

First time on the market since 1972, this property measures 8, 541sf and offers a perfect opportunity for those looking to update the current home & guest house or develop the property. Currently there is a quaint and cozy 3 bedroom, 2 bath home in the front, built in 1918 (approx.) and a separate 1 bedroom, 1 bath guest house at the rear, built in 1935 (apprx.) along with a 2-car carport. Both homes have their own private yards. The potential to add an ADU on the property may be an option and the potential buyer is strongly encouraged to work closely with the city's building department to determine the setbacks requirements and other possible development information the city will require to determine the maximum development possibilities, as this information is subject to change. The location is highly desirable as it at the end of a private drive and at the entry point of the Canyon. Conveniently close to hiking in the Sierra Madre Canyon, Mount Wilson, Chantry Flats and Eaton Canyon, and just minutes away from the downtown village of Sierra Madre.

Exceptional Sierra Madre Home. If buying a home is on your Wish list then be sure to take a look at this lovely property. In addition to everything the residence has to offer, the 14, 097SqFt lot is zoned R-3 (see additional remarks). Ideally located close to The Village Shops, public and private schools, and beloved local hiking trails, this remarkable property has been extensively remodeled by its current owner. The spacious floor-plan includes three large bedrooms and two bathrooms. The primary bedroom features an ensuite bath. Two classic mid-century fireplaces warm both the living and family rooms while a formal dining room provides lovely mountain views. There is an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a oversized laundry room and pantry. The newer Milgard dual pane windows fill the home with natural light. Outside, a huge private patio is surrounded by mature trees and flowering plants. Professionally designed, a portion of the garden is dedicated to raised beds where a Hunter PRO-C9 irrigation system ensures a bounty of fresh veggies and flowers all year long. The large 3-car garage with provides ample inside parking, all-the-while providing plenty of storage for treasures. There is a full basement with ground level windows and exterior access. Noteworthy Features include: Sierra Madre Schools, red oak hardwood floors, updated copper plumbing, and more. Excellent investment property. May be able to build 7-8 units. This exceptional home is move-in ready and sure to sell fast. Don't wait.

This is your chance to reimagine this classic Tollefson-designed and built home in the lovely Sierra Madre. Great curb appeal home with a lovely yard and fig tree in the front. There are beautiful hardwood floors throughout the home and you'll feel the warmth of the home with two fireplaces in both the living room and family room. The custom stained glass was designed by Susan Wallace adds great character to the home. The master bedroom is spacious with double sinks, a shower, and a full-size tub. All three bedrooms are upstairs and there is a bonus finished attic that makes a great play area or office. The backyard deck opens to an expansive shaded backyard with a 3 car garage that could be great for a converted ADU home?

9 residential units in Sierra Madre (public records reflect 10 units). Walk from Kersting Court. Please do not walk on the property. DRIVE BY ONLY. Offer 'Subject To Inspection.' DO NOT WALK ON THE PROPERTY.

Cute condo located a block from downtown Sierra Madre. The living room has a fireplace and a vaulted ceiling and the kitchen is well appointed with adequate cabinet space. The kitchen leads to a formal dining room complete with chandelier. There are two master bedrooms both with bathrooms and there is a half bathroom downstairs. Off the living room there is an outside patio. There is central air and heat and the complex has a swimming pool. Washer, dryer hookups are in the spacious two car garage.
full_street_line: 103 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit E

text: Dreaming of idyllic indoor/outdoor living in Sierra Madre? Discover this Mid-Century-inspired home peacefully set on a 19, 476 SF lot with 360-degree views of nature! Welcome guests on the beautiful wraparound porch before leading them into the 2, 853 SF layout where original character abounds, from the stylish craftsmanship throughout to the grand brick fireplace. Soft carpet flows underfoot in the living room and formal dining room illuminated by an elegant chandelier. Begin your day in the sunlit breakfast nook that adjoins the updated kitchen featuring plenty of cabinetry, granite countertops, and all the appliances an avid home cook needs. Comfortably unwind in the 5 well-sized private retreats where cooler color tones are on show to create a calm ambiance throughout. Take advantage of the serene outdoor setting to entertain your lucky guests on the covered patio or dine al fresco while lush foliage provides refreshing shade. Explore additional features, such as a newer roof, an attached 2-car garage, and much more. Come for a tour before the opportunity slips you by!

Great opportunity to own two charming homes on a lot in beautiful and quaint Sierra Madre. This is a rare opportunity with each unit having a private yard space and both homes are completely detached with separate electrical, gas and water meters! Front house is a 3 bedroom 1 1/4 Baths bungalow style home with a living room, and an eat in kitchen with 1 small bedroom/Office downstairs and 3 bedrooms upstairs. Second unit is free standing one story home with 3 bedroom and 1 bath with a 1 car covered garage as well as a very private backyard. Don't miss seeing this amazing opportunity in this lovely area, walking distance to downtown with all the shops and restaurants Sierra Madre has to offer!

Escape the hustle and bustle as the location of this property offers a peaceful setting. The current owner is only the second owner of this property, and it has not been on the market for 63 years! Now it's time for a new family to reimagine it and enjoy living there for decades to come. When the children were growing up, this spacious home was the place to gather for the children and their neighborhood friends. With four-bedrooms, three bathrooms, this home offers the perfect blend of a comfortable lifestyle and possibility. The spacious second master bedroom with balcony was added in 1965. There is new flooring in the entry, living room, updated kitchen, family room, dining room and one of the master bedrooms. The family room lends well as an office with a wall of built-in cabinets and shelves for displaying family keepsakes. This Sierra Madre treasure is a short distance to the quaint village of Sierra Madre offering boutique shopping, eateries and coffee shops and is also near hiking trails in the canyon of Sierra Madre, Eaton Canyon, Bailey Canyon and Chantry Flats. Don't wait - this gem oozes potential!

The Robert & Rachel Corey Residence, Jack Corey AIA (1954.) Built for his parents while still a student at USC and later used as his personal residence, this early design shows an astonishing level of skill and sophistication from the young architect. Corey's version of California modernism displays the influence not only of his studies under Cal Straub at USC, but also his deep appreciation for the work of Frank Lloyd Wright. He quickly became a practitioner of wooden post-and-beam architecture, evolving its design along with his mentors to influence architecture locally and beyond. On Edgeview Drive, the calm cul-de-sac location and gently descending street to street lot gave him the opportunity to develop an ideal model of the mid-century modern home. In the process of restoring the home to its former glory, HabHouse had the rare privilege of interviewing the now 91 year old architect about his design and work. The original plan remains intact- deep eaves shelter large expanses of glass walls that open in all directions to private patios and gardens. The result is a living space that feels nearly twice the size of it's measure. Views distant and near are framed by a grid of window walls. Natural light is treated with reverence. A seamless merging of period and new that has become synonymous with HabHouse projects shows up in spectacular fashion with custom birch cabinetry and Japanese sourced tile in the new kitchen and both baths. Vintage fixtures and hardware have been restored and reinstated. Beautiful old growth redwood siding has been given new life. A long lost trellis detail above the rear deck is now back in place, giving shade to outdoor living and dining areas. From here and elsewhere on the property are dramatic views of the nearby San Gabriel Mountains to the north and the expanse of city below to the south. An alley access two car garage and utility room are found at the rear of the property.

If happiness was a house, this is it! Tucked away in the magical foothill village of Sierra Madre, this fully renovated 1908 farmhouse bungalow is just a quick walk to the heart of town with so many enchanting shops and restaurants right at your fingertips. Widely published for its modern farmhouse design aesthetic, home and gardens have been featured in the LA Times, HGTV.com, Country Living Magazine, Better Homes and Gardens, ApartmentTherapy.com, and more. When you arrive at the property, be sure to sit for a moment on the Wisteria-shaded front porch and enjoy a view of the sunset setting the San Gabriel foothills aglow. Upon entering the home, you are greeted by a light filled great room with soaring ceilings. The spacious farmhouse kitchen features concrete countertops, extra wide Rohl farmhouse sink, wide plank Pergo Outlast with WetProtect waterproof floors (throughout the whole house) plus cabinet space galore. Double French doors beckon you onto the spacious covered back deck. Beyond the light-filled family room you'll find a charming guest powder room, and rounding out the main floor is the primary suite with full bath. Downstairs features two more bedrooms a full guest bath and a laundry room. The home boasts a newer roof, HVAC, plumbing, electrical, home speaker system and Nest Thermostat. The outdoor spaces are designed for year around entertaining. Organic gardens, seating, outdoor living and dining, and ideal workshop. Must see

Classic California Craftsman Bungalow set against the breathtaking San Gabriel mountain range offers charm, style and character. Set well back from the street, beautiful mature grounds with circular driveway welcome you to the front porch. Both bright and spacious, this home boasts a wonderful floor plan including an expansive living room with fireplace. The dining room is conveniently located next to the kitchen. Relax in the family room with sliding doors to the backyard. All bedrooms are conveniently located on one side of the home including a master bedroom with sliding doors to the outside. One bedroom is currently used as a home office. There is a main hallway bathroom with step-in shower. Other amenities include a large California basement for additional storage, potting shed and studio with separate entrance next to the garage - perfect for a home office, hobby room or music studio. Enjoy the fully-fenced yard with a grassy play area, mature landscape and many decks perfect for entertaining. This well tended home is a must see and ready for your personal touch! Located with close proximity to charming downtown; explore shops, restaurants, parks, famous hiking trails, schools, and the celebrated Sierra Madre Playhouse.

THIS DIAMOND IN THE ROUGH IS NESTLED IN THE MAJESTIC FOOTHILLS JUST ABOVE SIERRA MADRE Single story POOL HOME on a private lot of over 10, 000 sq ft! A flowing floor plan with original hardwood floors features a living room/dining room combo with a stone fireplace and built-in hutch, a kitchen/family room combo with a brick fireplace, extra large bedrooms and two bathrooms! Hall bath has a walk-in tub/shower and there are hand rails thru-out the house. Inside laundry room off kitchen leads to the peaceful backyard with a covered patio, wood decking and fenced off pool. Hall bath has a beautiful curb appeal with a stone driveway. Solar panels (leased), Central AC and so much more! What amazing potential to remodel and make this home your own!

Back on market:Traditional/mid-century duplex in Sierra Madre. Pride of ownership, well maintained over the years. Minutes away from downtown shopping. Each unit features two bedrooms and one bath with updated amenities. 2 one car garages and backyard landscaped with grass and trees.Both units are currently rented. Perfect for either Homeowners or Investors.

Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac lined with trees, this beautiful mid-century modern home is set on more than 15, 000 square feet and features over 100 different plants including 34 fruit trees, some exotic and rare varieties. This single-level home exudes tranquility and elegance. The combined elements of natural light and open space create an architectural masterpiece designed to entertain guests. The home features many custom-made and imported pieces: a wooden front door, an iron patio door in the master bedroom and artsy window panels, and etc. There are custom double-pane windows and screens, refinished hardwood floors and baseboards, formal living room with a marble fireplace, and a well-situated dining room. The gourmet kitchen and laundry room include high-end stainless steel appliances, a large central island, chic pendant lighting, stunning display cabinetry, marble countertops, backsplash, and a bar area adjacent to the family room which boasts a vaulted cathedral ceiling. In the family room, French doors open to a backyard oasis featuring a sparkling pool, synthetic grass, and beautiful views of the San Gabriel Mountains. Additional new features include solar panels, tankless water heater, central heating and air with Nest thermostat, recessed lights, Springwell whole-house water filtration and softener system, copper plumbing, grounded home with upgraded electrical panel, finished garage with attic, electric car charger option, a replaced pool pump, and a newer roof. Your new life awaits with this entertainer's dream home.

Wow! Where to start? Fantastic home, all on one level, with 4 bedrooms, 2 1/4 baths with Mountain views. Cool, mid-century, stone fireplace accentuates the open floor plan living room and eat in kitchen, with hardwood floors. Bright and airy kitchen has bonus of good size laundry room. Sunny backyard is an entertaining dream; a large covered patio overlooks the sparkling swimming pool, beautifully landscaped. What more can you ask for? Oh... the attached two car garage... Currently set up up as a shop but could be whatever so many possibilities.

This lovely single level home has been completely remodeled with designer touches throughout. As well as being centrally located near downtown Sierra Madre, close to schools, walking distance to parks, trails and the majestic SM mountains The kitchen has designer colors and upgraded amenities , newer flooring and cabinets. There are laundry hookups in kitchen area for convenience . The hardwood flooring is new, as is the air conditioning unit it was installed in 2019. The floor plan offers 4 spacious bedrooms 3 designer baths spacious open floor plan, the living room has large picturesque windows as well as a cozy fireplace. The home is situated on a corner lot, mature landscaping done in front and rear yards. There is a driveway in front of 2 car garage and also a circular driveway out front. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own on unique property in the magical City of Sierra Madre.

Located in the quaint town of Sierra Madre, this single story home offers four bedroom and two bathroom across 1, 703 square feet. The front of the home has a beautiful newly installed paver driveway and refreshed landscaping. You are nicely greeted by a brick fireplace as you enter the front door into a spacious living room. The living room is connected to the kitchen and dining area where you will see newly glazed tile counter tops and wood-like laminate flooring. This flooring carries through the entire home. A large laundry room is right off of the kitchen with access to the detached two car garage. The laundry room has been nicely updated with newly installed stone like vinyl flooring that provides a cohesive look as this is the same flooring in the 2 bathrooms. The master suite is quite spacious and includes a private on-suite three quarter bathroom. The remaining three bedrooms are found in the back of the home where you will also find a spacious backyard with concrete patio shaded by a beautiful avocado tree. These bedrooms share the second bathroom that is a full. This home is minutes from downtown Sierra Madre with an abundance of shops and dining. You will notice the beautiful street close to the San Gabriel Valley Mountains.

This charming California bungalow is situated on a quiet, jacaranda-lined street in Sierra Madre and features numerous Craftsman elements and accents. It was renovated in the early 2000s to provide an open floor plan for the kitchen and dining room, central air and heating, recessed lighting, tankless water heater, repaved driveway, copper plumbing, granite countertops, new hardwood floors (recently refinished), remodeled main-level Jack and Jill bathroom with mosaic tiling, and a downstairs master bedroom, full bathroom with jetted tub, laundry room, and windows and solar tube to provide ample natural light. The front lawn is graced by a majestic sycamore tree and the back yard encompasses a peaceful sanctuary populated with oak, jacaranda, lemon, plum, crepe myrtle, Carolina cherry, and other trees and hedges for privacy. The detached garage is fronted by a trellis adorned with a purple-blooming wistaria vine. This property has been cared for by the same owner for more than 37 years. Now's the chance to make it your home!

We are proud to present 175 E. Highland Ave. located near the heart of Sierra Madre which is near the foothills and a very short distance neighboring Pasadena, the Playhouse District and downtown LA. The building area is 4, 626 sq.ft, with an average unit size of apprx. 1, 150 sq.ft., and it sits on a 8, 630 sq.ft. lot. This well-designed property offers (4) 2-bed / 1-bath units with much upside potential. The units include A/C, all individual meters for gas & electric, on-site laundry room with the washers and dryers owned by landlord and ample on-site parking. Conveniently located near local shops and transportation. Please do not disturb the tenants.

Set in the deep suburbs of Sierra Madre, on a cul de sac street, sit a 1, 590 sqft, 3-bedroom, -bathroom single family home move in ready for the next lucky buyer to turn this property into the jewel of the neighborhood. On an oversized lot, surrounded by greenery, a paved walkway leads to the front door of the home and upon entering you are greeted to original hardwood flooring throughout the open floor layout. An easy flow to the large eat in kitchen that features tile countertops, white cabinetry, and built-in appliances. A hallway at the right of entry that leads to 2 bedrooms, both of which have built in closets, and a common bathroom, that's conveniently used by guest as well. A primary bedroom at the other end of the home which includes a built-in walk-in closet and an en suit bathroom. French doors that flood the space with natural lighting and give access to the backyard, extending all the way back to a grassy and shady area. Home includes an individual laundry room with a washer/dryer hookup and a detached 2 car garage that can be used a nifty workshop.

First time on the market in nearly 50 years! Located in Sierra Madre, this home has the advantage of being located in the Arcadia School District. This tri-level home sits on a large lot with many impressive features to note. When you enter this home, you will be greeted by many windows which allows for plenty of natural light. On the main level there is a designated office space, 1 bedroom and 1 full bathroom. The living room provides a cozy feel with an inviting fireplace and gleaming hardwood floors. When you enter the kitchen, take notice of the ample counter space and the breathtaking views of the backyard. Another feature to note in the kitchen is the copious storage space; plenty of cabinetry, along with closet space perfect for a pantry or a hidden desk/office space. Upstairs you will find a private master suite with a balcony providing gorgeous views of the foothills and valley. Downstairs there are two additional bedrooms, along with a full bathroom. The backyard has a large side patio with pavers perfect for outdoor gatherings and barbecues. Out back there are many deer tolerant plants, an avocado tree and a mandarin orange tree. Incredible views of the foothills and valley!

Located on a tree lined desirable street in Sierra Madre steps from park & recreation center is this delightful, 1876 sq ft ltwo story cottage. Spacious living room w/lovely Federal fireplace, coved ceilings & delicate chair rails. Cozy inset dining room, hardwood flooring & a gourmet kitchen with stainless appliances, quartz counter tops, Alder cabinetry, self closing drawers, composite sink, inlaid tile design & a charming garden window. Convenient built-in stackable laundry. Two ample sized downstairs bedrooms share a full remodeled hallway bath. Upstairs to the generous master-suite with tall ceilings, north mountain vistas, over-sized walk-in closet & remodeled full bath with tile inlay. A large family room w/new engineered oak floors provides access to the attached garage, the rear pavered patio & sylvan rear yard. Relax, retreat under the shade of a graceful line of Crepe Myrtles, surrounded by Lemon, Tangerine, Pear, Apple & Avocado trees, all waiting for you in your private backyard with a bonus play house/art studio or office with electrical & window a/c. Freshly painted interior & exterior, central air, tankless water heater, copper plumbing, upgraded electrical, whole house water filter, vinyl windows, wired alarm system, double attached garage & concrete drive. A hidden treasure awaits in the quaint village of Sierra Madre!!!

Sierra Madre Cottage Hideaway with Views!Located in Little Santa Anita Canyon, this charming 1947 rustic bungalow is full of character and charm. The home includes a generous living room with beamed ceilings and hardwood floors, a large kitchen with breakfast area, and a full bath with private outdoor shower. Upstairs are two bedrooms with ample storage. A private rear patio as well as a large front porch and brick patio provide plenty of space for outdoor entertaining and valley views. This charming mountain bungalow is convenient to local trails and Mary's Market.

This classic 1923 vintage home offers charm, style and character. The welcoming front door opens to a large living room with hardwood floors, high ceilings and a brick fireplace flanked by window seats with hidden storage. The formal dining room features a decorative tin ceiling, wall sconces and a sparkling pendant light fixture. The open country kitchen features wood cabinets, butcher block countertops, ample storage, center island, a breakfast room with a built-in, wall-length cabinet and a view of the rear yard. The 1, 736 square foot house offers a total of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms including a master suite with walk-in closet, and a master bathroom with new mirror and flooring. Other amenities include central air and heat, hardwood floors, crown and base moldings, high ceilings, wall sconces, wood windows, glass door knobs, a restored pocket door, a separate laundry room, an original built-in telephone cubby space with a pull down seat, and a California basement. The property includes a 526 square foot back house and a workshop (both the back house and workshop need TLC). The combined living space of the front and back house is 2, 272 square feet. The expansive 10, 251 square foot lot offers ample parking, drought-tolerant gardens, and mature fruit trees. The property is near Downtown Sierra Madre's many great shops and restaurants.

Nestled on a peaceful tree-lined street with peek-a-boo views of the stunning San Gabriel Mountains sits this polished and 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom farmhouse in Sierra Madre! This luxurious home catches one's eye due to its attractive curb appeal featuring the professionally landscaped yard and trees. Past the front door, one is struck by the wide plank wood floors that are consistent throughout the home, the open floor plan and the natural light. The living room has a fireplace with a custom mantle, a beam ceiling, a chandelier and windows to the front and rear yard. The living room opens up to the kitchen & dining area. The kitchen is updated and has wooden cabinets, a center island with a quartz countertop, a marble backsplash, hood, farmhouse sink, base molding, and brand new KitchenAid stainless steel appliances including: a refrigerator, dishwasher, an oven & a 5 burner range with sleek pot filler. The dining area has base molding, additional cabinets with quartz countertops & pull out drawers, & French Doors that lead to the backyard. On the other side of the home sits four bedrooms, the three bathrooms, and the laundry room. The first bedroom has recessed lighting, a closet & windows facing the front grounds. Next to the bedroom is the bathroom which has a dual sink/vanity, enclosed walk in-shower, tub. The second bedroom features a closet, base molding, &a window facing the side of the home. Next to the room is the laundry room. The third bedroom has recessed lighting, base molding, a large walk-in closet & a window facing the side of the home. Right off the hallway is the second bathroom which has white tile flooring, a glass enclosed shower, and a quartz countertop vanity. Towards the end of the hallways sits the primary bedroom that has an oversized walk-in closet, a built-in dry bar with a wine fridge, large windows and direct access to the outdoor area. The en suite bathroom has tile floors, drop pendant lighting, a dual vanity with a quartz countertop, dual sinks, an enclosed shower, and a separate tub. There are many things to love about this home, especially the expansive backyard which has a newly built deck that has a built-in bench. Additionally, there is a detached finished garage as well as a bonus structure that is also drywalled, painted, and with recessed lighting. This bonus space is perfect for creating an office, a home gym, a game room, or a separate ADU. Don't miss the opportunity to call this luxurious Sierra Madre gem yours!

Seeking a stylish townhome in a desirable Sierra Madre location? Grab the chance to explore this must-see end unit located in a secure gated complex. Newly installed laminate flooring paired with custom molding greets you as you enter the freshly painted interior. A sunlit bedroom and a tastefully designed bath offer an ideal spot to create a secondary primary retreat. Ascend into the living room and take in the stunning mountain views as the large bay window lets in an abundance of natural light and overlooks the community swimming pool. Delight the home chef in the cheerful kitchen equipped with granite countertops and all the appliances you need. Savor gourmet meals in the adjacent dining that accesses your private balcony. Retire in privacy to your upper-level primary retreat adorned with soft carpeting, a large closet, and a thoughtfully designed ensuite. From the downstairs bedroom, you'll have direct access to your private patio where there's room to enjoy an al fresco meal or spend time relaxing in the fresh air. For sunbathing and recreation, the pool is just seconds away. This incredible townhome is set in an unbeatable location that's close to popular shopping and dining destinations. You'll be living just a few blocks from downtown Sierra Madre and Sierra Vista Park. Everything you could ever ask for awaits in this move-in-ready residence, so come take a tour before it's gone for good!
full_street_line: 125 E Sierra Madre Blvd Unit F

text: Located in the quaint city of Sierra Madre, this delightful property exudesoutstanding curb appeal and glorious views of the foothills. A welcoming front porchgives entry to this light filled home. There are extensive windows and French doorsthroughout, inviting views of the lushly landscaped gardens. Hardwood flooring, crown molding, and recessed lighting are found throughout much of the home. Thecook's kitchen has newer stainless appliances and overlooks a lovely patio with a wisteria-covered trellis. There is a lower level that features a bedroom, plus anadjoining bonus room with built-in entertainment center, built-in speakers, and desk area. The downstairs also features a wet bar and wine cellar. Situated in the middle of the verdant rear gardens is an enchanting gazebo with ceiling fan. A spacious guest apartment above the garage has newer kitchen appliances plus an in wallAC/Heating unit. The guest apartment enjoys captivating city light and mountainviews. Tucked beside the garage and guest apartment is a large area dedicated to RVparking and storage.Additional Features:Guest Apartment - 528 SqFt (t) - Studio with Kitchen and Bath, Hot Water Recirculating System, Ecobee Smart Thermostat, B-Hyve Smart Sprinkler Controllers, Fire Suppression Sprinkler System, RV Hookups, Whole House Vacuum Set up, Fruit Trees - Grapefruit, Navel Oranges, Tangerine, and Lemon

Don't miss this wonderful opportunity in the highly sought-after City of Sierra Madre. Pristine 4 bedroom, 3 bath home situated on a large lot. Enter the living room with cozy, stacked stone fireplace which opens up to the family and dining rooms. Updated kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances and breakfast bar. Laundry room is off the kitchen with an abundance of cabinets. Access the beautiful backyard through the family room and master suite. The over-sized master suite offers a full, updated bathroom and large walk-in closet. Additional bedrooms offer large closets. All bathrooms have been updated nicely. Some of the great features include: an expansive yard with matured landscaping, pool, spacious family room, natural light throughout, finished 2-car garage, additional parking in the driveway and a 200-amp electric panel. Within close proximity to the 210 freeway, parks, eateries, entertainment and the metro. Move in ready and a MUST SEE!

Very rare opportunity to own a unique property in one Sierra Madre's nicest locations. This property consists of 5 different structures on over 20, 000 square Foot lot facing South. There are three single family homes with their own kitchen and bathrooms as well as Family Rooms, the other 2 structures consist of a Studio and an a totally updated Office with beautiful windows and Fleetwood Doors. The grounds are beautiful and could be your own little compound. Most of these structures have been updated with copper plumbing, electrical panel, new gas lines, all new interior painting, new flooring, New roof - with architectural shingles and new gutters, New tile flooring, tile shower, new bathtub, toilet, sinks, faucets and new milgard windows. Another cool feature is the 3-zoned mini-split A.C. system as well as the reverse osmosis system. The primary residence is gorgeous and completely updated with gorgeous windows, Fleetwood Doors and 2 spacious bedrooms and a large family room. This property is definitely a site to see and you probably wont find anything similar to it ever again in Sierra Madre. Very close to Sierra Madre's quaint downtown and to all restaurants, entertainment and nearby schools. Don't miss out on viewing this very special property.

This inviting single-level Ranch style home has four bedrooms and two baths. It is ideally located in a very sought-after area of the Village of Sierra Madre. The lovely curb appeal with drought tolerant landscaping entices you to the formal entry. When you enter you will be surprised by the open living room and dining areas. A wall of glass in the adjoining covered enclosed patio/family room perfectly frames the swimming pool and lush rear yard with delightful areas for entertaining. The kitchen with it's original cabinetry & newer white tile counter tops has a cozy eating area. In addition there are beautiful wood floors throughout the home. The two baths have also been updated. This is the first time in 45 years that this wonderfully cared for property has been offered for sale. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own this gem and make it your own dream home.

This beautifully designed custom built home offers 4 bedrooms and 3 baths. It features wood floors throughout the first floor and wall-to-wall carpeting on the second floor. The windows are covered with custom made plantation shutters. The family room with soaring ceilings and fireplace provides a bright yet cozy atmosphere. The gourmet kitchen offers timely quality amenities including ample cabinets, granite counter tops, built-in ovens & microwave, stainless steel refrigerator & dishwasher plus a nice size pantry.
