The first floor bedroom with a three-quarter bath leads to a beautiful patio and back yard that includes a built-in BBQ, fireplace, waterfall, fountain and in-ground spa with a locking safety cover. Upstairs you will find the main bedroom and full bath with a spa tub. The additional two upstairs bedrooms have a shared full bath. The landscape includes orange, apple and olive trees along with plumeria, hibiscus and wisteria all of which create a private outdoor environment that is truly a peaceful place to unwind and enjoy this unique gem. In addition, the exterior was freshly painted in 2020. There is also a new AC, water heater, water softener and spa pump.

First time on the market since 1973, this property's current zoning is R3. It has a lot size of nearly 12, 000 square feet (62 X 193) which is perfect for those looking to develop. According to the Sierra Madre building department, the extremely preliminary numbers allow for 6, 541 square feet of building and up to 4 units. This information is subject to change as the potential buyer works closely with the city's building department to determine the setbacks requirements and other possible development information the city will require to determine the maximum development possibilities. Currently there is a quaint and cozy one bedroom, one bath home built in 1907 on the property with an older 1-car garage. The location is highly desirable as it is near the quaint downtown village of Sierra Madre with eateries, boutique shopping, Starbucks, and close to hiking in the Sierra Madre Canyon, Mount Wilson, Chantry Flats and Eaton Canyon and the Sierra Madre Elementary School.

This is a gorgeous home fully renovated with high quality design and totally rebuilt like new. Very quiet neighborhood in North Sierra Madre, walking distance to downtown Sierra Madre. Property is south facing with a unique Mid Century Modern Farmhouse style. Open floor plan with bright and airy feeling throughout interior. Great 3 bed, 2 bath family home with large entertaining area in Living room that opens to a fully remodeled gourmet kitchen and spacious patio in backyard perfect for large gatherings and children's play area. Totally upgraded throughout in 2018. Newly added 4 steps up to beautiful large master suite with walk-in closet, full bathroom with large built-in soaking tub, dual sinks and walk-in shower with rain shower head. All Major systems upgraded, including New electrical 200 amp panel, New PEX piping plumbing, New roof, New HVAC unit with Nest thermostat. New kitchen has modern flat-front high gloss cabinets, Quartz counter tops, Stainless steel appliances, and chrome plumbing fixtures in both kitchen and bathrooms. New Vinyl Milgard dual pane windows, sliding patio doors with custom window shades. Fire sprinklers, LED recessed lighting and beautiful European Oak engineered hardwood floors. Smart LIFT Master garage control system with insulated steel back garage door. Outdoor sprinklers for lawn with smart Rachio control system. Drought tolerant landscaping in front yard with drip line irrigation system. Two-tier terraced backyard with grass area for family and friends BBQ gatherings.

Good things do come in small packages and this home packs a punch! Freshly painted and polished, this classic 1890 Sierra Madre cottage is ready for its debut! Bay windows and hardwood floors enhance the charm of the living room. The kitchen is updated and has its own bay window over the sink with a view to the garden. There are three bedrooms and 1.75 baths. The den has a cozy brick fireplace for cold winter nights. The rear patio is compact and private for intimate outdoor dining. The carport is currently used for storage. Sip your morning coffee from the front porch swing and watch the world go by. Come home to this darling cottage that is warm, livable and affordable!!!

First time on the market in 40 years!! This lovingly maintained three bedroom, one and three-quarter bath home is nestled in the foothills of Sierra Madre. The warmth of the home is unmistakable as you walk through the front door and see the lovely and spacious dining room overlooking the formal living room. The kitchen is conveniently located between the dining and family rooms making the flow ideal for family gatherings and parties. Windows throughout bring the outdoors in as you nestle in front of the cozy fireplace or hang out in the family room. The outdoor spaces offer the best of both worlds as there is a fenced yard perfect for a play area and pets as well as a serene and lush patio area on the west side of the property. A true Sierra Madre gem waiting for it's new owners!

Indulge in the breathtaking mountain views on display in this inviting Sierra Madre home that offers the low-maintenance lifestyle you deserve! Enviably set on an 8, 455 sq ft lot, this chic residence offers 2, 112 sq ft across its open-concept layout. Step inside to discover natural light beaming through expansive windows to accentuate the freshly painted interior and create a welcoming ambiance throughout. Gather with lucky guests as you entertain by the fireplaces that adorn your main living areas. Even the dine-in kitchen is crafted for hosting company with a breakfast bar complimented by tile countertops and plenty of cabinetry.Flexibly choose among 5 bedrooms to relax in, all featuring soft carpet flowing underfoot. Explore additional features, such as central air/heat and a laundry room adjacent to a bedroom you could conveniently utilize as an office or a den. As a bonus, this delightful abode is close to downtown Sierra Madre for shopping, dining, recreation, and much more. Experience it all by coming on a tour before the opportunity's gone for good!

Welcome to this charming two-on-a-lot property in the quaint town of Sierra Madre. The front house features 2 bedrooms and 1 remodeled full bathroom, great remodeled kitchen, living room has floor-to-ceiling picture window to bring in an abundance of natural light, original hardwood floors, indoor laundry, front patio has new landscaping and gorgeous mountain views. The recently remodeled darling backhouse features a kitchenette, 3/4 bathroom and separate room for bedroom/office/studio. Finished basement offers additional space for recreation, play room, wine cellar or storage. Completely fenced backyard with small raised deck to enjoy morning coffee. One-car detached garage with additional parking in the driveway. Memorial Park, Library, shopping and restaurants are close by. This two-on-a lot property is a great opportunity to own two special houses in Sierra Madre.

Expand your space while keeping your privacy intact. At the end of a tree-lined drive, behind a security gate is a stunning early California Hacienda-style estate once owned by Herbert Hoover, Jr., son of the 31st President of the United States. President and Mrs. Hoover visited often and the home was known as The Winter White House . It was originally built in 1928 by local businessman, Frank Picard, and the estate included almost 6 acres of land. In 1932, when the Hoovers moved in, they added a children's wing. Word has it that the playroom, which is accessed by a slide, was designed by family friend, A. A. Milne, the author of Winnie the Pooh . The current owner has lovingly maintained the property, making necessary improvements and upgrades while respecting the architectural integrity of the building and its grounds. The main residence will impress with its expansive rooms, soaring open-beamed ceilings, updated kitchen with original ice box , four fireplaces, wood paneled library, huge formal dining room, and so much more. In addition, there is a full guest house with living room, kitchen, bedroom, bath, office, laundry room and screened-in porch. Spectacular grounds with meandering brick pathways, pool, spa, pool house, and several outdoor dining/sitting areas. This stately property and its colorful link with history reflects the graceful architecture of an earlier era. A hidden gem that is truly one of Sierra Madre's finest treasures!

Newly Remodeled Mediterranean-Style Residence on a huge 16, 557 square foot rectangular lot with privacy fence and new hedges all around. This gorgeous South Facing home blends lush gardens and fountains with modern updates while staying true to original architectural charm and details. The living room boasts vaulted ceilings, a lovely fireplace, and a large arched window with picture-perfect views of the garden and fountains. The dining room has new hardwood French doors that lead out to the shaded patio. The completely updated Kitchen boasts stainless appliances and is open to the beautiful family room which leads out to the sprawling grounds. Downstairs, there is a main level bedroom and completely remodeled bath. Upstairs, there are 2 bedrooms and an updated bath with a walk-in shower, Carrera marble vanity, and a high-end free standing soaking tub. The second story enjoys direct access to the oversized rooftop deck with breathtaking views. The resort-like grounds showcases multiple gardens, patios, and a heated pool with waterfall and Pebble Tec finish surrounded by cabanas and seating areas. Behind the 2 car garage, there is a spacious roofed area that can be used as a workshop, hobby area, or possibly converted to an ADU/office/pool house. Additional features include new energy-efficient LED recessed lighting, new Spanish tile flooring, refinished hardwood floors, new copper plumbing, new central HVAC with new Nest Thermostat, updated electrical, and automatic privacy gate. A MUST SEE ~ Don't miss your chance to own this rare breathtaking estate!

First time on the market since 1983 this charming mid-century home of nearly 1, 000 square feet is situated on an R3 lot that is approximately 50 feet wide and 150 feet deep. According to the Sierra Madre building department the extremely preliminary numbers allow for 2, 999 square feet of building (FAR) and up to 2 units. This information is subject to change as the potential buyer works closely with the city's building department to determine the setback requirements and other possible development information from the city will require to determine the maximum development possibilities. The south-facing, sun-filled living room features a cozy fireplace, wood flooring and there are plantation shutters throughout the home. There are two bedrooms, one bathroom, a cozy breakfast area in the kitchen, a separate laundry room and a detached one-car garage. Relax under the trellis and enjoy the tranquil view of the majestic San Gabriel mountains from the spacious back yard. According to city hall permit records, it appears the roof is new as of 2012; buyer to verify! The location of this property is highly desirable as it is near the quaint downtown village of Sierra Madre with eateries, boutique shopping, Starbucks, and close to hiking in the Sierra Madre Canyon, Mount Wilson, Chantry Flats and Eaton Canyon and the Sierra Madre Elementary School.

Opportunity knocks in Sierra Madre. Don't miss this single level, cul-de-sac home set against the breathtaking San Gabriel mountain range. Both bright and spacious, this home boasts a wonderful floor plan including an expansive living room w/fireplace and sliding doors to the backyard. The kitchen is a generous size, ample storage and offers an eat-in kitchen area. The dining room is conveniently located next to the kitchen. There is an additional room that could be used as a home office, den or playroom. All bedrooms are conveniently located on one side of the home including a master bedroom w/step-in shower. There is a main hallway bathroom with tub and shower. Enjoy the fully-fenced yard with a grassy play area, mature landscape and an enclosed patio perfect for entertaining. This well tended home is a must see! Located with close proximity to charming downtown; explore shops, restaurants, parks, famous hiking trails, schools, and the celebrated Sierra Madre Playhouse.

This charming craftsman home, was built in 1909, is situated in the heart of Sierra Madre. This home has been upgraded throughout the years, it offers 4 bedrooms, one full bath, one 3/4 bath and a half bath in the garage. Enjoying sitting and relaxing at the front and side patios looking at the San Gabriel mountains. As you enter into the home from the front patio, you will notice a loft which could be a potential storage area. The living room also has a dining and sitting area. Kitchen features granite countertops, brand new stainless steel appliances including refrigerator, dishwasher, and slide in gas oven stove. The 4 bedroom share 2 updated bathrooms. An outdoor laundry area is located outside of the first bedroom at the wood deck side patio. Entering the two car garage from the sliding glass door with views of the mountains offers laminate wood floors and a half bath. Other features: central air and heat, laminate floors, newer kitchen and bathroom faucets, recessed lighting, fire sprinklers throughout the house.

Sophisticated and Serene single story Pool Home in Sierra Madre! Picturesquely nestled on an oversized 11, 065sqft lot in the scenic foothills, this 3BR/2.5BA, 1, 967sqft freshly painted property emanates California panache with a modern exterior color palette, impeccable landscaping, and contemporary architectural elements. Explore the beautifully updated and meticulously maintained interior to discover gorgeous refinished oak hardwood floors, thick crown molding, an openly flowing traditional floorplan, tons of glimmering natural light, and an expansive living room with an ambiance-inducing double-sided fireplace. Be the host with most in the open concept gourmet kitchen featuring stainless-steel appliances, granite countertops, new refrigerator, new dishwasher, new oven, gas range with matching stainless-steel vent hood, white bead board cabinetry w/leaded glass, enormous pantry, center island w/seating, built-in desk, new recessed lighting, dining area, and a lovely family room with a double-sided fireplace, plantation shutters, and sliding glass doors to the outdoor space. Invite guests over to bask in the many amenities of your fully fenced-in backyard, which include a sparkling swimming pool, soothing spa, fully plumbed bar w/seating, greenery, raised redwood deck w/fantastic mountain views, and a covered patio. Additionally, the dream backyard is also a cornucopia of delicious fruit trees, which include lemon, orange, nectarine, fig, and persimmon! Sleep easy and find bliss in the primary bedroom, which has a sizeable closet, patio access, and an attached en suite with a glass enclosed shower, custom tilework, and a high 36" storage vanity. Two additional guest bedrooms are abundantly sized with dedicated closets and offer tremendous comfort for home offices, children, or overnight visitors. Other features: attached and oversized 2-car garage w/work bench, new garage door w/opener, hanging garage storage, new roof, new solid interior doors, new ceiling fans in bedrooms, new ducting, new plugs throughout, new carpet (hardwoods beneath carpeted rooms), new front yard low-voltage lighting, laundry room, close to shopping, dining, and restaurants, and much more! Call now to secure your private tour!

TWO HOMES situated on one of the most desireable streets in the sought after City of Sierra Madre. The spacious MAIN house consists of a large living room with mountain views and a sitting area with built- in bookcase to sit and enjoy your favorite book, 4 bedrooms with one that could be used as a studio or office. The main house has been freshly painted inside and out, newer plank gray-toned waterproof treasure collection flooring, two fireplaces, open floor plan, sunroom/office off the kitchen area, a kitchen that offers a large eating area and sitting room, plus laundry for easy access while kids are doing homework or you're cooking, located off the kitchen, there is a deck off the kitchen to sit and sip your morning coffee with all the peacefulness that surrounds you. Walk outside down the stairs and you have a studio with sleeping area and bathroom that's perfect for the teenager or a man cave, gym, or whatever your heart desires. You have a storage/gardening area to store all your gardening supplies located underneath the deck down in front of the studio, as well as another storage area that can be converted into a wine cellar or craft room with a door, As you walk down to the paved walkway you have a GUEST residence with 2 bedrooms, bonus room or a studio, darling kitchen and nice sized living room, 1 1/2 bath and the loft-style room that is great for additional sleeping quarters with back door to enter freely. The one larger bedroom with a separate entrance. This expansive lot has endless possibilities and is waiting for you and your family!! Don't miss out on this magnificent home on this truly remarkable street!! LOT over 19, 000 sq ft

Priced to sell. lovely single family corner house located in a quiet and nice neighborhood. good size of 3 bedroom, 2 full baths, open area with formal living, formal dining, family room and eat-in kitchen; solid hardwoods; marble tops; living room has fireplace. Full Kitchen redo cabinets, granite counters, high - end appliances, breakfast bar. up to date plumbing, electric, A/C, tile, roof, skylights, etc. Energy efficient Milgard dual pane windows. Mountain view with nice pool, and trees in the backyard. Must See to appreciate!

Majestic Mid Century Home in the highly desirable town of Sierra Madre! Some of the features of this almost 1, 600 Square Foot home are: 3 Bedrooms; 2 Bathrooms; Expansive Living Room with Fireplace; Formal Dining Room; Large Eat-In Kitchen with lots of Cabinets and a Double Oven; Jack and Jill Bedroom; Laundry Room; Hardwood Floors throughout; 2 Car Attached Garage; Newer Double-Pane windows; Ceiling Fans; Newer Roof; Quiet Cul-de-sac; Plenty of Storage; Mountain Views from Front and Back yard; Close to Parks, Recreation Center Pool, Shopping, Hiking Trails and Sierra Madre Dining! See the 3D Tour at

This is an incredible opportunity to own a truly unique home in the quaint community of Sierra Madre. This inviting and impeccably maintained two-story home has a remodeled kitchen with plenty of counter space, white shaker cabinets and a farm-style sink. Also on the first floor, you'll find the primary bedroom with a remodeled bathroom, and an open plan living/dining area, complete with a fireplace. The living space is ideal for entertaining indoors or out thanks to beautiful French doors that lead to the patio and backyard. The backyard is a Southern California dream, complete with mature trees, a grassy area and a beautiful solar-heated salt water pool. The second story of the home holds three additional bedrooms (4 total) - one with a balcony that looks out to, yes, that idyllic lush backyard. The home is completely gated in the front and back for ultimate privacy.

Welcome to this spectacular resort-like retreat you'll never want to leave offering a three-level home with elevator, expansive pool, separate cottage, multiple patios, and lush gardens. Full of charm and elegance, this property, totally rebuilt in 2018, abounds with expertly designed indoor and outdoor living spaces to provide the delights of country living with the conveniences of the city. The inviting front porch with mountain views sets the stage as you step into this fabulous home. A living room with a fireplace flows into the beautiful dining room with coffered ceiling, built-in leaded glass cabinetry and marble buffet. The heart of the home for gatherings of friends and family is the incredible state-of-the-art gourmet kitchen with center island, professional gas range, two dishwashers, trendy farm sink and second vegetable sink, inlaid tile backsplash, custom designed pendant lights, and an eating area. The open floor plan extends into the warm large family room boasting high beamed ceilings, oversized whimsical fan, and fireplace. Abundant light graces the kitchen and family room from the wall of glass doors opening to the relaxing wrap-around balcony overlooking the immense pool and spa with arching fountains and waterfall. A sunny ensuite bedroom and a second bedroom are on the first floor along with an exquisite powder room. Enjoy the luxurious upstairs primary suite boasting a fireplace, dual walk-in closets, and elegant marble bathroom with dual sinks, soaking tub with jets, separate shower, and crystal chandelier. A study/office with a balcony, a bedroom with two closets and attractive bath complete the upstairs. The elevator goes to all three levels from the lower level 645 sf garage to the upstairs primary bedroom. The outdoor living spaces abound including a large pergola covered patio poolside, a relaxing spa patio, a covered cabana, a pool bathroom, and a delightful rose covered pergola dining patio in the rear yard set among the English gardens and walkways. The separate cottage with kitchen, bath, and attached 400 sf studio offers the many options of a work-from-home office, rental income, aging parents or adult children quarters. The property also has approved plans for a 2 bedroom/1.5 bath unit. The current owners spent over $400, 000 in landscaping and improvements to create the perfect indoor and outdoor settings. This is a spectacular property that you must experience.

Majestic mountain-view Sierra Madre residence beckons. This completely ground-up redesigned single-family home has been stunningly constructed sparing no expense. Situated on an over 12, 000 SF lot, this 2, 776 SF main home features 4br and 3.5 baths. Everything is brand new from flooring, electrical, roof, to kitchen appliances and fixtures. An open floor plan with soaring 12 ceilings greets you as you enter this home. The entryway flows into a stunning open living space with an impressive oversized picture window that floods the home with warm natural light. A bright corner office is nestled off of the great room which is sure to satisfy any professionals working needs. A gourmet chef's kitchen awaits with stainless steel appliances, a Miele range, quartz countertops, gorgeous chevron backsplash, walk-in pantry, and a custom built-in bar-top perfect for satisfying all of your culinary desires. The open living space also features a walk-in wine cellar. Attention to detail is apparent throughout the home in the choice of chic, high-quality fixtures denoting a sense of timeless, understated luxury. The home features dual tank-less water heaters and an entirely redesigned HVAC system. The serene master suite is the ideal retreat with vaulted ceilings and an elegant bathroom that boasts dual vanities, an oversized walk-in shower, and a tranquil soaking tub. The home has been thoughtfully designed with state-of-the-art smart features including exterior motion-activated lighting, along with Ring and Nest systems, creating the perfect oasis for your modern lifestyle. An entertainer's dream, this home showcases a sprawling yard with meticulous landscaping and a custom fire pit with built-in seating overlooking the picturesque San Gabriel mountains. There is a bonus, finished studio complete with full bathroom (approx. 260 SF included in total SF) adjacent to the garage that could be utilized as additional living or guest space. This home is an absolute gem and a rare opportunity to own a completely remodeled home in a prime area of the Sierra Madre with close proximity to the freeway and a wide variety of shopping and dining options! We invite you to come and feel how this gorgeous newly redesigned house could become a home.

This well-maintained charming Cape Cod style home is in the highly desirable Jameson Court neighborhood of Sierra Madre, featuring quality construction of 5 bedrooms, 4 bathroom, 3709 sq.ft. and 3 fireplaces. Dramatic entry with cathedral high ceiling and skylight, leading into an stately sunken Living Room with wood floor, wood shutter windows, beveled glass windows, custom stone fireplace and vaulted ceiling. Formal dining room with wood shutter, wood floors, crown moldings and chandelier. Den/Bedroom off family on the main floor has bay windows, built-in book shelves and its own bathroom with double sink and separate toilet closet. Grand sized Family Room features full-sized wet bar with fridge, bar-tender workspace behind the fun high counter bar-stools seating for fun enjoyment; also features brick fireplace, large space above fireplace for TV, wood shutters, ceiling fan-light, wood floors, patio doors to the backyard entertainment. The state of the art kitchen is with custom built-ins, granite counter-tops, center island with 6 burners, L-Shape counter-tops with corner-sink, stainless appliances, walk-in pantry, individual laundry room, additional storage closet and a charming breakfast nook with patio door to the backyard and a 3-car garage & an attached bathroom. Upstairs features the main bedroom/bathroom suite with vaulted ceiling, own fireplace, a well-lite sitting area, French door to balcony, beautiful full size bathroom, walk-in closet. Three other good-sized bedrooms with plantation shutters, wood floors and ample closed space. Systems include 2 zoned central air conditioning/heatings. Additional works done by Seller include: Granite counters & upgraded tiles in all bathrooms, new water softener/treatment system (2019), new water heater (2018), new roof tiles (2019). Must see to appreciate this turn key home within the charming city of Sierra Madre.
